original: taṃ pana dhammasaṃvaṇṇanāsu viññūnaṃ bahumānuppādanatthaṃ, taṃ sammadeva tesaṃ uggahadhāraṇādikkamaladdhabbāya
analyzed: tam pana dhamma saṃvaṇṇanāsu viññūnam bahu māna uppādana attham tam sammat eva tesam uggaha dhāraṇā ādikkama laddhabbāya

analyzed: ca saṃvaṇṇanāyam ratanattaya paṇāma kiriyā atha vā ratanattaya paṇāma karaṇam pūjanīya pūjā puñña visesa nibbattana attham

original: Taṃ attano yathāladdhasampattinimittakassa kammassa balānuppadānatthaṃ. Antarā ca

original: Tathā –

original: “Yasmiṃ mahānāma samaye ariyasāvako tathāgataṃ anussarati, nevassa tasmiṃ samaye rāgapariyuṭṭhitaṃ cittaṃ hoti, na dosa…pe… na mohapariyuṭṭhitaṃ cittaṃ hotī”tiādi,

original: Lomahaṃso na hessatī”ti ca. ;
analyzed: lomahaṃsaḥ na hessati iti ca

original: Tattha yassa vatthuttayassa vandanaṃ kattukāmo, tassa guṇātisayayogasandassanatthaṃ

original: “karuṇāsītalahadaya”ntiādinā gāthāttayamāha. Guṇātisayayogena hi vandanārahabhāvo,

original: vandanārahe ca katā vandanā yathādhippetaṃ payojanaṃ sādhetīti. Tattha yassā desanāya

original: saṃvaṇṇanaṃ kattukāmo. Sā na vinayadesanā viya karuṇāppadhānā, nāpi abhidhammadesanā

analyzed: paññā appadhānā atha kho karuṇā paññā appadhānā ti tad ubhaya ppadhānam eva tāva sammāsambuddhassa

original: thomanaṃ kātuṃ tammūlakattā sesaratanānaṃ “karuṇāsītalahadaya”ntiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha
analyzed: thomanam kātum sesa ratanānam vuttam tattha

original: kiratīti karuṇā, paradukkhaṃ vikkhipati apanetīti attho. Atha vā kiṇātīti karuṇā,
analyzed: kirati iti karuṇā para dukkham vikkhipati apaneti iti atthaḥ atha vā kiṇāti iti karuṇā

original: paradukkhe sati kāruṇikaṃ hiṃsati vibādhatīti attho. Paradukkhe sati sādhūnaṃ kampanaṃ
analyzed: para dukkhe sati kāruṇikam hiṃsati vibādhati iti attho para dukkhe sati sādhūnam kampanam

original: hadayakhedaṃ karotīti vā karuṇā. Atha vā kamiti sukhaṃ, taṃ rundhatīti karuṇā. Esā
analyzed: hadaya khedam karoti iti vā karuṇā atha vā kam iti sukham tam rundhati iti karuṇā esā

original: hi paradukkhāpanayanakāmatālakkhaṇā attasukhanirapekkhatāya kāruṇikānaṃ sukhaṃ rundhati
analyzed: hi para dukkha apanayana kāma tā lakkhaṇā atta sukha nirapekkha tāya kāruṇikānam sukham rundhati

original: vibandhatīti attho. Karuṇāya sītalaṃ karuṇāsītalaṃ, karuṇāsītalaṃ hadayaṃ assāti
analyzed: vibandhati iti karuṇāya sītalam karuṇā sītalam karuṇā sītalam hadayam assa ati

original: karuṇāsītalahadayo, taṃ karuṇāsītalahadayaṃ.
analyzed: tam karuṇā sīta lahadayam

original: Tattha kiñcāpi paresaṃ hitopasaṃhārasukhādiaparihānicchanasabhāvatāya, byāpādāratīnaṃ
analyzed: kiñca api paresam hita upasaṃhāra sukha ādi a parihāni chana sabhāva tāya byāpāda aratīnam

original: ujuvipaccanīkatāya ca parasattasantānagatasantāpavicchedanākārappavattiyā mettāmuditānampi
analyzed: uju vipaccanīka tāya ca para satta santāna gata santāpa vicchedana ākāra ppavattiyā

original: cittasītalabhāvakāraṇatā upalabbhati, tathāpi paradukkhāpanayanākārappavattiyā parūpatāpāsahanarasā
analyzed: citta sītala bhāva kāraṇa tā upalabbhati tathā api para dukkha apanayana ākāra ppavattiyā parūpa tāpa āsahana rasā

original: avihiṃsābhūtā karuṇāva visesena bhagavato cittassa cittapassaddhi viya sītibhāvanimittanti
analyzed: avihiṃsā bhūtā visesena bhagavato cittassa citta passaddhi viya sīti bhāva nimittanti

original: vuttaṃ “karuṇāsītalahadaya”nti. Karuṇāmukhena vā mettāmuditānampi hadayasītalabhāvakāraṇatā
analyzed: vuttam karuṇā mukhena vā hadaya sītala bhāva kāraṇa tā

original: vuttāti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Atha vā asādhāraṇañāṇavisesanibandhanabhūtā sātisayaṃ niravasesañca
analyzed: vuttā iti daṭṭhabbam atha vā asādhāraṇa ñāṇa visesa nibandhana bhūtā sa atisayam niravasesam ca

original: sabbaññutaññāṇaṃ viya savisayabyāpitāya mahākaruṇābhāvaṃ upagatā karuṇāva bhagavato

original: atisayena hadayasītalabhāvahetūti āha “karuṇāsītalahadaya”nti. Atha vā satipi mettāmuditānaṃ
analyzed: āha atha vā

original: sātisaye hadayasītibhāvanibandhanatte sakalabuddhaguṇavisesakāraṇatāya tāsampi kāraṇanti
analyzed: sa atisaye sakala buddha guṇa visesa kāraṇatāya tāsam pi

original: karuṇāva bhagavato “hadayasītalabhāvakāraṇa”nti vuttā. Karuṇānidānā hi sabbepi buddhaguṇā.
analyzed: karuṇā ava bhagavataḥ hadaya sītala bhāva kāraṇan ti vuttā karuṇā nidānāḥ hi sabbe pi buddha guṇāḥ

original: Karuṇānubhāvanibbāpiyamānasaṃsāradukkhasantāpassa hi bhagavato paradukkhāpanayanakāmatāya
analyzed: karuṇā anubhāva nibbāpiyamāna saṃsāra dukkha santāpassa hi bhagavato para dukkha apanayana kāma tāya

original: anekānipi asaṅkhyeyyāni kappānaṃ akilantarūpasseva niravasesabuddhakaradhammasambharaṇaniratassa
analyzed: anekāni api asaṅkhyeyyāni kappānam a kilanta rūpassa iva niravasesa buddha kara dhamma sambharaṇa niratassa

original: samadhigatadhammādhipateyyassa ca sannihitesupi sattasaṅkhārasamupanītahadayūpatāpanimittesu
analyzed: samadhigata dhamma ādhipateyyassa ca sannihitesu pi satta saṅkhāra samupanīta hadaya upatāpa nimittesu

original: na īsakampi cittasītibhāvassa aññathattamahosīti. Etasmiñca atthavikappe tīsupi avatthāsu
analyzed: na īsakam pi citta sīti bhāvassa aññathattam ahosi iti etasmin ca attha vikappe tīsu pi avatthāsu

original: bhagavato karuṇā saṅgahitāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
analyzed: bhagavato karuṇā saṅgahitā iti daṭṭhabbam

original: Pajānātīti paññā, yathāsabhāvaṃ pakārehi paṭivijjhatīti attho. Paññāva ñeyyāvaraṇappahānato

original: pakārehi dhammasabhāvajotanaṭṭhena pajjototi paññāpajjoto. Savāsanappahānato visesena
analyzed: pakārehi dhamma sabhāva jotana ṭṭhena pajjoto ti paññāpajjoto sa vāsanā pahānataḥ visesena

analyzed: hatam samugghātitam vihatam paññāpajjotena vihatam paññāpajjota vihatam muyhanti

original: andhakārasarikkhatāya tamo viyāti tamo, paññāpajjotavihato mohatamo etassāti paññāpajjotavihatamohatamo,
analyzed: andhakāra sa rikkha tāya tamaḥ viyā ati tamo paññā pajjota vihataḥ moha tamo etassa ati paññā pajjota vihata moha tamo

original: taṃ paññāpajjotavihatamohatamaṃ. Sabbesampi hi khīṇāsavānaṃ satipi paññāpajjotena
analyzed: tam paññāpajjota vihata mohatamam sabbesam pi hi khīṇāsavānam sati pi paññāpajjotena

original: avijjandhakārassa vihatabhāve saddhāvimuttehi viya diṭṭhippattānaṃ sāvakehi paccekasambuddhehi
analyzed: avijja andhakārassa vihata bhāve saddhā vimuttehi viya diṭṭhippattānam sāvakehi paccekasambuddhehi

original: ca savāsanappahānena sammāsambuddhānaṃ kilesappahānassa viseso vijjatīti sātisayena
analyzed: ca sa vāsanā pahānena sammāsambuddhānam kilesa ppahānassa visesaḥ vijjati iti sa atisayena

original: avijjāpahānena bhagavantaṃ thomento āha “paññāpajjotavihatamohatama”nti.
analyzed: avijjā apahānena bhagavantam thomentaḥ āha paññā pajja uta vihata moha taman ti

original: Atha vā antarena paropadesaṃ attano santāne accantaṃ avijjandhakāravigamassa nibbattitattā,
analyzed: atha vā antarena para upadesam attano santāne accantam avijja andhakāra vigamassa

original: tathā sabbaññutāya balesu ca vasībhāvassa samadhigatattā, parasantatiyañca dhammadesanātisayānubhāvena
analyzed: tathā sabbaññutāya balesu ca vasībhāvassa samadhigata ttā para santatiyam ca dhamma desanā atisaya anubhāvena

original: sammadeva tassa pavattitattā bhagavāva visesato mohatamavigamena thometabboti āha
analyzed: sammat eva tassa pavatti tattā bhagavā ava visesataḥ moha tama vigamena thometabbaḥ iti āha

original: “paññāpajjotavihatamohatama”nti. Imasmiñca atthavikappe “paññāpajjoto”ti padena bhagavato
analyzed: imasmin ca attha vikappe paññāpajjota uti padena bhagavataḥ

original: paṭivedhapaññā viya desanāpaññāpi sāmaññaniddesena, ekasesanayena vā saṅgahitāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
analyzed: paṭivedha paññā viya desanā paññā api sāmañña niddesena ekasesa nayena vā saṅgahitā ti daṭṭhabbam

original: Atha vā bhagavato ñāṇassa ñeyyapariyantikattā sakalañeyyadhammasabhāvāvabodhanasamatthena
analyzed: atha vā bhagavataḥ ñāṇassa ñeyya pariyantika ttā sakala ñeyya dhamma sabhāva avabodhana samatthena

original: anāvaraṇañāṇasaṅkhātena paññāpajjotena sabbañeyyadhammasabhāvacchādakassa mohandhakārassa

original: vidhamitattā anaññasādhāraṇo bhagavato mohatamavināsoti katvā vuttaṃ “paññāpajjotavihatamohatama”nti.
analyzed: vidhamita ttā anañña sādhāraṇaḥ bhagavataḥ moha tama vināsaḥ ti katvā vuttam paññāpajja uta vihata moha taman ti

original: Ettha ca mohatamavidhamanante adhigatattā anāvaraṇañāṇaṃ kāraṇūpacārena sasantāne
analyzed: ettha ca moha tama vidham anante adhigata ttā anāvaraṇa ñāṇam kāraṇa upacārena sa santāne

original: mohatamavidhamananti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Abhinīhārasampattiyā savāsanappahānameva hi kilesānaṃ
analyzed: mohatama vidhamananti daṭṭhabbam abhinīhāra sampattiyā sa vāsanā pahānam eva hi kilesānam

original: ñeyyāvaraṇappahānanti, parasantāne pana mohatamavidhamanassa kāraṇabhāvato anāvaraṇañāṇaṃ
analyzed: ñeyya āvaraṇa pahānam ti para santāne pana moha tama vidhamanassa kāraṇa bhāvataḥ anāvaraṇa ñāṇam

original: “mohatamavidhamana”nti vuccatīti.
analyzed: vuccati iti

original: Kiṃ pana kāraṇaṃ avijjāsamugghātoyeveko pahānasampattivasena bhagavato thomanānimittaṃ
analyzed: kim pana kāraṇam pahāna sampatti vasena bhagavataḥ thomanā nimittam

original: gayhati, na pana sātisayaṃ niravasesakilesappahānanti? Tappahānavacaneneva tadekaṭṭhatāya
analyzed: gayhati na pana sa atisayam niravasesa kilesa pahānan ti tad pahāna vacanena iva tad ekaṭṭhatāya

original: sakalasaṃkilesagaṇasamugghātassa jotitabhāvato. Na hi so tādiso kileso atthi, yo
analyzed: sakala saṃkilesa gaṇa samugghātassa jotita bhāvataḥ na hi so tādisaḥ kileso atthi yaḥ

original: niravasesaavijjāppahānena na pahīyatīti.
analyzed: niravasesa avijjā pahānena na pahīyati iti

original: Atha vā vijjā viya sakalakusaladhammasamuppattiyā niravasesākusaladhammanibbattiyā
analyzed: atha vā vijjā viya sakala kusala dhamma samuppattiyā niravasesa akusala dhamma nibbattiyā

original: saṃsārappavattiyā ca avijjā padhānakāraṇanti tabbighātavacanena sakalasaṃkilesagaṇasamugghāto
analyzed: saṃsāra ppavattiyā ca avijjā padhāna kāraṇan ti tad bighāta vacanena sakala saṃkilesa gaṇa samugghātaḥ

original: vuttoyeva hotīti vuttaṃ “paññāpajjotavihatamohatama”nti.
analyzed: vuttaḥ yā iva hoti iti vuttam

original: Narā ca amarā ca narāmarā, saha narāmarehīti sanarāmaro, sanarāmaro ca so loko cāti
analyzed: narā ca amarā ca nara amarā saha nara amara ihi iti sa nara amaraḥ sa nara amaraḥ ca saḥ lokaḥ ca ati

original: sanarāmaraloko. Tassa garūti sanarāmaralokagaru, taṃ sanarāmaralokagaruṃ. Etena devamanussānaṃ
analyzed: sa nara amara lokaḥ tassa garu uti sa nara amara loka garu tam sa nara amara loka garum etena deva manussānam

original: viya tadavasiṭṭhasattānampi yathārahaṃ guṇavisesāvahatāya bhagavato upakāritaṃ dasseti.
analyzed: viya tad avasiṭṭha sattānam pi yathāraham guṇa visesa āvahatāya bhagavataḥ upakāritam dasseti

original: Na cettha padhānāppadhānabhāvo codetabbo. Añño hi saddakkamo, añño atthakkamo. Edisesu
analyzed: na ca ittha padhāna appadhāna bhāvaḥ codetabbaḥ aññaḥ hi sadda kkamaḥ aññaḥ attha kkamaḥ edisesu

original: hi samāsapadesu padhānampi appadhānaṃ viya niddisīyati yathā “sarājikāya parisāyā”ti.
analyzed: hi samāsa padesu padhānam pi appadhānam viya niddisīyati yathā sa rājikāya parisāya ati

original: Kāmañcettha sattasaṅkhārokāsavasena tividho loko, garubhāvassa pana adhippetattā
analyzed: kāmañca ittha satta saṅkhāra ukāsa vasena tividhaḥ lokaḥ garu bhāvassa pana adhippeta ttā

original: garukaraṇasamatthasseva yujjanato sattalokassa vasena attho gahetabbo. So hi lokīyanti
analyzed: garu karaṇa samatthassa iva satta lokassa vasena atthaḥ gahetabbaḥ saḥ hi lokīyanti

original: ettha puññapāpāni tabbipāko cāti “loko”ti vuccati. Amaraggahaṇena cettha upapattidevā adhippetā.
analyzed: ettha puñña pāpāni tad vipāko ca ati loko ti vuccati amara ggahaṇena ca ittha upapatti devāḥ adhippetā

original: Atha vā samūhattho lokasaddo samudāyavasena lokīyati paññāpīyatīti. Saha narehīti
analyzed: atha vā samūha atthaḥ loka saddo samudāya vasena lokīyati paññāpīyati iti saha narehi iti

original: sanarā, sanarā ca te amarā cāti sanarāmarā, tesaṃ lokoti sanarāmaralokoti purimanayeneva

original: saparijanānaṃ manussānaṃ maṅgalakaraṇaṃ. Samajjaṃ nāma naṭasamajjādi. Ussavo nakkhattaṃ.
analyzed: sa parijanānam manussānam maṅgala karaṇam samajjam nāma naṭasamajja ādi ussavaḥ nakkhattam

original: Yattha gāmanigamavāsino tayo satta vā divase nakkhattaghosanaṃ katvā yathāvibhavaṃ
analyzed: yattha gāma nigama vāsino tayo satta vā divase nakkhatta ghosanam katvā yathāvibhavam

original: alaṅkatapaṭiyattā bhoge paribhuñjantā nakkhattakīḷanaṃ kīḷanti. Tesaṃ taṃ tatheva
analyzed: alaṅkata paṭiyattāḥ bhoge paribhuñjantā nakkhatta kīḷanam kīḷanti tesam tam tathā iva

original: hotīti tesaṃ manussānaṃ taṃ patthanaṃ tannivāsidevatānubhāvena yebhuyyena tatheva
analyzed: hoti iti tesam manussānam tam patthanam tad nivāsi devatā anubhāvena yebhuyyena tathā iva

original: hoti, patthanā samijjhatīti attho. Bahujanakantatāyāti iminā “sundarakāmattā”ti etasseva
analyzed: hoti patthanā samijjhati iti atthaḥ bahu jana kanta tāya ati iminā sundara kāma ttā ati etassa iva

original: padassa pakārantarena atthaṃ vibhāveti. Tatrāyaṃ vacanattho – kamanīyaṭṭhena suṭṭhu

analyzed: subhagan ti evam pa ittha attham vaṇṇenti keci pana subhāga vana iti paṭhanti sundara bhūmi bhāge

original: “subhagavana”nti aññe. Vananaṃ bhattītiatthe taṃ vananaṃ kāretīti etasmiṃ atthe vanayatīti
analyzed: subhaga vananti aññe vananam bhattī iti atthe tam vananam kāreti iti etasmin atthe vanayati iti

original: padasiddhi veditabbā. Tenevāha “attani sinehaṃ uppādetī”ti. Yācanatthe vanute iti
analyzed: pada siddhi veditabbā tena iva āha attani sineham uppādeti iti yācana atthe vanute iti

original: vananti upacārakappanāvasena vana-saddo veditabbo.
analyzed: vananti upacāra kappanā vasena vana saddo veditabbo

original: Ujuvaṃsāti ujubhūtaviṭapā. Mahāsālāti mahārukkhā. Aññatarasmiṃ sālamūleti aññatarassa

original: Tatthāti “ekaṃ samayaṃ bhagavā ukkaṭṭhāyaṃ viharati subhagavane sālarājamūle”ti yaṃ
analyzed: tattha ati ekam samayam bhagavā ukkaṭṭhāyam viharati subhaga vane sālarājamūla iti yam

original: codeyya vāti attho. Atha tattha viharatīti yadi subhagavane sālarājamūle viharati.
analyzed: codeyya vāti atha tattha viharati iti yadi subhaga vane sāla rājamūle viharati

original: Na vattabbanti nānāṭhānabhūtattā ukkaṭṭhāsubhagavanānaṃ, ekaṃ samayanti ca vuttattāti
analyzed: na vattabbanti nānā ṭhāna bhūta ttā ukkaṭṭha a su bhagavanānam ekam ca vuttattā ti

analyzed: adhippāyaḥ idāni codakaḥ tam eva attanaḥ adhippāyam na hi sakkā ati ādinā vivarati itaro

original: sabbametaṃ aviparītaṃ atthaṃ ajānantena vuttanti dassento “na kho panetaṃ evaṃ daṭṭhabba”nti

original: āha. Tattha etanti “ukkaṭṭhāyaṃ viharati subhagavane sālarājamūle”ti etaṃ vacanaṃ.

analyzed: evam ti yadi tāva bhagavā ati ādinā yam tam bhavatā coditam tam atthatas evam na kho

original: Idāni attano yathādhippetaṃ aviparītaṃ atthaṃ, tassa ca paṭikacceva vuttabhāvaṃ,

analyzed: dutiyena atta adhīna kiriyā karaṇam purimena vā karuṇā kiccam itarena paññā kiccam purimena

original: Iminā nayena “bhaddante”tiādīsupi yathārahaṃ iti-saddassa attho veditabbo. Pubbe
analyzed: iminā nayena bhaddanta iti ādīsu pi yathāraham iti saddassa atthaḥ veditabbaḥ pubbe

original: “bhagavā āmantesī”ti vuttattā “bhagavato paccassosu”nti idha “bhagavato”ti sāmivacanaṃ
analyzed: bhagavā āmantesi iti vutta ttā bhagavato paccassosuṃ idha bhagavato ti sāmi vacanam

original: āmantanameva sambandhīantaraṃ apekkhatīti iminā adhippāyena “bhagavato āmantanaṃ
analyzed: āmantanam eva sambandhī antaram apekkhati iti iminā adhippāyena bhagavataḥ āmantanam

original: paṭiassosu”nti vuttaṃ. “Bhagavato”ti pana idaṃ paṭissavasambandhanena sampadānavacanaṃ
analyzed: paṭiassosunti vuttam bhagavato ti pana idam paṭissava sambandhanena sampadāna vacanam

original: yathā “devadattassa paṭissuṇotī”ti.
analyzed: yathā devadattassa paṭissuṇoti iti

original: Yaṃ nidānaṃ bhāsitanti sambandho. Etthāha – kimatthaṃ pana dhammavinayasaṅgahe kariyamāne
analyzed: yam nidānam bhāsitam iti sambandhaḥ ettha āha kimattham pana dhamma vinaya saṅgahe kariyamāne

original: nidānavacanaṃ, nanu bhagavatā bhāsitavacanasseva saṅgaho kātabboti? Vuccate – desanāya
analyzed: nidāna vacanam nanu bhagavatā bhāsita vacanassa iva saṅgahaḥ kātabbaḥ iti vuccate desanāya

original: ṭhitiasammosasaddheyyabhāvasampādanatthaṃ. Kāladesadesakanimittaparisāpadesehi upanibandhitvā
analyzed: ṭhiti asammosa saddheyya bhāva sampādana attham kāla desa desaka nimitta parisā apadesehi upanibandhitvā

original: ṭhapitā hi desanā ciraṭṭhitikā hoti asammosadhammā saddheyyā ca, desakālakattusotunimittehi
analyzed: ṭhapitā hi desanā cira ṭṭhitikā hoti asammosa dhammā saddheyyā ca desa kāla kattu sotu nimittehi

original: upanibaddho viya vohāravinicchayo. Teneva ca āyasmatā mahākassapena “mūlapariyāyasuttaṃ
analyzed: upanibaddhaḥ viya vohāra vinicchayaḥ tena iva ca āyasmatā mahākassapena mūla pariyāya suttam

original: āvuso, ānanda, kattha bhāsita”ntiādinā desādipucchāsu katāsu tāsaṃ vissajjanaṃ karontena
analyzed: āvuso ānanda kattha bhāsita nti ādinā desa ādi pucchāsu katāsu tāsam vissajjanam karontena

original: dhammabhaṇḍāgārikena “evaṃ me suta”ntiādinā imassa suttassa nidānaṃ bhāsitaṃ. Apica
analyzed: dhammabhaṇḍāgārikena evam me suta nti ādinā imassa suttassa nidānam bhāsitam apica

original: satthusampattipakāsanatthaṃ nidānavacanaṃ. Tathāgatassa hi bhagavato pubbaracanānumānāgamatakkābhāvato
analyzed: satthu sampatti pakāsana attham nidāna vacanam tathāgatassa hi bhagavataḥ pubba racanā anumāna āgama takka abhāvato

original: sammāsambuddhabhāvasiddhi. Na hi sammāsambuddhassa pubbaracanādīhi attho atthi sabbattha
analyzed: na hi sammāsambuddhassa pubba racanā ādīhi atthaḥ atthi sabbattha

original: appaṭihatañāṇacāratāya ekappamāṇattā ca ñeyyadhammesu. Tathā ācariyamuṭṭhidhammamacchariyasāsanasāvakānurodhābhāvato
analyzed: appaṭihata ñāṇa cāra tāya eka ppamāṇa ttā ca ñeyya dhammesu tathā ācariya muṭṭhi dhamma macchariya sāsana sāvaka anurodha abhāvato

original: khīṇāsavabhāvasiddhi. Na hi sabbaso khīṇāsavassa te sambhavantīti suvisuddhassa parānuggahappavatti.
analyzed: na hi sabbasas khīṇāsavassa te sambhavanti iti su visuddhassa para anuggaha ppavatti

original: Evaṃ desakasaṃkilesabhūtānaṃ diṭṭhisīlasampadādūsakānaṃ avijjātaṇhānaṃ accantābhāvasaṃsūcakehi
analyzed: evam desaka saṃkilesa bhūtānam diṭṭhi sīla sampadā dūsakānam avijjā taṇhānam accanta abhāva saṃsūcakehi

original: ñāṇasampadāpahānasampadābhibyañjakehi ca sambuddhavisuddhabhāvehi purimavesārajjadvayasiddhi,
analyzed: ñāṇa sampadā apahāna sampadā abhibyañjakehi ca sambuddha visuddha bhāvehi

original: tato eva ca antarāyikaniyyānikadhammesu sammohābhāvasiddhito pacchimavesārajjadvayasiddhīti
analyzed: tatas eva ca antarāyika niyyānika dhammesu sammoha abhāva siddhito pacchima vesārajja dvaya siddhi iti

original: bhagavato catuvesārajjasamannāgamo attahitaparahitapaṭipatti ca nidānavacanena pakāsitā
analyzed: bhagavato catu vesārajja samannāgamaḥ atta hita para hita paṭipatti ca nidāna vacanena pakāsitā

original: hoti tattha tattha sampattapariyāya ajjhāsayānurūpaṃ ṭhānuppattikapaṭibhānena dhammadesanādīpanato,
analyzed: hoti tattha tattha sampatta pariyāya ajjhāsayā anurūpam ṭhāna uppattika paṭibhānena dhamma desanā dīpanato

original: idha pana pathavīādīsu vatthūsu puthujjanānaṃ paṭipattivibhāgavavatthāpakadesanādīpanatoti
analyzed: idha pana pathavī ādīsu vatthūsu puthujjanānam

original: yojetabbaṃ. Tena vuttaṃ “satthusampattipakāsanatthaṃ nidānavacana”nti.
analyzed: yojetabbam tena vuttam satthu sampatti pakāsana ttham nidāna vacanan ti

original: Tathā sāsanasampattipakāsanatthaṃ nidānavacanaṃ. Ñāṇakaruṇāpariggahitasabbakiriyassa
analyzed: tathā sāsana sampatti pakāsana attham nidāna vacanam ñāṇa karuṇā pariggahita sabba kiriyassa

original: hi bhagavato natthi niratthikā paṭipatti, attahitatthā vā. Tasmā paresaṃ eva atthāya
analyzed: hi bhagavataḥ natthi niratthikā paṭipatti atta hita tthā vā tasmā paresam eva atthāya

original: pavattasabbakiriyassa sammāsambuddhassa sakalampi kāyavacīmanokammaṃ yathāpavattaṃ
analyzed: pavatta sabba kiriyassa sammāsambuddhassa sakalam pi kāya vacī manaḥ kammam yathāpavattam

original: vuccamānaṃ diṭṭhadhammikasamparāyikaparamatthehi yathārahaṃ sattānaṃ anusāsanaṭṭhena
analyzed: vuccamānam diṭṭhadhammika samparāyika paramatthehi yathāraham sattānam anusāsana ṭṭhena

original: sāsanaṃ, na kabyaracanā, tayidaṃ satthucaritaṃ kāladesadesakaparisāpadesehi saddhiṃ
analyzed: sāsanam na kabya racanā tayā idam satthu caritam kāla desa desaka parisā apadesehi saddhim

original: tattha tattha nidānavacanehi yathārahaṃ pakāsīyati, idha pana “pathaviyādīsu vatthūsū”ti
analyzed: tattha tattha nidāna vacanehi yathāraham pakāsīyati idha pana pathaviya ādīsu vatthūsu iti

original: sabbaṃ purimasadisameva. Tena vuttaṃ “sāsanasampattipakāsanatthaṃ nidānavacana”nti.
analyzed: sabbam purima sadisam eva tena vuttam sāsana sampatti pakāsana attham nidāna vacanan ti

original: Apica satthuno pamāṇabhāvappakāsanena sāsanassa pamāṇabhāvadassanatthaṃ nidānavacanaṃ,
analyzed: apica satthuno pamāṇa bhāva ppakāsanena sāsanassa pamāṇa bhāva dassana attham nidāna vacanam

original: tañca desakappamāṇabhāvadassanaṃ heṭṭhā vuttanayānusārena “bhagavā”ti ca iminā padena
analyzed: tat ca desa kappamāṇa bhāva dassanam heṭṭhā vutta naya anusārena bhagavā ati ca iminā padena

original: vibhāvitanti veditabbaṃ. “Bhagavā”ti iminā tathāgatassa rāgadosamohādisabbakilesamaladuccaritādidosappahānadīpanena
analyzed: vibhāvitanti veditabbam bhagavā ti iminā tathāgatassa rāga dosa moha ādi sabba kilesa mala duccarita ādi dosa ppahāna dīpanena

analyzed: sabba sattuttama bhāva dīpanena ayam attho sabbathā pakāsitaḥ hoti iti idam ettha nidāna vacana ppayojanassa mukhamatta dassanam

original: Abbhantaranidānavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
analyzed: abbhantara nidāna vaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā

original: Suttanikkhepavaṇṇanā
analyzed: sutta nikkhepa vaṇṇanā

original: Nikkhittassāti desitassa. Desanāpi hi desetabbassa sīlādiatthassa vineyyasantānesu

analyzed: desanāya samuṭṭhāne dassite suttassa sammadeva nidāna parijānanena vaṇṇanāya su viññeyya ttā

original: vuttaṃ. Evañhi “assutavā bhikkhave puthujjano”tiādinā, “yopi so, bhikkhave, bhikkhu

original: arahaṃ khīṇāsavo”tiādinā, “tathāgatopi kho, bhikkhave, arahaṃ sammāsambuddho”tiādinā

original: ca pavattadesanā anusandhidassanasukhatāya suviññeyyā hoti. Tattha yathā anekasataanekasahassabhedānipi

analyzed: ādi sutta nikkhepa vasena catubbidha bhāvanti āha cattāraḥ hi sutta nikkhepā ti

analyzed: sambhavati atta ajjhāsayo ca para ajjhāsayo ca atta ajjhāsayo ca pucchāvasiko ca aṭṭhuppattiko

analyzed: sesa nikkhepānam mūla nikkhepa vasena cattāro va dassitā tathā dassanam ca ittha ayam saṃsagga bhedaḥ gahetabbaḥ ti

analyzed: tatra ayam vacana atthaḥ nikkhipīyati iti nikkhepaḥ suttam eva nikkhepaḥ sutta nikkhepaḥ

original: Atha vā nikkhipanaṃ nikkhepo, suttassa nikkhepo suttanikkhepo, suttadesanāti attho.
analyzed: atha vā nikkhipanam nikkhepaḥ suttassa nikkhepaḥ sutta nikkhepaḥ sutta desanā ati attho

original: Attano ajjhāsayo attajjhāsayo, so assa atthi kāraṇabhūtoti attajjhāsayo. Attano ajjhāsayo
analyzed: attanaḥ ajjhāsayo attajjhāsayo so assa atthi kāraṇa bhūto ti attajjhāsayo attanaḥ ajjhāsayo

original: etassāti vā attajjhāsayo. Parajjhāsayepi eseva nayo. Pucchāya vaso pucchāvaso, so
analyzed: etassa ati vā esā iva nayo pucchāya vaso pucchāvaso so

original: etassa atthīti pucchāvasiko. Suttadesanāvatthubhūtassa atthassa uppatti atthuppatti,

original: atthuppattiyeva aṭṭhuppatti ttha-kārassa ṭṭha-kāraṃ katvā. Sā etassa atthīti aṭṭhuppattiko.

original: Atha vā nikkhipīyati suttaṃ etenāti suttanikkhepo, attajjhāsayādi eva. Etasmiṃ pana

original: attavikappe attano ajjhāsayo attajjhāsayo. Paresaṃ ajjhāsayo parajjhāsayo. Pucchīyatīti

original: pucchā, pucchitabbo attho. Pucchanavasena pavattaṃ dhammapaṭiggāhakānaṃ vacanaṃ pucchāvasikaṃ,

original: tadeva nikkhepa-saddāpekkhāya pulliṅgavasena “pucchāvasiko”ti vuttaṃ. Tathā aṭṭhuppatti

original: eva aṭṭhuppattikoti evampettha attho veditabbo.
analyzed: eva aṭṭhuppattikaḥ ti evam pi ittha atthaḥ veditabbo

original: Apicettha paresaṃ indriyaparipākādikāraṇanirapekkhattā attajjhāsayassa visuṃ suttanikkhepabhāvo
analyzed: api ca ittha paresam indriya paripāka ādi kāraṇa nirapekkha ttā visum sutta nikkhepa bhāvo

original: yutto kevalaṃ attano ajjhāsayeneva dhammatantiṭhapanatthaṃ pavattitadesanattā. Parajjhāsayapucchāvasikānaṃ
analyzed: yuttaḥ kevalam attanaḥ ajjhāsayena iva dhamma tanti ṭhapana attham pavatti ta desana ttā para jjhāsaya pucchāvasikānam

original: pana paresaṃ ajjhāsayapucchānaṃ desanāpavattihetubhūtānaṃ uppattiyaṃ pavattitānaṃ
analyzed: pana paresam ajjhāsaya pucchānam desanā pavatti hetu bhūtānam uppattiyam

original: kathamaṭṭhuppattiyaṃ anavarodho, pucchāvasikaaṭṭhuppattikānaṃ vā parajjhāsayānurodhena

original: pavattikānaṃ kathaṃ parajjhāsaye anavarodhoti? Na codetabbametaṃ. Paresañhi abhinīhāraparipucchādivinimuttasseva
analyzed: pavattikānam katham anavarodhaḥ iti na codetabbam etam paresam hi abhinīhāra paripucchā ādi vinimuttassa iva

original: suttadesanākāraṇuppādassa aṭṭhuppattibhāvena gahitattā parajjhāsayapucchāvasikānaṃ

original: visuṃ gahaṇaṃ. Tathā hi brahmajāla dhammadāyādasuttādīnaṃ vaṇṇāvaṇṇaāmisuppādādidesanānimittaṃ
analyzed: visum gahaṇam tathā hi brahmajāla dhamma dāyāda sutta ādīnam vaṇṇa avaṇṇa āmisa uppāda ādi desanā nimittam

analyzed: aṭṭhuppattī iti vuccati paresam puccham vinā ajjhāsayam eva nimittam katvā desito

original: parajjhāsayo, pucchāvasena desito pucchāvasikoti pākaṭoyamatthoti.
analyzed: parajjhāsayo pucchā vasena desito pucchāvasiko ti pākaṭaḥ yam attho ti

original: Attano ajjhāsayeneva kathesi dhammatantiṭhapanatthanti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Sammappadhānasuttantahārakoti
analyzed: attanaḥ ajjhāsayena iva kathesi dhamma tanti ṭhapana attham ti daṭṭhabbam sammappadhāna suttanta hārako ti

original: anupubbena nikkhittānaṃ saṃyuttake sammappadhānapaṭisaṃyuttānaṃ suttānaṃ āvaḷi. Tathā
analyzed: anupubbena nikkhittānam saṃyuttake sammappadhāna paṭisaṃyuttānam suttānam āvaḷi tathā

original: iddhipādahārakādayo.
analyzed: iddhipāda hāraka ādayaḥ

original: Vimuttiparipācanīyā dhammā saddhindriyādayo. Ajjhāsayanti adhimuttiṃ. Khantinti diṭṭhinijjhānakkhantiṃ.
analyzed: vimutti paripācanīyā dhammā saddhi indriya ādayaḥ ajjhāsayanti adhimuttim khantinti diṭṭhi nijjhāna kkhantim

original: Mananti cittaṃ. Abhinihāranti paṇidhānaṃ. Bujjhanabhāvanti bujjhanasabhāvaṃ, paṭivijjhanākāraṃ vā.
analyzed: mananti cittam abhinihāranti paṇidhānam bujjhana bhāvanti bujjhana sabhāvam paṭivijjhana ākāram vā

original: Uppanne māne nikkhittanti sambandho. Itthiliṅgādīni tīṇi liṅgāni. Nāmādīni cattāri
analyzed: uppanne māne nikkhittanti sambandhaḥ itthi liṅga ādīni tīṇi liṅgāni nāma ādīni cattāri

original: padāni. Paṭhamādayo satta vibhattiyo. Muñcitvā na kiñci katheti sabhāvaniruttiyā
analyzed: padāni paṭhama ādayaḥ satta vibhattiyaḥ muñcitvā na kiñci kathā iti sabhāva niruttiyā

original: tatheva pavattanato. Gaṇṭhibhūtaṃ padaṃ. Yathā hi rukkhassa gaṇṭhiṭṭhānaṃ dubbinibbedhaṃ
analyzed: tathā iva pavattanataḥ gaṇṭhi bhūtam padam yathā hi rukkhassa gaṇṭhi ṭṭhānam du binibbedham

original: duttacchitañca hoti, evamevaṃ yaṃ padaṃ atthato vivarituṃ na sakkā, taṃ “gaṇṭhipada”nti
analyzed: hoti evam evam yam padam atthataḥ vivaritum na sakkā tam gaṇṭhi padanti

original: vuccati. Anupahaccāti anuddharitvā.
analyzed: vuccati an upahacca ati an uddharitvā

original: Yena yena sambandhaṃ gacchati, tassa tassa anavasesataṃ dīpetīti iminā imassa sabba-saddassa
analyzed: yena yena sambandham gacchati tassa tassa anavasesa tam dīpeti iti iminā imassa sabba saddassa

analyzed: idha api atisayaḥ pasaṃsā vā attho tasmā yassa pasaṃsitam atisayena vā sutam atthi

analyzed: apaccayāḥ dhammā ati paccaya uppannam hi paccaya sambandhi iti

analyzed: amanussaḥ ti tad bhāva matta nivattiyam manussa mattam na atthi aññam samāna nti sadisa tā

analyzed: tad niṭṭhānam hi ettha pakāsitanti evam anekesam atthānam jotakaḥ idha pana arūpinaḥ

analyzed: bāhusaccam hoti yathā āha kittāvatā nu kho bhante bahu ssutaḥ hoti yatas kho bhikkhu

original: puthujjanā. Avighātameva vā jana-saddo vadati. Puthu satthārānaṃ mukhamullokikāti

original: Rāgaggiādayo santāpā. Te eva, sabbepi vā kilesā pariḷāhā. Puthu pañcasu kāmaguṇesu

analyzed: ettha puthula ṭṭhena puthuvī puthuvī eva pathavī sā hi sati pi

analyzed: sabbesam sakala apabhāvānam ādhāra bhāvena pavattamānā puthulā patthaṭā vitthiṇṇā ati

original: vattabbataṃ arahati, na pana taṃ anupavisitvā pavattamānā āpādayo. Sasambhārapathaviyā
analyzed: vattabbatam arahati na pana tam an upavisitvā pavattamānāḥ āpādayo sa sambhāra pathaviyā

original: pana puthulabhāve vattabbameva natthi. Ārammaṇapathaviyaṃ vaḍḍhanapharaṇaṭṭhehi puthulaṭṭho,
analyzed: pana puthula bhāve vattabbam eva natthi ārammaṇa pathaviyam vaḍḍhana pharaṇa ṭṭhehi puthula ṭṭho

original: itarasmiṃ ruḷhiyāva daṭṭhabbo. Ārammaṇapathavīti jhānassa ārammaṇabhūtaṃ pathavīsaṅkhātaṃ
analyzed: itarasmim ruḷhiyāva daṭṭhabbaḥ ārammaṇa pathavī ti jhānassa ārammaṇa bhūtam pathavī saṅkhātam

original: paṭibhāganimittaṃ. Tenāha “nimittapathavītipi vuccatī”ti. Āgamanavasenāti pathavīkasiṇabhāvanāgamanavasena.
analyzed: paṭibhāga nimittam tena āha vuccati iti āgamana vasena ati pathavī kasiṇa bhāvanā āgamana vasena

original: Tathā hi vuttaṃ “āpo ca devā pathavī, tejo vāyo tadāgamu”nti.
analyzed: tathā hi vuttam āpaḥ ca devā pathavī tejaḥ vāyo tadā āgamunti

original: Sabbāpīti catubbidhā pathavīpi. Anussavādimattaladdhā maññanā vatthu hotiyeva. Tathā
analyzed: sabbā api iti catubbidhā pathavī pi anussava ādi matta laddhā maññanā vatthu hotiyā iva tathā

original: hi “kakkhaḷaṃ kharigata”ntiādinā lakkhaṇapathavīpi uddharīyati. Yaṃ paneke vadanti
analyzed: hi kakkhaḷam khari gata nti ādinā yam pana eke vadanti

original: “lakkhaṇe diṭṭhe maññanā natthi, sañjānātīti vuttasaññā ca diṭṭhiggāhassa mūlabhūtā
analyzed: lakkhaṇe diṭṭhe maññanā natthi sañjānāti iti vutta saññā ca diṭṭhi ggāhassa mūla bhūtā

original: piṇḍaggāhitā, sā lakkhaṇe nakkhamati, tasmā lakkhaṇapathavī na gahetabbā”ti, tadayuttaṃ
analyzed: piṇḍa ggāhitā sā lakkhaṇe na khamati tasmā lakkhaṇa pathavī na gahetabbā iti tat ayuttam

original: lakkhaṇapaṭivedhassa idha anadhippetattā. Tenāha “lokavohāraṃ gahetvā”ti. Na ca sabbasaññā
analyzed: lakkhaṇa paṭivedhassa idha an adhippeta ttā tena āha loka vohāram gahetvā iti na ca sabba saññā

original: piṇḍaggāhikā, nāpi diṭṭhiggāhasseva mūlabhūtā, tasmā lakkhaṇapathaviyāpi kāyadvārānusārena
analyzed: piṇḍaggāhikā nā api diṭṭhi ggāhassa iva mūla bhūtā tasmā kāya dvāra anusārena

original: aññathā ca upaṭṭhitāya maññanā pavattateva. Teneva ca “anussavādimattaladdhā”ti vuttaṃ.
analyzed: aññathā ca upaṭṭhitāya maññanā pavattatā iva tena iva ca anussava ādi matta laddhā iti vuttam

original: Pathavitoti paccate nissakkavacananti dassento “pathavīti sañjānātī”ti āha. Yasmā
analyzed: pathavito ti paccate nissakka vacananti dassentaḥ pathavī iti sañjānāti iti āha yasmā

original: catubbidhampi pathaviṃ “pathavī’ti sañjānanto tena tena nayena pathavīkoṭṭhāseneva
analyzed: catubbidham pi pathavim pathavī iti sañjānanto tena tena nayena pathavī koṭṭhāsena iva

original: sañjānātīti vuccati, na āpādikoṭṭhāsena, tasmā vuttaṃ “pathavibhāgena sañjānātī”ti.
analyzed: sañjānāti iti vuccati na āpādi koṭṭhāsena tasmai vuttam patha vibhāgena sañjānāti iti

original: Lokavohāraṃ gahetvāti lokasamaññaṃ avijahitvā. Etena lakkhaṇapathaviyampi vohāramukhenevassā pavattīti dasseti.
analyzed: loka vohāram gahetvā ati loka samaññam a vijahitvā etena lakkhaṇa pathaviyam pi vohāra mukhena iva assā pavatti iti dasseti

original: Yadi lokavohārena tattha pavatti, ko ettha doso, nanu ariyāpi “ayañhi bhante mahāpathavī”tiādinā
analyzed: yadi loka vohārena tattha pavatti kaḥ ettha dosaḥ nanu ariyā api ayan hi bhante mahā pathavī iti ādinā

original: lokavohārena pavattantīti? Na ettha vohāramatte avaṭṭhānaṃ adhippetaṃ, atha kho vohāramukhena
analyzed: loka vohārena pavattanti iti na ettha vohāra matte avaṭṭhānam adhippetam atha kho vohāra mukhena

original: micchābhinivesoti dassento “saññāvipallāsena sañjānātī”ti āha. Tassattho – ayonisomanasikārasambhūtāya
analyzed: micchā abhinivesaḥ ti dassento saññā vipallāsena sañjānāti iti āha tassa attho a yoniso manasikāra sambhūtāya

original: “subha”ntiādinayappavattāya viparītasaññāya sañjānātīti. Etena dubbalā taṇhāmānadiṭṭhimaññanā
analyzed: subha nti ādi naya ppavattāya viparīta saññāya sañjānāti iti etena dubbalā taṇhā māna diṭṭhi maññanā

original: dassitāti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Yadi evaṃ kasmā saññā gahitāti? Pākaṭabhāvato. Yathā nāma aggimhi
analyzed: dassitā ti daṭṭhabbam yadi evam kasmā saññā gahitā ati pākaṭa bhāvataḥ yathā nāma aggimhi

original: mathiyamāne yadā dhūmo upalabbhati, kiñcāpi tadā vijjateva pāvako avinābhāvato, pākaṭabhāvato
analyzed: mathiyamāne yadā dhūmo upalabbhati kiñca api tadā vijjatā iva pāvakaḥ avinābhāvataḥ pākaṭa bhāvataḥ

original: pana dhūmo jātoti vuccati, na aggi jātoti, evaṃsampadamidaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ. Yadipi tattha
analyzed: pana dhūmaḥ jātaḥ iti vuccati na aggi jātaḥ iti evaṃsampadam idam daṭṭhabbam yadi api tattha

original: maññanākiccaṃ atthi, na pana vibhūtaṃ apākaṭabhāvato saññākiccameva vibhūtaṃ, taṃ
analyzed: maññanā kiccam atthi na pana vibhūtam apākaṭa bhāvataḥ saññā kiccam eva vibhūtam tam

original: pana maññanānukūlaṃ maññanāsahitaṃ cāti āha “saññāvipallāsena sañjānātī”ti. Evaṃ
analyzed: pana maññanā anukūlam maññanā sahitam ca ati āha saññā vipallāsena sañjānāti iti evam

original: pathavībhāgaṃ amuñcantoyeva vā sañjānātīti sambandho. Yo hi vuttappabhedāya pathaviyā
analyzed: pathavī bhāgam vā sañjānāti iti sambandhaḥ yaḥ hi vutta ppabhedāya pathaviyā

original: pathavibhāgaṃ amuñcantoyeva avijahantoyeva sīsapiṇḍe suvaṇṇasaññī viya anattādisabhāvaṃyeva
analyzed: patha vibhāgam a muñcantaḥ yeva a vijahantaḥ yeva sīsa piṇḍe suvaṇṇa saññī viya anatta ādi sabhāvam yeva

original: taṃ attādivasena sañjānāti, tassa vasena vuttaṃ “pathavī”tiādi. Na vattabbaṃ puthujjanaggāhassa
analyzed: tam attā ādi vasena sañjānāti tassa vasena vuttam pathavī itiādi na vattabbam puthujjana ggāhassa

original: yuttimaggananivāraṇatoti dassento āha “ummattako viya…pe… gaṇhātī”ti. Ariyānaṃ adassāvitādibhedanti
analyzed: yutti maggana nivāraṇataḥ ti dassentaḥ āha ummattakaḥ viyape gaṇhāti iti ariyānam

original: ariyānaṃ adassāvitādivisesaṃ vadantena bhagavatāva ettha yathāvuttasañjānane kāraṇaṃ vuttanti yojanā.
analyzed: ariyānam a dassāvita ādi visesam vadantena bhagavatā ava ettha yathā vutta sañjānane kāraṇam vuttan ti yojanā

original: Evanti “pathavibhāgena sañjānātī”tiādinā vuttappakārena. Sañjānitvāti pubbakālakiriyāniddesoti
analyzed: evam ti patha vibhāgena sañjānāti itiādinā vutta ppakārena sañjānitvā ati pubba kālakiriyā niddeso ti

original: āha “aparabhāge…pe… gaṇhātī”ti. Papañcasaṅkhāti papañcakoṭṭhāsā. Papañcanti sattā
analyzed: āha gaṇhāti iti papañca saṅkhāti papañca koṭṭhāsā papañcanti sattā

original: saṃsāre cirāyanti etehīti papañcā, maññanti “etaṃ mamā”tiādinā parikappenti etāhīti
analyzed: saṃsāre cirāyanti etehi iti papañcāḥ maññanti etam mama ati ādinā parikappenti etāhi iti

original: maññanāti dvīhipi pariyāyehi taṇhādayova vuttāti āha “taṇhāmānadiṭṭhipapañcehi idha
analyzed: maññanā ti dvīhi pi pariyāyehi taṇhā ādayaḥ vuttā ti āha taṇhā māna diṭṭhi papañcehi idha

original: maññanānāmena vuttehī”ti. Ajaññassa jaññato, aseyyādikassa seyyādito gahaṇato diṭṭhimaññanā
analyzed: maññanā nāmena vuttehi iti a jaññassa jaññataḥ a seyya ādikassa seyya āditaḥ gahaṇataḥ diṭṭhi maññanā

original: viya taṇhāmānamaññanāpi aññathā gāho evāti āha “aññathā gaṇhātī”ti. Ārammaṇābhiniropanādinā
analyzed: viya aññathā gāhaḥ evā ti āha aññathā gaṇhāti iti ārammaṇa abhiniropana ādinā

original: bhinnasabhāvānampi vitakkādīnaṃ sādhāraṇo upanijjhāyanasabhāvo viya anugijjhanuṇṇatiparāmasanasabhāvānampi
analyzed: bhinna sabhāvānam pi vitakka ādīnam sādhāraṇaḥ upanijjhāyana sabhāvaḥ viya

original: taṇhādīnaṃ sādhāraṇena ārammaṇaparikappanākārena pavatti maññanāti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Tenāha
analyzed: taṇhā ādīnam sādhāraṇena ārammaṇa parikappanā ākārena pavatti maññanā ati daṭṭhabbam tena āha

original: “tīhi maññanāhi maññatī”tiādi. Assāti puthujjanassa, udayabbayānupassanādīsu viya
analyzed: tīhi maññanāhi maññati itiādi assa ati puthujjanassa udaya bbaya anupassana ādīsu viya

original: sukhumanayenapi maññanāpavatti atthīti vibhāvanasukhatāya thūlaṃyeva taṃ dassetukāmo
analyzed: maññanā pavatti atthi iti vibhāvana sukhatāya thūlam yā iva tam dassetu kāmo

original: “oḷārikanayenā”tiāha. Oḷārike hi vibhāge dassite sukhumavibhāvanā sukarāti dassetuṃ
analyzed: oḷārika nayena ati āha oḷārike hi vibhāge dassite sukhuma vibhāvanā sukarā ati dassetum

original: ayamatthayojanā vuccatīti sambandho. Ajjhattikāti indriyabaddhā sattasantānapariyāpannā
analyzed: ayam attha yojanā vuccati iti sambandhaḥ ajjhattikā ati indriya baddhā satta santāna pariyāpannā

original: niyakajjhattā vuttā vibhaṅge paṭisambhidāmagge ca.
analyzed: niya kajjhattā vuttā vibhaṅge paṭisambhidā magge ca

original: Vibhaṅgeti dhātuvibhaṅge. Bāhirāti anindriyabaddhā saṅkhārasantānapariyāpannā. Kakkhaḷanti
analyzed: vibhaṅga iti dhātu vibhaṅge bāhirā ati an indriya baddhā saṅkhāra santāna pariyāpannā kakkhaḷanti

analyzed: thaddham khari gatanti pharusam kakkhaḷa bhāvo kakkhaḷattam kakkhaḷa bhāvoti kakkhaḷa sabhāvo

original: Bahiddhāti indriyabaddhato bahiddhābhūtaṃ. Anupādinnanti na upādinnaṃ. Ayoti kāḷalohaṃ.
analyzed: bahiddhā iti indriya baddhataḥ bahiddhā bhūtam anupādinnam ti na upādinnam kāḷa loham

original: Lohanti jātilohaṃ vijātilohaṃ kittimalohaṃ pisācalohanti catubbidhaṃ. Tattha ayo
analyzed: lohanti jāti loham vijāti loham kittima loham pisāca lohanti catubbidham tattha ayaḥ

original: sajjhu suvaṇṇaṃ tipu sīsaṃ tambalohaṃ vekantakalohanti imāni satta jātilohāni nāma.
analyzed: sajjhu suvaṇṇam tipu sīsam tambaloham vekantakalohanti imāni satta jātilohāni nāma

original: Nāganāsikālohaṃ vijātilohaṃ nāma. Kaṃsalohaṃ vaṭṭalohaṃ ārakuṭanti tīṇi kittimalohāni
analyzed: nāganāsikā loham vijātiloham nāma kaṃsa loham vaṭṭa loham ārakuṭanti tīṇi kittima lohāni

original: nāma. Morakkhakaṃ puthukaṃ malinakaṃ capalakaṃ salakaṃ āṭalaṃ bhattakaṃ dusilohanti
analyzed: nāma morakkhakam puthukam malinakam capalakam salakam āṭalam bhattakam

original: aṭṭha pisācalohāni nāma. Tesu vekantakalohaṃ nāma sabbalohacchedanasamatthā ekā lohajāti.
analyzed: aṭṭha pisācalohāni nāma tesu vekantaka loham nāma sabba loha chedana samatthā ekā loha jāti

original: Tathā hi taṃ vikantati chindatīti vikantakanti vuccati. Vikantakameva vekantakaṃ.
analyzed: tathā hi tam vikantati chindati iti vikantakam ti vuccati vikantakam eva vekantakam

original: Nāganāsikālohaṃ lohasadisaṃ lohavijāti haliddādivijāti viya. Tathā hi taṃ lohākāraṃ
analyzed: nāga nāsikā loham loha sadisam loha vijāti halidda ādi vijāti tathā hi tam loha ākāram

original: lohamalaṃ viya ghanasaṃhataṃ hutvā tiṭṭhati, tāpetvā tāḷitaṃ pana bhinnaṃ bhinnaṃ

original: hutvā visarati mudu maṭṭhaṃ kammaniyaṃ vā na hoti. Tiputambe missetvā kataṃ kaṃsalohaṃ.
analyzed: hutvā visarati mudu maṭṭham kammaniyam vā na hoti tipu tambe missetvā katam kaṃsa loham

original: Sīsatambe missetvā kataṃ vaṭṭalohaṃ. Jasatambe missetvā kataṃ ārakuṭaṃ. Teneva taṃ
analyzed: sīsa tambe missetvā katam vaṭṭa loham jasa tambe missetvā katam ārakuṭam tena iva tam

original: karaṇena nibbattattā kittimalohanti vuccati. Yaṃ pana kevalaṃ rasakadhātu viniggataṃ,
analyzed: karaṇena nibbatta ttā kittimalohanti vuccati yam pana kevalam rasaka dhātu viniggatam

original: taṃ “pittala”ntipi vadanti. Taṃ idha nādhippetaṃ, yathāvuttaṃ missakameva katvā yojitaṃ
analyzed: tam vadanti tam idha na adhippetam yathā vuttam missakam eva katvā yojitam

original: kittimanti vuttaṃ. Morakkhakādīni evaṃnāmānevetāni. Tesu yasmā pañca jātilohāni pāḷiyaṃ
analyzed: kittimanti vuttam morakkhaka ādīni evaṃnāmāni iva etāni tesu yasmā pañca jāti lohāni

original: visuṃ vuttāneva, tasmā vekantakalohena saddhiṃ vuttāvasesaṃ sabbaṃ idha lohanti veditabbaṃ.
analyzed: visum vuttān eva tasmā vekantaka lohena saddhim vutta avasesam sabbam idha lohan ti veditabbam

original: Tipūti setatipu. Sīsanti kāḷatipu. Sajjhanti rajataṃ. Muttāti hatthikumbhajādikā
analyzed: rajatam muttā ati

original: aṭṭhavidhāpi muttā. Tathā hi hatthikumbhaṃ varāhadāṭhā bhūjaṅgasīsaṃ valāhakūṭaṃ
analyzed: aṭṭhavidhā api muttā tathā hi hatthi kumbham varāha dāṭhā bhūjaṅga sīsam valāha kūṭam

original: veḷū macchasīro saṅkho sippīti aṭṭha muttāyoniyo. Tattha hatthikumbhajā pītavaṇṇā
analyzed: veḷū macchasīro saṅkhaḥ sippī iti aṭṭha muttā yoniyaḥ tattha hatthi kumbha jā pīta vaṇṇā

original: pabhāhīnā. Varāhadāṭhā varāhadāṭhavaṇṇāva. Bhujaṅgasīsajā nīlādivaṇṇā suvisuddhā
analyzed: pabhā hīnā varāha dāṭhā varāha dāṭha vaṇṇā ava bhujaṅga sīsa jā nīla ādi vaṇṇā su visuddhā

original: vaṭṭalā ca. Valāhakajā bhāsurā dubbibhāgarūpā rattibhāge andhakāraṃ vidhamantiyo
analyzed: vaṭṭalā ca valāhaka jā bhāsurā dubbibhāga rūpāḥ ratti bhāge andhakāram vidhamantiyo

original: tiṭṭhanti, devūpabhogā eva ca honti. Veḷujā karakupalasamānavaṇṇā na bhāsurā, te
analyzed: tiṭṭhanti deva upabhogāḥ eva ca honti veḷu jāḥ kara kupala samāna vaṇṇāḥ na bhāsurā te

original: ca veḷū amanussagocare eva padese jāyanti. Macchasīrajā pāṭhīnapiṭṭhisamānavaṇṇā
analyzed: ca veḷū amanussa gocare eva padese jāyanti maccha sīra jā pāṭhīna piṭṭhi samāna vaṇṇā

original: vaṭṭalā laghavo ca honti pabhāvihīnā, te ca macchā samuddamajjhe eva jāyanti. Saṅkhajā
analyzed: vaṭṭalāḥ laghavaḥ ca honti pabhā vihīnā te ca macchā samudda majjhe eva jāyanti saṅkha jā

original: saṅkhodaracchavivaṇṇā kolappamāṇāpi honti pabhāvihīnāva. Sippijā pabhāvisesayuttā
analyzed: saṅkha udara chavi vaṇṇā kola ppamāṇā api honti sippi jā pabhā visesa yuttā

original: honti nānāsaṇṭhānā. Evaṃ jātito aṭṭhavidhāsupi muttāsu yā macchasaṅkhasippijā, tā
analyzed: honti nānā saṇṭhānāḥ evam jātitaḥ aṭṭhavidhāsu pi muttāsu yā maccha saṅkha sippi jā tā

original: sāmuddikā honti, bhujaṅgajāpi kāci sāmuddikā honti, itarā asāmuddikā. Yasmā bahulaṃ
analyzed: sāmuddikāḥ honti bhujaṅga jā api kāci sāmuddikāḥ honti itarāḥ a sāmuddikāḥ yasmai bahulam

original: sāmuddikāva muttā loke dissanti, tatthāpi sippijāva, itarā kādācikā. Tasmā sammohavinodaniyaṃ
analyzed: sāmuddikā ava muttāḥ loke dissanti tattha api sippi jāva itarā kādācikā

original: “muttāti sāmuddikā muttā”ti vuttaṃ.
analyzed: muttā ati sāmuddikā muttā iti vuttam

original: Maṇīti ṭhapetvā pāḷiāgate veḷuriyādike seso jotirasādibhedo sabbopi maṇi. Veḷuriyanti
analyzed: maṇi iti ṭhapetvā pāḷi āgate veḷuriya ādike sesaḥ joti rasa ādi bhedo sabbaḥ api maṇi veḷuriyanti

original: vaṃsavaṇṇamaṇi. Saṅkhoti sāmuddikasaṅkho. Silāti kāḷasilā paṇḍusilā setasilādibhedā
analyzed: vaṃsa vaṇṇa maṇi saṅkhaḥ iti sāmuddika saṅkhaḥ silā ati kāḷa silā paṇḍusilā setasila ādi bhedā

original: aṭṭhapi silā. Rajatanti kahāpaṇādikaṃ vuttāvasesaṃ rajatasammataṃ. Jātarūpanti suvaṇṇaṃ.
analyzed: aṭṭha pi silāḥ rajatanti kahāpaṇa ādikam vutta avasesam rajata sammatam jātarūpanti suvaṇṇam

original: Lohitaṅgoti rattamaṇi. Masāragallanti kabaramaṇi tiṇādīsu bahibhārā tālanāḷikerādayopi
analyzed: rattamaṇi kabaramaṇi tiṇa ādīsu tāla nāḷikera ādayaḥ api

original: tiṇaṃ nāma. Antosāraṃ khadirādi antamaso dārukhaṇḍampi kaṭṭhaṃ nāma. Muggamattato

original: pubbe avuttampi samuccinoti.

original: sañjanaṭṭhena sattā. Sabbe pāṇāti “ekindriyo pāṇo dvindriyo pāṇo”tiādivasena vuttā
analyzed: sañjana ṭṭhena sattā sabbe pāṇā ti eka indriyaḥ pāṇaḥ dvi indriyaḥ pāṇaḥ iti ādi vasena vuttā

original: anavasesā pāṇanaṭṭhena pāṇā. Sabbe bhūtāti anavasesā aṇḍakosādīsu bhūtā sañjātāti
analyzed: anavasesā pāṇanaṭṭhena pāṇā sabbe bhūtā ati anavasesā aṇḍa kosa ādīsu bhūtā sañjātā ati

original: bhūtā. Sabbe jīvāti sāliyavagodhūmādayo anavasesā jīvanaṭṭhena jīvā. Tesu hi so virūhabhāvena
analyzed: bhūtā sabbe jīvāti sāli yava godhūma ādayaḥ anavasesāḥ jīvana ṭṭhena jīvā tesu hi so virūha bhāvena

original: jīvasaññī. Avasā abalā avīriyāti tesaṃ attano vaso vā balaṃ vā vīriyaṃ vā natthīti
analyzed: jīva saññī a vasāḥ abalāḥ a vīriyā ti tesam attanaḥ vasaḥ vā balam vā vīriyam vā natthi iti

original: dasseti. Niyatisaṅgatibhāvapariṇatāti ettha niyatīti. Niyatatā, acchejjasuttāvutaabhejjamaṇi
analyzed: dassa iti niyati saṅgati bhāva pariṇatā ati ettha niyatī iti niyata tā

original: viya avijahitapakatitā. Saṅgatīti channaṃ abhijātīnaṃ tattha saṅgamo. Bhāvoti sabhāvoyeva,
analyzed: saṅgatī iti channam abhijātīnam tattha saṅgamaḥ bhāvoti

original: kaṇḍakānaṃ tikhiṇatā, kapiṭṭhaphalādīnaṃ parimaṇḍalāditā, migapakkhīnaṃ vicittavaṇṇāditāti
analyzed: kaṇḍakānam tikhiṇa tā kapiṭṭha phala ādīnam parimaṇḍala ādi tā miga pakkhīnam vicitta vaṇṇa ādi tā ati

original: evamādiko. Evaṃ niyatiyā ca saṅgatiyā ca bhāve ca pariṇatā nānappakārataṃ pattā.
analyzed: evamādikaḥ evam niyatiyā ca saṅgatiyā ca bhāve ca pariṇatā nānā pakāra tam pattā

original: Yena hi yathā bhavitabbaṃ, so tatheva bhavati. Yena na bhavitabbaṃ, so na bhavatīti
analyzed: yena hi yathā bhavitabbam saḥ tathā iva bhavati yena na bhavitabbam saḥ na bhavati iti

original: dasseti. Chasvevābhijātīsūti kaṇhābhijātiādīsu chasu eva abhijātīsu ṭhatvā sukhañca
analyzed: dassa iti chasu eva abhijātīsu iti kaṇha abhijāti ādīsu chasu eva abhijātīsu sukham ca

original: dukkhañca paṭisaṃvedenti, aññā sukhadukkhabhūmi natthīti dasseti. Vā-saddena antādibhede
analyzed: dukkham ca paṭisaṃvedenti aññā sukha dukkha bhūmi natthi iti dasseti vā saddena anta ādi bhede

original: diṭṭhābhinivese saṅgaṇhāti.
analyzed: diṭṭha abhinivese saṅgaṇhāti

original: Upapattinti iminā tasmiṃ tasmiṃ sattanikāye bhūtānaṃ sahabyataṃ ākaṅkhatīti dasseti.
analyzed: upapattim ti iminā tasmim tasmim satta nikāye bhūtānam sahabyatam ākaṅkhati iti dasseti

original: Sukhuppattinti iminā pana tattha tattha uppannassa sukhuppattiṃ. Ekacce bhūte niccātiādinā
analyzed: sukha uppattin ti iminā pana tattha tattha uppannassa sukha uppattim ekacce bhūte nicca ati ādinā

original: ekaccasassatikadiṭṭhiṃ dasseti. Ahampi bhūtesu aññatarosmīti iminā pana catutthaṃ
analyzed: ekacca sassatika diṭṭhim dasseti aham pi bhūtesu aññataraḥ asmi iti iminā pana catuttham

original: ekaccasassatikavādaṃ dasseti.
analyzed: ekacca sassatika vādam dasseti

original: Yato kutocīti issarapurisādibhedato yato kutoci. Ekā taṇhāmaññanāva labbhatīti idhāpi
analyzed: yatas kutoci iti issara purisa ādi bhedato yatas kutoci ekā taṇhā maññanā ava labbhati iti idha api

original: heṭṭhā vuttanayena itaramaññanānampi sambhavo niddhāretabbo. Vuttappakāreyeva bhūte
analyzed: heṭṭhā vutta nayena itara maññanānam pi sambhavaḥ niddhāretabbaḥ vutta ppakāreya iva bhūte

original: taṇhādiṭṭhīhi abhinandatītiādinā vattabbattā āha “vuttanayamevā”ti. Yojanā kātabbāti
analyzed: taṇhā diṭṭhīhi abhinandati itiādinā vattabbattā āha vutta nayam eva iti yojanā kātabbā ati

original: “yo bhūtapaññattiyā upādānabhūte khandhe parijānāti, so tīhi pariññāhi parijānātī”tiādinā
analyzed: yaḥ bhūta paññattiyā upādāna bhūte khandhe parijānāti saḥ tīhi pariññāhi parijānāti itiādinā

original: yojanā kātabbā. Apare panettha bhūtagāmopi bhūta-saddena saṅgahitoti rukkhādivasenapi
analyzed: yojanā kātabbā apare pana ittha bhūtagāmaḥ api bhūta saddena saṅgahito ti rukkha ādi vasena api

original: maññanāvibhāgaṃ yojetvā dassenti, tathā mahābhūtavasenapi, taṃ aṭṭhakathāyaṃ natthi.
analyzed: maññanā vibhāgam yojetvā dassenti tathā mahābhūta vasena api tam aṭṭhakathāyam natthi

original: Bhūmivisesādinā bhedenāti bhūmivisesaupapattivisesādivibhāgena. Iddhiyāti puññavisesanibbattena
analyzed: bhūmi visesa ādinā bhedena ati bhūmi visesa aupapatti visesa ādi vibhāgena iddhiyā ati puñña visesa nibbattena

original: ānubhāvena. Kiñcāpi deva-saddo “viddhe vigatavalāhake deve”tiādīsu ajaṭākāse āgato,
analyzed: ānubhāvena kiñcā api deva saddaḥ viddhe vigata valāhake deva iti ādīsu ajaṭā kāse āgataḥ

original: “devo ca thokaṃ thokaṃ phusāyatī”tiādīsu meghe, “ayañhi deva kumāro”tiādīsu khattiye
analyzed: devo ca thokam thokam phusāyati itiādīsu meghe ayan hi deva kumāraḥ itiādīsu khattiye

original: āgato, “pañcahi kāmaguṇehi samappito samaṅgibhūto paricāreti devo maññe”tiādīsu viya
analyzed: āgataḥ pañcahi kāmaguṇehi samappitaḥ samaṅgi bhūtaḥ paricāreti devaḥ maññā iti ādīsu viya

original: idha upapattidevesu āgato, deva-saddena pana vattabbasatte anavasesato uddharitvā
analyzed: idha upapatti devesu āgataḥ deva saddena pana vattabba satte anavasesataḥ uddharitvā

original: tato idhādhippete dassetuṃ “te tividhā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Sesā cha kāmāvacarā idha devāti
analyzed: tatas idha adhippete dassetum te tividhā atiādi vuttam sesā cha kāmāvacarāḥ idha deva ti

original: adhippetā itaresaṃ padantarehi nivattitattāti adhippāyo. Bhūtā devāti gahitesu sattesu
analyzed: adhippetāḥ itaresam pada antarehi adhippāyaḥ bhūtāḥ devā ti gahitesu sattesu

original: taṇhādimaññanānaṃ pavattākārenapi tividhalakkhaṇanti āha “bhūtavāre vuttanayena veditabbā”ti.
analyzed: taṇhā ādi maññanānam pavatta ākārena api tividha lakkhaṇan ti āha bhūta vāre vutta nayena veditabbā ati

original: “Aññatarassa upāsakassa pajāpati abhirūpā hotī”tiādīsu pajāpati-saddo gharaṇiyaṃ
analyzed: aññatarassa upāsakassa pajāpati abhirūpā hoti itiādīsu pajāpati saddo gharaṇiyam

original: āgato, “pajāpati kāmadāyī suvaṇṇavaṇṇā me pajā hotū”tiādīsu diṭṭhigatikaparikappite,
analyzed: āgataḥ pajāpati kāma dāyī suvaṇṇa vaṇṇā me pajā hotu uti ādīsu diṭṭhigatika parikappite

original: “pajāpatissa devarājassa dhajaggaṃ ullokeyyāthā”tiādīsu devajeṭṭhake, idha pana adhipatīti
analyzed: pajāpatissa devarājassa dhajaggam ullokeyyātha atiādīsu devajeṭṭhake idha pana adhipati iti

original: vadanti, taṃ upari brahmuno gayhamānattā tesaṃ matimattaṃ. Devānanti cātumahārājikādidevānaṃ.
analyzed: vadanti tam upari brahmunaḥ tesam matimattam cātumahārājika ādi devānam

original: Mahārājādīnanti ādi-saddena sakkasuyāmasantussitasunimmitavasavattino gahitā. Tesanti
analyzed: mahārāja ādīnam ti ādi saddena sakka suyāma santussita sunimmita vasavattinaḥ gahitā tesan ti

original: mahārājādīnaṃ. Sattasaṅkhātāyāti kāmabhūmiyaṃ sattasaṅkhātāya. Pajāpatinti pajāpatibhāvaṃ.
analyzed: mahārāja ādīnam satta saṅkhātāya ati satta saṅkhātāya pajāpatinti pajāpati bhāvam

original: Pajāpatibhāvena hi mānaṃ jappento pajāpatiṃ mānamaññanāya maññatīti vutto.
analyzed: pajāpati bhāvena hi mānam jappentaḥ pajāpatim māna maññanāya maññati iti vutto

original: Ekā diṭṭhimaññanāva yujjatīti vuttaṃ, pajāpatino pana samipataṃ salokataṃ vā ākaṅkhato,
analyzed: ekā diṭṭhi maññanā ava yujjati iti vuttam pajāpatino pana samipatam salokatam vā ākaṅkhato

original: tathābhāvāya cittaṃ paṇidahato, tathāladdhabbāya sampattiyā attano seyyādibhāvaṃ
analyzed: tathābhāvāya cittam paṇidahataḥ tathā laddhabbāya sampattiyāḥ attanaḥ seyya ādi bhāvam

original: dahato ca taṇhāmānamaññanāpi sambhavantīti sakkā viññātuṃ. Ye ca dhammāti āyuvaṇṇādike
analyzed: dahataḥ ca sambhavanti iti sakkā viññātum ye ca dhammā ti āyu vaṇṇa ādike

original: vadati. Pajāpatinti etthāpi heṭṭhā vuttanayena itaramaññanānampi sambhavo veditabbo.
analyzed: vadati pajāpatin ti ettha api heṭṭhā vutta nayena itara maññanānam pi sambhavaḥ veditabbo

original: Brūhitoti parivuddho. Guṇavisesehīti jhānādīhi visiṭṭhehi guṇehi uttarimanussadhammatāya.
analyzed: brūhito ti parivuddhaḥ guṇa visesehi iti jhāna ādīhi visiṭṭhehi guṇehi uttari manussa dhamma tāya

original: Brahma-saddassa satipi avisesato visiṭṭhavācakatte yattha yattha panassa guṇavisesayuttādirūpā
analyzed: brahma saddassa avisesataḥ visiṭṭha vācaka tte yattha yattha panassa guṇa visesa yutta ādi rūpā

original: pavatti, taṃ dassetuṃ “apicā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Sahassoti sahassiyā lokadhātuyā adhipatibhūto.
analyzed: tam dassetum api ca atiādi vuttam sahasso ti sahassiyā lokadhātuyā adhipati bhūtaḥ

original: Paṭhamābhinibbattoti paṇītena paṭhamajhānena nibbatto, paṭhamajjhānabhūmiyaṃ vā paṭhamaṃ
analyzed: paṭhama abhinibbatto ti paṇītena paṭhama jhānena nibbattaḥ paṭhama jhāna bhūmiyam vā paṭhamam

original: abhinibbatto. Gahitāti veditabbā padhānaggahaṇena appadhānānampi kenaci sambandhena
analyzed: abhinibbattaḥ gahitā ati veditabbā padhāna ggahaṇena appadhānānam pi kenacid sambandhena

original: gahitabhāvasiddhito. Ettha ca brahmāti mahābrahmā adhippeto. So hi vaṇṇavantatāya
analyzed: gahita bhāva siddhitaḥ ettha ca brahmā ati mahābrahmā adhippeto so hi vaṇṇavanta tāya

original: ceva dīghāyukatāya ca brahmapārisajjādīhi mahanto brahmāti mahābrahmā, tassa pana
analyzed: ca iva dīgha āyuka tāya ca brahma pārisajja ādīhi mahantaḥ brahmā ati mahābrahmā tassa pana

original: purohitaṭṭhāne ṭhitāti brahmapurohitā, parisāyaṃ bhavā paricārakāti brahmapārisajjāti
analyzed: purohita ṭṭhāne ṭhitā ati brahma purohitā parisāyam bhavā paricārakā ati brahmapārisajjā ati

original: veditabbā. Ukkaṭṭhekapuggalabhāvato pajāpatismiṃ viya brahmani maññanā vattatīti
analyzed: veditabbā ukkaṭṭha eka puggala bhāvato pajāpatismim viya brahmani maññanā vattati iti

original: vuttaṃ “pajāpativāre vuttanayeneva veditabbā”ti. Tathā hi bahupuggalabhāvasāmaññato
analyzed: vuttam pajāpativāre vutta nayena iva veditabbā ati tathā hi bahu puggala bhāva sāmaññato

original: ābhassaravārādīnaṃ bhūtavārasadisatā vuttā.
analyzed: ābhassara vāra ādīnam bhūta vāra sadisa tā vuttā

original: Yathāvuttapabhāya ābhāsanasīlā vā ābhassarā. Ekatalavāsinoti idaṃ jhānantarabhūmīnaṃ
analyzed: ābhāsana sīlāḥ vā ābhassarāḥ eka tala vāsinaḥ ti idam

original: viya heṭṭhuparibhāvābhāvato vuttaṃ, ṭhānāni pana nesaṃ paricchinnāneva. Ābhassarehi
analyzed: viya heṭṭhu paribhāva abhāvataḥ vuttam ṭhānāni pana nesam paricchinnāni iva ābhassarehi

original: parittā ābhā etesanti parittābhā. Appamāṇā ābhā etesanti appamāṇābhā.
analyzed: parittāḥ ābhāḥ etesanti paritta ābhāḥ appamāṇāḥ ābhāḥ etesanti appamāṇa ābhā

original: Subhāti sobhanā pabhā. Kañcanapiṇḍo viya sassirikā kañcanapiṇḍasassirikā. Tattha
analyzed: subhā ati sobhanā pabhā kañcana piṇḍaḥ viya sassirikā kañcana piṇḍa sassirikā tattha

original: sobhanāya pabhāya kiṇṇā subhākiṇṇāti vattabbe bhā-saddassa rassattaṃ, antima-ṇa-kārassa
analyzed: sobhanāya pabhāya kiṇṇā subhākiṇṇā iti vattabbe bhā saddassa rassa ttam antima ṇakārassa

original: ha-kārañca katvā “subhakiṇhā”ti vuttā. Subhāti ca ekagghanā niccalā pabhā vuccati,
analyzed: hakāram ca katvā subhakiṇhā ati vuttā subhā ati ca ekagghanā niccalā pabhā vuccati

original: parittā subhā etesanti parittasubhā. Appamāṇā subhā etesanti appamāṇasubhā.
analyzed: parittā subhā etesanti paritta subhā appamāṇā subhā etesanti appamāṇa subhā

original: Vipulaphalāti vipulasantasukhāyuvaṇṇādiphalā.
analyzed: vipula phalā ati vipula santa sukha āyu vaṇṇa ādi phalā

original: Satipi devabrahmādīnaṃ puññaphalena jhānaphalena ca paṭipakkhābhibhave yesaṃ pana
analyzed: sati pi deva brahma ādīnam puñña phalena jhāna phalena ca paṭipakkha abhibhave yesam pana

original: puthujjanaasaññasattesu abhibhūvohāro pākaṭo niruḷho ca, tesaṃ vasenāyaṃ desanā pavattāti
analyzed: puthujjana asañña sattesu abhibhū vohāraḥ pākaṭaḥ niruḷhaḥ ca tesam vasena ayam desanā pavattā ati

original: dassento āha “asaññabhavassetaṃ adhivacana”nti. Yathā pajāpativāre “idhekacco pajāpatismiṃyevā”tiādinā
analyzed: dassentaḥ āha asañña bhavassa etam adhivacanam ti yathā pajāpati vāre idha ekacco pajāpatismin yeva iti ādinā

original: maññanāpavatti dassitā, tathā idhāpi taṃ dassetuṃ sakkāti āha “sesaṃ pajāpativāre vuttanayamevā”ti.
analyzed: maññanā pavatti dassitā tathā idha api tam dassetum sakkā iti āha sesam pajāpativāre vutta nayam evā ti

original: Bhūtavārādivaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
analyzed: bhūtavāra ādi vaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā

original: Ākāsānañcāyatanavārādivaṇṇanā
analyzed: ākāsa anañcāyatana vāra ādi vaṇṇanā

original: 4. Evaṃ sattavasena bhūmikkamadassane suddhāvāsānaṃ aggahaṇe kāraṇaṃ niddhārento
analyzed: evam satta vasena bhūmikkama dassane suddhāvāsānam aggahaṇe kāraṇam niddhārento

original: “evaṃ bhagavā”tiādimāha. Tattha anāgāmikhīṇāsavāti anāgāmino ca khīṇāsavā ca. Kiñcāpi
analyzed: evam bhagavā iti ādim āha tattha anāgāmi khīṇa āsavā ti anāgāmino ca khīṇa āsavā ca kiñcā api

original: suddhāvāsā attheva anekakappasahassāyukā, ukkaṃsaparicchedato pana soḷasakappasahassāyukāva,
analyzed: suddhāvāsāḥ atthā iva aneka kappa sahassa āyukā ukkaṃsa paricchedato pana soḷasa kappa sahassa āyukā ava

original: na tato paranti āha “katipayakappasahassāyukā”ti. Kāmarūpabhavesu pavattamānāpi ākāsānañcāyatanādidhammā
analyzed: na tatas paranti āha katipaya kappa sahassa āyukā ati kāmarūpa bhavesu pavattamānā api ākāsa ānañca āyatana ādi dhammā

original: arūpāvacarabhāvato taṃbhūmikavohāraṃ na labhantīti “tatrūpapannāyevā”ti avadhāretvā
analyzed: arūpāvacara bhāvataḥ taṃbhūmika vohāram na labhanti iti tatra upapannāya iva ati avadhāretvā

original: vuttaṃ. Abhibhūvāre vuttanayena veditabbā yathārahanti adhippāyo. Na hettha vaṇṇavantatādi
analyzed: vuttam abhibhū vāre vutta nayena veditabbāḥ yathārahanti adhippāyaḥ na hi ittha vaṇṇavanta tā ādi

original: sambhavatīti. Pajāpativāre vuttanayenāti ettha “ahamasmi arūpo pahīnarūpapaṭighasañño”tiādinā
analyzed: sambhavati iti pajāpativāre vutta nayena ati ettha aham asmi arūpo pahīna rūpa paṭigha saññā ti ādinā

original: mānamaññanā veditabbā.
analyzed: māna maññanā veditabbā

original: Ākāsānañcāyatanavārādivaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
analyzed: ākāsa anañcāyatana vāra ādi vaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā

original: Diṭṭhasutavārādivaṇṇanā
analyzed: diṭṭha suta vāra ādi vaṇṇanā

original: 5. Rūpamukhena maññanāvatthudassanaṃ saṅkhepoti katvā vuttaṃ “vitthāratopī”ti. Tampi
analyzed: rūpa mukhena maññanā vatthu dassanam saṅkhepaḥ iti katvā vuttam vitthārataḥ api iti tam pi

original: hi “yattha neva pathavī, na āpo, na tejo, na vāyo, na ākāsānañcāyatana”ntiādiggahaṇaṃ
analyzed: hi yattha na iva pathavī na āpaḥ na tejaḥ na vāyo na ākāsa anañca āyatanan ti ādi gahaṇam

original: viya saṅkhepato pañcavokārabhavadassanaṃ hotīti.
analyzed: viya saṅkhepato pañcavokāra bhava dassanam hoti iti

original: Diṭṭhanti yaṃ cakkhudvārena katadassanakiriyāsamāpanaṃ, yañca cakkhu dvayaṃ passati
analyzed: diṭṭhanti yam cakkhu dvārena kata dassana kiriyā samāpanam yam ca cakkhu dvayam passati

original: passissati sati sambhave passeyya, taṃ sabbakālanti visesavacanicchāya abhāvato diṭṭhanteva
analyzed: passissati sati sambhave passeyya tam sabba kālam ti visesa vacanicchāya abhāvataḥ

original: vuttaṃ yathā “duddha”nti. Tenāha “rūpāyatanassetaṃ adhivacana”nti. Ayañca nayo sutādīsupi
analyzed: vuttam yathā tena āha rūpa āyatanassa itam adhivacananti ayam ca nayaḥ suta ādīsu pi

original: yojetabbo. Sattāti rūpādīsu sattā visattāti sattā. Sañjanaṭṭhena sāmaññasaddopi cesa

analyzed: pubba bhāga paṭipadāya bhagavataḥ tathāgata bhāvam dassetvā idāni saha upāyena aṭṭhahi

analyzed: samāpattīhi aṭṭhārasahi ca mahāvipassanāhi tam dassetum ñāṇena ati ādim āha nāma rūpa pariggaha kaṅkhā vitaraṇānam hi

analyzed: vinibandha bhūtassa mohassa dūrīkaraṇena ṭhitassa anicca saññā ādayo sijjhanti

analyzed: tathā jhāna samāpattīsu abhirati nimittena pāmojjena tattha an abhiratiyā vinoditāya

original: jhānādīnaṃ samadhigamo”ti samāpattivipassanānaṃ arativinodanaavijjāpadālanādīni upāyo,
analyzed: jhāna ādīnam samadhigamaḥ ti samāpatti vipassanānam arati vinodana avijjā padālana ādīni upāyaḥ

original: uppaṭipāṭiniddeso pana nīvaraṇasabhāvāya avijjāya heṭṭhā nivaraṇesupi saṅgahadassanatthanti

analyzed: daṭṭhabbam samāpatti vihāra pavesa vibandhanena nīvaraṇāni kavāṭa sadisāni iti āha nīvaraṇa kavāṭam

analyzed: ugghāṭetvā iti rattim anuvitakketvā anuvicāretvā divā kammante payojeti iti vutta ṭṭhāne

analyzed: vitakka vicārāḥ dhūmāyanā iti adhippetā iti āha vitakka vicāra dhūmanti kiñca api

analyzed: dukkham catuttha jhāna upacāre ca sukham pahīyati atisaya pahānam pana sandhāya āha

original: “catutthajjhānena sukhadukkhaṃ pahāyā”ti.
analyzed: catuttha jhānena sukha dukkham pahāya ati

original: Aniccassa, aniccanti ca anupassanā aniccānupassanā, tebhūmakadhammānaṃ aniccataṃ
analyzed: aniccassa aniccanti ca anupassanā anicca anupassanā tebhūmaka dhammānam anicca taṃ

original: evaṃpavattamicchāsaññaṃ. Saññāsīsena diṭṭhicittānampi gahaṇaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ. Esa nayo

original: ito paresupi. Nibbidānupassanāyāti saṅkhāresu nibbijjanākārena pavattāya anupassanāya.
analyzed: itas paresu pi nibbida anupassanāya ati saṅkhāresu nibbijjana ākārena pavattāya anupassanāya

original: Nandinti sappītikataṇhaṃ. Virāgānupassanāyāti saṅkhāresu virajjanākārena pavattāya
analyzed: nandinti sappītika taṇham virāga anupassanāya ati saṅkhāresu virajjana ākārena pavattāya

original: anupassanāya. Nirodhānupassanāyāti saṅkhārānaṃ nirodhassa anupassanāya. Yathā vā
analyzed: anupassanāya nirodha anupassanāya ati saṅkhārānam nirodhassa anupassanāya yathā vā

original: saṅkhārā nirujjhantiyeva, āyatiṃ punabbhavavasena na uppajjanti, evaṃ anupassanā
analyzed: saṅkhārāḥ nirujjhantiyā iva āyatim punabbhava vasena na uppajjanti evam anupassanā

original: nirodhānupassanā. Tenevāha “nirodhānupassanāya nirodheti, no samudetī”ti. Muccitukamyatā
analyzed: nirodha anupassanā tena iva āha nirodha anupassanāya nirodha iti no samudeti iti muccitu kamya tā

original: hi ayaṃ balappattāti. Paṭinissajjanākārena pavattā anupassanā paṭinissaggānupassanā,
analyzed: hi ayam bala ppattā ati paṭinissajjana ākārena pavattā anupassanā paṭinissagga anupassanā

original: paṭisaṅkhāsantiṭṭhanā hi ayaṃ. Ādānanti niccādivasena gahaṇaṃ. Santatisamūhakiccārammaṇānaṃ
analyzed: paṭisaṅkhā santiṭṭhanā hi ayam ādāna nti nicca ādi vasena gahaṇam santati samūha kicca ārammaṇānam

original: vasena ekattaggahaṇaṃ ghanasaññā. Āyūhanaṃ abhisaṅkharaṇaṃ. Avatthāvisesāpatti vipariṇāmo.
analyzed: vasena ekatta ggahaṇam ghana saññā āyūhanam abhisaṅkharaṇam avatthā avisesa āpatti vipariṇāmo

original: Dhuvasaññanti thirabhāvaggahaṇaṃ. Nimittanti samūhādighanavasena sakiccaparicchedatāya
analyzed: dhuva saññanti thira bhāva ggahaṇam nimittam ti samūha ādi ghana vasena sa kicca pariccheda tāya

original: ca saṅkhārānaṃ saviggahaggahaṇaṃ. Paṇidhinti rāgādipaṇidhiṃ. Sā panatthato taṇhāvasena
analyzed: ca saṅkhārānam sa viggaha ggahaṇam paṇidhim ti rāga ādi paṇidhim sā pana atthataḥ taṇhā vasena

original: saṅkhāresu ninnatā. Abhinivesanti attānudiṭṭhiṃ.
analyzed: saṅkhāresu ninna tāḥ abhinivesanti attā anudiṭṭhim

original: Aniccadukkhādivasena sabbadhammatīraṇaṃ adhipaññādhammavipassanā. Sārādānābhinivesanti
analyzed: anicca dukkha ādi vasena sabba dhamma tīraṇam adhi paññā dhamma vipassanā

original: asāresu sāraggahaṇavipallāsaṃ. Issarakuttādivasena loko samuppannoti abhiniveso sammohābhiniveso.
analyzed: asāresu sāra ggahaṇa vipallāsam issara kutta ādi vasena loko samuppanno ti abhiniveso sammoha abhiniveso

original: Keci pana “ahosiṃ nu kho ahaṃ atītamaddhānantiādinā pavattasaṃsayāpatti sammohābhiniveso”ti
analyzed: keci pana ahosim nu kho aham atīta maddhā ananti ādinā pavatta saṃsaya āpatti sammoha abhinivesaḥ ti

original: vadanti. Saṅkhāresu leṇatāṇabhāvaggahaṇaṃ ālayābhiniveso. “Ālayaratā ālayasammuditā”ti
analyzed: vadanti saṅkhāresu leṇa tāṇa bhāva ggahaṇam ālaya abhinivesaḥ ālaya ratā ālaya sammuditā ati

original: vacanato ālayo taṇhā, sāyeva cakkhādīsu rūpādīsu ca abhinivisanavasena pavattiyā
analyzed: vacanataḥ ālayaḥ taṇhā sāya iva cakkhu ādīsu rūpa ādīsu ca abhinivisana vasena pavattiyā

original: ālayābhinivesoti keci. “Evaṃvidhā saṅkhārā paṭinissajjīyantī”ti pavattaṃ ñāṇaṃ paṭisaṅkhānupassanā.
analyzed: ālaya abhinivesaḥ ti evaṃvidhā saṅkhārā paṭinissajjīyanti iti pavattam ñāṇam paṭisaṅkhā anupassanā

analyzed: pavattiyā saṃyoga abhinivesanti saṃyuj jana vasena saṅkhāresu

original: nivisanaṃ. Diṭṭhekaṭṭheti diṭṭhiyā sahajātekaṭṭhe pahānekaṭṭhe ca. Oḷāriketi uparimaggavajjhakilese
analyzed: nivisanam diṭṭhekaṭṭha iti diṭṭhiyā sahajāta ekaṭṭhe pahāna ikaṭṭhe ca oḷārikā iti upari magga vajjha kilese

original: apekkhitvā vuttaṃ, aññathā dassanena pahātabbāpi dutiyamaggavajjhehi oḷārikāti. Aṇusahagateti
analyzed: apekkhitvā vuttam aññathā dassanena pahātabbā api dutiya magga vajjhehi oḷārikā ati aṇu sahagatā iti

analyzed: aṇu bhūte idam heṭṭhima magga vajjhe apekkhitvā vuttam sabba kilese iti avasiṭṭha sabba kilese

original: Na hi paṭhamādimaggehi pahīnā kilesā puna pahīyantīti.
analyzed: na hi paṭhama ādi maggehi pahīnā kilesā puna pahīyanti iti

original: Kakkhaḷattaṃ kathinabhāvo. Paggharaṇaṃ dravabhāvo. Lokiyavāyunā bhastassa viya yena

analyzed: tehi asamphuṭṭha bhāvaḥ asamphuṭṭha lakkhaṇam tena āha bhagavā ākāsadhātu niddese asamphuṭṭham

original: catūhi mahābhūtehī”ti.
analyzed: catūhi mahābhūtehi iti

original: Virodhipaccayasannipāte visadisuppatti ruppanaṃ. Cetanāpadhānattā saṅkhārakkhandhadhammānaṃ

analyzed: ca cetanā yathā āha tattha katamo puñña abhisaṅkhāro kusalā cetanā kāmāvacarā atiādi

original: Pharaṇaṃ savipphārikatā. Assaddhiyeti asaddhiyahetu. Nimittatthe bhummaṃ. Esa nayo
analyzed: pharaṇam sa vipphārika tā assaddhiyā iti asaddhiya hetu nimitta atthe bhummam esa nayo

analyzed: pakkha pāta upacchedataḥ

original: ājīvasseva vā suddhi vodānaṃ. Sasampayuttadhammassa cittassa saṃkilesapakkhe patituṃ
analyzed: ājīvassa iva vā suddhi vodānam sa sampayutta dhammassa cittassa saṃkilesa pakkhe patituṃ

original: adatvā sammadeva paggaṇhanaṃ paggaho.
analyzed: a datvā sammadā eva paggaṇhanam paggahaḥ

original: “Saṅkhārā”ti idha cetanā adhippetāti vuttaṃ “saṅkhārānaṃ cetanālakkhaṇa”nti. Namanaṃ

original: ārammaṇābhimukhabhāvo. Āyatanaṃ pavattanaṃ. Āyatanānaṃ vasena hi āyasaṅkhātānaṃ cittacetasikānaṃ
analyzed: ārammaṇa abhimukha bhāvaḥ āyatanam pavattanam āyatanānam vasena hi āya saṅkhātānam citta cetasikānam

original: pavatti. Taṇhāya hetulakkhaṇanti vaṭṭassa janakahetubhāvo, maggassa pana nibbānasampāpakattanti ayametesaṃ viseso.
analyzed: pavatti taṇhāya hetu lakkhaṇanti vaṭṭassa janaka hetu bhāvaḥ maggassa pana nibbāna sampāpaka ttan ti ayam etesam visesaḥ

original: Tathalakkhaṇaṃ aviparītasabhāvo. Ekaraso aññamaññānativattanaṃ anūnānadhikabhāvo. Yuganaddhā samathavipassanāva. Saddhāpaññā paggahāvikkhepātipi vadanti.

original: Khīṇoti kilese khepatīti khayo, maggo. Anuppādapariyosānatāya anuppādo, phalaṃ. Passaddhi
analyzed: khīṇo ti kilese khepati iti khayaḥ maggo anuppāda pariyosāna tāya anuppādaḥ phalam

original: kilesavūpasamo. Chandassāti kattukāmatāchandassa. Mūlalakkhaṇaṃ patiṭṭhābhāvo. Samuṭṭhānabhāvo
analyzed: kilesa vūpasamaḥ chandassa ati kattu kāma tā chandassa mūla lakkhaṇam patiṭṭhā bhāvo samuṭṭhāna bhāvo

original: samuṭṭhānalakkhaṇaṃ ārammaṇapaṭipādakatāya sampayuttadhammānaṃ uppattihetutā. Samodhānaṃ

original: sampayuttadhammāti vā samodhānaṃ, phasso. Samosaranti sannipatanti etthāti samosaraṇaṃ.
analyzed: sampayutta dhammā ti vā samodhānam phasso samosaranti sannipatanti ettha ati samosaraṇam

original: Vedanāya vinā appavattamānā sampayuttadhammā vedanānubhavananimittaṃ samosaṭā viya
analyzed: vedanāya vinā appavattamānā sampayutta dhammā vedanā anubhavana nimittam samosaṭāḥ viya

original: hontīti evaṃ vuttaṃ. Gopānasīnaṃ kūṭaṃ viya sampayuttānaṃ pāmokkhabhāvo pamukhalakkhaṇaṃ.
analyzed: honti iti evam vuttam gopānasīnam kūṭam viya sampayuttānam pāmokkha bhāvaḥ pamukha lakkhaṇam

original: Tato, tesaṃ vā sampayuttadhammānaṃ uttari padhānanti tatuttari, paññuttarā hi kusalā
analyzed: tatas tesam vā sampayutta dhammānam uttari padhānanti tatuttari paññuttarāḥ hi kusalā

original: dhammā. Vimuttiyāti phalassa. Tañhi sīlādiguṇasārassa paramukkaṃsabhāvena sāraṃ.
analyzed: dhammā vimuttiyā ti phalassa tat hi sīla ādi guṇa sārassa paramukkaṃsa bhāvena sāram

original: Ayañca lakkhaṇavibhāgo chadhātupañcajhānaṅgādivasena taṃtaṃsuttapadānusārena porāṇaṭṭhakathāyaṃ
analyzed: ayam ca lakkhaṇa vibhāgo cha dhātu pañca jhā anaṅga ādi vasena taṃ taṃ sutta pada anusārena porāṇa ṭṭhakathā ayam

original: āgatanayena ca katoti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Tathā hi pubbe vuttopi koci dhammo pariyāyantarapakāsanatthaṃ
analyzed: āgata nayena ca kataḥ iti daṭṭhabbam tathā hi pubbe vuttaḥ api koci dhammaḥ

original: puna dassito. Tato eva ca “chandamūlakā kusalā dhammā manasikārasamuṭṭhānā phassasamodhānā
analyzed: puna dassitaḥ tatas eva ca chanda mūlakā kusalā dhammā manasikāra samuṭṭhānā phassa samodhānā

original: vedanāsamosaraṇā”ti, “paññuttarā kusalā dhammā”ti, “vimuttisāramidaṃ brahmacariya”nti,
analyzed: vedanā samosaraṇā ati paññuttarā kusalā dhammā ati vimutti sāram idam brahmacariyanti

original: “nibbānogadhañhi āvuso brahmacariyaṃ nibbānapariyosāna”nti ca suttapadānaṃ vasena

original: buddhādīnaṃ lakkhaṇadīpanagantho mahāpurisalakkhaṇaṃ. Tesu anūno paripūrakārīti anavayo.
analyzed: buddha ādīnam lakkhaṇa dīpana gantho mahāpurisa lakkhaṇam tesu anūnaḥ paripūrakārī iti anavayaḥ

original: Manteti vede. Yadipi vedo “manto, brahmaṃ, kappo”ti tividho, manto eva pana mūlavedo,
analyzed: manta iti vede tividhaḥ mantaḥ eva mūlavedaḥ

original: tadatthavivaraṇaṃ brahmaṃ, tattha vuttanayena yaññakiriyāvidhānaṃ kappo. Tena vuttaṃ

original: Lomasānīti lomavantāni, ghanakesamassuvānīti attho. Kesāpi hi lomaggahaṇena gayhanti

original: Abhiññāyāti kusalādibhedaṃ khandhādibhedañca desetabbaṃ dhammaṃ, veneyyānañca āsayānusayacariyāvimuttiādibhedaṃ,

analyzed: na itti naya vaṇṇanā

original: 3. Sīhavikkīḷitanayavaṇṇanā

original: “ābhavaggā bhagavato yaso pavattatī”ti. Abhividhiattho cāyaṃ ā-kāro idha gahitoti

analyzed: vuttam antokaraṇa attho ti

analyzed: vira parivuttha tā purāṇa bhāvaḥ avijjā ettha ādi saddena purimā bhikkhave

analyzed: cira parivuttha tāya dassitāya tad bhāva bhāvino kāma āsavassa cira parivuttha tā dassitā ava

original: nissayanabhāvanā sambhavantīti. Ayamevāti viveko eva. Viveko hi pahānavinayavirāganirodhā ca samānatthā.

original: dassetuṃ “yo hī”tiādi vuttaṃ. Evaṃ chahipi padehi udarāvadehakaṃ bhojanaṃ dassitaṃ,
analyzed: dassetum yaḥ hi itiādi vuttam evam chahi pi padehi udara avadehakam bhojanam dassitam

original: tañca kho parikappanāvasena. Na hi bhagavā evaṃ bhuñjati. Tenāha “sabbañcetaṃ parikappetvā vutta”nti.

original: paricchedavacana”nti āha. Nukāro pucchāyanti ayaṃ nu-saddo idheva pucchāyaṃ āgatoti

original: katvā vuttaṃ. Nu-saddena hettha jotiyamāno attho kiṃ-saddena parimāṇo attho parimeyyattho
analyzed: katvā vuttam nu saddena ha ittha jotiyamānaḥ attho kim saddena parimāṇaḥ attho parimeyyattho

original: ca. Ettha saṃkilesapakkho vivekassa ananusikkhanaṃ āmisadāyādatā, vodānapakkho tassa
analyzed: ca ettha saṃkilesa pakkhaḥ vivekassa an anusikkhanam āmisa dāyāda tā vodāna pakkhaḥ tassa

analyzed: tīhi vivekehi iti tad anta gadhattā

original: vivekapañcakassa. Vivekapañcakaggahaṇe panassa sarūpena kāyaviveko gahito na siyā,
analyzed: viveka pañcakassa viveka pañcaka ggahaṇe pana assa sarūpena kāya vivekaḥ gahitaḥ na siyā

original: tadāyattattā vā satthārā tadā payujjamānavivekadassanavasena “tīhi vivekehī”tiādi
analyzed: tad āyatta ttā vā satthārā tadā payujjamāna viveka dassana vasena tīhi vivekehi itiādi

original: vuttaṃ. Aññatarampīti kasmā vuttaṃ. Na hi kāyavivekamattena dhammadāyādabhāvo sijjhatīti?
analyzed: vuttam aññataram pi iti kasmā vuttam na hi kāya viveka mattena dhamma dāyāda bhāvo sijjhati iti

original: Na, vivekadvayasannissayasseva kāyavivekassa idhādhippetattā. Evañca katvā cittavivekaggahaṇampi
analyzed: na viveka dvaya sannissayassa iva kāya vivekassa idha adhippetattā evam ca katvā citta viveka ggahaṇam pi

original: samatthitaṃ hoti. Na hi lokiyajjhānādhigamamattena nippariyāyato satthudhammadāyādabhāvo
analyzed: samatthitam hoti na hi lokiya jhāna adhigama mattena nippariyāyataḥ satthu dhamma dāyāda bhāvaḥ

original: icchito, nibbānādhigamena pana so icchito, tasmā sabbāpi sāsane vivekānusikkhanā
analyzed: icchitaḥ nibbāna adhigamena pana so icchitaḥ tasmā sabbā api sāsane viveka anusikkhanā

original: nibbānapoṇā nibbānapabbhārā nibbānogadhā cāti vuttaṃ “tiṇṇaṃ vivekānaṃ aññatarampī”ti.
analyzed: nibbāna poṇāḥ nibbāna pabbhārāḥ nibbāna ugadhāḥ ca ati vuttam tiṇṇam vivekānam aññataram pi iti

original: Asati āloke andhakāro viya asati dhammadāyādatāya ekaṃsiyā āmisadāyādatāti āha “āmisadāyādāva
analyzed: asati āloke andhakāraḥ viya asati dhamma dāyāda tāya āha

original: hontī”ti. Esa nayo sukkapakkhepīti kaṇhapakkhato sādhāraṇavasena labbhamānaṃ atthasāmaññaṃ
analyzed: honti iti esa nayaḥ sukka pakkhe pi iti kaṇha pakkhato sādhāraṇa vasena labbhamānam attha sāmaññam

original: atidisati, na atthavisesaṃ tassa visadisattā, atthavisesameva vā atidisati visadisūdāharaṇūpāyañāyena.
analyzed: atidisati na attha visesam tassa visadisa ttā attha visesam eva vā atidisati visadisa udāharaṇa upāya ñāyena

original: “Tiṇṇaṃ vivekānaṃ aññatara”nti idaṃ idha na labbhati. Tayopi hi vivekā, tesu eko

original: vā itaradvayasannissayo idha labbhati.
analyzed: vā itara dvaya sannissayaḥ idha labbhati

original: Dūratopīti dūraṭṭhānatopi. Tenāha “tiroraṭṭhatopī”tiādi. Kāmaṃ “paṭibhātū”ti ettha

analyzed: dassentaḥ āha āyasmato yā iva sāriputtassa ati bhāgaḥ hotu iti iminā bhāga attho paṭisaddo ti

analyzed: dasseti lakkhaṇa ādi atthānam idha ayujjanato tena āha evam sadda lakkhaṇena sameti iti

original: Dissatūti ñāṇena dissatu, passatūti vā attho. Upaṭṭhātūti ñāṇassa paccupatiṭṭhatu.
analyzed: dissatu uti ñāṇena dissatu passatu uti vā attho upaṭṭhātu uti ñāṇassa paccupatiṭṭhatu

original: Uggahessantīti vācuggataṃ karissanti. Vācuggatakaraṇañhi uggaho. Pariyāpuṇissantīti
analyzed: uggahessanti iti vācuggatam karissanti vācuggata karaṇam hi uggahaḥ pariyāpuṇissanti iti

original: tasseva vevacanaṃ. Puripucchanādinā vā atthassa citte āpādanaṃ paṭṭhapanaṃ pariyāpuṇanaṃ.
analyzed: tassa iva vevacanam puripucchana ādinā vā atthassa citte āpādanam paṭṭhapanam pariyāpuṇanam

original: Vuttatthapaccāmasanaṃ taṃ-saddena karīyatīti. Tenāha “yasmā”tiādi.
analyzed: vutta ttha pacca āmasanam taṃsaddena tena āha yasmā itiādi

original: Ekenevākārenāti āmisadāyādatāsiddhena ādiyatāsaṅkhātena ekeneva pakārena. Tameva
analyzed: ekena iva ākārena ati āmisa dāyāda tā siddhena ādiya tā saṅkhātena ekena iva pakārena tam eva

analyzed: hi ākāram sandhāya āha bhagavatā vuttam attham ti aññathā satthu pavivittassa viharato

original: sāvakā vivekaṃ nānusikkhantī’ti ekeneva ākārena so attho therenapi vutto. Tīhi ākārehīti

original: āmisadāyādapaṭipadābhūtehi tiṇṇaṃ vivekānaṃ ananusikkhanākārehi. Ettāvatāti “idhāvuso…pe…
analyzed: āmisa dāyāda paṭipadā bhūtehi tiṇṇam vivekānam an anusikkhanā ākārehi ettāvatā ati idha āvuso pe

original: nānusikkhantī”ti ettakena kaṇhapakkhe uddesapāṭhena.
analyzed: na anusikkhanti iti ettakena kaṇha pakkhe uddesa pāṭhena

original: Vitthārato suvibhatto hoti anavasesato sammadeva niddiṭṭhattā. Nanu ca uddese satthunopi
analyzed: vitthārato su vibhattaḥ hoti anavasesato sammat eva niddiṭṭha ttā nanu ca uddese satthunā api

original: ādiyatā bhagavatā gahitā, sā na niddiṭṭhāti anuyogaṃ sandhāyāha “so ca kho”tiādi.
analyzed: ādiyatā bhagavatā gahitā sā na niddiṭṭhā iti anuyogam sandhāya āha saḥ ca kho ti ādi

original: Sāvake anuggaṇhantassāti “āmisadāyādā satthu sāvakā”ti satthu parappavādapariharaṇatthampi
analyzed: sāvake anuggaṇhantassa ati āmisa dāyādā satthu sāvakā ati satthu para pavāda pariharaṇa attham pi

original: “tumhehi dhammadāyādehi bhavitabba”nti evaṃ sāvake anukampamānassa. Sāvakānaṃ taṃ
analyzed: tumhehi dhamma dāyādehi bhavitabban ti evam sāvake anukampamānassa sāvakānam tam

original: na yuttaṃ sāmīciabhāvatoti yojanā. Esa nayoti yadidaṃ “ettāvatāyaṃ bhagavā”tiādinā
analyzed: na yuttam sāmīci abhāvataḥ ti yojanā yat idam bhagavān ati ādinā

original: kaṇhapakkhe uddesassa atthavibhāgadassanamukhena sambandhadassanaṃ, esa nayo sukkapakkhepi
analyzed: kaṇha pakkhe uddesassa attha vibhāga dassana mukhena sambandha dassanam esa nayo sukka pakkhe pi

analyzed: sambandha dassanā iti adhippāyaḥ tena āha ayam tāva ettha anusandhi kama yojanā ti satthārā

original: Yathānusandhi eva cettha anusandhi veditabbo.
analyzed: yathānusandhi eva ca ittha anusandhi veditabbo

original: Accantapavivittassāti ekantaupadhiviveko viya itarepi viveko satthu ekantikāvāti.
analyzed: accanta pavivittassa ti ekanta opadhi vivekaḥ itare pi

original: Anusikkhanaṃ nāma anu anu pūraṇanti tappaṭikkhepena āha “na paripūrentī”ti, na paribrūhentīti
analyzed: anusikkhanam nāma anu anu pūraṇanti tad paṭikkhepena āha na paripūrenti iti na paribrūhenti iti

original: attho, na paripūrentīti vā na paripālentīti attho. Yadaggena hi vivekaṃ nānusikkhanti,
analyzed: atthaḥ na paripūrenti iti vā na paripālenti iti atthaḥ yad aggena hi vivekam na anusikkhanti

analyzed: tad aggena na paribrūhenti na paripālenti iti vā vattabbatam labhanti iti kasmā pana ittha

analyzed: vivekam na anusikkhanti iti uddese viya avisesa vacane kāya vivekassa iva gahaṇam katam ti

original: codanaṃ sandhāyāha “yadi panā”tiādi. Pucchāyāti pucchāto aviseso siyā vibhāgassa
analyzed: codanam sandhāya āha yadi pana atiādi pucchāya ati pucchātaḥ avisesaḥ siyā vibhāgassa

original: alabbhamānattā vissajjanassa. Nanu ca “vivekaṃ nānusikkhantī”ti avisesavacanato pāḷiyaṃ
analyzed: a labbha māna ttā vissajjanassa nanu ca vivekam na anusikkhanti iti avisesa vacanataḥ pāḷiyam

analyzed: vibhāgaḥ na labbhateva ati na pada antarena vibhāvita ttā tena āha yesam ca dhammānaṃ tiādi

original: Byākaraṇapakkhoti vissajjanapakkho. Vissajjanañca na pucchā viya avisesajotanā, atha

analyzed: kho yathā adhippeta attha vibhajanan ti adhippāyaḥ iminā padena ati vivekam na anusikkhanti iti

original: Ettha ca nappajahantīti pahātabbadhammānaṃ pahānābhāvavacanaṃ pahānalakkhaṇavivekābhāvadīpanaṃ,
analyzed: ettha ca na ppajahanti iti pahātabba dhammānam pahāna abhāva vacanam pahāna lakkhaṇa viveka abhāva dīpanam

original: tadubhayavivekābhāvadassanena “yesañca dhammāna”ntiādināva pārisesañāyena “vivekaṃ
analyzed: tad ubhaya viveka abhāva dassanena yesam ca dhamma ananti ādinā ava pārisesa ñāyena vivekam

analyzed: bāhulikā yathā venayikā uti te pana yasmā paccaya bahula bhāvāya yutta ppayuttāḥ nāma

analyzed: a daḷham gaṇhanti iti sāthalikā ati vuttam sithilanti bhāva napuṃsaka niddeso sithila saddena

analyzed: upadhīhi vivitte oropita dhurā ati

original: Dasavasse upādāyāti dasavassato paṭṭhāya. Issariyeti “seṭṭhiṭṭhānaṃ senāpatiṭṭhāna”ntiādīsu
analyzed: dasa vasse upādāya ati dasa vassataḥ paṭṭhāya issariyā iti seṭṭhi ṭṭhānam senāpati ṭṭhāna ntiādīsu

original: viya. Acirakkhaṇobhāsena lakkhavedhako akkhaṇavedhi. Ṭhitiyanti avaṭṭhāne. Ṭhānasoti

analyzed: taṅkhaṇeya iva tiṭṭhati iti ādhāra ādheyya bhāvena ati āha tad āyatta vutti bhāvena ati upekkhā anubrūhanā

original: sattasaṅkhāresu udāsīnatāpi asaṅkhatādhigamassa upāyoti tabbipariyāyato cīvarādimaṇḍanā

original: 32. Imasmiñca kaṇhapakkheti imasmiñca niddesavāre kaṇhapakkhe, na uddesavāre kaṇhapakkhe.
analyzed: imasmin ca kaṇha pakkha iti imasmin ca niddesavāre kaṇha pakkhe na uddesavāre kaṇha pakkhe

original: Sāyaṃ nikkhamati yonisomanasikāraṃ upabrūhetvāti adhippāyo. Kasiṇaparikammaṃ karoti,
analyzed: sāyam nikkhamati yoni somanasikāram adhippāyaḥ kasiṇa parikammam karoti

original: na yaṃ kiñci kiccantaraṃ. Samāpattiyo nibbatteti, na moghamanasikāraṃ. Sabbathātiādito
analyzed: na yam kiñci kiccantaram samāpattiyaḥ nibbattā iti na mogha manasikāram sabbathā āti āditas

original: paṭipassaddhivasenāti sabbappakārena cittavivekaṃ pūreti. Paṃsukūlāni dhāretīti iminā

original: bāhulikatābhāvaṃ dasseti, asithilaṃ sāsanaṃ gahetvāti iminā sāthalikatābhāvaṃ, vigatanīvaraṇoti
analyzed: bāhulika tā bhāvam dasseti asithilam sāsanam gahetvā iti iminā sāthalika tā bhāvam vigata nīvaraṇā ti

original: iminā okkamane nikkhittadhurataṃ, phalasamāpattintiādinā pavivekapubbaṅgamataṃ dasseti.
