original: saddasiddhimāha yathā “kakū”ti. “Seyyathidanti nipāto”ti vatvā tassa sabbaliṅgavibhattivacanasādhāraṇatāya
analyzed: sadda siddhim āha yathā nipāto ti vatvā tassa sabba liṅga vibhatti vacana sādhāraṇa tāya

original: “katamāni tāni aṭṭhaṅgānī”ti vuttaṃ. Nanu ca aṅgāni samuditāni maggo antamaso sattaṅgavikalassa
analyzed: katamāni tāni aṭṭhaṅgāni iti vuttam nanu ca aṅgāni samuditāni maggaḥ antamasaḥ sattaṅga vikalassa

original: ariyamaggassa abhāvatoti? Saccametaṃ saccapaṭivedhena, maggapaccayatāya pana yathāsakaṃ
analyzed: ariya maggassa abhāvato ti saccam etam sacca paṭivedhena magga paccaya tāya pana yathāsakam

original: kiccakaraṇena paccekampi tāni maggoyevāti āha “ekamekañhi aṅgaṃ maggoyevā”ti, aññathā
analyzed: kicca karaṇena paccekam pi tāni āha ekam ekam hi aṅgam aññathā

original: samuditānampi nesaṃ maggakiccaṃ na sambhaveyyāti. Idāni tamevatthaṃ pāḷiyā samatthetuṃ
analyzed: samuditānam pi na īsam magga kiccam na sambhaveyya idāni tam eva attham pāḷiyā samatthetum

original: “sammādiṭṭhimaggo ceva hetu cā”ti vuttaṃ.
analyzed: sammādiṭṭhi maggaḥ ca iva hetu ca ati vuttam

original: Sammā aviparītaṃ pariññābhisamayādivasena catunnaṃ saccānaṃ dassanaṃ paṭivijjhanaṃ
analyzed: sammā aviparītam pariññā abhisamaya ādi vasena catunnam saccānam dassanam paṭivijjhanam

original: lakkhaṇaṃ etissāti sammādassanalakkhaṇā. Sammā aviparītaṃ sampayuttadhamme nibbānārammaṇe
analyzed: lakkhaṇam etissa ati sammādassana lakkhaṇā sammā aviparītam sampayutta dhamme nibbāna ārammaṇe

original: abhiniropanaṃ appanālakkhaṇaṃ etassāti sammāabhiniropanalakkhaṇo musāvādādīnaṃ visaṃvādanādikiccatāya
analyzed: abhiniropanam appanā lakkhaṇam etassa ati sammā abhiniropana lakkhaṇaḥ musāvāda ādīnam visaṃvādana ādi kicca tāya

original: lūkhānaṃ apariggāhakānaṃ paṭipakkhabhāvato siniddhasabhāvattā sampayuttadhamme, sammāvācappaccayasubhāsitasotārañca
analyzed: lūkhānam a pariggāhakānam paṭipakkha bhāvataḥ siniddha sabhāva ttā sampayutta dhamme sammā vāca paccaya subhāsita sotāram ca

original: janaṃ sammadeva pariggaṇhātīti sammāvācā sammāpariggaho lakkhaṇaṃ etissāti sammāpariggahalakkhaṇā.
analyzed: janam sammat eva pariggaṇhāti iti sammā vācā sammā pariggahaḥ lakkhaṇam etissa ati sammā pariggaha lakkhaṇā

original: Yathā kāyikā kiriyā kiñci kattabbaṃ samuṭṭhāpeti, sayañca samuṭṭhahanaṃ ghaṭanaṃ
analyzed: yathā kāyikā kiriyā kiñci kattabbam samuṭṭhāpeti sayam ca samuṭṭhahanam ghaṭanam

original: hoti, tathā sammākammantasaṅkhātā viratipīti sammāsamuṭṭhānalakkhaṇo sammākammanto.
analyzed: hoti tathā sammākammanta saṅkhātā virati pīti sammā samuṭṭhāna lakkhaṇaḥ sammākammanto

original: Sampayuttadhammānaṃ vā ukkhipanaṃ samuṭṭhānaṃ kāyikakiriyāya bhārukkhipanaṃ viya.
analyzed: sampayutta dhammānam vā ukkhipanam samuṭṭhānam kāyika kiriyāya bhāra ukkhipanam viya

original: Jīvamānassa sattassa, sampayuttadhammānaṃ vā suddhi vodānaṃ, ājīvasseva vā jīvitappavattiyā
analyzed: jīvamānassa sattassa sampayutta dhammānam vā suddhi vodānam ājīvassa iva vā jīvita ppavattiyā

original: suddhi vodānaṃ etenāti sammāvodānalakkhaṇo sammāājīvo. Kosajjapakkhe patituṃ adatvā
analyzed: suddhi vodānam etena ati sammāvodāna lakkhaṇaḥ sammāājīvaḥ kosajja pakkhe patitum a datvā

original: sampayuttadhammānaṃ paggaṇhanaṃ anubalappadānaṃ paggaho. Ārammaṇaṃ upagantvā ṭhānaṃ,
analyzed: sampayutta dhammānam paggaṇhanam anubala ppadānam paggahaḥ ārammaṇam upagantvā ṭhānam

original: tassa vā anissajjanaṃ upaṭṭhānaṃ. Ārammaṇe sampayuttadhammānaṃ sammā, samaṃ vā ādhānaṃ
analyzed: tassa vā a nissajjanam upaṭṭhānam ārammaṇe sampayutta dhammānam sammā samam vā ādhānam

original: samādhānaṃ. Sammā saṅkappeti sampayuttadhamme ārammaṇe abhiniropetīti sammāsaṅkappo.
analyzed: samādhānam sammā saṅkappeti sampayutta dhamme ārammaṇe abhiniropeti iti sammāsaṅkappaḥ

original: Sammā vadati etāyāti sammāvācā. Sammā karoti etenāti sammākammaṃ, tadeva sammākammanto.
analyzed: sammā vadati etāya ati sammā vācā sammā karoti etena ati sammākammam tat eva sammākammantaḥ

original: Sammā ājīvati etenāti sammāājīvo. Sammā vāyamati ussahati etenāti sammāvāyāmo. Sammā
analyzed: sammā ājīvati etena ati sammāājīvaḥ sammā vāyamati ussahati etena ati sammāvāyāmaḥ sammā

original: sarati anussaratīti sammāsati. Sammā samādhiyati cittaṃ etenāti sammāsamādhīti evaṃ
analyzed: sarati anussarati iti sammā sati sammā samādhiyati cittam etena ati sammāsamādhi iti evam

original: sammāsaṅkappādīnaṃ nibbacanaṃ veditabbaṃ.
analyzed: sammāsaṅkappa ādīnam nibbacanam veditabbam

original: Micchādiṭṭhinti sabbampi micchādassanaṃ. Tappaccanīyakileseti ettha taṃ-saddena sammādiṭṭhi.
analyzed: micchādiṭṭhin ti sabbam pi micchādassanam tad paccanīya kilese ti ettha tad saddena sammādiṭṭhi

original: Na hi micchādiṭṭhiyā kilesā paccanīyā, atha kho sammādiṭṭhiyā. Avijjañcāti avijjāggahaṇaṃ
analyzed: na hi micchādiṭṭhiyā kilesāḥ paccanīyāḥ atha kho sammādiṭṭhiyā avijjam ca ati avijjā ggahaṇam

original: tassā saṃkilesadhammānaṃ pamukhabhāvato. Tenāha “avijjā, bhikkhave, pubbaṅgamā akusalānaṃ
analyzed: saṃkilesa dhammānam pamukha bhāvataḥ tena āha avijjā bhikkhave pubbaṅgamā akusalānam

original: dhammānaṃ samāpattiyā”ti. Dassananivārakassa sammohassa samugghātena asammohato.
analyzed: dhammānam samāpattiyā ati dassana nivārakassa sammohassa samugghātena a sammohato

original: Ettha ca micchādiṭṭhiṃ…pe… pajahatīti etena pahānābhisamayaṃ, nibbānaṃ ārammaṇaṃ
analyzed: ettha ca micchādiṭṭhiṃpe pajahati iti etena pahāna abhisamayam nibbānam ārammaṇam

original: karotīti etena sacchikiriyābhisamayaṃ, sampayuttadhammetiādinā bhāvanābhisamayaṃ
analyzed: karoti iti etena sacchikiriyā abhisamayam sampayutta dhamma iti ādinā bhāvanā abhisamayam

original: sammādiṭṭhikiccaṃ dasseti. Pariññābhisamayo pana nānantariyatāya atthato vutto eva hotīti daṭṭhabbo.
analyzed: sammādiṭṭhi kiccam dasseti pariññā abhisamayaḥ pana nānantariya tāya atthataḥ vuttaḥ eva hoti iti daṭṭhabbo

original: Kathaṃ pana ekameva ñāṇaṃ ekasmiṃ khaṇe cattāri kiccāni sādhentaṃ pavattati. Na hi
analyzed: katham pana ekam eva ñāṇam ekasmin khaṇe cattāri kiccāni sādhentam pavattati na hi

original: tādisaṃ loke diṭṭhaṃ, na āgamo vā tādiso atthīti na vattabbaṃ. Yathā hi padīpo ekasmiṃyeva
analyzed: tādisam loke diṭṭham na āgamaḥ vā tādisaḥ atthi iti na vattabbam yathā hi padīpaḥ ekasmin yeva

original: khaṇe vaṭṭiṃ dahati, snehaṃ pariyādiyati, andhakāraṃ vidhamati, ālokañca vidaṃseti,
analyzed: khaṇe vaṭṭim dahati sneham andhakāram vidhamati ālokam ca vidaṃseti

original: evametaṃ ñāṇanti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Maggasamaṅgissa ñāṇaṃ dukkhepetaṃ ñāṇaṃ, dukkhasamudayepetaṃ
analyzed: evam etam ñāṇanti daṭṭhabbam magga samaṅgissa ñāṇam dukkhe petam ñāṇam dukkha samudaye petam

original: ñāṇaṃ, dukkhanirodhepetaṃ ñāṇaṃ, dukkhanirodhagāminiyā paṭipadāyapetaṃ ñāṇanti suttapadaṃ
analyzed: ñāṇam dukkha nirodha ipetam ñāṇam dukkha nirodha gāminiyā paṭipadāya apetam ñāṇam ti sutta padaṃ

original: ettha udāharitabbaṃ. Yathā ca sammādiṭṭhi pubbabhāge dukkhādīsu visuṃ visuṃ pavattitvā
analyzed: ettha udāharitabbam yathā ca sammādiṭṭhi pubba bhāge dukkha ādīsu visum visum pavattitvā

original: maggakkhaṇe ekāva catunnaṃ ñāṇānaṃ kiccaṃ sādhentī pavattati, evaṃ sammāsaṅkappādayo
analyzed: magga kkhaṇe ekā ava catunnam ñāṇānam kiccam sādhentī pavattati evam sammāsaṅkappa ādayo

analyzed: pubba bhāge nekkhamma saṅkappa ādi nāmakāḥ hutvā kāma saṅkappa ādīnam pajahana vasena visum

original: visuṃ pavattitvā maggakkhaṇe tiṇṇaṃ catunnañca kiccaṃ sādhentā pavattanti. Sammāsamādhi
analyzed: visum pavattitvā magga kkhaṇe tiṇṇam catunnam ca kiccam sādhentā pavattanti sammāsamādhi

analyzed: pana pubba bhāge pi magga kkhaṇe pi nānāyā iva hutvā pavattati iti kāmam ca ittha sammādiṭṭhiyā

original: sabbepi pāpadhammā paṭipakkhā, ujuvipaccanīkatādassanavasena pana sammādiṭṭhiyā kiccaniddese
analyzed: sabbe pi pāpa dhammā paṭipakkhāḥ uju vipaccanīka tā dassana vasena pana sammādiṭṭhiyā kicca niddese

original: micchādiṭṭhiggahaṇaṃ kataṃ. Teneva ca “tappaccanīyakilese cā”ti vuttaṃ.
analyzed: micchādiṭṭhi ggahaṇam katam tena iva ca tad paccanīya kilese ca ati vuttam

original: Yesaṃ kilesānaṃ anupacchindane sammādiṭṭhi na uppajjeyya, te micchādiṭṭhiyā sahajekaṭṭhatāya
analyzed: yesam kilesānam anupacchindane sammādiṭṭhi na uppajjeyya te micchādiṭṭhiyā sahajekaṭṭha tāya

original: tadekaṭṭhāva tappaccanīyakilesā daṭṭhabbā. Sammāsaṅkappādīnaṃ kiccaniddesepi eseva
analyzed: tad ekaṭṭhā va tad paccanīya kilesā daṭṭhabbā sammāsaṅkappa ādīnam kicca niddese pi esā eva

original: nayo. Sotāpattimaggādivasena cattāro lokuttaramaggabhāvasāmaññena ekato katvā. Lobhadosā
analyzed: nayo sotāpatti magga ādi vasena cattāraḥ lokuttara magga bhāva sāmaññena ekatas katvā lobha dosā

original: samudayasaccaṃ, yassa pana so samudayo taṃ dukkhasaccaṃ, pahānabhāvo maggasaccaṃ,

original: yattha taṃ pahānaṃ, taṃ nirodhasaccanti imāni cattāri saccāni. Kasmā panettha lobhadosānaṃ
analyzed: yattha tam pahānam tam nirodha saccanti imāni cattāri saccāni kasmā pana ittha lobha dosānaṃ

original: visuṃ ādito ca gahaṇaṃ? Visuṃ gahaṇaṃ tāva tathābujjhanakānaṃ puggalānaṃ ajjhāsayavasena,
analyzed: visum āditas ca gahaṇam visum gahaṇam tāva tathābujjhanakānam puggalānam ajjhāsaya vasena

original: imehi lobhadosehi āmisadāyādatā, tappahānena ca dhammadāyādatāti dassanatthaṃ, tadanusārena
analyzed: imehi lobha dosehi āmisa dāyāda tā tad pahānena ca dhamma dāyāda tā ti dassana ttham tad anusārena

original: catusaccayojanāya evaṃ ekekassa niyyānamukhaṃ hotīti dassanatthañca. Sesavāresupi
analyzed: catur acca yojanāya evam ekekassa niyyāna mukham hoti iti dassana ttham ca sesa vāresu pi

original: eseva nayo. Ādito gahaṇaṃ pana ativiya oḷārikatāya supākaṭabhāvato vakkhamānānaṃ
analyzed: esa iva nayaḥ āditas gahaṇam pana ativiya oḷārika tāya su pākaṭa bhāvataḥ vakkhamānānam

original: aññesañca pāpadhammānaṃ mūlabhāvato tadekaṭṭhatāya ca veditabbaṃ.
analyzed: aññesam ca pāpa dhammānam mūla bhāvato tad ekaṭṭha tāya ca veditabbam

original: Kujjhanalakkhaṇoti kuppanasabhāvo, cittassa byāpajjanāti attho. Caṇḍikkaṃ luddatā,
analyzed: kujjhana lakkhaṇo ti kuppana sabhāvo cittassa attho caṇḍikkam ludda tā

original: kururabhāvoti attho. Āghātakaraṇarasoti “anatthaṃ me acarī”tiādinā citte āghātassa
analyzed: kuruḥ abhāvaḥ ti attho āghāta karaṇa rasaḥ ti anattham me acari iti ādinā citte āghātassa

original: karaṇaraso. Dussanapaccupaṭṭhānoti saparasantānassa vināsanapaccupaṭṭhāno laddhokāso
analyzed: karaṇa rasaḥ dussana paccupaṭṭhāno ti sa para santānassa vināsana paccupaṭṭhāno laddha ukāso

original: viya sapatto. Upanandhanaṃ nānappakārassa uparūpari nandhanaṃ viya hotīti katvā.
analyzed: viya sa pattaḥ upanandhanam nānappakārassa upari upari nandhanam viya hoti iti katvā

original: Tathā hesa “veraappaṭinissajjanaraso, kodhānupabandhabhāvapaccupaṭṭhāno”ti ca vutto.
analyzed: tathā ha isa vera appaṭinissajjana raso kodha anupabandha bhāva paccupaṭṭhānaḥ ti ca vutto

original: Aparakāle upanāhotiādīti ādi-saddena “upanayhanā upanayhitattaṃ āṭhapanā ṭhapanā
analyzed: apara kāle upanāhaḥ uti ādi iti ādi saddena upanayhanā upanayhitattam āṭhapanā ṭhapanā

original: saṇṭhapanā anusaṃsandanā anuppabandhanā daḷhīkamma”ntiādīnaṃ niddesapadānaṃ atthavaṇṇanaṃ
analyzed: saṇṭhapanā anusaṃsandanā anuppabandhanā daḷhīkammanti ādīnam niddesa padānam attha vaṇṇanam

analyzed: saṅgayhati upanāha samaṅgī hi puggalaḥ verassa a nissajjanataḥ āditta pūti alātam viya

original: jalati eva, cittañcassa dhoviyamānaṃ acchacammaṃ viya, masimakkhitapilotikā viya ca na sujjhateva.
analyzed: jalati eva cittam cassa dhoviyamānam accha cammam viya masi makkhita pilotikā viya ca na sujjhatā iva

original: Paraguṇamakkhanalakkhaṇoti udakapuñchaniyā udakaṃ viya paresaṃ guṇānaṃ makkhanasabhāvo.
analyzed: para guṇa makkhana lakkhaṇaḥ ti udaka puñchaniyā udakam viya paresam guṇānam makkhana sabhāvaḥ

original: Tathābhūto cāyaṃ attano kārakaṃ gūthena paharantaṃ gūtho viya paṭhamataraṃ makkheti
analyzed: tathābhūtaḥ ca ayam attanaḥ kārakam gūthena paharantam gūthaḥ viya paṭhamataram makkheti

original: evāti daṭṭhabbo. Tathā hessa saparasantānesu guṇaṃ makkhetīti makkhoti vuccati. Yugaggāho
analyzed: eva ati daṭṭhabbo tathā ha issa sa para santānesu guṇam makkheti iti makkho ti vuccati yuga ggāho

original: samadhuraggahaṇaṃ asamānassapi abhūtassa samāropanaṃ. Samabhāvakaraṇaṃ samīkaraṇaṃ.
analyzed: asamānassa api abhūtassa samāropanam sama bhāva karaṇam samīkaraṇam

original: Paresaṃ guṇappamāṇena attano guṇānaṃ upaṭṭhānaṃ paccupaṭṭhapetīti āha “paresaṃ guṇappamāṇena
analyzed: paresam guṇa ppamāṇena attanaḥ guṇānam upaṭṭhānam paccupaṭṭhapeti iti āha paresam guṇa ppamāṇena

original: upaṭṭhānapaccupaṭṭhāno”ti. Tathā hesa paresaṃ guṇe ḍaṃsitvā viya attano guṇehi same
analyzed: upaṭṭhāna paccupaṭṭhānaḥ ti tathā ha esa paresam guṇe ḍaṃsitvā viya attanaḥ guṇehi same

original: karotīti paḷāsoti vuccati.
analyzed: karoti iti paḷāsaḥ ti vuccati

original: Parasampattikhīyanaṃ parasampattiyā usūyanaṃ. Issati parasampattiṃ na sahatīti issā.
analyzed: para sampatti khīyanam para sampattiyāḥ usūyanam issati para sampattim na sahati iti issā

original: Tathā hesā “parasampattiyā akkhamanalakkhaṇā”ti vuccati. Tatthāti parasampattiyaṃ.
analyzed: tathā ha isā para sampattiyā akkhamana lakkhaṇā ti vuccati tattha ati para sampattiyam

original: Anabhiratirasā abhiratipaṭipakkhakiccā. Vimukhabhāvapaccupaṭṭhānā parasampattiṃ passitumpi
analyzed: an abhirati rasā abhirati paṭipakkha kiccā vimukha bhāva paccupaṭṭhānā para sampattim passitum pi

original: appadānato. Nigūhanalakkhaṇaṃ attano sampattiyā parehi sādhāraṇabhāvāsahanato. Asukhāyanaṃ
analyzed: appadānataḥ nigūhana lakkhaṇam attanaḥ sampattiyā parehi sādhāraṇa bhāva a sahanataḥ asukhāyanam

original: na sukhanaṃ dukkhanaṃ, arocananti adhippāyo.
analyzed: na sukhanam dukkhanam a rocananti adhippāyaḥ

original: Katassa kāyaduccaritādipāpassa paṭicchādanaṃ katapāpapaṭicchādanaṃ. Tassa pāpassa
analyzed: katassa kāya duccarita ādi pāpassa paṭicchādanam kata pāpa paṭicchādanam tassa pāpassa

original: āvaraṇabhāvena paccupatiṭṭhatīti tadāvaraṇapaccupaṭṭhānā, māyā, yāya samannāgato

analyzed: puggalaḥ bhasma channaḥ viya aṅgāraḥ udaka channaḥ viya khāṇu pilotika paṭicchāditam viya

original: ca satthaṃ hoti. Avijjamānaguṇappakāsanaṃ attani avijjamānasīlādiguṇavibhāvanaṃ,

original: “evaṃcitto, evaṃkiriyo”ti dubbiññeyyattā kucchiṃ vā piṭṭhiṃ vā jānituṃ na sakkā. Yato –

original: “Vāmena sūkaro hoti, dakkhiṇena ajāmigo;

original: pavattaṃ attano micchāgāhaṃ dīpeti. Tenāha “visuddhabhāvaṃ detīti evaṃ sammatā”ti.
analyzed: pavattam attanaḥ micchāgāham dīpeti tena āha visuddha bhāvam deti iti evam sammatā ati

original: Pāpapavāhanena samparāyikādisampattiāvahato lokassa hitā lokyā. Lokyāti sammatāti
analyzed: pāpa pavāhanena samparāyika ādi sampatti āvahataḥ lokassa hitā lokyā lokyā ati sammatā ati

original: sabbaṃ purimasadisaṃ. Tenāha “seṭṭhaṃ lokaṃ gamayatīti evaṃ sammatā”ti. Puññasammatāti
analyzed: sabbam purima sadisam tena āha seṭṭham lokam gamayati iti evam sammatā ati puñña sammatā ati

original: pujjabhavaphalanibbattanena sattānaṃ punanena visodhanena puññāti sammatā. Tadatthadīpanatthamevāti
analyzed: pujja bhava phala nibbattanena sattānam punanena visodhanena puññā ati sammatā tad attha dīpana ttham evā ti

original: tassā pubbe āgatadesanāya atthadīpanatthameva. Vuttassevatthassa puna dīpanaṃ kimatthiyanti
analyzed: pubbe āgata desanāya attha dīpana attham eva vuttassa iva atthassa puna dīpanam kim atthiyanti

original: āha “gāthārucikāna”nti. Cuṇṇikavacanaṃ asambhāventā tathā ca vutte atthamabujjhanakā
analyzed: āha cuṇṇika vacanam tathā ca vutte attham abujjhanakā

original: pajjavacanaṃ sambhāventā tathā ca vutte bujjhanakā gāthārucikā. Visesatthadīpanatthanti
analyzed: pajja vacanam sambhāventā tathā ca vutte bujjhanakāḥ gāthā rucikāḥ visesa attha dīpana tthanti

original: visiṭṭhadīpanatthaṃ, purimadesanāya aññadīpanatthanti attho.
analyzed: visiṭṭha dīpana tham purima desanāya añña dīpana ttham ti attho

original: “Gacchati pana bhavaṃ gotamo bāhukaṃ nadiṃ sināyitu”nti heṭṭhā vuttattā bāhukanti
analyzed: gacchati pana bhavam gotamaḥ bāhukam nadim sināyitunti heṭṭhā vutta ttā bāhukam ti

original: idameva ettha tadatthadīpakaṃ. Sesāni adhikakkādivacanāni tato visiṭṭhassa atthassa
analyzed: idam eva ettha tad attha dīpakam sesāni adhikakka ādi vacanāni tatas visiṭṭhassa atthassa

original: bodhanato visesatthadīpakāni. Kasmā panettha bhagavatā brāhmaṇena avuttāni adhikakkādīni
analyzed: bodhanataḥ visesa attha dīpakāni kasmā pana itthā bhagavatā brāhmaṇena a vuttāni

original: gahitānīti āha “yatheva hī”tiādi. Kakkanti nhānapiṇḍaṃ adhippetaṃ, nhāyitvā adhikaṃ
analyzed: gahitāni iti āha yathā iva hi itiādi kakkanti nhāna piṇḍam adhippetam nhāyitvā adhikam

original: kakkaṃ ettha gaṇhantīti adhikakkaṃ. Tenāha “nhānasambhāravasenā”tiādi. Maṇḍalavāpisaṇṭhānanti
analyzed: kakkam ettha gaṇhanti iti adhikakkam tena āha nhāna sambhāra vasena atiādi maṇḍala vāpi saṇṭhānam iti

original: vaṭṭapokkharaṇīsaṇṭhānaṃ. Nadiyoti visuṃ nadiyo, na adhikakkādīni viya titthamattaṃ.
analyzed: vaṭṭa pokkharaṇī saṇṭhānam nadiyā iti visum nadiyaḥ na adhikakka ādīni tittha mattam

original: Tīhi padehīti sundarikāpayāgabāhukāpadehi. Cattārīti adhikakkādīni cattāri. Vuttāneva
analyzed: tīhi padehi iti cattāri iti adhikakka ādīni cattāri

original: hontīti lokasammatālakkhaṇena ekalakkhaṇatā brāhmaṇassa adhippāyena, paramatthato
analyzed: honti iti loka sammatā lakkhaṇena eka lakkhaṇa tā brāhmaṇassa adhippāyena paramatthato

original: pana pāpapavāhalakkhaṇena ekalakkhaṇattā. Tenāha “tasmā”tiādi. Kiñci pāpasuddhiṃ
analyzed: pana pāpa pavāha lakkhaṇena eka lakkhaṇa ttā tena āha tasmā itiādi kiñci pāpa suddhim

original: na karontiyeva. Na hi naṃ sodhayeti naṃ puggalaṃ na sodhaye. Verakibbisabhāvaṃ appattā
analyzed: na karontiyā iva na hi nam sodhaye iti nam puggalam na sodhaye verakibbisa bhāvam appattā

original: nāma kammapathabhāvaṃ appattā. Tenāha “khuddakehī”ti.
analyzed: nāma kammapatha bhāvam appattā tena āha khuddakehi iti

original: Paṭihanantoti ayuttabhāvadassanena taṃ diṭṭhiṃ paṭibāhanto. Tatthāyaṃ paṭibāhanavidhi
analyzed: paṭihananto ti ayutta bhāva dassanena tam diṭṭhim paṭibāhanto tattha ayam paṭibāhana vidhi

original: yathā yaṃ kiñci udakorohanaṃ na pāpapavāhanaṃ, evaṃ yo koci nakkhattayogo pāpahetūnaṃ
analyzed: yathā yam kiñci udakorohanam na pāpa pavāhanam evam yaḥ koci nakkhatta yogaḥ pāpa hetūnam

original: paṭipakkhābhāvato. Yañhi vināseti, so tassa paṭipakkho. Yathā āloko andhakārassa
analyzed: paṭipakkha abhāvataḥ yat hi vināseti saḥ tassa paṭipakkhaḥ yathā ālokaḥ andhakārassa

original: vijjā ca avijjāya, na evaṃ udakorohanaṃ nakkhattayogo vā pāpahetūnaṃ lobhādīnaṃ paṭipakkho,
analyzed: vijjā ca avijjāya na evam udakorohanam nakkhatta yogaḥ vā pāpa hetūnam lobha ādīnam paṭipakkhaḥ

original: tasmā niṭṭhamettha gantabbaṃ “na udakorohanādi pāpapavāhana”nti. Niccaṃ phaggunīnakkhattanti
analyzed: tasmā niṭṭham ettha gantabbam na udakorohana ādi pāpa pavāhananti niccam phaggunī nakkhattan ti

original: suddhasīlādikassa sabbakālaṃ maṅgaladivaso evāti adhippāyo. Itaroti sīlādivasena
analyzed: suddha sīla ādikassa sabbakālam maṅgala divasaḥ eva iti adhippāyaḥ itaraḥ ti sīla ādi vasena

original: asuddho. Niccameva uposatho ariyuposathena upavutthabhāvato. Suddhassāti parisuddhamanosamācārassa.
analyzed: asuddhaḥ niccam eva uposathaḥ ariya uposathena upavuttha bhāvato suddhassa ati parisuddha manaḥ samācārassa

original: Sucikammassāti parisuddhakāyavacīsamācārassa. Tenāha “nikkilesatāyā”tiādi. Kusalūpasañhitanti
analyzed: suci kammassa ati parisuddha kāya vacī samācārassa tena āha nikkilesa tāya atiādi kusala upasañhitanti

original: anavajjabhāvūpagataṃ. Vatasamādānanti dhutadhammasamādānādi sampannameva hoti, nāssa
analyzed: anavajja bhāva upagatam vata samādānam ti dhuta dhamma samādāna ādi sampannam eva hoti na assa

original: vipatti atthīti attho. Mama sāsaneyeva sināhi, yadi accantameva suddhiṃ icchasīti
analyzed: vipatti atthi iti atthaḥ mama sāsaneya iva sināhi yadi accantam eva suddhim icchasi iti

original: adhippāyo. Tenāha “sace”tiādi. Khematanti khemabhāvaṃ. Yathā sabbabhūtāni tapavasena
analyzed: adhippāyaḥ tena āha sacā itiādi khematanti khema bhāvam yathā sabba bhūtāni tapa vasena

original: khemappattāni abhayappattāni honti, evaṃ karohīti taṃ heṭṭhā dassitaṃ mettādibhāvanaṃ
analyzed: khema pattāni abhaya ppattāni honti evam karohi iti tam heṭṭhā dassitam mettā ādi bhāvanam

original: brāhmaṇassa saṅkhepena upadisantenassa ekaccasamādhisampadā tadavinābhāvinī paññāsampadā
analyzed: brāhmaṇassa saṅkhepena ekacca samādhi sampadā tad avinābhāvinī paññā sampadā

original: ca dassitāti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Tenāha “manodvārasuddhi dassitā”ti.
analyzed: ca dassitā iti daṭṭhabbam tena āha manaḥ dvāra suddhi dassitā ati

original: Tassa pana sampadādvayassa nissayabhūtaṃ sīlasampadaṃ dassetuṃ “sace musā na bhaṇasī”tiādi
analyzed: tassa pana sampadā dvayassa nissaya bhūtam sīla sampadam dassetum sace musā na bhaṇasi itiādi

original: vuttaṃ. Ettha ca yathā “sace musā na bhaṇasī”tiādinā musāvāda-pāṇātipāta-adinnādāna-paṭivirativacanena
analyzed: vuttam ettha ca yathā sace musā na bhaṇasi iti ādinā musāvāda pāṇātipāta a dinnādāna paṭivirati vacanena

original: avasesakāyavacīduccaritaviratīpi vuttā eva hoti lakkhaṇahāranayena, evaṃ “saddahāno
analyzed: vuttā eva hoti lakkhaṇa hāra nayena evam saddahāno

original: amaccharī”ti saddhādidhanasampadāniyojaneneva avasesaariyadhanasampadāniyojanampi
analyzed: amacchari iti saddha ādi dhana sampadā aniyojanam iva avasesa ariya dhana sampadā aniyojanam pi

original: siddhameva hotīti saddhādayo vimuttiparipācanīyadhammā brāhmaṇassa pakāsitā evāti
analyzed: siddham eva hoti iti saddhā ādayaḥ vimutti paripācanīya dhammāḥ brāhmaṇassa pakāsitāḥ eva ati

original: veditabbā. Tenevāha “imāya eva paṭipattiyā kilesasuddhī”ti. Gayā sammatatarā bāhukādīhipīti adhippāyo.
analyzed: veditabbā tena iva āha imāya eva paṭipattiyā kilesa suddhi iti gayā sammatatarā adhippāyaḥ

original: 80. Ekoti asahāyo, esā panassa asahāyatā ekībhāvenāti. Na hissa tāva taṇhādutiyatā
analyzed: ekaḥ ti asahāyaḥ esā panassa asahāya tā ekībhāvena ati na hi ssa tāva taṇhā dutiya tā

original: vigatā. Tenevāha “na cirassevā”tiādi. Ekaggahaṇeneva kāyena vūpakaṭṭhatā vuttāti
analyzed: vigatā tena iva āha na cirassa iva atiādi eka ggahaṇena iva kāyena vūpakaṭṭha tā vuttā iti

original: āha “vupakaṭṭho cittavivekenā”ti. Tena “divā caṅkamena nisajjāyā”tiādinā āgataṃ jāgariyānuyogamāha.
analyzed: āha citta vivekena ati tena divā caṅkamena āgatam jāgariya anuyogam āha

original: Tathābhūtassa cassa ekādasahi aggīhi āditte tayo bhave passato yathā pamādassa lesopi
analyzed: tathābhūtassa cassa ekādasahi aggīhi āditte tayaḥ bhave passataḥ yathā pamādassa lesaḥ api

original: nāhosi, evaṃ kammaṭṭhānaṃ brūhento sammadeva padahati. Katthaci saṅkhāragate anapekkhacitto
analyzed: na ahosi evam kammaṭṭhānam sammat eva padahati katthaci saṅkhāra gate an apekkha citto

original: nibbānādhimutto eva vihāsīti dassetuṃ “appamatto”tiādi vuttaṃ. Khīṇā jātītiādīsu
analyzed: nibbāna adhimuttaḥ eva vihāsi iti dassetum appamattaḥ tiādi vuttam khīṇā jātī iti ādīsu

original: yaṃ vattabbaṃ, taṃ heṭṭhā vuttameva. Sesaṃ suviññeyyameva.
analyzed: yat vattabbam tat heṭṭhā vuttam eva sesam su viññeyyam eva

original: Vatthasuttavaṇṇanāya līnatthappakāsanā samattā.
analyzed: vattha sutta vaṇṇanāya līnattha ppakāsanā samattā

original: 8. Sallekhasuttavaṇṇanā
analyzed: sallekha sutta vaṇṇanā

original: 81. “Cundo”ti tassa mahātherassa nāmaṃ, pūjāvasena pana mahācundoti vuccati yathā
analyzed: cundo ti tassa mahā therassa nāmam pūjā vasena pana mahācundo ti vuccati yathā

original: “mahāmoggallāno”ti. Attano vā cundaṃ nāma bhāgineyyattheraṃ upādāya āyasmato sāriputtattherassa

original: bhātā ayaṃ mahāthero “mahācundo”ti paññāyittha yathā “mahāpanthako”ti. Sāyanhasamayanti
analyzed: bhātā ayam mahā theraḥ mahā cundo ti paññāyittha yathā mahā panthako ti

original: bhummatthe ekaṃ upayogavacananti āha “sāyanhakāle”ti. Na hettha accanta saṃyogo sambhavatīti.
analyzed: ekam upayoga vacanan ti āha sāyanha kāla iti na ha itthā saṃyogaḥ sambhavati iti

original: Sattasaṅkhārehīti saddhivihārikaantevāsikaupāsakādisattehi ceva rūpārammaṇādisaṅkhārehi
analyzed: satta saṅkhārehi iti saddhivihārika antevāsika aupāsaka ādi sattehi ca iva rūpa ārammaṇa ādi saṅkhārehi

original: ca. Paṭinivattitvāti apasakkitvā. Nilīyananti vivecanaṃ kāyacittehi tato vivittatā.
analyzed: ca paṭinivattitvā ati apasakkitvā nilīyanam ti vivecanam kāya cittehi tatas vivitta tā

original: Ekībhāvoti hi kāyavivekamāha, pavivekoti cittavivekaṃ. Tato vuṭṭhitoti tato duvidhavivekato
analyzed: ekībhāvaḥ iti hi kāya vivekam āha citta vivekam tatas vuṭṭhitaḥ ti tatas duvidha vivekato

original: bhavaṅguppattiyā, sabrahmacārīhi samāgamena ca apeto. Abhivādāpetvāti abhivādaṃ kāretvā.
analyzed: bhavaṅga uppattiyā sabrahmacārīhi samāgamena ca apetaḥ abhivādāpetvā ati abhivādam kāretvā

original: Evanti yathāvuttaabhivādavasena. Paggayhāti unnāmetvā. Anupacchinnabhavamūlānaṃ tāva
analyzed: evam ti yathā vutta abhivāda vasena unnāmetvā

original: evaṃ abhivādo hotu, ucchinnabhavamūlānaṃ kimatthiyoti āha “etaṃ āciṇṇaṃ tathāgatāna”nti.
analyzed: evam abhivādaḥ hotu ucchinna bhava mūlānam āha etam āciṇṇam tathāgatānam ti

original: Tena na tathāgatā samparāyikaṃyeva sattānaṃ sukhaṃ āsīsanti, atha kho diṭṭhadhammikampīti
analyzed: tena na tathāgatāḥ samparāyikam yā iva sattānam sukham āsīsanti atha kho diṭṭhadhammikam pi iti

original: daṭṭhabbaṃ. Kasmā evaṃ tathāgatā abhivadantīti tattha kāraṇamāha “sukhakāmā hī”tiādi.
analyzed: daṭṭhabbam kasmai evam tathāgatāḥ abhivadanti iti tattha kāraṇam āha sukha kāmāḥ hi itiādi

original: Puthukāyāti bahū sattakāyā. Yakkhāti devā. Te hi pūjanīyatāya “yakkhā”ti vuccanti.
analyzed: puthu kāyāti bahū satta kāyā yakkhā ati devā te hi pūjanīya tāya yakkhā ati vuccanti

original: Abhivadantīti āsīsitamevatthaṃ ñāṇakaruṇāhi abhimukhaṃ katvā vadanti.
analyzed: abhivadanti iti ñāṇa karuṇāhi abhimukham katvā vadanti

original: Yāti aniyamato gahitā niyamato dassento “imā”ti āha. Imāti ca āsannapaccakkhavacananti
analyzed: yā ati aniyamataḥ gahitā niyamataḥ dassentaḥ imā ti āha imā ti ca āsanna paccakkha vacanan ti

original: āha “abhimukhaṃ karonto viyā”ti, taṃ taṃ diṭṭhigatikaṃ cittagataṃ sammukhā viya karontoti
analyzed: āha abhimukham karontaḥ viya iti tam tam diṭṭhigatikam citta gatam sammukhāḥ viya karontaḥ iti

original: attho. Diṭṭhiyoti purimapadalopena pāḷiyaṃ vuttanti dassento “micchādiṭṭhiyo”ti āha.
analyzed: atthaḥ diṭṭhiyā iti purima pada lopena pāḷiyam vuttanti dassentaḥ micchā diṭṭhiyā iti āha

original: Sattesu diṭṭhigatacittuppādesu uppajjamānā, sattesu vā visayabhūtesu ārabbha uppajjamānā
analyzed: sattesu diṭṭhi gata cittuppādesu uppajjamānā sattesu vā visaya bhūtesu ārabbha uppajjamānā

original: “sattesu pātubhavantī”ti vuttā. Attavādenāti attānaṃ ārabbha pavattena vacanena.
analyzed: sattesu pātubhavanti iti vuttāḥ atta vādena ati attānam ārabbha pavattena vacanena

original: Paṭisaṃyuttāti “atthi attā”ti gāhe gāhaṇe ca visayabhāvena paṭisaṃyuttā. Diṭṭhigatikena
analyzed: paṭisaṃyuttā ati atthi attā ati gāhe gāhaṇe ca visaya bhāvena paṭisaṃyuttā diṭṭhigatikena

original: diṭṭhiṃ gāhantehi gahaṇe gāhāpaṇe ca diṭṭhi diṭṭhivādassa visayoti tena paṭisaṃyuttā
analyzed: diṭṭhim gāhantehi gahaṇe gāhāpaṇe ca diṭṭhi diṭṭhi vādassa visayo ti tena paṭisaṃyuttā

original: nāma hoti. “Atthi attā”ti evaṃ pavattā diṭṭhi idha attavādapaṭisaṃyuttā, na tassā
analyzed: nāma hoti atthi attā ati evam pavattā diṭṭhi idha atta vāda paṭisaṃyuttā na tassā

original: visayabhūto attā. Sā ca visayabhāvato tathāpavattena vādena paṭisaṃyuttā. Lokavādappaṭisaṃyuttāti
analyzed: visaya bhūtaḥ attā sā ca visaya bhāvato tathā pavattena vādena paṭisaṃyuttā lokavāda paṭisaṃyuttā ati

original: etthāpi eseva nayo. Vīsati bhavanti tato paraṃ attavādavatthuno abhāvā. Pañcapi hi
analyzed: ettha api esā iva nayaḥ vīsati bhavanti tato param attavāda vatthuno abhāvā pañca api hi

original: upādānakkhandhe paccekaṃ “attā”ti te ca attano nissayabhāvena gaṇhato etāsaṃ diṭṭhīnaṃ
analyzed: upādāna khandhe paccekam attā ati te ca attanaḥ nissaya bhāvena gaṇhataḥ etāsam diṭṭhīnam

original: sambhavo, tabbinimutto panāyaṃ visayo attaggahaṇākāro ca natthīti. Sassato attā ca
analyzed: sambhavaḥ tad vinimuttaḥ pana ayam visayaḥ atta ggahaṇa ākāro ca natthi iti sassataḥ attā ca

original: loko cāti rūpādīsu aññataraṃ “attā”ti, “loko”ti vā gahetvā taṃ sassato sabbakālabhāvī
analyzed: ca ati rūpa ādīsu aññataram attā ati loko iti vā gahetvā tam sassato sabba kāla bhāvī

original: nicco dhuvoti. Yathāha “rūpī attā ceva loko ca sassato cāti attānañca lokañca paññapetī”tiādi.
analyzed: niccaḥ dhuvaḥ ti yathā āha rūpī attā ca iva loko ca ca ati attānam ca lokañca paññapeti itiādi

original: Sassatotiādīsu paṭhamo sassatavādavasena attaggāho, dutiyo ucchedavādavasena, tatiyo
analyzed: sassatā ti ādīsu paṭhamaḥ sassata vāda vasena attaggāhaḥ dutiyaḥ uccheda vāda vasena tatiyaḥ

original: ekaccasassatavādavasena, catuttho takkīvādavasena pavatto, amarāvikkhepavasena vā
analyzed: ekacca sassata vāda vasena catutthaḥ takkīvāda vasena pavattaḥ amarā vikkhepa vasena vā

original: pavatto attaggāho. Antavāti attano paricchedatāvasena. Anantavāti aparicchedatāvasena.
analyzed: pavattaḥ attaggāhaḥ antavāti attano pariccheda tā vasena anantavāti apariccheda tā vasena

original: Antavā ca anantavā cāti tadubhayavasena, itaro takkīvādavasena pavatto attaggāho.
analyzed: antavā ca anantavā ca ati tad ubhaya vasena itaro takkīvāda vasena pavattaḥ attaggāho

original: Evaṃ pavattattā aṭṭha hontīti yojanā.
analyzed: evam pavatta ttāḥ aṭṭha honti iti yojanā

original: Ādimevāti ādimanasikārameva. Taṃ pana sarūpato dassento “vipassanāmissakapaṭhamamanasikāramevā”ti
analyzed: ādim eva ati ādi manasikāram eva tam pana sarūpataḥ dassentaḥ vipassanā missaka paṭhama manasikāram eva ati

original: āha. Appatvāpi sotāpattimagganti iminā avadhāraṇena nivattitaṃ dasseti. Nāmarūpaparicchedato
analyzed: āha appatvā api sotāpatti maggan ti iminā avadhāraṇena nivattitam dasseti nāma rūpa paricchedato

original: pabhuti yāva udayabbayadassanaṃ, ayaṃ idha ādimanasikāroti adhippeto paññābhāvanāya
analyzed: ayam idha ādi manasikāro ti adhippeto paññā bhāvanāya

original: Tattha adhimāniko appatte pattasaññitāya na sammasati, itaro avisayatāya. Yatthāti
analyzed: tattha adhimānikaḥ appatte patta saññi tāya na sammasati itaraḥ avisaya tāya yattha ati

original: yasmiṃ sallekhavatthusmiṃ, avihiṃsakatādīhi catucattālīsāya ākārehi.

original: Aṭṭha samāpattiyo nāma kilesānaṃ vikkhambhanavasena pavattā uttaruttari santapaṇītā

analyzed: vutta nayena veditabbam

analyzed: vipākaḥ etassa ti dukkha vipākam tattha sāvajja vacanena akusalānam pavatti dukkha taṃ

original: dasseti, dukkhavipākavacanena vipākadukkhataṃ. Purimañhi pavattisambhavavasena akusalassa
analyzed: dasseti dukkha vipāka vacanena vipāka dukkha tam puriman hi pavatti sambhava vasena akusalassa

original: lakkhaṇavacanaṃ, pacchimaṃ tālantare vipākuppādanasamatthatāvasena. Tathā purimena
analyzed: lakkhaṇa vacanam pacchimam tāla antare vipāka uppādana samattha tā vasena tathā purimena

original: akusalassa avisuddhasabhāvataṃ dasseti, pacchimena avisuddhavipākataṃ. Purimena akusalaṃ
analyzed: akusalassa avisuddha sabhāva tam dasseti pacchimena avisuddha vipāka tam purimena akusalam

original: kusalasabhāvato nivatteti, pacchimena abyākatasabhāvato savipākattadīpakattā pacchimassa.
analyzed: kusala sabhāvataḥ nivatteti pacchimena abyākata sabhāvato sa vipāka tta dīpaka ttā pacchimassa

original: Purimena vā avajjavantatādassanato kiccaṭṭhena rasena anatthajananarasataṃ dasseti,
analyzed: purimena vā avajjavanta tā dassanataḥ kicca ṭṭhena rasena anattha janana rasa tam dasseti

original: pacchimena sampattiatthena aniṭṭhavipākarasataṃ. Purimena ca upaṭṭhānākāraṭṭhena
analyzed: pacchimena sampatti atthena purimena ca upaṭṭhāna ākāra ṭṭhena

original: paccupaṭṭhānena saṃkilesapaccupaṭṭhānataṃ, pacchimena phalaṭṭhena dukkhavipākapaccupaṭṭhānataṃ.
analyzed: paccupaṭṭhānena saṃkilesa paccupaṭṭhāna tam pacchimena phala aṭṭhena dukkha vipāka paccupaṭṭhāna tam

original: Purimena ca ayonisomanasikāraṃ akusalassa padaṭṭhānaṃ pakāseti. Tato hi taṃ sāvajjaṃ
analyzed: purimena ca a yoniso manasikāram akusalassa padaṭṭhānam pakāseti tatas hi tam sāvajjam

original: jātaṃ, pacchimena akusalassa aññesaṃ padaṭṭhānabhāvaṃ vibhāveti. Tañhi dukkhavipākassa
analyzed: jātam pacchimena akusalassa aññesam padaṭṭhāna bhāvam vibhāveti tat hi dukkha vipākassa

original: kāraṇanti. Saṃkiliṭṭhanti saṃkilesehi samannāgataṃ, dasahi kilesavatthūhi vibādhitaṃ,
analyzed: saṃkiliṭṭhanti saṃkilesehi samannāgatam dasahi kilesa vatthūhi vibādhitam

original: upatāpitaṃ vā tehi vidūsitaṃ malīnakatañcāti attho. Idañcassa dukkhavipākatañcāti
analyzed: upatāpitam vā tehi vidūsitam malīnakatam ca ati atthaḥ idam ca assa dukkha vipāka tat ca ati

original: atthe idañca dukkhavipākataṃ apaccakkhatāya asaddahantānaṃ paccakkhato ādīnavadassanena
analyzed: atthe idam ca dukkha vipāka tam apaccakkhatāya asat dahantānam paccakkhataḥ ādīnava dassanena

original: saṃvejanatthaṃ vuttaṃ. Sādhāraṇā sabbassapi akusalassa.
analyzed: saṃvejana attham vuttam sādhāraṇā sabbassa api akusalassa

original: Saraseneva patanasabhāvassa antarā eva atīva pātanaṃ atipāto, saṇikaṃ patituṃ adatvā
analyzed: sa rasena iva patana sabhāvassa antarā eva atīva pātanam atipātaḥ saṇikam patitum a datvā

original: sīghaṃ pātananti attho. Atikkammavā satthādīhi abhibhavitvā pātanaṃ atipāto. Payogavatthumahantatādīhi
analyzed: sīgham pātanam ti atthaḥ sattha ādīhi abhibhavitvā pātanam atipātaḥ payoga vatthu mahanta tā ādīhi

original: mahāsāvajjatā tehi paccayehi uppajjamānāya cetanāya balavabhāvato. Ekassa hi payogassa
analyzed: mahā sāvajja tā tehi paccayehi uppajjamānāya cetanāya balava bhāvataḥ ekassa hi payogassa

original: sahasā nipphādanavasena sakiccasādhikāya bahukkhattuṃ pavattajavanehi laddhāsevanāya
analyzed: sahasā nipphādana vasena sa kicca sādhikāya bahu kkhattum pavatta javanehi laddha āsevanāya

original: ca sanniṭṭhāpakacetanāya vasena payogassa mahantabhāvo. Satipi kadāci khuddake ceva
analyzed: ca sanniṭṭhāpaka cetanāya vasena payogassa mahanta bhāvo sati pi kadāci khuddake ca iva

original: mahante ca pāṇe payogassa samabhāve mahantaṃ hanantassa cetanā tibbākārā uppajjatīti
analyzed: mahante ca pāṇe payogassa sama bhāve mahantam hanantassa cetanā tibba ākārā uppajjati iti

original: vatthussa mahantabhāvo. Iti ubhayampetaṃ cetanāya balavabhāveneva hotīti. Yathāvuttapaccayapariyāyepi
analyzed: vatthussa mahanta bhāvaḥ iti ubhayam petam cetanāya balava bhāvena iva hoti iti yathā vutta paccaya pariyāye pi

original: taṃtaṃpaccayehi cetanāya balavatāya eva mahāsāvajjabhāvo veditabbo. Payogavatthuādipaccayānañhi
analyzed: tad tad paccayehi cetanāya balavatāya eva mahā sāvajja bhāvaḥ veditabbaḥ payoga vatthu ādi paccayānam hi

original: amahattepi hantabbassa guṇavantatāya mahāsāvajjatā, tabbipariyāyena appasāvajjatā
analyzed: a mahat te pi hantabbassa guṇavanta tāya mahā sāvajja tā tad vipariyāyena appa sāvajja tā

original: ca vatthussa mahattāmahattesu viya daṭṭhabbā. Kilesānaṃ upakkamānaṃ dvinnañca mudutāya
analyzed: ca vatthussa mahatta amahattesu viya daṭṭhabbā kilesānam upakkamānam dvinnam ca mudu tāya

original: tibbatāya ca appasāvajjatā mahāsāvajjatāpi yojetabbā. Pāṇo pāṇasaññitā vadhakacittañca
analyzed: tibba tāya ca appa sāvajja tā mahā sāvajja tā api yojetabbā pāṇaḥ pāṇa saññi tā vadhaka cittañca

original: pubbabhāgiyāpi honti, upakkamo vadhakacetanāsamuṭṭhāpito. Pañca sambhārā hi pāṇātipātacetanāti
analyzed: pubbabhāgiyāḥ api honti upakkamaḥ vadhaka cetanā samuṭṭhāpito pañca sambhārāḥ hi pāṇātipāta cetanā ati

original: sā pañcasambhāravinimuttā daṭṭhabbā. Ayañca vicāro adinnādānādīsupi yathārahaṃ vattabbo.
analyzed: sā pañca sambhāra vinimuttā daṭṭhabbā ayam ca vicāraḥ adinnādāna ādīsu pi yathāraham vattabbo

original: Vijjhanapaharaṇādivasena sahatthenanibbatto sāhatthiko, āṇāpanavasena pavatto āṇattiko,
analyzed: vijjhana paharaṇa ādi vasena sahatthena nibbattaḥ sāhatthikaḥ āṇāpana vasena pavattaḥ āṇattikaḥ

original: ususattiyantapāsāṇādinissajjanavasena pavatto nissaggiyo, aduhalasajjanādivasena
analyzed: usu satti yanta pāsāṇa ādi nissajjana vasena pavattaḥ nissaggiyaḥ

original: pavatto thāvaro, āthabbaṇikādīnaṃ viya mantaparijappanavasena pavatto vijjāmayo,
analyzed: pavattaḥ thāvaraḥ āthabbaṇika ādīnam viya manta parijappana vasena pavattaḥ vijjā mayaḥ

original: kammavipākajiddhimayo iddhimayo dāṭhākoṭanādīni viya.
analyzed: iddhi mayaḥ dāṭhā koṭana ādīni

original: Yadi “mama ida”nti parena pariggahitaṃ adinnaṃ, uttānaseyyakadārakasantake kathaṃ
analyzed: yadi mama idam ti parena pariggahitam a dinnam uttānaseyyaka dāraka santake katham

original: tassa pariggahasaññāya eva abhāvatoti āha “yattha paro”tiādi. Paro nāma viññū vā
analyzed: tassa pariggaha saññāya eva abhāvato ti āha yattha para iti ādi paraḥ nāma viññū vā

original: aviññū vā atthi tassa vatthussa sāmiko. Aviññūpi hi viññukāle yathākāmaṃ karonto
analyzed: aviññū vā atthi tassa vatthussa sāmikaḥ aviññu upi hi viññu kāle yathākāmam karontaḥ

original: adaṇḍārahoti. Mantaparijappanena parasantakaharaṇaṃ vijjāmayo, vinā mantena parasantakassa
analyzed: a daṇḍa arahā uti manta parijappanena para santaka haraṇam vijja āmayaḥ vinā mantena para santakassa

original: kāyavacīpayogehi parikaḍḍhanaṃ tādiseniddhivasena iddhimayo payogoti adinnādāne cha
analyzed: parikaḍḍhanam adinna ādāne cha

original: payogā sāhatthikādayo vuttā. Yathānurūpanti ettha sāhatthiko tāva pañcannampi avahārānaṃ
analyzed: sāhatthika ādayaḥ vuttāḥ yathā anurūpan ti ettha sāhatthikaḥ

original: vasena pavattati, tathā āṇattiyo nissaggiyo ca. Thāvaro theyyāvahārapasayhāvahārapaṭicchannāvahāravasena.
analyzed: vasena pavattati tathā āṇattiyaḥ nissaggiyaḥ ca thāvaraḥ theyyāvahāra pasayhāvahāra paṭicchannāvahāra vasena

original: Tathā sesāpīti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
analyzed: tathā sesā api iti daṭṭhabbam

original: Methunasamācāresūti sadārāsantosa-paradāragamanavasena duvidhesu methunasamācāresu.
analyzed: methuna samācāresu iti sa dāra a santosa para dāra gamana vasena duvidhesu methuna samācāresu

original: Ayamevahi bhedo idhādhippeto. Gottarakkhitā sagottehi rakkhitā. Dhammarakkhitā sahadhammikehi
analyzed: ayam eva hi bhedaḥ idha adhippetaḥ gotta rakkhitā sa gottehi rakkhitā dhamma rakkhitā sahadhammikehi

original: rakkhitā. Sārakkhā sasāmikā. Yassā gamane raññā daṇḍo ṭhapito, sā saparidaṇḍā. Bhariyabhāvatthaṃ
analyzed: rakkhitā sa ārakkhā sa sāmikā yassā gamane raññā daṇḍaḥ ṭhapito sā sa paridaṇḍā bhariya bhāvatthaṃ

original: dhanena kītā dhanakkītā. Chandena vasantī chandavāsinī. Bhogatthaṃ vasantī bhogavāsinī.
analyzed: dhanena kītā dhana kkītā chandena vasantī chanda vāsinī bhogattham vasantī bhoga vāsinī

original: Paṭatthaṃ vasantī paṭavāsinī. Udakapattaṃ āmasitvā gahitā odapattakinī. Cumbaṭakaṃ
analyzed: paṭattham vasantī paṭavāsinī udaka pattam āmasitvā gahitā odapattakinī cumbaṭakam

original: apanetvā gahitā obhaṭacumbaṭā. Karamarānītā dhajāhatā. Taṅkhaṇikā muhuttikā. Abhibhavitvā
analyzed: apanetvā gahitā obhaṭa cumbaṭā karamara ānītā dhaja āhatā taṅkhaṇikā muhuttikā abhibhavitvā

original: vītikkame micchācāro mahāsāvajjo, na tathā dvinnaṃ samānachandatāya. Abhibhavitvā
analyzed: vītikkame micchā ācāraḥ mahā sāvajjaḥ na tathā dvinnam samāna chanda tāya abhibhavitvā

original: vītikkamane satipi maggenamaggapaṭipattiadhivāsane purimuppannasevanābhisandhipayogābhāvato
analyzed: vītikkamane sati pi maggena magga paṭipatti adhivāsane purima uppanna sevana abhisandhi payoga abhāvato

original: micchācāro na hoti abhibhuyyamānassāti vadanti. Sevanācitte sati payogābhāvo appamāṇaṃ
analyzed: micchā ācāraḥ na hoti abhibhuyyamānassa ati vadanti sevanā citte sati payoga abhāvaḥ appamāṇam

original: yebhuyyena itthiyā sevanāpayogassa abhāvato. Tathā sati puretaraṃ sevanācittassa
analyzed: yebhuyyena itthiyā sevanā apayogassa abhāvato tathā sati puretaram sevanā cittassa

original: upaṭṭhānepi tassā micchācāro na siyā, tathā purisassapi sevanāpayogābhāveti, tasmā
analyzed: upaṭṭhāne pi tassāḥ micchācāro na siyā tathā purisassa api sevana apayoga abhāvā iti tasmā

original: attano ruciyā pavattitassa vasena tayo, balakkārena pavattitassa vasena tayoti sabbepi
analyzed: attanaḥ ruciyā pavatti tassa vasena tayaḥ balakkārena pavatti tassa vasena tayaḥ ti sabbe pi

original: aggahitaggahaṇena cattāro sambhārāti vuttanti veditabbaṃ.
analyzed: aggahita ggahaṇena cattāraḥ sambhārā ti vuttan ti veditabbam

original: Atthabhañjakoti kammapathavasena vuttaṃ. Kammapathakathā hesāti. Assāti visaṃvādakassa.
analyzed: attha bhañjako ti kammapatha vasena vuttam kammapatha kathā ha isā ati assa ati visaṃvādakassa

original: Musā vadati etenāti cetanā musāvādo, imasmiṃ pakkhe atathākārena vatthuno viññāpanapayogo
analyzed: musā vadati etena ati cetanā musāvādaḥ imasmin pakkhe a tathākārena vatthunaḥ viññāpana payogo

original: musā, taṃsamuṭṭhāpikā cetanāmusāvādoti vuttattā tato aññathā vattuṃ “aparo nayo”tiādi
analyzed: musā taṃ samuṭṭhāpikā cetanā musāvādaḥ ti vutta ttā tatas aññathā vattum aparaḥ naya utiādi

original: vuttaṃ. Attano santakaṃ adātukāmatāyātiādi musāvādasāmaññena vuttaṃ. Hasādhippāyenapi
analyzed: vuttam attanaḥ santakam a dātu kāma tāya atiādi musāvāda sāmaññena vuttam hasa adhippāyena api

original: visaṃvādanapurakkhārassa musāvādo. Parassāti visaṃvādanavasena viññāpetabbassa. Soti musāvādapayogo.
analyzed: visaṃvādana purakkhārassa musāvādaḥ parassa ati visaṃvādana vasena viññāpetabbassa saḥ ti musāvāda payogo

original: Suññabhāvanti pītivirahitatāya rittabhāvaṃ. Pharusasaddatāya neva kaṇṇasukhā. Atthavipannatāya na hadayasukhā. Saṃkiliṭṭhacittassāti dosena, lobhena vā dūsitacittassa.
analyzed: suñña bhāvanti pīti virahita tāya ritta bhāvam pharusa sadda tāya na iva kaṇṇa sukhā attha vipanna tāya na hadaya sukhā saṃkiliṭṭha cittassa ati dosena lobhena vā dūsita cittassa

original: Ekantapharusā cetanāti etena duṭṭhacittataṃyeva vibhāveti, duṭṭhacittatā cassa amaraṇādhippāyavasena
analyzed: ekanta pharusā cetanā ati etena duṭṭha citta taṃyā iva vibhāveti duṭṭha citta tā ca ssa a maraṇa adhippāya vasena

original: daṭṭhabbā. Sati hi maraṇādhippāye atthasiddhi, tadabhāve pāṇātipātabyāpādā siyunti.
analyzed: daṭṭhabbā sati hi maraṇa adhippāye tad abhāve pāṇa atipāta byāpādā siyunti

original: Yaṃ paṭicca pharusavācā payujjati, tassa sammukhāva sīsaṃ eti. Parammukhāpi sīsaṃ
analyzed: yam paṭicca pharusa vācā payujjati tassa sammukhā ava sīsam eti parammukhā api sīsam

original: eti evāti apare. Tatthāyaṃ adhippāyo yutto siyā – sammukhā payoge agāravādīnaṃ balavabhāvato
analyzed: eti eva ati apare tattha ayam adhippāyaḥ yuttaḥ siyā sammukhā payoge agārava ādīnam balava bhāvato

original: siyā cetanā balavatī, parassa ca tadatthaviññāpanaṃ, na tathā asammukhāti. Yathā
analyzed: siyā cetanā balavatī parassa ca tad attha viññāpanam na tathā asammukhā ati yathā

original: ca akkosite mate āḷahane katā khamāpanā upavādantarāyaṃ nivatteti, evaṃ parammukhā
analyzed: ca akkosite mate āḷahane katā khamāpanā upavāda antarāyam nivattā iti evam parammukhā

original: payuttā pharusavācā hotiyevāti sakkā viññātuṃ. Tassāti ekantapharusacetanāya eva
analyzed: payuttā pharusa vācā hotiyā iva ati sakkā viññātum tassa ti ekanta pharusa cetanāya eva

original: pharusavācābhāvassa āvibhāvatthaṃ. Mammacchedako savanapharusatāyāti adhippāyo. Cittasaṇhātāya
analyzed: pharusa vācā abhāvassa āvi bhāva attham savana pharusa tāya ati adhippāyo citta saṇhātāya

original: pharusavācā na hoti kammapathā’ppattattā, kammabhāvaṃ pana na sakkā vāretuṃ. Evaṃ
analyzed: pharusa vācā na hoti kamma patha appatta ttā kamma bhāvam pana na sakkā vāretum evam

original: anvayavasena cetanāpharusatāya pharusavācaṃ sādhetvā idāni tameva byatirekavasena
analyzed: anvaya vasena cetanā pharusa tāya pharusa vācam sādhetvā idāni tam eva byatireka vasena

original: sādhetuṃ “vacanasaṇhatāyā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Esāti pharusavācā. Kammapathabhāvaṃ appattā
analyzed: sādhetum vacana saṇha tāya ātiādi vuttam esā ati pharusa vācā kamma patha bhāvam appattā

original: appasāvajjā, itarā mahāsāvajjā. Tathā kilesānaṃ mudutibbatābhedehi sabbaṃ purimasadisaṃ.
analyzed: appasāvajjāḥ itarāḥ mahāsāvajjāḥ tathā kilesānam mudu tibba tā bhedehi sabbam purima sadisam

original: Āsevanaṃ bahulīkaraṇaṃ. Yaṃ uddissa pavattito, tena aggahite appasāvajjo, gahite
analyzed: āsevanam bahulīkaraṇam yam uddissa pavattitaḥ tena aggahite appasāvajjaḥ gahite

original: mahāsāvajjo kammapathappattito. Yo koci pana samphappalāpo dvīhi sambhārehi sijjhati.
analyzed: mahā sāvajjaḥ kammapatha ppattitaḥ yaḥ koci pana samphappalāpaḥ dvīhi sambhārehi sijjhati

original: Kilesānaṃ mudutibbatāvasenapi appasāvajjamahāsāvajjatā veditabbā.
analyzed: kilesānam mudu tibba tā vasena api appa sāvajja mahāsāvajja tā veditabbā

original: Attano pariṇāmanaṃ cittenevāti veditabbaṃ. Hitasukhaṃ byāpādayatīti yo taṃ uppādeti,
analyzed: attanaḥ pariṇāmanam cittena iva ati veditabbam hita sukham byāpādayati iti yaḥ tam uppādeti

original: tassa hitasukhaṃ vināseti. Aho vatāti iminā accantavināsacintanaṃ dīpeti. Evaṃ hissa
analyzed: tassa hita sukham vināseti aho vata ati iminā accanta vināsa cintanam dīpeti evam hissa

original: dāruṇapavattiyā kammapathappatti. Yathābhuccagahaṇābhāvenāti yāthāvaggāhassa abhāvena
analyzed: dāruṇa pavattiyā kammapatha ppatti yathābhucca gahaṇa abhāvena ati yāthāvaggāhassa abhāvena

original: aniccādisabhāvassa niccādito gahaṇena. Micchā passatīti vitathaṃ passati. Samphappalāpo
analyzed: anicca ādi sabhāvassa nicca āditaḥ gahaṇena micchā passati iti vitatham passati samphappalāpo

original: viyāti iminā āsevanassa mandatāya appasāvajjataṃ, mahantatāya mahāsāvajjataṃ dasseti.
analyzed: viyā ti iminā āsevanassa manda tāya appasāvajja tam mahanta tāya mahāsāvajja tam dasseti

original: Gahitākāraviparītatāti micchādiṭṭhiyā gahitākārassa viparītabhāvo. Vatthunoti tassā
analyzed: gahita ākāra viparīta tā ati micchādiṭṭhiyā gahita ākārassa viparīta bhāvaḥ vatthuno ti tassā

original: ayathābhūtasabhāvamāha. Tathābhāvenāti gahitākāreneva tassa diṭṭhigatikassa, tassa
analyzed: ayathābhūta sabhāvam āha tathābhāvena ati gahita ākārena iva tassa diṭṭhigatikassa tassa

original: vā vatthuno upaṭṭhānaṃ evametaṃ, na ito aññathāti.
analyzed: vā vatthuno upaṭṭhānam evam etam naḥ itas aññathā ti

original: Dhammatoti sabhāvato. Koṭṭhāsatoti phassapañcamakādīsu cittaṅgakoṭṭhāsesu yaṃ koṭṭhāsā honti, tatoti attho. Cetanādhammāti cetanāsabhāvā.
analyzed: dhammato ti sabhāvato koṭṭhāsato ti phassa pañcamaka ādīsu cittaṅga koṭṭhāsesu yam koṭṭhāsāḥ honti tatas ti attho cetanā dhammā ti cetanā sabhāvā

original: Paṭipāṭiyā sattāti ettha nanu cetanā abhidhamme kammapathesu na vuttāti paṭipāṭiyā
analyzed: paṭipāṭiyā sattā ti ettha nanu cetanā abhidhamme kamma pathesu na vuttā ati paṭipāṭiyā

original: sattannaṃ kammapathabhāvo na yuttoti? Na, avacanassa aññahetukattā. Na hi tattha
analyzed: sattannam kammapatha bhāvaḥ na yutto ti na avacanassa añña hetuka ttā na hi tattha

original: cetanāya akammapathattā kammapatharāsimhi avacanaṃ, kadāci pana kammapatho hoti,
analyzed: cetanāya a kamma patha ttā kamma patha rāsimhi avacanam kadāci pana kamma pathaḥ hoti

analyzed: namana lakkhaṇam ti ārammaṇa abhimukham namana sabhāvam tena vinā apavattanataḥ ruppanam

original: sītādivirodhipaccayasannipāte visadisuppatti. Ime pana tayotiādinā sabbacittuppādasādhāraṇavaseneva
analyzed: sītā ādi virodhi paccaya sannipāte ime pana tayo ti ādinā sabba cittuppāda sādhāraṇa vasena iva

original: taṃsaṅkhārakkhandhaggahaṇaṃ, tasmā ye yattha asādhāraṇā, tepi atthato gahitāyevāti dasseti.
analyzed: tad saṅkhāra kkhandha ggahaṇam tasmā ye yattha asādhāraṇā te pi atthataḥ gahitāya iva ati dasseti

original: Upādiyitvāti paccaye katvā. Paccayakaraṇameva hi paccayuppannassa paccayabhūtadhammānaṃ
analyzed: upādiyitvā iti paccaye katvā paccaya karaṇam eva hi paccaya uppannassa paccaya bhūta dhammānam

original: upādiyanaṃ. Samūhasambandhe sāmivacanaṃ etanti “samūhatthe etaṃ sāmivacana”nti vuttaṃ
analyzed: samūha sambandhe sāmi vacanam etat ti samūha atthe etam sāmi vacanan ti vuttam

original: tena vinā sambandhassa abhāvato. Tenāti tasmā. Taṃ sabbampīti taṃ bhūtupādāyapabhedaṃ
analyzed: tena vinā sambandhassa abhāvataḥ tena ati tasmā tam sabbam pi iti tam bhūta upādāya pabhedam

original: sabbampi sattavīsatividhaṃ. Yassa nāmassāti catuvokārabhave nāmassa. Viññāṇampi tappariyāpannameva
analyzed: sabbam pi sattavīsatividham yassa nāmassa ati catu vokāra bhave nāmassa viññāṇam pi tad pariyāpannam eva

original: veditabbaṃ. Rūpassāti ekavokārabhave rūpassa. Viññāṇaṃ pana pañcavokārabhave saṅkhāraviññāṇameva.
analyzed: veditabbam rūpassa ati eka vokāra bhave rūpassa viññāṇam pana pañca vokāra bhave saṅkhāra viññāṇam eva

original: Yassa pañcavokārabhave nāmarūpassa. Tassa vasenāti sahajātassa sahajātādivasena,
analyzed: yassa pañcavokāra bhave nāma rūpassa tassa vasena ati sahajātassa sahajāta ādi vasena

original: anantarassa anantarādivasena, itarassa upanissayādivasena tassa nāmassa yathārahaṃ
analyzed: anantarassa anantara ādi vasena itarassa upanissaya ādi vasena tassa nāmassa yathāraham

original: tassa tassa viññāṇassa paccayabhāvo veditabbo.
analyzed: tassa tassa viññāṇassa paccaya bhāvaḥ veditabbo

original: Nāmarūpavāravaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
analyzed: nāma rūpa vāra vaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā

original: Viññāṇavāravaṇṇanā
analyzed: viññāṇa vāra vaṇṇanā

original: 101. Tebhūmakavipākaggahaṇe kāraṇaṃ heṭṭhā vuttameva. Saṅkhāro yassa viññāṇassāti
analyzed: tebhūmaka vipāka ggahaṇe kāraṇam heṭṭhā vuttam eva saṅkhāraḥ yassa viññāṇassa ati

original: ettha aṭṭhavidhopi kāmāvacarapuññābhisaṅkhāro soḷasavidhassa kāmāvacaravipākaviññāṇassa,
analyzed: ettha aṭṭhavidhaḥ api kāmāvacara puñña abhisaṅkhāro soḷasavidhassa kāmāvacara vipāka viññāṇassa

original: pañcavidhopi rūpāvacarapuññābhisaṅkhāro pañcavidhassa rūpāvacaravipākaviññāṇassa,
analyzed: pañcavidhaḥ api rūpāvacara puñña abhisaṅkhāro pañcavidhassa rūpāvacara vipāka viññāṇassa

original: dvādasavidhopi apuññābhisaṅkhāro sattavidhassa akusalavipākaviññāṇassa, catubbidhopi
analyzed: dvādasavidhaḥ api apuñña abhisaṅkhāro sattavidhassa akusala vipāka viññāṇassa catubbidhaḥ api

original: āneñjābhisaṅkāro catubbidhassa arūpāvacaravipākaviññāṇassa yathārahaṃ paṭisandhipavattīsu
analyzed: āneñja abhisaṅkāro catubbidhassa arūpa avacara vipāka viññāṇassa yathāraham paṭisandhi pavattīsu

original: kammapaccayena ceva upanissayapaccayena ca paccayo hoti. Ayamettha saṅkhepo, vitthāro
analyzed: kamma paccayena ca iva upanissaya paccayena ca paccayaḥ hoti ayam ettha saṅkhepaḥ vitthāro

original: pana visuddhimagge vuttanayena veditabbo.
analyzed: pana visuddhi magge vutta nayena veditabbaḥ

original: Viññāṇavāravaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
analyzed: viññāṇa vāra vaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā

original: Saṅkhāravāravaṇṇanā
analyzed: saṅkhāra vāra vaṇṇanā

original: 102. Abhisaṅkharaṇalakkhaṇoti abhisañcetayitasabhāvo, āyūhanalakkhaṇoti attho. Copanavasenāti
analyzed: abhisaṅkharaṇa lakkhaṇo ti abhisañcetayita sabhāvo āyūhana lakkhaṇo ti attho copana vasena ati

original: kāyaviññattisaṅkhātacopanavasena. Tena pañcadvārikacetanā paṭikkhipati. Vacanabhedavasenāti
analyzed: kāya viññatti saṅkhāta copana vasena tena pañcadvārika cetanā paṭikkhipati vacana bheda vasena ati

original: vācānicchāraṇavasena. Vacīviññattisamuṭṭhāpanavasenāti attho. Yathāvuttā vīsati,
analyzed: vācā anicchā raṇa vasena vacī viññatti samuṭṭhāpana vasena ati atthaḥ yathā vuttā vīsati

original: nava mahaggatakusalacetanā cāti ekūnatiṃsa manosañcetanā. “Kusalānaṃ upanissayavasenā”ti
analyzed: nava mahaggata kusala cetanā ca ati ekūnatiṃsa manaḥ sañcetanā kusalānam upanissaya vasena ati

original: vuttaṃ, ekaccānaṃ ārammaṇavasenapīti vattabbaṃ. Sahajātādivasenāti sahajāta-aññamañña-nissaya-sampayutta-atthi-avigatahetuvasena,
analyzed: vuttam ekaccānam ārammaṇa vasena api iti vattabbam sahajāta ādi vasena ati sahajāta aññamañña nissaya sampayutta atthi avigata hetu vasena

original: anantarānaṃ anantarasamanantaraanantarūpanissayanatthivigatāsevanasena paccayo. Api-saddena
analyzed: anantara anaṃ paccayaḥ api saddena

original: upanissayaṃ saṅgaṇhāti.
analyzed: upanissayam saṅgaṇhāti

original: Saṅkhāravāravaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
analyzed: saṅkhāra vāra vaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā

original: Avijjāvāravaṇṇanā
analyzed: avijjā vāra vaṇṇanā

original: 103. “Dukkhasacceaññāṇa”nti saṅkhepato vuttamatthaṃ vivarituṃ “tatthā”tiādi āraddhaṃ.
analyzed: dukkha sacca iaññāṇam ti saṅkhepataḥ vuttam attham vivaritum tattha atiādi āraddham

original: Tanti aññāṇaṃ. Satipi pahātabbatte pariññeyyattavasena antogadhaṃ. Dukkhasaccañcassāti
analyzed: aññāṇam sati pi pahātabba tte pariññeyya tta vasena antogadham dukkha saccañcassa ati

original: vatthusaṅkhātaṃ sampayuttakhandhasaṅkhātañca dukkhasaccaṃ assa aññāṇassa. Taṃ hissa
analyzed: vatthu saṅkhātam sampayutta khandha saṅkhātañca dukkha saccam assa aññāṇassa tam hissa

original: nissayapaccayo hoti. Tassāti dukkhasaccassa. Yāthāvalakkhaṇapaṭivedhanivāraṇenāti
analyzed: nissaya paccayaḥ hoti tassa ati dukkha saccassa yāthāva lakkhaṇa paṭivedha nivāraṇena ati

original: saṅkhataaviparītasabhāvapaṭivijjhanassa nivāraṇena. Etenassa pariññābhisamayasaṅkhātassa
analyzed: saṅkhata aviparīta sabhāva paṭivijjhanassa nivāraṇena etena assa pariññā abhisamaya saṅkhātassa

original: ariyamaggapaṭivedhassa vibandhakabhāvamāha. Ñāṇappavattiyāti “idaṃ dukkhaṃ, ettakaṃ
analyzed: ariya magga paṭivedhassa vibandhaka bhāvam āha ñāṇa ppavattiyā ti idam dukkham ettakam

original: dukkha”nti anubujjhanākārāya pubbabhāgañāṇappavattiyā. Etthāti dukkhasacce. Appadānenāti
analyzed: dukkhanti anubujjhana ākārāya pubbabhāga ñāṇa ppavattiyā ettha āti dukkha sacce appadānena ati

original: avissajjanena. Etenassā anubodhañāṇassapi vibandhakatamāha.
analyzed: a vissajjanena etena assāḥ anubodha ñāṇassa api vibandhaka tam āha

original: Tīhi kāraṇehi veditabbaṃ antogadhābhāvato. Idha sampayuttakhandhavaseneva vatthuto
analyzed: tīhi kāraṇehi veditabbam antogadha abhāvataḥ idha sampayutta khandha vasena iva vatthutaḥ

original: samudaye aññāṇaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ. Ekenevāti itaraṃ kāraṇattayaṃ paṭikkhipati. Yadipi aññāṇaṃ
analyzed: samudaye aññāṇam daṭṭhabbam ekena iva ati itaram kāraṇattayam paṭikkhipati yadi api aññāṇam

original: nirodhamagge ārammaṇaṃ na karoti, kuto tadantogadhatabbatthutā, te pana jānitukāmassa
analyzed: nirodha magge ārammaṇam na karoti kutas tad anta gadha tabba tthu tā te pana jānitu kāmassa

original: tappaṭicchādanavasena anirodhamaggesu nirodhamaggaggāhahetutāvasena ca pavattamānaṃ
analyzed: tad paṭicchādana vasena anirodha maggesu nirodha magga ggāha hetu tā vasena ca pavattamānam

original: “nirodhe paṭipadāyañca aññāṇa”nti vuccati. Tenāha “paṭicchādanato”tiādi. Tassattho
analyzed: nirodhe aññāṇanti vuccati tena āha paṭicchādanato tiādi tassa attho

original: vuttoyeva. Gambhīrattāti sabhāveneva gambhīrattā. Agādhaapatiṭṭhābhāvena taṃvisayassa
analyzed: vuttā yā iva gambhīra ttā ati sa bhāvena iva gambhīra ttā agādha apatiṭṭhā bhāvena tad visayassa

original: ñāṇassa uppādetuṃ asakkuṇeyyattā duddasaṃ. Purimaṃ pana saccadvayaṃ. Vañcanīyaṭṭhenāti
analyzed: ñāṇassa uppādetum a sakkuṇeyya ttā duddasam purimam pana sacca dvayam vañcanīya ṭṭhena ati

original: vañcakabhāvena ayāthāvabhāvena upaṭṭhānato duddasattā gambhīraṃ, na sabhāvato, tasmā
analyzed: vañcaka bhāvena a yāthāva bhāvena upaṭṭhānataḥ duddasa tā gambhīram na tasmā

original: taṃvisayaṃ aññāṇaṃ uppajjati. Tatthāti tasmiṃ purimasaccadvaye aniccādisabhāvalakkhaṇassa
analyzed: taṃvisayam aññāṇam uppajjati tattha ati tasmim purima sacca dvaye anicca ādi sabhāva lakkhaṇassa

original: duddasattā eva niccādivipallāsavasena pavattati aññāṇanti ānetvā sambandhitabbaṃ.
analyzed: duddasa ttā eva nicca ādi vipallāsa vasena pavattati aññāṇam ti ānetvā sambandhitabbam

original: Idāni niddesavibhāgenapi avijjāya saccesu pavattivibhāgaṃ dassetuṃ “apicā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
analyzed: idāni niddesa vibhāgena api avijjāya saccesu pavatti vibhāgam dassetum api ca atiādi vuttam

original: Tattha dukkheti ettakena bhummaniddesena. Saṅgahatoti pariññeyyatāya dukkhena saṅgahetabbato.
analyzed: tattha dukkha iti ettakena bhumma niddesena saṅgahato ti pariññeyya tāya dukkhena saṅgahetabbato

original: Tena niddhāraṇatthaṃ dasseti. Dukkhasmiñhi avijjā niddhārīyati, na aññasmiṃ. Vatthutoti
analyzed: tena niddhāraṇa attham dasseti dukkhasmin hi avijjā niddhārīyati na aññasmin vatthuto ti

original: ādhāratthaṃ. Dukkhasannissayā hi avijjā. Ārammaṇatoti visayatthaṃ taṃ ārabbha pavattanato.
analyzed: ādhāra ttham dukkha sannissayā hi avijjā ārammaṇato ti visaya ttham tam ārabbha pavattanato

original: Kiccatoti byāpanatthaṃ chādanavasena taṃ byāpetvā pavattanato. Iminā nayena sesesupi
analyzed: kiccataḥ ti byāpana attham chādana vasena tam byāpetvā pavattanataḥ iminā nayena sesesu pi

original: attho veditabbo. Avisesatoti visesābhāvato, vuttanayena dukkhādīsu pavattiākāravisesaṃ
analyzed: atthaḥ veditabbaḥ avisesataḥ ti visesa abhāvataḥ vutta nayena dukkha ādīsu pavatti ākāra visesam

original: aggahetvāti attho. Sabhāvatoti sarasalakkhaṇato. Catunnampi saccānaṃ ajānanasabhāvā
analyzed: aggahetvā ti attho sabhāvato ti sarasa lakkhaṇato catunnam pi saccānam a jānana sabhāvā

original: hi avijjā. Kāmarāgabhavarāgā kāmāsavabhavāsavāti āha “sahajātādivasenā”ti. Nanu avijjā
analyzed: hi avijjā kāma rāga bhava rāgā kāma āsava bhava āsavā iti āha sahajāta ādi vasena ati nanu avijjā

original: eva avijjāsavo, so kathaṃ avijjāya paccayoti āha “pubbuppannā”tiādi.
analyzed: eva avijjā āsavo so katham avijjāya paccayaḥ ti āha pubbuppanna ātiādi

original: Avijjāvāravaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
analyzed: avijjā vāra vaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā

original: Āsavavāravaṇṇanā
analyzed: āsava vāra vaṇṇanā

original: 104. Āsavavāre āsava-saddattho āsavavicāro ca heṭṭhā vuttoyeva. Kasmā panāyaṃ vāro
analyzed: āsava vāre āsava sadda attho āsava vicāro ca heṭṭhā vuttaḥ yā iva kasmā pana ayam vāro

original: vutto, nanu avijjādikāva paṭiccasamuppādadesanāti codanaṃ sandhāya “ayaṃ vāro”tiādi
analyzed: vuttaḥ nanu avijjā ādikā va paṭiccasamuppāda desanā ati codanam sandhāya ayam vāraḥ ti ādi

original: āraddhaṃ. Paṭiccasamuppādapadesūti paṭiccasamuppādakoṭṭhāsesu. Dvādasakoṭṭhāsā hi
analyzed: āraddham paṭiccasamuppāda padesu iti paṭiccasamuppāda koṭṭhāsesu dvādasa koṭṭhāsāḥ hi

original: satthu paṭiccasamuppādadesanā. Tassāpi paccayadassanavasenāti nāyaṃ kāpilānaṃ mūlapakati
analyzed: satthu paṭiccasamuppāda desanā tassa api paccaya dassana vasena ati na ayam kāpilānam mūla pakati

original: viya appaccayā, atha kho sappaccayāti avijjāyapi paccayadassanavasena. Āsavasamudayenāti
analyzed: appaccayā atha kho sappaccayā ati paccaya dassana vasena āsava samudayena ati

original: atītabhave āsavānaṃ samudayena etarahi avijjāya samudayo, etarahi avijjāya samudayena
analyzed: atīta bhave āsavānam samudayena etarahi avijjāya samudayaḥ etarahi avijjāya samudayena

original: anāgate āsavasamudayoti evaṃ āsavāvijjānaṃ paccayapaccayuppannakabhāvena aparāparaṃ
analyzed: anāgate āsava samudayo ti evam āsava āvijjānam paccaya paccayuppannaka bhāvena apara aparam

original: pavattamānaṃ ādikoṭiabhāveneva tannimittassa saṃsārassa ādikoṭiabhāvato anamataggatāsiddhi veditabbā.
analyzed: pavattamānam ādi koṭi abhāvena iva tad nimittassa saṃsārassa ādi koṭi abhāvataḥ anamataggata asiddhi veditabbā

original: Dvattiṃsa ṭhānānīti dvattiṃsa saccappaṭivedhakāraṇāni, dvattiṃsa vā catusaccakammaṭṭhānāni.
analyzed: dvattiṃsa ṭhānāni iti dvattiṃsa sacca paṭivedha kāraṇāni dvattiṃsa vā catu sacca kammaṭṭhānāni

original: Imamhā sammādiṭṭhisuttāti yāya ariyasāvako sammādiṭṭhi nāma hoti, sā ariyā sammādiṭṭhi
analyzed: imamhā sammādiṭṭhi suttā ati yāya ariya sāvako sammādiṭṭhi nāma hoti sā ariyā sammādiṭṭhi

original: ettha vuttāti sammādiṭṭhisuttaṃ, ito sammādiṭṭhisuttato.
analyzed: ettha vuttā iti sammādiṭṭhi suttam itas sammādiṭṭhi suttataḥ

original: Catusaccapariyāyehīti catusaccādhigamakāraṇehi. Arahattapariyāyehīti “so sabbaso rāgānusayaṃ pahāyā”tiādinā arahattādhigamakāraṇehi. Tenāha “catusaṭṭhiyā kāraṇehī”ti.
analyzed: catu sacca pariyāyehi iti catu sacca adhigama kāraṇehi arahatta pariyāyehi iti saḥ sabbasas rāga anusayam pahāya ati ādinā arahatta adhigama kāraṇehi tena āha catu saṭṭhiyā kāraṇehi iti

original: Āsavavāravaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
analyzed: āsava vāra vaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā

original: Sammādiṭṭhisuttavaṇṇanāya līnatthappakāsanā samattā.
analyzed: sammādiṭṭhi sutta vaṇṇanāya līna ttha ppakāsanā samattā

original: 10. Satipaṭṭhānasuttavaṇṇanā
analyzed: satipaṭṭhāna sutta vaṇṇanā

original: 105. Jānapadinoti janapadavanto, janapadassa vā issarā rājakumārā. Gottavasena kurū
analyzed: jānapadino ti janapadavantaḥ janapadassa vai issarāḥ rāja kumārāḥ gotta vasena kurū

original: nāma. Tesaṃ nivāso yadi eko janapado, kathaṃ bahuvacananti āha “ruḷhīsaddenā”ti.
analyzed: nāma tesam nivāsaḥ yadi ekaḥ janapadaḥ katham bahuvacanan ti āha ruḷhī saddena ati

original: Akkharacintakā hi īdisesu ṭhānesu yutte viya saliṅgavacanāni (pāṇini 1.251) icchanti,
analyzed: akkhara cintakāḥ hi īdisesu ṭhānesu yutte viya saliṅga vacanāni pāṇini icchanti

original: ayamettha ruḷhī yathā aññatthāpi “aṅgesu viharati, mallesu viharatī”ti ca. Tabbisesane
analyzed: ayam ettha ruḷhī yathā aññattha api aṅgesu viharati mallesu viharati iti ca tad visesane

original: pana janapada-sadde jāti-sadde ekavacanameva. Aṭṭhakathācariyā panāti pana-saddo
analyzed: pana janapada sadde jāti sadde ekavacanam eva aṭṭhakathā cariyā pana āti pana saddo

original: visesatthajotano. Tena puthuatthavisayatāya evaṃ taṃ bahuvacananti “bahuke panā”tiādinā
analyzed: tena puthu attha visaya tāya evam tam bahuvacananti bahuke pana ati ādinā

original: vakkhamānaṃ visesaṃ dīpeti. Sutvāti mandhātumahārājassa ānubhāvadassanānusārena paramparāgataṃ
analyzed: vakkhamānam visesam dīpeti sutvā iti mandhātu mahā rājassa ānubhāva dassana anusārena paramparā gatam

original: kathaṃ sutvā. Anusaṃyāyantenāti anuvicarantena. Etesaṃ ṭhānanti candimasūriyamukhena
analyzed: katham sutvā anusaṃyāyantena ati anuvicarantena candima sūriya mukhena

original: cātumahārājikabhavanamāha. Tenāha “tattha agamāsī”tiādi. Soti mandhātumahārājā. Tanti
analyzed: cātumahārājika bhavanam āha tena āha tattha agamāsi itiādi saḥ ti mandhātu mahā rājā

original: cātumahārājikarajjaṃ. Gahetvāti sampaṭicchitvā. Puna pucchi pariṇāyakaratanaṃ. Dovārikabhūmiyaṃ
analyzed: cātumahārājika rajjam gahetvā ati sampaṭicchitvā puna pariṇāyaka ratanam

original: tiṭṭhanti sudhammāya devasabhāya devapurassa ca catūsu dvāresu ārakkhāya adhikatattā.
analyzed: tiṭṭhanti sudhammāya deva sabhāya deva purassa ca catūsu dvāresu ārakkhāya adhikatattā

original: Dibbarukkhasahassapaṭimaṇḍitanti idaṃ “cittalatāvana”ntiādīsupi yojetabbaṃ.
analyzed: dibba rukkha sahassa paṭimaṇḍitanti idam cittalatā vana nti ādīsu pi yojetabbam

analyzed: dhammā vatthu tasmā tesam pahāna attham cattāro va vuttā

original: Yadaggena ca kāyo kāmoghassa vatthu, tadaggena abhijjhākāyaganthassa vatthu, dukkhāya
analyzed: yad aggena ca kāyaḥ kāma oghassa vatthu tad aggena abhijjhā kāya ganthassa vatthu dukkhāya

original: attano sīlena suddhītiādi parāmasanaṃ hotīti sīlabbataparāmāsassa cittaṃ vatthu,
analyzed: attanaḥ sīlena suddhi itiādi parāmasanam hoti iti sīlabbata parāmāsassa cittam vatthu

analyzed: parāmāsam uppādeti iti diṭṭhupādānassa vedanā vatthu santati ghana gahaṇa vasena sa rāga ādi citte

original: dhammā vatthu. Ye panettha avuttā, tesaṃ vuttanayena vatthubhāvo yojetabbo. Tathā
analyzed: dhammāḥ vatthu ye pana ittha avuttā tesam vutta nayena vatthu bhāvaḥ yojetabbaḥ tathā

original: “Āhārasamudayā kāyasamudayo, phassasamudayā vedanāsamudayo, saṅkhārapaccayā viññāṇaṃ,
analyzed: āhāra samudayā kāya samudayo phassa samudayā vedanā samudayo saṅkhāra paccayā viññāṇam

original: Ekanibbānapavesahetubhāvaṃ pana dassetuṃ “yathā hī”tiādimāha. Etasmiṃ atthe saraṇekattasamosaraṇāni
analyzed: eka nibbāna pavesa hetu bhāvam pana dassetum yathā hi iti ādim āha etasmin atthe saraṇa ekatta samosaraṇāni

original: “Gocare, bhikkhave, caratha sake pettike visaye”tiādivacanato bhikkhugocarā ete dhammā,
analyzed: gocare bhikkhave caratha sake pettike visaye iti ādi vacanataḥ bhikkhu gocarāḥ ete dhammāḥ

original: yadidaṃ kāyānupassanādayo. Tattha yasmā kāyānupassanādipaṭipattiyā bhikkhu hoti,

analyzed: ca sabbappakārāya anusāsaniyā bhājana bhāvaḥ

original: Samaṃ careyyāti kāyādivisamacariyaṃ pahāya kāyādīhi samaṃ careyya. Rāgādivūpasamena
analyzed: samam careyya ati kāya ādi visama cariyam pahāya kāya ādīhi samam careyya rāga ādi vūpasamena

analyzed: santaḥ indriya damena danto catu magga niyāmena niyataḥ seṭṭha caritāya brahmacārī

original: Kāyadaṇḍādioropanena nidhāya daṇḍaṃ. Ariyabhāve ṭhito so evarūpo bāhitapāpasamitapāpabhinnakilesatāhi
analyzed: kāya daṇḍa ādi āropanena nidhāya daṇḍam ariya bhāve ṭhitaḥ saḥ evarūpaḥ

analyzed: brāhmaṇaḥ samaṇaḥ bhikkhu iti veditabbaḥ

original: Asammissatoti “vedanādayopi ettha sitā ettha paṭibaddhā”ti kāye vedanādianupassanāpasaṅgepi

analyzed: āpanne tatas a sammissato ti attho samūha visaya tāya ca ssa kāya saddassa samudāya upādāna tāya

analyzed: ca asubha ākārassa kāya iti ekavacanam tathā ārammaṇa ādi vibhāgena aneka bheda bhinnam pi

analyzed: cittam citta bhāva sāmaññena ekajjham gahetvā citta iti eka vacanam vedanā pana sukha ādi bheda bhinnā

original: niddeso pavattito, dhammā ca paropaṇṇāsabhedā anupassitabbākārena ca anekabhedā evāti

original: tepi bahuvacanavaseneva vuttā. Avayavīgāha-samaññātidhāvana-sārādānābhinivesanisedhanatthaṃ

analyzed: kāyam aṅga paccaṅgehi tāni ca kesa ādīhi kesa ādike ca bhūta upādāya rūpehi vinibbhujjantaḥ

analyzed: tathā na kāya iti ādim āha pāsāda ādi nagara avayava samūhe avayavī vādinaḥ api

analyzed: na karonti nagaram nāma koci atthaḥ atthi iti pana kesañci samaññā ati dhāvanam siyāti

original: itthipurisādisamaññātidhāvane nagaranidassanaṃ vuttaṃ. Aṅgapaccaṅgasamūho, kesalomādisamūho

original: itthiādayoti āha “kāyo vā…pe… dissatī”ti. Koci dhammoti iminā sattajīvādiṃ paṭikkhipati,
analyzed: itthi ādayaḥ ti āha kāyaḥ vāpe dissati iti koci dhammaḥ ti iminā satta jīva ādim paṭikkhipati

original: avayavī pana kāyapaṭikkhepeneva paṭikkhittoti. Yadi evaṃ kathaṃ kāyādisaññābhidhānānītiāha
analyzed: avayavī pana kāya paṭikkhepena iva paṭikkhittaḥ ti yadi evam katham kāya ādi saññā abhidhānāni iti āha

original: “yathāvutta…pe… karontī”ti.
analyzed: karonti iti

original: Yaṃ passati itthiṃ purisaṃ vā. Nanu cakkhunā itthipurisadassanaṃ natthīti? Saccametaṃ,
analyzed: yam passati itthim purisam vā nanu cakkhunā itthi purisa dassanam natthi iti saccam etam

original: “itthiṃ passāmi, purisaṃ passāmī”ti pana pavattasaññāya vasena “yaṃ passatī”ti vuttaṃ.

original: Micchādassanena vā diṭṭhiyā yaṃ passati, na taṃ diṭṭhaṃ, taṃ rūpāyatanaṃ na hotīti
analyzed: micchā dassanena vā diṭṭhiyā yam passati na tat diṭṭham tam rūpa āyatanam na hoti iti

original: attho viparītaggāhavasena micchāparikappitarūpattā. Atha vā taṃ kesādibhūtupādāyasamūhasaṅkhātaṃ

analyzed: na passati iti yam rūpa āyatanam kesa ādi bhūta upādāya samūha saṅkhātam diṭṭham tam paññā cakkhunā

analyzed: bhūtataḥ na passati iti attho apassam bajjhata iti imam atta bhāvam yathābhūtam paññā cakkhunā

original: apassanto “etaṃ mama, esohamasmi, eso me atto”ti kilesabandhanena bajjhati.
analyzed: a passantaḥ etam mama esaḥ aham asmi esaḥ me atto ti kilesa bandhanena bajjhati

original: Na aññadhammānupassīti na aññasabhāvānupassī, asubhādito aññākārānupassī na hotīti
analyzed: na añña dhamma anupassī iti na añña sabhāva anupassī asubha āditas añña ākāra anupassī na hoti iti

original: attho. Kiṃ vuttaṃ hotītiādinā tamevatthaṃ pākaṭaṃ karoti. Pathavīkāyanti kesādikoṭṭhāsapathaviṃ
analyzed: atthaḥ kim vuttam hoti itiādinā tam eva attham pākaṭam karoti pathavīkāyanti kesa ādi koṭṭhāsa pathavim

original: dhammasamūhattā “kāyo”ti vadati, lakkhaṇapathavimeva vā anekappabhedaṃ sakalasarīragataṃ
analyzed: dhamma samūha ttā kāyaḥ ti vadati lakkhaṇa pathavim eva vā aneka ppabhedam sakala sarīra gatam

original: pubbāpariyabhāvena ca pavattamānaṃ samūhavasena gahetvā “kāyo”ti vadati. Āpokāyantiādīsupi eseva nayo.
analyzed: pubba apariya bhāvena ca pavattamānam samūha vasena gahetvā kāyo ti vadati esa iva nayo

original: Evaṃ gahetabbassāti “ahaṃ mama”nti evaṃ attattaniyabhāvena andhabālehi gahetabbassa.
analyzed: evam gahetabbassa ati aham mama nti evam atta ttaniya bhāvena andha bālehi gahetabbassa

original: Idāni sattannaṃ anupassanākārānampi vasena kāyānupassanaṃ dassetuṃ “apicā”tiādi āraddhaṃ.
analyzed: idāni sattannam anupassanā ākārānam pi vasena kāya anupassanam dassetum apica ati ādi āraddham

original: Tattha aniccato anupassatīti catusamuṭṭhānikakāyaṃ “anicca”nti anupassati, evaṃ passanto
analyzed: tattha aniccataḥ anupassati iti catu samuṭṭhānika kāyam aniccan ti anupassati evam passanto

original: evaṃ cassa aniccākārampi anupassatīti vuccati. Tathābhūtassa cassa niccaggāhassa
analyzed: evam ca assa anicca ākāram pi anupassati iti vuccati tathābhūtassa ca ssa nicca ggāhassa

original: lesopi na hotīti vuttaṃ “no niccato”ti tathāhesa “niccasaññaṃ pajahatī”ti vutto.
analyzed: lesaḥ api na hoti iti vuttam no niccataḥ ti tathā ha isa nicca saññam pajahati iti vuttaḥ

original: Ettha ca “aniccato eva anupassatī”ti eva-kāro luttaniddiṭṭhoti tena nivattitamatthaṃ
analyzed: ettha ca aniccataḥ eva anupassati iti evakāraḥ lutta niddiṭṭhaḥ ti tena nivattitam attham

original: dassetuṃ “no niccato”ti vuttaṃ. Na cettha dukkhato anupassanādinivattanamāsaṅkitabbaṃ
analyzed: dassetum no niccatas ti vuttam na ca ittha dukkhataḥ anupassanā ādi nivattanam āsaṅkitabbam

original: paṭiyogīnivattanaparattā eva-kārassa, uparidesanāruḷhattā ca tāsaṃ.
analyzed: paṭiyogī nivattana parattā eva kārassa upari desanā āruḷha ttā ca tāsam

original: Dukkhato anupassatītiādīsupi eseva nayo. Ayaṃ pana viseso – aniccassa dukkhattā tameva
analyzed: dukkhataḥ anupassati iti ādīsu pi esā iva nayaḥ ayam pana visesaḥ aniccassa dukkha ttā tam eva

original: kāyaṃ dukkhato anupassati, dukkhassa anattattā anattato anupassati. Yasmā pana yaṃ
analyzed: kāyam dukkhataḥ anupassati dukkhassa anatta ttā anattataḥ anupassati yasmai pana yam

original: aniccaṃ dukkhaṃ anattā, taṃ anabhinanditabbaṃ, na tattha rajjitabbaṃ, tasmā vuttaṃ
analyzed: aniccam dukkham anattā tam an abhinanditabbam na tattha rajjitabbam tasmā vuttam

original: “nibbindati no nandati, virajjati no rajjatī”ti. So evaṃ arajjanto rāgaṃ nirodheti
analyzed: nibbindati no nandati virajjati no rajjati iti saḥ u evam a rajjantaḥ rāgam nirodha iti

original: no samudeti, samudayaṃ na karotīti attho. Evaṃ paṭipanno ca paṭinissajjati no ādiyati.
analyzed: no samudeti samudayam na karoti iti attho evam paṭipannaḥ ca paṭinissajjati no ādiyati

original: Ayañhi aniccādianupassanā tadaṅgavasena saddhiṃ kāyatannissayakhandhābhisaṅkhārehi

analyzed: nirodhaḥ rūpa dhammā pana anārammaṇāḥ pakāsetabbāḥ evam tesam pakāsetabba bhāva nivatti

analyzed: rūpa dhammānam dandha parivatti tā nānā dhātuyā yathābhūta ñāṇam kho pana tathāgatassa iva

original: sattaṃ, bhavādike vā bhavantarādīhi, kammunā vā vipākaṃ saṃyojeti bandhatīti saṃyojanaṃ.

original: Evaṃ paṭighasaṃyojanādīnampi yathārahaṃ attho vattabbo. Sarasalakkhaṇavasenāti ettha

analyzed: nibbāpetunti evam bhante iti

analyzed: pamāṇam gahetvā ati tasmin rūpe rūpa sampattiyam pamāṇa bhāvam upādāya pasādam janeti iti

original: adhimokkhaṃ uppādeti.
analyzed: adhimokkham uppādeti

original: Paravaṇṇanāyāti “amuko ediso ca ediso cā”ti yasaguṇavacanena. Parathomanāyāti sammukhāva
analyzed: para vaṇṇanāya ati amukaḥ edisaḥ ca edisaḥ ca ati sammukhāḥ

original: parassa silāghuppādanena abhitthavanena. Parapasaṃsanāyāti parammukhā parassa guṇasaṃkittanena.
analyzed: parassa silā ghuppādanena abhitthavanena para pasaṃsanāya ati parammukhā parassa guṇa saṃkittanena

original: Paravaṇṇahārikāyāti paramparavaṇṇahārikāya paramparāya parassa kittisaddūpasaṃhārena.
analyzed: para vaṇṇa hārikāya ati parampara vaṇṇa hārikāya paramparāya parassa kitti saddu upasaṃhārena

original: Tatthāti tasmiṃ thutighose.
analyzed: tattha ati tasmin thuti ghose

original: Cīvaralūkhanti thūlajiṇṇabahutunnakatādiṃ cīvarassa lūkhabhāvaṃ. Pattalūkhanti anekaganthikāhatādiṃ

analyzed: pattassa lūkha bhāvam vividham vā dukkara kārikanti dhutaṅga sevana ādi vasena pavattam

original: nānāvidhaṃ dukkaracariyaṃ.
analyzed: nānāvidham dukkara cariyam

original: Sīlaṃ vā passitvāti sīlapāripūrivasena visuddhaṃ kāyavacīsucaritaṃ ñāṇacakkhunā passitvā. Jhānādiadhigamasiddhaṃ samādhiṃ vā. Vipassanābhiññāsaṅkhātaṃ paññaṃ vā.
analyzed: sīlam vā passitvā ti sīla pāripūri vasena visuddham kāya vacī su caritam ñāṇa cakkhunā passitvā jhāna ādi adhigama siddham samādhim vā vipassanā abhiññā saṅkhātam paññam vā

original: Bhagavato sarīraṃ disvāti sambandho. Rūpappamāṇopi sammāsambuddheyeva pasīdati aparimitakālasamupacitapuññānubhāvanipphannāya
analyzed: bhagavataḥ sarīram disvā ati sambandhaḥ rūpa ppamāṇaḥ api sammāsambuddhā iya iva pasīdati aparimita kāla samupacita puñña anubhāva nipphannāya

original: sabbaso anavajjāya sabbākāraparipuṇṇāvayavāya rūpakāyasampattiyā samantapāsādikattā,
analyzed: sabbasas anavajjāya sabba ākāra paripuṇṇa avayavāya rūpa kāya sampattiyā samanta pāsādikattā

original: yassā rucirabhāvo visuddhe vigatavalāhake deve puṇṇamāsiyaṃ paripuṇṇakalābhāgamaṇḍalaṃ

analyzed: canda maṇḍalam abhibhavitvā atirocati pabhassara bhāvaḥ sarada samayam saṃvaddhita diguṇa teja kiraṇa jāla samujjalam

analyzed: sūriya maṇḍalam abhibhavati sommakiraṇa rasa samujjala bhāvehi tad ubhayehi abhibhuyya

original: vattamānaṃ ekasmiṃ khaṇe dasasahassilokadhātuṃ vijjotanasamatthaṃ mahābrahmuno pabhāsamudayaṃ

original: abhivihacca bhāsate tapate virocati ca.
analyzed: abhivihat ca bhāsate tapate virocati ca

original: Satipi aṅgapariccāgādīnaṃ dānapāramibhāve pariccāgavisesabhāvadassanatthañceva sudukkarabhāvadassanatthañca
analyzed: aṅga pariccāga ādīnam dāna pārami bhāve pariccāga visesa bhāva dassana ttham ca iva su dukkara bhāva dassana ttham ca

original: aṅgapariccāgādiggahaṇaṃ, tatthāpi ca aṅgapariccāgato visuṃ nayanapariccāgaggahaṇaṃ,
analyzed: aṅga pariccāga ādi ggahaṇam tattha api ca aṅga pariccāgataḥ visum nayana pariccāga ggahaṇam

original: pariccāgabhāvasāmaññepi rajjapariccāgato puttadārapariccāgaggahaṇañca kataṃ. Ādinā
analyzed: pariccāga bhāva sāmaññe pi rajja pariccāgato putta dāra pariccāga ggahaṇam ca katam ādinā

original: nayenāti ādi-saddena pubbayogapubbacariyādihetusampattiyā, “itipi so bhagavā”tiādinā

original: vuttāya phalasampattiyā, “so dhammaṃ desetī”tiādinā vuttāya sattupakārakiriyāya ca
analyzed: vuttāya phala sampattiyā saḥ dhammam deseti iti ādinā vuttāya sattu pakāra kiriyāya ca

original: saṅgaho daṭṭhabbo. Sammāsambuddheyeva pasīdati yathāvuttaguṇānaṃ anaññasādhāraṇabhāvato
analyzed: saṅgahaḥ daṭṭhabbo sammāsambuddha iya iva pasīdati yathā vutta guṇānam anañña sādhāraṇa bhāvato

original: acchariyabbhutabhāvato ca. Sesesupi eseva nayo.
analyzed: ca sesesu pi esa iva nayaḥ

original: “Cīvaralūkhaṃ disvā”ti vatvā taṃ dassetuṃ “sace bhagavā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Sāṇapaṃsukūlacīvarenāti
analyzed: cīvara lūkham disvā iti vatvā tam dassetum sace bhagavā itiādi vuttam sāṇa paṃsukūla cīvarena ati

original: matakaḷevaraṃ paliveṭhetvā chaḍḍitena tumbamatte kimī papphoṭetvā gahitena sāṇapaṃsukūlacīvarena.
analyzed: mata kaḷevaram paliveṭhetvā chaḍḍitena tumba matte kimī papphoṭetvā gahitena sāṇa paṃsukūla cīvarena

original: Bhāriyanti garukaṃ, dukkaranti attho. Vadhuyuvatīmajjhimitthivasena, bālayobbanapurāṇavasena

original: vā tividhanāṭakatā. Hareṇuyūsaṃ maṇḍalakalāyaraso. “Yāpessati nāmā”ti nāma-saddaṃ
analyzed: vā tividha nāṭaka tā hareṇu yūsam maṇḍala kalāya rasaḥ yāpessati nāma ati nāma saddam

original: ānetvā sambandho. Nāma-saddayogena hi anāgatakālassa viya payogo, yāpeti icceva attho.

original: Appāṇakanti nirassāsaṃ nirodhitassāsapassāsaṃ.
analyzed: appāṇakanti nirassāsam nirodhita ssāsa passāsam

original: Samādhiguṇanti sādhāraṇato vuttamatthaṃ vivarati jhānādiggahaṇena. Mānadabbanimmadanena

analyzed: nibbisevana bhāva āpādanam pi damanam evā ti vuttam pāthika putta damana ādīni iti ādi saddena

original: aṭṭhaṅgasamannāgatena sarena samannāgato. Tena brahmassaratākaravīkabhāṇitādassanena
analyzed: aṭṭhaṅga samannāgatena sarena samannāgataḥ tena brahmassara tā karavīka bhāṇita ādassanena

original: Hatappabhāti buddhānubhāvena vigatatejā. Kāḷapakkhūpameti sattānaṃ byāmohandhakārābhibhavena kāḷapakkharattūpame. Sūriyeti sūriye udayitvā obhāsenteti adhippāyo.

original: Siṅghāṭaketi tikoṇaracchāyaṃ. Catukketi sandhiyaṃ. Paridevantīti anutthunanavasena
analyzed: siṅghāṭakā iti catukkā iti sandhiyam paridevanti iti

original: vippalapanti. Sokādhikakato hi vacīpalāpo paridevo. Loke uppajjamāneyeva uppannāti

original: attano diṭṭhivādassa purātanabhāvaṃ dīpenti.

original: ettha kato niyamo “vivicca akusalehī”ti etthāpi katoyeva hoti sāvadhāraṇasseva atthassa
analyzed: ettha kataḥ niyamaḥ vivicca akusalehi iti ettha api kataḥ yā iva hoti sa avadhāraṇassa iva atthassa

analyzed: icchitabba ttā evam idha api iti tena āha dutiya ādayaḥ pi itiādi sāmañña phala adhigama vasena

analyzed: nippariyāyataḥ samaṇa bhāvo ti tesam vasena ittha cattāro samaṇāḥ desitā ti tam attham sutta antarena

analyzed: dutiya ādi tā vuttā ati sotāpannassa paṭhama tā a vutta siddhā ti na coditā

analyzed: tad atthāya paṭipannā ca na gahitā ati veneyya jhāsayato tattha hi magga adhigama tthāya

analyzed: vipassanā api itas bahiddhā natthi kutas magga phalāni iti dassentena bhagavatā ñāyassa

original: dhammassa padesavattī, ito bahiddhā samaṇopi natthī”ti vuttaṃ. Idha pana niṭṭhānappattameva
analyzed: dhammassa padesavattī itas bahiddhā samaṇaḥ api natthi iti vuttam idha pana niṭṭhāna ppattam eva

original: taṃtaṃsamaṇabhāvaṃ gaṇhantena phalaṭṭhakasamaṇāva gahitā “maggaṭṭhato phalaṭṭho savisesaṃ
analyzed: taṃ taṃ samaṇa bhāvam gaṇhantena phalaṭṭhaka samaṇāḥ va gahitāḥ magga ṭṭhataḥ phalaṭṭhaḥ sa visesam

original: dakkhiṇeyyo”ti. Svāyamattho dvīsu suttesu desanābhedeneva viññāyatīti.
analyzed: dakkhiṇeyyaḥ ti sva ayam atthaḥ dvīsu suttesu desanā bhedena iva viññāyati iti

original: Rittāti vivittā. Tucchāti nissārā paṭipannakasārābhāvato. Pavadanti etehīti pavādā,

analyzed: diṭṭhi gatikānam nānā diṭṭhi dīpakā samayā ti āha cattāro sassata vādā tiādi tattha

analyzed: yam vattabbam tam paratas āgamissati te iti yathā vutta samaṇāḥ ettha ati para pavādā ti

original: vutte bāhirakasamaye.
analyzed: vutte bāhiraka samaye

analyzed: āha ñāyassa dhammassa ati

analyzed: tesam parappavāda sāsanānam akhetta tā khetta tā ca ariya maggassa abhāva bhāvā su parisuddhassa

original: Sīhassa kesā nāma kesarāyatanā khandhalomā. Gocariyahatthikulaṃ nāma pakatihatthikulaṃ,
analyzed: sīhassa kesā nāma kesara āyatanā khandha lomā gocariya hatthi kulam nāma pakati hatthi kulam

original: yaṃ “kālāvaka”ntipi vuccati. Ghoṭako nāma assakhaḷuṅko. Sineruparibhaṇḍe simbalirukkhehi

original: sañchādito paññāsayojano daho simbalidaho, taṃ parivāretvā mahantaṃ simbalivanaṃ,
analyzed: sañchādito paññāsa yojanaḥ dahaḥ simbali daho tam parivāretvā mahantam simbali vanam

original: taṃ sandhāyāha “simbalidahavane”ti. Aññatitthāvāsabhūmiyaṃ imesu samaṇesu ekacco
analyzed: tam sandhāya āha simbalidahavana iti añña titthāvāsa bhūmiyam imesu samaṇesu ekacco

original: na uppajjati, īdiso panettha vikappo natthi, sabbena sabbaṃ na uppajjantevāti dassento
analyzed: na uppajjati īdisaḥ pana ittha vikappaḥ natthi sabbena sabbam na uppajjanteva iti dassento

original: “ekasamaṇopī”ti āha. Ariyamaggaparikkhateti ariyamagguppattiyā abhisaṅkhate, yadā
analyzed: eka samaṇaḥ api iti āha ariya magga parikkhata iti ariya magga uppattiyā yadā
