analyzed: sāsanikānam sammā paṭipattiyā ariya maggo dibbati tadā ti attho

original: Sammāti suṭṭhu. Suṭṭhu nadanaṃ nāma hetuyuttaṃ suṭṭhu katvā kathananti āha “hetunā”ti.
analyzed: sammā iti suṭṭhu suṭṭhu nadanam nāma hetu yuttam suṭṭhu katvā kathanan ti āha hetunā iti

original: So ca hetu aviparīto eva icchitabboti āha “nayenā”ti, ñāyenāti attho. Evaṃbhūto ca
analyzed: saḥ ca hetu aviparītaḥ eva icchitabbo ti āha nayena ati ñāyena ati attho evaṃbhūto ca

original: so yathādhippetatthaṃ karoti sādhetīti dassento āha “kāraṇenā”ti. Yadi tiracchānasīhassa
analyzed: saḥ karoti sādha iti iti dassentaḥ āha kāraṇena ati yadi tiracchāna sīhassa

original: nādo sabbatiracchānaekaccamanussāmanussanādato seṭṭhattā seṭṭhanādo, kimaṅgaṃ pana
analyzed: nādaḥ sabba tiracchāna ekacca manussa amanussa nādataḥ seṭṭha ttā seṭṭha nādaḥ kim aṅgam pana

original: tathāgatasīhanādoti āha “sīhanādanti seṭṭhanāda”nti. Yadi tiracchānasīhanādassa seṭṭhanādatā
analyzed: tathāgata sīha nādaḥ ti āha sīha nādanti seṭṭha nādanti yadi tiracchāna sīha nādassa seṭṭha nāda tā

original: nibbhayatāya appaṭisattutāya icchitā, tathāgatasīhanādasseva ayamattho sātisayoti
analyzed: nibbhaya tāya appaṭisattu tāya icchitā tathāgata sīha nādassa iva ayam attho sa atisayaḥ ti

original: āha “abhītanādaṃ appaṭināda”nti. Idānissa seṭṭhanādabhāvaṃ kāraṇena paṭipādento “imesañhī”tiādimāha.
analyzed: āha abhīta nādam idānissa seṭṭha nāda bhāvam kāraṇena paṭipādentaḥ imesaṃ hi itiādim āha

original: Tena “sammā”ti vuttamatthaṃ samattheti. Tattha atthitāyāti iminā sīhanādassa uttamatthataṃ
analyzed: tena sammā iti vuttam attham samattheti tattha atthi tāya iti iminā sīha nādassa uttamattha taṃ

original: dasseti. Bhūtaṭṭho hi uttamaṭṭho. Tāya eva bhūtaṭṭhatāya abhītanādatāti dassento
analyzed: dasseti bhūta ṭṭhaḥ hi uttama ṭṭhaḥ tāya eva bhūta ṭṭhatāya abhīta nāda tā ati dassentaḥ

original: “ime samaṇā…pe… nāma hotī”ti āha. Abhūtañhi vadato kutoci bhayaṃ vā āsaṅkā vā siyāti
analyzed: ime samaṇāpe nāma hoti iti āha abhūtam hi vadataḥ kutocid bhayam vā āsaṅkā vā siyāti

original: “idhevā”ti niyamassa aviparītataṃ dassento “amhākampi…pe… appaṭinādo nāma hotī”ti
analyzed: idha iva ati niyamassa a viparīta tam dassentaḥ amhākam pipe appaṭinādaḥ nāma hoti iti

original: āha. Yañhi aññatthāpi atthi, taṃ idhevāti avadhāretuṃ na yuttanti.
analyzed: āha yat hi aññattha api atthi tam idha iva ati avadhāretum na yuttam ti

original: 140. Khoti avadhāraṇe. Tena vijjati evāti dasseti. Yanti karaṇatthe paccattanti āha
analyzed: kho iti avadhāraṇe tena vijjati eva ati dasseti yanti karaṇa atthe paccattanti āha

original: “yena kāraṇenā”ti. Titthaṃ nāma dvāsaṭṭhi diṭṭhiyo tabbinimuttassa kassaci diṭṭhivipphanditassa
analyzed: yena kāraṇena ati tittham nāma dvāsaṭṭhi diṭṭhiyaḥ tad vinimuttassa kassaci diṭṭhi vipphanditassa

original: abhāvato. Pāragamanasaṅkhātaṃ taraṇaṃ diṭṭhigatikānaṃ tattha tattheva aparāparaṃ
analyzed: abhāvato pāra gamana saṅkhātam taraṇam diṭṭhi gatikānam tattha tattha iva apara aparam

original: ummujjananimujjanavasena pilavananti āha “taranti uppalavantī”ti. Uppādetāti pūraṇādiko.
analyzed: ummujjana nimujjana vasena āha taranti uppalavanti iti pūraṇa ādikaḥ

original: Titthe jātāti titthiyā, yathāvuttaṃ vā diṭṭhigatasaṅkhātaṃ titthaṃ etesaṃ atthīti
analyzed: titthe jātā ati titthiyāḥ yathāvuttam vā diṭṭhigata saṅkhātam tittham etesam atthi iti

original: titthikā, titthikā eva titthiyā. Assasanti ettha, etenāti vā assāso, avassayo.
analyzed: titthikā titthikāḥ eva titthiyāḥ assasanti ettha etena ati vā assāsaḥ avassayo

original: Pakatatthaniddeso yaṃ-taṃ-saddoti tassa “bhagavatā”tiādīhi padehi samānādhikaraṇabhāvena
analyzed: tassa bhagavatā ati ādīhi padehi samāna adhikaraṇa bhāvena

original: vuttassa yena abhisambuddhabhāvena bhagavā pakato satthubhāvena adhigato supākaṭo
analyzed: vuttassa yena abhisambuddha bhāvena bhagavā pakataḥ satthu bhāvena adhigataḥ su pākaṭaḥ

original: ca, taṃ abhisambuddhabhāvaṃ saddhiṃ āgamanapaṭipadāya atthabhāvena dassento “yo so…pe…
analyzed: ca tam abhisambuddha bhāvam saddhim āgamana paṭipadāya attha bhāvena dassentaḥ yaḥ sope

original: abhisambuddho”ti āha. Satipi ñāṇadassanasaddānaṃ idha paññāvevacanabhāve tena tena
analyzed: abhisambuddhaḥ ti āha sati pi ñāṇa dassana saddānam idha paññā vevacana bhāve tena tena

original: visesena nesaṃ savisaye visesappavattidassanatthaṃ asādhāraṇavisesavasena vijjāttayavasena
analyzed: visesena na īsam sa visaye visesa ppavatti dassana ttham asādhāraṇa visesa vasena

original: vijjābhiññānāvaraṇavasena sabbaññutaññāṇamaṃsacakkhuvasena paṭivedhadesanāñāṇavasena
analyzed: vijjā abhiññāna āvaraṇa vasena sabbaññuta ññāṇa maṃsa cakkhu vasena paṭivedha desanā ñāṇa vasena

original: ca te yojetvā dassento “tesaṃ tesa”ntiādimāha. Tattha āsayānusayaṃ jānatā āsayānusayañāṇena,
analyzed: ca te yojetvā dassentaḥ tesam tesam ti ādim āha tattha āsayā anusayam jānatā āsayā anusaya ñāṇena

original: sabbaṃ ñeyyadhammaṃ passatā sabbaññutānāvaraṇañāṇehi. Pubbenivāsādīhīti pubbenivāsaāsavakkhayañāṇehi.
analyzed: sabbam ñeyya dhammam passatā sabbaññu tā anāvaraṇa ñāṇehi pubbenivāsa ādīhi iti pubbenivāsa āsava kkhaya ñāṇehi

original: Anaññasādhāraṇapuññānubhāvanibbatto anuttarañāṇādhigamaladdhapurāvattako ca bhagavato
analyzed: anañña sādhāraṇa puñña anubhāva nibbattaḥ anuttara ñāṇa adhigama laddha purāvattako ca bhagavataḥ

original: rūpakāyo atikkammeva devānaṃ devānubhāvaṃ vattatīti āha “sabbasattānaṃ…pe… passatā”ti.
analyzed: rūpa kāyaḥ atikkamma iva devānam deva anubhāvam vattati iti āha sabba sattānam pe passata ti

original: Paṭivedhapaññāyāti maggapaññāya. Tāya hi sabbaso ñeyyadhammesu sammohassa vidhamitattā
analyzed: paṭivedha paññāya ati magga paññāya tāya hi sabbaso ñeyya dhammesu sammohassa vidhamita ttā

original: pacchā pavattajānanaṃ tassa jānanaṃ viya vuccati.
analyzed: pacchā pavatta jānanam tassa jānanam viya vuccati

original: Arīnanti kilesārīnaṃ, pañcavidhamārānaṃ vā sāsanapaccatthikānaṃ vā aññatitthiyānaṃ,
analyzed: arīnam ti kilesa arīnam pañcavidha mārānam vā sāsana paccatthikānam vā añña titthiyānam

original: tesaṃ hananaṃ pāṭihāriyehi abhibhavanaṃ appaṭibhānatākaraṇaṃ ajjhupekkhanaṃ vā. Kesivinayasuttañcettha
analyzed: tesam hananam pāṭihāriyehi abhibhavanam appaṭibhāna tā karaṇam ajjhupekkhanam vā kesivinaya suttam ca ittha

original: nidassanaṃ. Tathā ca ṭhānāṭṭhānādīni vā jānatā, yathākammupage satte passatā, savāsanānamāsavānaṃ
analyzed: nidassanam tathā ca ṭhāna aṭṭhāna ādīni vā jānatā yathā kamma upage satte passatā sa vāsanānam āsavānam

original: khīṇattā arahatā, abhiññeyyādibhede dhamme abhiññeyyādito aviparītāvabodhena sammāsambuddhena.
analyzed: khīṇattā arahatā abhiññeyya ādi bhede dhamme abhiññeyya āditaḥ a viparīta avabodhena sammāsambuddhena

original: Atha vā tīsu kālesu appaṭihatañāṇatāya jānatā, kāyakammādīnaṃ ñāṇānuparivattanena
analyzed: atha vā tīsu kālesu appaṭihata ñāṇa tāya jānatā kāya kamma ādīnam ñāṇa anuparivattanena

original: nisammakāritāya passatā, ravādīnampi abhāvasādhikāya pahānasampadāya arahatā, chandādīnaṃ
analyzed: nisamma kāritāya passatā rava ādīnam pi abhāva sādhikāya pahāna sampadāya arahatā chanda ādīnam

original: ahānihetubhūtāya akkhayapaṭibhānasādhikāya sabbaññutāya sammāsambuddhena. Evaṃ dasabalaaṭṭhārasāveṇikabuddhadhammavasenapi
analyzed: ahāni hetu bhūtāya akkhaya paṭibhāna sādhikāya sabbaññu tāya sammāsambuddhena evam dasa bala aṭṭhārasa āveṇika buddha dhamma vasena api

original: yojanā veditabbā. Yeti caturo dhamme. Attanīti amhesu. Na rājarājamahāmattādīsu upatthambhaṃ
analyzed: yojanā veditabbā yā iti caturo dhamme attani iti amhesu na rāja rāja mahāmatta ādīsu upatthambham

original: sampassamānā, na kāyabalaṃ sampassamānāti yojanā.
analyzed: sampassamānā na kāya balam sampassamānā ati yojanā

original: Uppannapasādoti aveccappasādaṃ vadati. Vakkhati hi “cattāri sotāpannassa aṅgāni kathitānī”ti.
analyzed: uppanna pasādaḥ ti avecca ppasādam vadati vakkhati hi cattāri sotāpannassa aṅgāni kathitāni iti

original: Kāmaṃ asekkhāpi asekkhāya samasikkhatāya sahadhammikā eva, ciṇṇabrahmacariyatāya
analyzed: kāmam asekkhā api asekkhāya sama sikkha tāya sahadhammikā eva ciṇṇa brahmacariya tāya

original: pana sahadhammaṃ carantīti na vattabbāti asekkhavāro na gahito. Sabbepeteti ete yathāvuttā
analyzed: pana sahadhammam caranti iti na vattabbā ati asekkha vāraḥ na gahito ete yathā vuttā

original: bhikkhuādayo sotāpannādayo ca puthujjanā ariyā cāti sabbepi ete taṃtaṃsikkhāhi samānadhammattā
analyzed: bhikkhu ādayo sotāpanna ādayo ca puthujjanāḥ ariyāḥ ca ati sabbe pi ete taṃ taṃ sikkhāhi samāna dhamma ttā

original: sahadhammattā “sahadhammikā”ti vuccanti. Idāni nibbattitaariyadhammavaseneva sahadhammike
analyzed: saha dhamma ttā sahadhammikā ati vuccanti idāni nibbattita ariya dhamma vasena iva sahadhammike

original: dassento “apicā”tiādimāha. Maggadassanamhīti pariññābhisamayādivasena saccapaṭivedhena
analyzed: dassentaḥ api ca atiādim āha magga dassanamhi iti pariññā abhisamaya ādi vasena sacca paṭivedhena

original: “nava maggaṅgāni, aṭṭha bojjhaṅgānī”tiādinā vivādo natthi. Ekadhammacāritāyāti samānadhammacāritāya.
analyzed: nava maggaṅgāni aṭṭha bojjhaṅgāni iti ādinā vivādaḥ natthi eka dhamma cāritāya ati samāna dhamma cāritāya

original: Na hi paṭividdhasaccānaṃ “mayā dhammo sudiṭṭho, tayā duddiṭṭho”tiādinā vivādo atthi.
analyzed: na hi paṭividdha saccānam mayā dhammo su diṭṭho tayā duddiṭṭhaḥ iti ādinā vivādaḥ atthi

original: Diṭṭhisīlasāmaññena saṅghātā hi te uttamapurisā. Imināti “sahadhammikā kho panā”tiādivacanena.
analyzed: diṭṭhi sīla sāmaññena saṅghātāḥ hi te uttama purisāḥ iminā ati sahadhammikā kho pana iti ādi vacanena

original: Tattha piyamanāpaggahaṇena sīlesu paripūrakāritāpadesena ekadesena gahitaṃ saṅghasuppaṭipattiṃ
analyzed: tattha piya manā paggahaṇena sīlesu paripūra kāri tā apadesena ekadesena gahitam saṅgha su paṭipattim

original: paripuṇṇaṃ katvā dasseti. Ye hi sampannasīlā suvisuddhadassanā, te viññūnaṃ piyā
analyzed: paripuṇṇam katvā dasseti ye hi sampanna sīlā su visuddha dassanā te viññūnam piyā

original: manāpāti. Ettāvatāti “atthi kho no āvuso”tiādinayappavattena ratanattayapasādajotanena
analyzed: manāpā ati ettāvatā ati atthi kho no āvuso iti ādi naya ppavattena ratana ttaya pasāda jotanena

original: akkhātā tesu tesu suttapadesesu.
analyzed: akkhātā tesu tesu sutta padesesu

original: 141. Satthari pasādoti pasādaggahaṇena “bhagavatā”tiādinā vā pasādanīyā dhammā gahitā.
analyzed: satthari pasādaḥ ti pasāda ggahaṇena bhagavatā ati ādinā vā pasādanīyāḥ dhammāḥ gahitā

original: Tena buddhasubuddhataṃ dasseti, tathā “dhamme pasādo”ti iminā dhammasudhammataṃ,
analyzed: tena buddha su buddha tam dasseti tathā dhamme pasādaḥ iti iminā dhamma su dhamma tam

original: itarena saṅghasuppaṭipannataṃ. Yena cittena aññattha anupalabbhamānena sāsaneyeva
analyzed: itarena saṅgha suppaṭipanna tam yena cittena aññattha an upalabbhamānena

original: samaṇo ito bahiddhā natthīti ayamattho, sammadeva, patiṭṭhāpitoti veditabbaṃ. Tatrāyaṃ
analyzed: samaṇaḥ itas bahiddhā na atthi iti ayam attho sammat eva patiṭṭhāpito ti veditabbam tatra ayam

original: yojanā – yasmā sammāsambuddho amhākaṃ satthā, tasmā atthi kho no, āvuso, satthari
analyzed: yojanā sammāsambuddhaḥ amhākam satthā tasmai atthi kho no āvuso satthari

original: pasādo, sammāsambuddhattā cassa svākhāto dhammoti atthi dhamme pasādo, tato eva ca
analyzed: pasādaḥ sammāsambuddha ttā cassa su ākhātaḥ dhammo ti atthi dhamme pasādaḥ tatas eva ca

original: atthi sīlesu paripūrakāritāti sahadhammikā…pe… pabbajitā cāti evamettha satthari
analyzed: atthi sīlesu paripūra kāri tā ati sahadhammika āpe pabbajitā ca ati evam ettha satthari

original: pasādena dhamme pasādo, tena saṅghasuppaṭipattīti ayañca nayo lesenapi parappavādesu
analyzed: pasādena dhamme pasādaḥ tena saṅgha suppaṭipatti iti ayaṃ ca nayaḥ lesena api para pavādesu

original: natthīti idheva samaṇo…pe… samaṇehi aññehīti.
analyzed: na atthi iti idha iva samaṇa upe samaṇehi aññehi iti

original: Paṭividdhasaccānaṃ pahīnānurodhānaṃ gehassitapemassa asambhavo evāti “idānī”ti vuttaṃ.
analyzed: paṭividdha saccānam pahīna anurodhānam geha sita pemassa asambhavaḥ evā ti idāni iti vuttam

original: Yadi evaṃ “upajjhāyena, bhikkhave, saddhivihārikamhi puttapemaṃ upaṭṭhapetabbaṃ”tiādivacanaṃ
analyzed: yadi evam upajjhāyena bhikkhave saddhivihārikamhi putta pemam upaṭṭhapetabbam ti ādi vacanam

original: kathanti? Nayidaṃ gehassitapemaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ, taṃsadisattā pana pemamukhena vutto
analyzed: katham ti na yidam geha sita pemam sandhāya vuttam tad sadisa ttā pana pema mukhena vuttaḥ

original: mettāsneho. Na hi bhagavā bhikkhū saṃkilese niyojeti. Evarūpaṃ pemaṃ sandhāyāti pasādāvahaguṇāvahato
analyzed: mettā snehaḥ na hi bhagavā bhikkhū saṃkilese niyojeti evarūpam pemam sandhāya ati pasāda āvaha guṇa āvahato

original: pūraṇādīsu bhatti pasādo na hoti, pasādapatirūpakā pana lobhapavattīti daṭṭhabbā.
analyzed: pūraṇa ādīsu pasādaḥ na hoti pasāda patirūpakā pana lobha pavattī iti daṭṭhabbā

original: Theroti mahāsaṅgharakkhitatthero. Yena aṭṭhakathā potthakaṃ āropitā. Ekova satthā
analyzed: thero ti mahā saṅgharakkhita thero yena aṭṭhakathā potthakam āropitā ekaḥ iva satthā

original: anaññasādhāraṇaguṇattā, aññathā anacchariyattā satthulakkhaṇameva na paripūreyya.
analyzed: anañña sādhāraṇa guṇa ttā aññathā satthu lakkhaṇam eva na paripūreyya

original: Visuṃ katvāti aññehi vivecetvā attano āveṇikaṃ katvā. “Amhākaṃ satthā”ti byāvadantānaṃ
analyzed: visum katvā ti aññehi vivecetvā attanaḥ āveṇikam katvā amhākam satthā iti byāvadantānam

original: aññesaṃ satthā na hotīti atthato āpannameva hoti, tathā ca padesavattiniṃ tassa satthutaṃ
analyzed: aññesam satthā na hoti iti atthataḥ āpannam eva hoti tathā ca tassa satthu tam

original: paṭijānantā paripuṇṇalakkhaṇasatthutaṃ icchantānampi tato viruddhā satthubhāvapariyesanena
analyzed: paṭijānantā paripuṇṇa lakkhaṇa satthu tam icchantānam pi tatas viruddhā satthu bhāva pariyesanena

original: parājitā honti. Pariyattidhammeti adhikabrahmaguṇasuttageyyādippabhedasamaye. Tattha
analyzed: parājitāḥ honti pariyatti dhammā iti adhika brahma guṇa sutta geyya ādi ppabheda samaye tattha

original: ajasīla…pe… kukkurasīlādīsūti idaṃ yebhuyyena aññatitthiyānaṃ tādisaṃ vatasamādānasabbhāvato
analyzed: ajasīlape kukkurasīla ādīsu iti idam yebhuyyena añña titthiyānam tādisam vata samādāna sabbhāvato

original: vuttaṃ, ādi-saddena yamaniyamacātuyāmasaṃvarādīnaṃ saṅgahoti. Adhippayāsoti adhikaṃ
analyzed: vuttam ādi saddena yama niyama cātuyāma saṃvara ādīnam saṅgahaḥ ti adhippayāsaḥ ti adhikam

original: payasati payujjati etenāti adhippayāso, savisesaṃ adhikattabbakiriyā. Tenāha “adhikappayogo”ti.
analyzed: payasati payujjati etena ati adhippayāsaḥ sa visesam adhikattabba kiriyā tena āha adhika ppayogaḥ iti

original: Tassa pasādassa pariyosānabhūtāti tassa satthari dhamme ca pasādassa niṭṭhānabhūtā.
analyzed: tassa pasādassa pariyosāna bhūtā ati tassa satthari dhamme ca pasādassa niṭṭhāna bhūtā

original: Niṭṭhāti mokkho. Samayavādīnañhi tasmiṃ tasmiṃ samaye tadupadesake ca pasādo yāvadeva
analyzed: samaya vādīnam hi tasmin tasmin samaye tad upadesake ca pasādaḥ yāvat eva

original: mokkhādhigamanaṭṭho. Diṭṭhigatikā tathā tathā attano laddhivasena niṭṭhaṃ parikappenti
analyzed: mokkha adhigamana ṭṭho diṭṭhi gatikā tathā tathā attanaḥ laddhi vasena niṭṭham parikappenti

original: yevāti āha “niṭṭhaṃ apaññapento nāma natthī”ti. Brāhmaṇānanti brāhmaṇavādīnaṃ. Tesaṃ
analyzed: yeva āti āha niṭṭham a paññapentaḥ nāma natthi iti brāhmaṇānam ti brāhmaṇa vādīnam tesam

original: ekacce brahmunā salokatā niṭṭhāti vadanti, ekacce tassa samīpatā, ekacce tena saṃyogo
analyzed: ekacce brahmunā salokatā vadanti ekacce tassa samīpa tā ekacce tena saṃyogaḥ

original: niṭṭhāti vadanti. Tattha ye salokatāvādino samīpatāvādino ca, te dvedhāvādino, itare
analyzed: niṭṭhā ti vadanti tattha ye salokatā vādino samīpatā vādino ca te dvedhāvādinaḥ itare

original: advedhāvādino. Sabbepi te atthato brahmalokupapattiyaṃyeva niṭṭhāsaññino. Tattha
analyzed: a dvedhāvādino sabbe pi te atthataḥ brahma loka upapattiyam yeva niṭṭhā saññino tattha

original: hi nesaṃ niccābhiniveso yathā taṃ bakassa brahmuno. Tena vuttaṃ “brahmaloko niṭṭhā”ti.
analyzed: hi nesam nicca abhinivesaḥ yathā tam bakassa brahmunaḥ tena vuttam brahma lokaḥ niṭṭhāti

original: Brahmalokoti paṭhamajjhānabhūmi. Mahātāpasānanti vekhanasāditāpasānaṃ. Mahābrahmā
analyzed: brahma lokaḥ iti vekhanasādi tāpasānam mahābrahmā

original: viya paṭhamajjhānabhūmiyaṃ ābhassaresu eko sabbaseṭṭho natthīti “ābhassarā”ti puthuvacanaṃ.
analyzed: paṭhama jhāna bhūmiyam ābhassaresu ekaḥ sabbaseṭṭhaḥ natthi iti ābhassarā ti puthuvacanam

original: Paribbājakānanti sañcayādiparibbājakānaṃ. Anto ca mano ca etassa natthīti anantamānaso.
analyzed: paribbājakānam ti sañcaya ādi paribbājakānam antaḥ ca manaḥ ca etassa na atthi iti anantamānasaḥ

original: Ājīvakānañhi sabbadābhāvato ananto, sukhadukkhādisamatikkamanato amānaso. Iminā aṭṭhahi
analyzed: ājīvakānam hi sabbadā bhāvataḥ anantaḥ sukha dukkha ādi samatikkamanataḥ amānasaḥ iminā aṭṭhahi

original: lokadhammehi upakkiliṭṭhacittataṃ dasseti.
analyzed: loka dhammehi upakkiliṭṭha citta tam dasseti

original: Papañce yaṃ vattabbaṃ, taṃ heṭṭhā vuttameva. Taṇhādiṭṭhiyova adhippetā mamaṅkāraahaṅkāravigamassa
analyzed: papañce yam vattabbam tam heṭṭhā vuttam eva taṇhā diṭṭhiyaḥ uva adhippetā mamaṅkāra ahaṅkāra vigamassa

original: adhippetattā. Yathā pañcasu ṭhānesu ekova kileso lobho āgato, evaṃ dvīsu ṭhānesu
analyzed: adhippeta ttā yathā pañcasu ṭhānesu ekaḥ iva kilesaḥ lobhaḥ āgataḥ evam dvīsu ṭhānesu

original: tayo kilesā āgatā “doso moho diṭṭhī”ti. “Sadosassā”ti hi vuttaṭṭhāne paṭighaṃ akusalamūlaṃ
analyzed: tayo kilesāḥ āgatāḥ dosaḥ mohaḥ diṭṭhī iti sa dosassa ati hi vutta ṭṭhāne paṭigham akusala mūlam

original: gahitaṃ, “paṭiviruddhassā”ti virodho, “samohassā”ti moho akusalamūlaṃ, “aviddasuno”ti
analyzed: gahitam paṭiviruddhassa ati virodhaḥ sa mohassa ati mohaḥ akusala mūlam

original: malyaṃ, asampajaññaṃ vā, “saupādānassā”ti “natthi dinna”ntiādinā nayena gahaṇaṃ,
analyzed: malyam asampajaññam vā sa upādānassa ati natthi dinna nti ādinā nayena gahaṇam

original: “papañcārāmassā”ti papañcuppattivasena.
analyzed: papañca ārāmassa āti papañca uppatti vasena

analyzed: hi jhāna ādi paccavekkhaṇa āñāṇam sattama balan ti tassa sa vitakka sa vicāra tā vuttā tathā api

original: “jhānādīhi vinā paccavekkhaṇā natthī”ti jhānādisahagataṃ ñāṇaṃ tadantogadhaṃ katvā
analyzed: jhāna ādīhi vinā paccavekkhaṇā na atthi iti jhāna ādi sahagatam ñāṇam tad antogadham katvā

original: evaṃ vuttanti veditabbaṃ. Atha vā sabbaññutaññāṇaṃ jhānādikiccaṃ viya na sabbaṃ balakiccaṃ

analyzed: kātum sakkoti iti dassetum jhānam hutvā appetum na sakkoti iddhi hutvā vikubbitum

original: na sakkotī”ti vuttaṃ, na pana kassaci balassa jhānaiddhibhāvatoti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Evaṃ

original: kiccavisesavasenapi dasabalañāṇasabbaññutaññāṇānaṃ visesaṃ dassetvā idāni vitakkattikabhūmantaravasenapi

original: taṃ dassetuṃ “apicā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Paṭipāṭiyātiādito paṭṭhāya paṭipāṭiyā.

original: Saṅgammāti samāgantvā. Ādito lāpo ālāpo, vacanapaṭivacanavasena samaṃ lāpo sallāpo. Sammā, samaññā vā kathā saṃkathā, saṃkathāva sākacchā.

original: abhippasannoti dassetuṃ “apicā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Catukuṇḍikoti dvīhi pādehi hatthehīti

original: catūhi aṅgehi kuṇḍanako āhiṇḍanako. Chamānikiṇṇanti bhūmiyaṃ khittaṃ. Bhakkhasanti āhāraṃ.
analyzed: catūhi aṅgehi kuṇḍanakaḥ āhiṇḍanakaḥ bhūmiyam khittam āhāram

original: Macchariyamalādipāpadhammavigamanato mettādiguṇānubrūhanato ca brahmaṃ seṭṭhaṃ cariyanti
analyzed: mad śariya mala ādi pāpa dhamma vigamanataḥ mettā ādi guṇa anubrūhanataḥ ca brahmam seṭṭham cariyanti

original: brahmacariyaṃ, dānaṃ. Tathā hi taṃ bhagavatā paṇḍitapaññattaṃ vuttaṃ. Evaṃ sesesupi
analyzed: brahmacariyam dānam tathā hi tam bhagavatā paṇḍita paññattam vuttam evam sesesu pi

original: yathārahaṃ brahmacariyapariyāyo niddhāretvā vattabbo. Kinti kīdisaṃ. Vatanti samādinnavataṃ.
analyzed: yathāraham brahmacariya pariyāyaḥ niddhāretvā vattabbo kinti kīdisam vatanti samādinna vatam

original: Suciṇṇassāti suṭṭhu ciṇṇassa puññassa. Iddhīti ānubhāvo. Jutīti vatthābharaṇobhāsasamujjalā
analyzed: su ciṇṇassa ati suṭṭhu ciṇṇassa puññassa iddhi iti ānubhāvaḥ juti iti vattha ābharaṇa ubhāsa samujjalā

original: sarīrappabhā. Balavīriyūpapattīti kāyabalena ceva ussāhena ca samannāgamo.
analyzed: sarīra ppabhā bala vīriya upapatti iti kāya balena ca iva ussāhena ca samannāgamo

original: Tena pāṇi kāmadadoti tena addhikānaṃ upagacchantānaṃ hatthaṃ pasāretvā asayhaseṭṭhino

original: dānaṭṭhānadassanamayena puññena idāni mayhaṃ hattho kapparukkho viya kāmadado icchiticchitadāyī,
analyzed: dāna ṭṭhāna dassana mayena puññena idāni mayham hatthaḥ kapparukkhaḥ viya kāma dadaḥ icchiti chita dāyī

original: kāmadado honto ca madhussavo iṭṭhavatthuvissajjanako jāto. Tena me brahmacariyenāti
analyzed: kāmadadaḥ honto ca madhussavaḥ iṭṭha vatthu vissajjanakaḥ jātaḥ tena me brahmacariyena ati

original: tena mama yathāvuttakāyaveyyāvaṭiyakammasaṅkhātena seṭṭhacariyena. Puññanti puññaphalaṃ.

original: Tampi hi pujjasabhāvato, uttarapadalopena vā “evamidaṃ puññaṃ pavaḍḍhatī”tiādīsu “puñña”nti vuccati.
analyzed: tat pi hi pujja sabhāvataḥ uttara pada lopena vā evam idam puññam pavaḍḍhati itiādīsu puññanti vuccati

original: Pañca sikkhāpadāni samāhaṭāni pañcasikkhāpadaṃ yathā “tibhavaṃ, tisakaṭa”nti ca.
analyzed: pañca sikkhāpadāni samāhaṭāni pañca sikkhāpadam yathā ca

original: Brahmacariyasminti dhammadesanāya. Sā hi vineyyānaṃ brahmabhāvāvahanato brahmaṃ seṭṭhaṃ

original: Nātikkamāmāti na aticarāma agamanīyaṭṭhānepi itaratthāpi na vītikkamāma. Tenāha “aññatra tāhi brahmacariyaṃ carāmā”ti. Amhanti amhākaṃ.
analyzed: na atikkamāma iti na aticarāma agamanīya ṭṭhāne pi itarattha api na vītikkamāma tena āha aññatra tāhi brahmacariyam carāma ati amhanti amhākam

original: Attadamanavasenāti yathāpaṭiññaṃ arahantānaṃ anukaraṇākārena pavattacittadamanavasena,

original: brahmacariyaṃ. Brahmaṃ seṭṭhaṃ carati etenāti brahmacariyaṃ, satthusāsanaṃ.

original: ca. Tulitoti tulāsadiso.
analyzed: ca tulitaḥ iti tulā sadisaḥ

Āhārasuddhivaṇṇanā

analyzed: saññam ṭhapetvā ti imasmin aṅgulikā ādi pabbe gahite satam hoti imasmin sahassanti ādinā

original: saññāṇaṃ katvā gaṇanā. Acchiddagaṇanāti “ekaṃ dve”tiādinā navantavidhinā nirantaragaṇanā.
analyzed: saññāṇam katvā gaṇanā acchidda gaṇanā ati ekam dve iti ādinā nava anta vidhinā nirantara gaṇanā

original: Piṇḍagaṇanāti saṅkalanapaṭuppādanādinā piṇḍitvā gaṇanā. Tenāha “khettaṃ oloketvā”tiādi.
analyzed: piṇḍa gaṇanā ati saṅkalana paṭuppādana ādinā piṇḍitvā gaṇanā tena āha khettam oloketvā atiādi

original: Kasanaṃ kasīti kasiggahaṇena sabbo kasipaṭibaddho jīvikūpāyo gahitoti āha “kasīti
analyzed: kasanam kasī iti kasi gahaṇena sabbaḥ kasi paṭibaddho jīvikā upāyaḥ gahito ti āha kasī iti

original: kasikamma”nti. Jaṅghavaṇijjāti jaṅghasatthavasena vaṇijjaṃ āha, thalavaṇijjāti sakaṭasatthavasena.

original: Ādi-saddena nāvāpaṇādivasena vohāraṃ. Vaṇippathoti vaṇijamaggo, dānaggahaṇavasena

original: saṃvohāroti attho. Usūnaṃ asanakammaṃ issattaṃ, dhanusippena jīvikā, idha pana issattaṃ
analyzed: saṃvohāraḥ ti atthaḥ usūnam asana kammam issattam dhanu sippena jīvikā idha pana issattam

original: viyāti issattaṃ, sabbaāvudhajīvikāti āha “āvudhaṃ gahetvā upaṭṭhānakamma”nti. Porohiccāmaccakammādi

analyzed: rāja kammam ādi saddena mahā sippam khuddaka sippam ca

original: saṅgaṇhāti. Sītassa purakkhatoti sītassa purato kato. Yo hi sītakāle jīvikāhetu sītalapadesaṃ
analyzed: saṅgaṇhāti sītassa purakkhatoti sītassa puratas kataḥ yaḥ hi sīta kāle jīvikā hetu sītala padesam

original: pakkhandati, so vāḷamigādīhi viya sītena paripātiyamāno tena purato kato viya hoti.
analyzed: pakkhandati saḥ vāḷamiga ādīhi viya sītena paripātiyamānaḥ tena puratas kataḥ viya hoti

original: Tenāha “sītena bādhiyamāno”ti. Uṇhassa purakkhatoti etthāpi eseva nayo. Saritvāti
analyzed: tena āha sītena bādhiyamānaḥ iti uṇhassa purakkhato ti ettha api esa iva nayaḥ saritvā iti

original: saṃsappitvā. Ghaṭṭiyamānoti hiṃsiyamāno bādhiyamāno. Ābādhanaṃ ābādho, pīḷāti attho.
analyzed: saṃsappitvā ghaṭṭiyamānaḥ iti hiṃsiyamānaḥ bādhiyamānaḥ ābādhanam ābādhaḥ pīḍā ati attho

original: Kāmahetunti vā bhāvanapuṃsakaniddeso yathā “visamaṃ candimasūriyā parivattantī”ti.
analyzed: kāma hetunti vā bhāva napuṃsaka niddesaḥ yathā visamam candima sūriyā parivattanti iti

original: Tathā sesapadadvayepi. Tenevāha “kāmānameva hetū”ti. Kāmānaṃ hetūti ettha purimapadāvadhāraṇamayuttaṃ

original: sambhavato, tasmā “uppajjatiyevā”ti vuttaṃ.
analyzed: sambhavataḥ tasmai uppajjatiyā iva iti vuttam

original: Uṭṭhahatoti iminā uṭṭhānavīriyaṃ vuttanti āha “ājīvasamuṭṭhāpakavīriyenā”ti. Taṃ
analyzed: uṭṭhahato ti iminā uṭṭhāna vīriyam vuttanti āha ājīva samuṭṭhāpaka vīriyena ati tam

original: vīriyanti ājīvikasamuṭṭhāpakavīriyaṃ. Pubbenāparaṃ ghaṭentassāti ārambhato paṭṭhāya
analyzed: vīriyanti ājīvika samuṭṭhāpaka vīriyam pubbena aparam ghaṭentassa ati ārambhataḥ paṭṭhāya

original: nirantaraṃ pavattentassa. Citte uppannabalavasokena socatīti cittasantāpena anto

original: nijjhāyati. Kāye uppannadukkhenāti tasseva sokassa vasena kāye uppannadukkhena. Sokuddesena
analyzed: nijjhāyati kāye uppanna dukkhena ati tassa iva sokassa vasena kāye uppanna dukkhena soka uddesena

original: paridevanākāradassanañceva sammohāpajjanākāradassanañca. Meti vatvā puna noti puthuvacanaṃ

original: attano ubhayathāpi voharitabbato, byāmūḷhavacanaṃ vā sokavasena.
analyzed: ubhayathā api voharitabbataḥ byāmūḍha vacanam vā soka vasena

original: 168. Idha kāmaggahaṇena visesato vatthukāmā gahitāti kāmādiggahaṇaṃ kataṃ, nānantariyatāya
analyzed: idha kāma ggahaṇena visesataḥ vatthu kāmā gahitā ati kāma ādi ggahaṇam katam na ānantariya tāya

analyzed: pana kilesa kāmaḥ api gahitaḥ eva asi camman ti ettha camma ggahaṇena na kevalam camma mayassa

original: cammaparisibbitasseva vā gahaṇaṃ, atha kho sabbassapi āvudhabādhakassa gahaṇanti
analyzed: camma parisibbitassa iva vā gahaṇam atha kho sabbassa api āvudha bādhakassa gahaṇam ti

original: dassento “kheṭakaphalakādīnī”ti āha. Ādi-saddena sarādisaṅgaho. Dhanukalāpaṃ sannayhitvāti

original: dhanuno sannayhananti. Dvinnaṃ senānaṃ byūhasaṃvidhānena vā ubhatobyūḷhaṃ. Vijjotalantesūti

original: nisitapītaphalatāya vijjotanavasena parivattamānesu.
analyzed: nisita pīta phala tāya vijjotana vasena parivattamānesu

original: Pākārasamīpātisaṅkhāratāya pākārapādā upakāriyo, yā “uddāpā”ti vuccanti. Satadantenāti
analyzed: pākāra samīpa ati saṅkhāra tāya pākāra pādāḥ upakāriyaḥ yāḥ uddāpā ati vuccanti sa tad antena ati

original: anekasatadantakena, yassa tikhiṇadantāni anekasatāni mūlāni honti. Atibhāratāya dasavīsamattāpi
analyzed: aneka sata dantakena yassa tikhiṇa dantāni aneka satāni mūlāni honti ati bhāratāya

original: janā ukkhipituṃ na sakkonti, yantavasena pana ukkhipitvā bandhitvā ṭhapenti. Tenāha
analyzed: janāḥ ukkhipitum na sakkonti yanta vasena pana ukkhipitvā bandhitvā ṭhapenti tena āha

original: “aṭṭhadantākārenā”tiādi. Omaddantīti oṭṭhapenti.
analyzed: aṭṭha danta ākārena atiādi omaddanti iti oṭṭhapenti

original: 169. Sandhimpi chindanti corikāya jīvitukāmā. Nillopanti nissesavilopaṃ, ekaṃ parittaṃ
analyzed: sandhim pi chindanti corikāya jīvitu kāmāḥ nillopanti nissesa vilopam ekam parittam

original: gāmaṃ parivāretvā tattha kiñcipi gayhūpagaṃ asesetvā karamaraggahaṇaṃ. Tenāha “mahāvilopa”nti.
analyzed: gāmam parivāretvā tattha kiñcipi a sesetvā kara mara gahaṇam tena āha mahā vilopanti

original: Panthaduhanakammaṃ aṭavimagge ṭhatvā addhikānaṃ vilumpanaṃ. Pahārasādhanatthaṃ daṇḍappahārassa
analyzed: pantha duhana kammam aṭavi magge ṭhatvā addhikānam vilumpanam pahāra sādhana tham daṇḍa ppahārassa

analyzed: sukha siddhi attham kañjitaḥ nibbattam kañjiyam āranālam yam vuccati

original: taṃ yattha siñcati, sā kañjiyaukkhalikā. Bilaṅgathālikasadisakaraṇaṃ bilaṅgathāliyaṃ.
analyzed: tam yattha siñcati sā kañjiyā aukkhalikā bilaṅga thālika sadisa karaṇam bilaṅga thāliyam

original: Sīsakapālaṃ uppāṭetvāti ayoguḷapavesanappamāṇaṃ chiddaṃ katvā. Saṅkhamuṇḍakammakāraṇanti

analyzed: saṅkham viya muṇḍa kamma kāraṇam

original: Rāhumukhakammakāraṇanti rāhumukhagata-sūriyasadisa-kammakāraṇaṃ. Jotimālikanti jotimālavantaṃ
analyzed: rāhu mukha kamma kāraṇanti rāhu mukha gata sūriya sadisa kamma kāraṇam jotimālikanti jotimālavantam

original: kammakāraṇaṃ. Hatthapajjotikanti hatthapajjotanakammakāraṇaṃ. Erakavattakammakāraṇanti
analyzed: kamma kāraṇam hatthapajjotikanti hattha pajjotana kamma kāraṇam erakavatta kamma kāraṇam

original: erakavattasadise sarīrato baddhe uppāṭanakammakāraṇaṃ. Cīrakavāsikakammakāraṇanti
analyzed: eraka vatta sadise sarīrataḥ baddhe uppāṭana kamma kāraṇam cīraka vāsika kamma kāraṇam ti

analyzed: sarīrataḥ uppāṭita baddha cīrakāhi nivāsāpana kamma kāraṇam tam karontāḥ yathā gīvataḥ

original: Eṇeyyakakammakāraṇanti eṇīmigasadisakammakāraṇaṃ. Ayavalayāni datvāti ayavalayāni
analyzed: eṇeyyaka kamma kāraṇam ti eṇī miga sadisa kamma kāraṇam aya valayāni aya valayāni

original: paṭimuñcitvā. Ayasūlāni koṭṭentīti kapparajaṇṇukakoṭīsu ayasūlāni pavesenti. Nti

original: taṃ tathākatakammakāraṇaṃ sattaṃ.
analyzed: tam tathā kata kamma kāraṇam sattam

analyzed: baḷisa maṃsikanti baḷisehi maṃsuppāṭana kamma kāraṇam kahāpaṇikanti kahāpaṇa attasaḥ

analyzed: chindana kamma kāraṇam koṭṭenti iti chindanti tat śetvā khāra avasiñcana kamma kāraṇam

original: Palighaparivattikanti palighassa viya parivattanakammakāraṇaṃ. Ekābaddhaṃ karonti
analyzed: paligha parivattikam ti palighassa viya parivattana kamma kāraṇam eka ābaddham karonti

original: ayasūlassa koṭṭanena. Palālapīṭhakanti palālapīṭhassa viya sarīrassa saṃvellanakammakāraṇaṃ.
analyzed: aya sūlassa koṭṭanena palāla pīṭhakanti palāla pīṭhassa viya sarīrassa saṃvellana kamma kāraṇam

original: Kāraṇikāti ghātanakārakā. Palālavaṭṭiṃ viya katvāti yathā palālapīṭhaṃ karontā palālavaṭṭiṃ
analyzed: kāraṇikā ati ghātana kārakā palāla vaṭṭim katvā ati yathā palāla pīṭham karontā palāla vaṭṭim

analyzed: katvā saṃvellana vasena nam veṭhenti evam karonti iti attho chātakehi iti bubhukkhitehi

original: koleyyakasunakhehi. Balavanto hi te javayoggā sūrā ca honti. Kammavasena sampareti
analyzed: koleyyaka sunakhehi balavantaḥ hi te java yoggā sūrā ca honti kamma vasena sampareti

original: etthāti samparāyo, paraloko. Tattha bhavoti samparāyiko.
analyzed: ettha ati samparāyo para loko tattha bhavoti samparāyiko

original: 170. Chandarāgo vinīyati ceva pahīyati ca etthāti nibbānaṃ chandarāgavinayo chandarāgappahānañcāti.

analyzed: tena āha nibbānam hi iti tattha āgamma ati idam yaḥ chanda rāgam vinā iti pajahati tassa

analyzed: aparittena ati ahīnena vipulena ati mahatā yadi vaṇṇa sampatti dassana attham vaṇṇa dasakam

original: kasmā na gahitanti āha “mātugāmassa hī”tiādi. Bhojanasampadādīnaṃ alābhepīti dassanatthaṃ
analyzed: kasmā na gahitanti āha mātu gāmassa hi itiādi bhojana sampad ādīnam alābhe pi iti dassana attham

original: “duggatakule nibbattassapī”ti vuttaṃ. Thokaṃ thokaṃ vaṇṇāyatanaṃ pasīdati maṃsassa
analyzed: duggata kule nibbattassa api iti vuttam thokam thokam vaṇṇa āyatanam pasīdati maṃsassa

original: paribrūhanato thanamaṃsāni vaḍḍhanti jāyanti. Vaṇṇeti hadayaṅgatabhāvaṃ pakāsento

original: viya hotīti vaṇṇo. So eva sāmaggopabhogādinā nibhātīti nibhā. Tenāha “vaṇṇanibhāti vaṇṇoyevā”ti.

original: Bhogganti ativiya vaṅkatāya bhoggaṃ. Tādisaṃ pana sarīraṃ bhaggaṃ viya hotīti āha
analyzed: bhogganti ativiya vaṅka tāya bhoggam tādisam pana sarīram bhaggam viya hoti iti āha

original: “bhagga”nti. Tenāha “imināpissa vaṅkabhāvameva dīpetī”ti. Dantānaṃ chinnabhinnatāya
analyzed: tena āha iminā api sa vaṅka bhāvam eva dīpeti iti dantānam chinna bhinna tāya

original: ekaccānaṃ patanena ca khaṇḍitadantaṃ. Kesānaṃ setavaṇṇatāya palitanti āha “paṇḍarakesa”nti.
analyzed: patanena ca khaṇḍita dantam kesānam seta vaṇṇa tāya āha paṇḍara kesanti

original: Kesānaṃ mattaso siyane khallāṭavohāroti bahuso siyanaṃ sandhāyāha “mahākhallāṭasīsa”nti.
analyzed: kesānam bahusas siyane khallāṭa vohāraḥ iti sandhāya āha mahā khallāṭa sīsanti

original: Vassasatikakāle uppajjanatilakāni sandhāyāha “tilakāhatagatta”nti. Tāni pana kānici
analyzed: vassa satika kāle uppajjana tilakāni sandhāya āha tilaka āhata gattam ti tāni pana kānici

original: setāni honti kānici kāḷānīti āha “setakāḷatilakehī”ti. Byādhikanti sañcātabyādhiṃ.
analyzed: setāni honti kānicid kāḷāni iti āha seta kāḷa tilakehi iti sañcāta byādhim

original: Bāḷhagilānanti māraṇanti kagelaññena gilānaṃ.
analyzed: bāḷha gilānam ti māraṇam ti kagelaññena gilānam

original: Byābādhanaṭṭhena byābādho, byābādhova byābajjhaṃ, natthi ettha byābajjhanti abyābajjhaṃ,
analyzed: byābādhana ṭṭhena byābādhaḥ byābādhaḥ uva byābajjham natthi ettha byābajjhanti a byābajjham

original: dukkharahitaṃ. Tenāha “niddukkhamevā”ti.
analyzed: dukkha rahitam tena āha niddukkham eva iti

original: 174. Aniccādiākāroti aniccākāro dukkhākāro vipariṇāmākāro calādiākāro ca.
analyzed: anicca ādi ākāro ti anicca ākāro dukkha ākāro vipariṇāma ākāro cala ādi ākāro ca

original: Mahādukkhakkhandhasuttavaṇṇanāya līnatthappakāsanā samattā.
analyzed: mahādukkhakkhandha sutta vaṇṇanāya līna ttha ppakāsanā samattā

original: 4. Cūḷadukkhakkhandhasuttavaṇṇanā
analyzed: cūḷadukkhakkhandha sutta vaṇṇanā

original: 175. Sakkesūti ettha yaṃ vattabbaṃ, taṃ satipaṭṭhānasuttavaṇṇanāyaṃ vuttanayeneva
analyzed: sakkesu iti ettha yat vattabbam tat satipaṭṭhāna sutta vaṇṇanāyam vutta nayena iva

original: veditabbanti taṃ ekadesena dassento “so hī”ti āha. Tattha yena rājakumārā sakyā nāma

analyzed: lubbhana lakkhaṇena pana lobho tu eva vuccati tena āha nānā ppakārakam

original: 176. Ajjhattanti niyakajjhattaṃ adhippetanti āha “tava santāne”ti. Appahīnoti anavasesato
analyzed: ajjhattam nti niyaka ajjhattam adhippetanti āha tava santāne iti appahīnaḥ ti anavasesato

original: 177. Assādīyatīti assādo, sukhaṃ. Appo appamattako assādo etesūti appassādā. Tenāha
analyzed: assādīyati iti assādaḥ sukham appaḥ appa mattakaḥ assādaḥ etesu iti appassādā tena āha

original: vuccatīti keci. Bhesakaḷāti vuccati ghammaṇḍagacchaṃ, keci “setarukkha”nti vadanti,

original: ayuttakārī, tassa tato gaḷitaṭṭhānatāya taṃ vanaṃ bhesagaḷāvanaṃ nāma jātanti keci.
analyzed: ayutta kārī tassa tatas gaḷita ṭṭhāna tāya tam vanam bhesagaḷāvanam nāma jātanti keci

original: Abhayadinnaṭṭhāne jātaṃ virūḷhaṃ, saṃvaddhanti attho.
analyzed: abhaya dinna ṭṭhāne jātam virūḍham saṃvaddhanti

original: Icchāpetīti yaṃ kiñci attani garahitabbaṃ vattuṃ sabrahmacārīnaṃ icchaṃ uppādeti,
analyzed: icchā apeti iti yam kiñci attani garahitabbam vattum sabrahmacārīnam iccham uppādeti

original: tadatthāya tesaṃ attānaṃ vissajjetīti attho. Paṭhamaṃ dinno hitūpadeso ovādo, aparāparaṃ
analyzed: tad atthāya tesam attānam vissajjeti iti

original: dinno anusāsanī. Paccuppannātītavisayo vā ovādo, anāgatavisayo anusāsanī. Otiṇṇavatthuko
analyzed: dinnaḥ anusāsanī paccuppanna atīta visayaḥ vā ovādaḥ anāgata visayaḥ anusāsanī otiṇṇa vatthuko

original: Vāmatoti apasabyato, vuttavipariyāyatoti adhippāyo.
analyzed: vāmataḥ ti apasabyataḥ vutta vipariyāyataḥ ti adhippāyo

original: Asantasambhāvanapatthanānanti asantehi avijjamānehi guṇehi sambhāvanassa patthanābhūtānaṃ.

original: 184. Paccavekkhitabboti “na pāpiccho bhavissāmi, na pāpikānaṃ icchānaṃ vasaṃ gato”tiādinā

original: 6. Cetokhilasuttavaṇṇanā
analyzed: cetokhila sutta vaṇṇanā

original: Tattha samudayasaccapañhenāti mahāsatipaṭṭhāne samudayasaccaniddesena. So hi “kattha
analyzed: tattha samudaya sacca pañhena ati mahāsati paṭṭhāne samudaya sacca niddesena saḥ hi kattha

original: Laddhavohāreti iminā rāgādīnaṃ appavattinimittatāya antoti samaññā nibbānassāti dasseti.
analyzed: laddha vohārā iti iminā rāga ādīnam appavatti nimitta tāya antaḥ ti samaññā nibbānassa ati dasseti

original: Eteneva abhinandanādīnaṃ abhāvoti ca idaṃ saṃvaṇṇitanti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Kathaṃ pana sabbasaṅkhatavinissaṭe

analyzed: evaṃsampadanti evaṃsampajjanakam evam passitabbam idam mama ajjhesanam tena āha

original: pattoti dhammabhūto. Brahmā vuccati maggo tena uppannattā lokassa ca taduppādanattā,
analyzed: patto ti dhamma bhūtaḥ brahmā vuccati maggo tena uppanna ttā lokassa ca tad uppādana ttā

original: tañca sayambhuñāṇena pattoti brahmabhūto. Catusaccadhammaṃ vadatīti vattā. Ciraṃ

analyzed: saḥ vā uddesaḥ hoti iti theraḥ yam kho no ti āha sabba loka sādhāraṇā hi

original: tasmā amhākaṃ neva attāti yojanā. Ajjhattikassa vatthuno neva attāti paṭikkhittattā
analyzed: tasmai amhākam na iva attā ati yojanā ajjhattikassa vatthunaḥ na iva attā ati paṭikkhitta ttā

original: bāhiravatthu attaniyabhāvena paṭikkhittaṃ hotīti āha “amhākaṃ cīvarādiparikkhāropi
analyzed: bāhira vatthu attaniya bhāvena paṭikkhittam hoti iti āha amhākam cīvara ādi parikkhāraḥ api

original: na hotī”ti. Khandhapañcakaṃyevāti bāhiravatthuṃ nidassanaṃ katvā khandhapañcakaṃyeva
analyzed: na hoti iti khandha pañcakam yā iva ati bāhira vatthum nidassanam katvā khandha pañcakam yā iva

original: na tumhākanti pajahāpeti. Na uppāṭetvā kandaṃ viya. Na luñcitvā vā kese viyāti. Iminā
analyzed: na tumhākanti pajahāpa iti na uppāṭetvā kandam na luñcitvā vā kese viyāti iminā

original: rūpādīnaṃ nāmamukhena pahānaṃ icchanti. Ulliṅgitamatthaṃ chandarāgavinayena pajahāpetīti sarūpato dasseti.
analyzed: rūpa ādīnam nāma mukhena pahānam icchanti ulliṅgitam attham chanda rāga vinayena pajahāpeti iti sarūpataḥ dasseti

original: 248. “Taṃ kiṃ maññatha, bhikkhave, rūpaṃ niccaṃ vā”tiādi desanā tiparivaṭṭaṃ. Yāva
analyzed: tam kim maññatha bhikkhave rūpam niccam vā atiādi desanā ti parivaṭṭam yāva

original: imaṃ ṭhānanti “evaṃ svākkhāto”ti yāvāyaṃ pāḷipadeso. Suviññeyyabhāvena akkhātattāpi
analyzed: imam ṭhānam ti evam su ākkhāto ti yāvā ayam pāḷi padeso su viññeyya bhāvena akkhāta ttā api

original: svākkhātoti āha “sukathitattā eva uttāno vivaṭo pakāsito”ti. Tiriyaṃ vidāraṇena chinnaṃ,
analyzed: āha su kathita ttā eva uttānaḥ vivaṭaḥ pakāsitaḥ ti tiriyam vidāraṇena chinnam

original: dīghaso phālanena bhinnaṃ, tato eva tattha tattha sibbitagaṇṭhikatajiṇṇavatthaṃ pilotikā,
analyzed: phālanena bhinnam tatas eva tattha tattha sibbita gaṇṭhikata jiṇṇa vattham pilotikā

original: tadabhāvato chinnapilotiko, pilotikarahitoti attho. Iriyāpatha-saṇṭhapanaavijjamānajhāna-vipassanāni
analyzed: tad abhāvataḥ chinna pilotikaḥ pilotika rahitaḥ ti attho iriyāpatha saṇṭhapana avijjamāna jhāna vipassanāni

original: chinnāya avijjamānāya paṭipattiyā sibbanagaṇṭhikaraṇasadisāni, tādisaṃ idha natthīti
analyzed: chinnāya a vijjamānāya paṭipattiyā sibbana gaṇṭhi karaṇa sadisāni tādisam idha natthi iti

original: āha “na hettha…pe… atthī”ti. Patiṭṭhātuṃ na labhatīti pesalehi saddhiṃ saṃvāsavasenapi
analyzed: āha na hettha pe atthi iti patiṭṭhātum na labhati iti pesalehi saddhim saṃvāsa vasena api

original: patiṭṭhātuṃ na labhati, visesādhigamavasena pana vattabbameva natthi.
analyzed: patiṭṭhātum na labhati visesa adhigama vasena pana vattabbam eva natthi

original: Kāraṇḍavaṃ niddhamathāti vipannasīlatāya kacavarabhūtaṃ puggalaṃ kacavaramiva nirapekkhā
analyzed: kāraṇḍavam niddham atha ati vipanna sīla tāya kaca vara bhūtam puggalam kaca varam iva nirapekkhā

original: apanetha. Kasambuñcāpakassathāti kasaṭabhūtañca naṃ khattiyādīnaṃ majjhagataṃ sambhinnaṃ
analyzed: apanetha kasambuñca apakassatha ati kasaṭa bhūtam ca nam khattiya ādīnam majjha gatam sambhinnam

original: paggharitakuṭṭhaṃ caṇḍālaṃ viya apakassatha nikkaḍḍhatha. Kiṃ kāraṇaṃ? Saṅghārāmo
analyzed: paggharita kuṭṭham caṇḍālam viya apakassatha nikkaḍḍhatha kim kāraṇam saṅghārāmaḥ

original: nāma sīlavantānaṃ kato, na dussīlānaṃ, yato etadeva. Tato palāpe vāhetha, assamaṇe
analyzed: nāma sīlavantānam kataḥ na dussīlānam yatas etat eva tatas palāpe assamaṇe

original: samaṇamānineti yathā palāpā antosārarahitā ataṇḍulā bahi thusena vīhi viya dissanti,
analyzed: samaṇa māninā iti yathā palāpāḥ antosāra rahitāḥ a taṇḍulāḥ bahi thusena vīhi viya dissanti

original: evaṃ pāpabhikkhū antosīlarahitāpi bahi kāsāvādiparikkhārena bhikkhū viya dissanti,
analyzed: evam pāpa bhikkhū antosīla rahitāḥ api bahi kāsāva ādi parikkhārena bhikkhū viya dissanti

original: tasmā “palāpā”ti vuccanti, te palāpe vāhetha odhunātha vidhamatha. Paramatthato assamaṇe
analyzed: tasmā palāpa ati vuccanti te palāpe vāhetha odhunātha vidhamatha paramatthataḥ assamaṇe

original: vesamattena samaṇamānine evaṃ niddhamitvāna…pe… patissatāti. Tattha kappayavhoti
analyzed: vesamattena samaṇa mānine evam patissata ati tattha

original: kappetha, karothāti vuttaṃ hoti. Patissatāti pati pati satā sampajānantā suṭṭhu pajānantā.
analyzed: kappetha karotha iti vuttam hoti pati satā ti pati pati satā sampajānantā suṭṭhu pajānantā

original: Patissatā vā sappatissā aññamaññaṃ sagāravā. Athevaṃ suddhā suddhehi saṃvāsaṃ kappentā
analyzed: patissatā vā sa patissā aññam aññam sa gāravā atha evam suddhā suddhehi saṃvāsam kappentā

original: diṭṭhisīlasāmaññena samaggā. Anukkamena paripākagatapaññatāya nipakā. Sabbassevimassa
analyzed: diṭṭhi sīla sāmaññena samaggāḥ anukkamena paripāka gata pañña tāya nipakā

original: dukkhavaṭṭassa antaṃ karissatha, parinibbānaṃ pāpuṇissathāti attho.
analyzed: dukkha vaṭṭassa antam karissatha parinibbānam pāpuṇissatha ati attho

original: Vaṭṭaṃ tesaṃ natthi paññāpanāya sabbaso samucchinnavaṭṭamūlakattā.
analyzed: vaṭṭam tesam natthi paññāpanāya sabbaso samucchinna vaṭṭa mūlaka ttā

original: Dhammaṃ anussaranti, dhammassa vā anussaraṇasīlāti dhammānusārino. Evaṃ saddhānusārinopi
analyzed: dhammam anussaranti dhammassa vā anussaraṇa sīlāḥ ati dhamma anusārinaḥ evam saddhā anusārinaḥ pi

original: veditabbā. Paṭipannassāti paṭipajjamānassa, sotāpattimaggaṭṭhopi adhippeto. Adhimattanti
analyzed: veditabbā paṭipannassa ti paṭipajjamānassa sotāpatti magga ṭṭhaḥ api adhippetaḥ adhimattam ti

original: balavaṃ. Paññāvāhīti paññaṃ vāheti, paññā vā imaṃ puggalaṃ vahatīti paññāvāhītipi
analyzed: balavam paññāvāhi iti paññam vāheti paññā vā imam puggalam vahati iti paññāvāhi iti pi

original: vadanti. Paññāpubbaṅgamanti paññaṃ purecārikaṃ katvā. Ayaṃ vuccatīti ayaṃ evarūpo
analyzed: vadanti paññā pubbaṅgamanti paññam purecārikam katvā ayam vuccati iti ayam evarūpaḥ

original: puggalo paññāsaṅkhātena dhammena sarati anussaratīti dhammānusārī. Saddhāvāhīti saddhaṃ
analyzed: puggalo paññā saṅkhātena dhammena sarati anussarati iti dhamma anusārī saddhā vāhī iti saddham

original: vāheti, saddhā vā imaṃ puggalaṃ vahatīti saddhāvāhītipi vadanti. Saddhāpubbaṅgamanti
analyzed: vāha iti saddhā vai imam puggalam vahati iti saddhā vāhī itipi vadanti saddhā pubbaṅgamanti

original: saddhaṃ purecārikaṃ katvā. Ayaṃ vuccatīti ayaṃ evarūpo puggalo saddhāya sarati anussaratīti
analyzed: saddham purecārikam katvā ayam vuccati iti ayam evarūpaḥ puggalo saddhāya sarati anussarati iti

original: saddhānusārī. Saddhāmattanti “itipi so bhagavā”tiādinā buddhasubuddhatāya saddahanamattaṃ.
analyzed: saddhā anusārī saddhā mattanti saḥ bhagavān ati ādinā buddha subuddha tāya

original: Matta-saddena aveccappasādaṃ nivatteti. Pemamattanti yathāvuttasaddhānusārena uppannaṃ
analyzed: matta saddena avecca ppasādam nivatteti pema mattanti yathā vutta saddhā anusārena uppannam

original: tuṭṭhimattaṃ. Sinehoti keci. Evaṃ vipassanaṃ paṭṭhapetvā nisinnānanti kalāpasammasanādivasena
analyzed: tuṭṭhimattam sineho ti keci evam vipassanam paṭṭhapetvā kalāpa sammasana ādi vasena

original: āraddhavipassanānaṃ. Ekā saddhāti vipassanānusārena svākkhātadhammatā siddhā, tato
analyzed: āraddha vipassanānam ekā saddhā ati vipassanā anusārena svākkhāta dhamma tā siddhā tatas

original: eva ekā seṭṭhā uḷārā saddhā uppajjati. Ekaṃ pemanti etthāpi eseva nayo. Sagge ṭhapitā
analyzed: eva ekā seṭṭhā uḷārā saddhā uppajjati ekam ettha api esā iva nayo sagge ṭhapitā

original: viya hontīti tesaṃ saddhāpemānaṃ saggasaṃvattaniyatāya abyabhicārībhāvamāha. Cūḷasotāpannoti
analyzed: viya honti iti tesam saddhā apemānam sagga saṃvatta niyatāya abyabhicārī bhāvam āha cūḍa sotāpannaḥ iti

original: vadanti ekadesena saccānubodhe ṭhitattā. Sesaṃ suviññeyyameva.
analyzed: vadanti eka desena sacca anubodhe ṭhita ttā sesam su viññeyyam eva

original: Alagaddūpamasuttavaṇṇanāya līnatthappakāsanā samattā.
analyzed: alagaddūpama sutta vaṇṇanāya līna ttha ppakāsanā samattā

original: 3. Vammikasuttavaṇṇanā
analyzed: vammika sutta vaṇṇanā

original: 249. Piyavacananti piyasamudācāro. Viññujātikā hi paraṃ piyena samudācarantā “bhava”nti
analyzed: piya vacanam ti piya samudācāraḥ viññu jātikāḥ hi param piyena samudācarantāḥ bhavanti

original: vā, “devānaṃ piyo”ti vā, “āyasmā”ti vā samudācaranti, tasmā sammukhā sambodhanavasena
analyzed: vā devānam vā vā samudācaranti sammukhā sambodhana vasena

original: “āvuso”ti, tirokkhaṃ “āyasmā”ti ayampi samudācāro. Mahākassapauruvelakassapādayo
analyzed: āvuso ti tirokkham āyasmā iti ayam pi samudācāraḥ mahākassapa auruvelakassapa ādayo

original: aññepi kassapanāmakā atthīti “katarassa kassapassā”ti pucchanti. Raññāti kosalaraññā.
analyzed: aññe pi kassapa nāmakāḥ atthi iti katarassa kassapassa ati pucchanti raññā ati kosala raññā

original: “Sañjāniṃsū”ti saṅkhepato vuttamatthaṃ vivarituṃ “ayaṃ panā”tiādi āraddhaṃ. Assāti
analyzed: sañjāniṃsu iti saṅkhepataḥ vuttam attham vivaritum ayam pana ati ādi āraddham assa ati

original: kumārakassapassa, “sañjāniṃsū”ti vuttasañjānanassa vā. Puññāni karontoti kappasatasahassaṃ
analyzed: kumārakassapassa sañjāniṃsu iti vutta sañjānanassa vā puññāni karontaḥ iti kappa sata sahassam

original: devesu ca manussesu ca nibbattitvā dānādīni puññāni bhāvento. Osakkanteti parihāyamāne.
analyzed: devesu ca manussesu ca nibbattitvā dāna ādīni puññāni bhāvento osakkanta iti parihāyamāne

original: Paṭhamanti kumārikākāle. Satthā upālittheraṃ paṭicchāpesi taṃ adhikaraṇaṃ vinayakammenevassā
analyzed: paṭhamanti kumārikā kāle satthā upāli ttheram paṭicchāpesi tam adhikaraṇam vinaya kammena iva assā

original: bhikkhuniyā pabbajjāya arogabhāvaṃ.
analyzed: bhikkhuniyāḥ pabbajjāya aroga bhāvam

original: Paññattivibhāvanāti “andhavana”ntveva paññāyamānassa vibhāvanā. Olīyatīti saṅkucati
analyzed: paññatti vibhāvanā ti andha vanam tu eva paññāyamānassa vibhāvanā olīyati iti saṅkucati

original: saṇikaṃ vattati. Bhāṇakoti sarabhāṇako. Yaṃ atthi, taṃ gahetvāti idāni pariyesitabbaṭṭhānaṃ
analyzed: saṇikam vattati bhāṇako ti sara bhāṇakaḥ yam atthi tam gahetvā iti idāni pariyesitabba ṭṭhānam

original: natthi, yathāgataṃ pana yaṃ atthi, taṃ gahetvā. Balavaguṇeti adhimattaguṇe. Kassapabhagavato
analyzed: natthi yathāgatam pana yam atthi tam gahetvā balava guṇe iti adhimatta guṇe kassapa bhagavato

original: kāle niruḷhasamaññāvasena vacanasantatiyā avicchedena ca imasmimpi buddhuppāde taṃ
analyzed: kāle niruḷha samaññā vasena vacana santatiyā avicchedena ca imasmim pi buddhuppāde tam

original: “andhavana”ntveva paññāyittha, uparūparivaḍḍhamānāya pathaviyā upari rukkhagacchādīsu
analyzed: andhavanantu eva paññāyittha upari upari vaḍḍhamānāya pathaviyāḥ upari rukkha gaccha ādīsu

original: sañjāyantesupīti. Sekkhapaṭipadanti sekkhabhāvāvahaṃ visuddhipaṭipattiṃ.
analyzed: sañjāyante su pi iti sekkha paṭipadanti sekkha bhāva āvaham visuddhi paṭipattim

original: Aññatara-saddo apākaṭe viya pākaṭepi vattati eka-saddena samānatthattāti dassetuṃ
analyzed: aññatara saddaḥ apākaṭe viya pākaṭe pi vattati eka saddena samānatthattā ti dassetum

original: “abhijānātī”tiādi vuttaṃ. Bhayabheravadassitampi abhikkanta-saddassa atthuddhāraṃ
analyzed: abhijānāti itiādi vuttam bhaya bherava dassitam pi abhikkanta saddassa attha uddhāram

original: idha dassento evaṃ heṭṭhā tattha tattha katā atthasaṃvaṇṇanā parato tasmiṃ tasmiṃ
analyzed: idha dassento evam heṭṭhā tattha tattha katā attha saṃvaṇṇanā paratas tasmin tasmin

original: suttapadese yathārahaṃ vattabbāti nayadassanaṃ karoti. Kañcanasannibhattacatā suvaṇṇavaṇṇaggahaṇena
analyzed: sutta padese yathāraham vattabbā ati naya dassanam karoti kañcana sannibhatta catā suvaṇṇa vaṇṇa ggahaṇena

original: gahitāti adhippāyenāha “chaviya”nti. Chavigatā pana vaṇṇadhātu eva “suvaṇṇavaṇṇo”ti
analyzed: gahitā iti adhippāyena āha chaviyanti chavi gatā pana vaṇṇa dhātu eva suvaṇṇa vaṇṇaḥ ti

original: ettha vaṇṇaggahaṇena gahitāti apare. Vaṇṇīyati kittīyati ugghosananti vaṇṇo, thuti.
analyzed: ettha vaṇṇa ggahaṇena gahitā ati apare vaṇṇīyati kittīyati ugghosananti vaṇṇaḥ thuti

original: Vaṇṇīyati asaṅkarato vavatthapīyatīti vaṇṇo, kulavaggo. Vaṇṇīyati phalaṃ etena yathāsabhāvato
analyzed: vaṇṇīyati asaṅkarataḥ vavatthapīyati iti vaṇṇaḥ kula vaggo vaṇṇīyati phalam etena yathā sabhāvataḥ

original: vibhāvīyatīti vaṇṇo, kāraṇaṃ. Vaṇṇanaṃ dīgharassādivasena saṇṭhahananti vaṇṇo, saṇṭhānaṃ.
analyzed: vibhāvīyati iti vaṇṇo kāraṇam vaṇṇanam dīgha rassa ādi vasena saṇṭhahananti vaṇṇo saṇṭhānam

original: Vaṇṇīyati aṇumahantādivasena pamīyatīti vaṇṇo, pamāṇaṃ. Vaṇṇeti vikāramāpajjamānaṃ
analyzed: vaṇṇīyati aṇu mahanta ādi vasena pamīyati iti vaṇṇaḥ pamāṇam vaṇṇeti vikāram āpajjamānam

original: hadayaṅgatabhāvaṃ pakāsetīti vaṇṇo, rūpāyatanaṃ. Evaṃ tena tena pavattinimittena
analyzed: hadayaṅgata bhāvam pakāseti iti vaṇṇaḥ rūpa āyatanam evam tena tena pavatti nimittena

original: vaṇṇa-saddassa tasmiṃ tasmiṃ atthe pavatti veditabbā.
analyzed: vaṇṇa saddassa tasmin tasmin atthe pavatti veditabbā

original: Anavasesattaṃ sakalatā kevalatā. Kevalakappāti ettha keci īsaṃ asamattā kevalā kevalakappāti
analyzed: sakala tā kevala tā kevala kappā ati ettha keci asamattā kevalā kevala kappā ati

original: vadanti, evaṃ sati anavasesattho eva kevala-saddo siyā. Anatthantarena pana kappa-saddena
analyzed: vadanti evam sati anavasesa atthaḥ eva kevala saddaḥ siyā anattha antarena pana kappa saddena

original: padavaḍḍhanaṃ katvā kevalā eva kevalakappā. Tathā vā kappanīyattā paññapetabbattā
analyzed: pada vaḍḍhanam katvā kevalā eva kevalakappā tathā vā kappanīya ttā paññapetabba ttā

original: kevalakappā. Yebhuyyatā bahulabhāvo. Abyāmissatā vijātiyena asaṅkaro suddhatā. Anatirekatā
analyzed: kevala kappāḥ yebhuyya tā bahula bhāvaḥ a byāmissa tā vijātiyena asaṅkaraḥ suddha tā an atireka tā

original: taṃmattatā visesābhāvo. Kevalakappanti kevalaṃ daḷhaṃ katvāti attho. Kevalaṃ vuccati
analyzed: taṃmatta tā visesa abhāvaḥ kevalakappanti kevalam daḷham katvā iti attho kevalam vuccati

original: nibbānaṃ sabbasaṅkhatavivittattā. Tenāha “visaṃyogādianekattho”ti. Kevalaṃ etassa
analyzed: nibbānam sabba saṅkhata vivitta ttā tena āha visaṃyoga ādi aneka atthaḥ iti kevalam etassa

original: adhigataṃ atthīti kevalī, sacchikatanirodho khīṇāsavo.
analyzed: adhigatam atthi iti kevalī sacchikata nirodho khīṇa āsavaḥ

original: Kappa-saddo panāyaṃ saupasaggo anupasaggo cāti adhippāyena okappanīyapade labbhamānaṃ
analyzed: kappa saddaḥ pana ayam sa upasaggaḥ an upasaggaḥ ca ati adhippāyena okappanīya pade labbhamānam

original: okappasaddamattaṃ nidasseti, aññathā kappa-saddassa atthuddhāre okappanīyapadaṃ anidassanameva
analyzed: okappa sadda mattam nidasseti aññathā kappa saddassa attha uddhāre okappanīya padam a nidassanam eva

original: siyā. Samaṇakappehīti vinayasiddhehi samaṇavohārehi. Niccakappanti niccakālaṃ. Paññattīti
analyzed: siyā samaṇa kappehi iti vinaya siddhehi samaṇa vohārehi niccakappanti niccakālam paññattī iti

original: nāmaṃ. Nāmañhetaṃ tassa āyasmato, yadidaṃ kappoti. Kappitakesamassūti kattarikāya
analyzed: nāmam tassa āyasmataḥ yat idam kappoti kappita kesa massu iti kattarikāya

original: cheditakesamassu. Dvaṅgulakappoti majjhanhikavelāya vītikkantāya dvaṅgulatāvikappo.
analyzed: chedita kesa massu dvaṅgula kappo ti majjhanhika velāya vītikkantāya dvaṅgula tā vikappo

original: Lesoti apadeso. Anavasesaṃ pharituṃ samatthassapi obhāsassa kenaci kāraṇena ekadesapharaṇampi
analyzed: lesaḥ ti apadesaḥ anavasesam pharitum samatthassa api obhāsassa kenaci kāraṇena eka desa pharaṇam pi

original: siyā, ayaṃ pana sabbasova pharīti dassetuṃ samantattho kappa-saddo gahitoti āha “anavasesaṃ samantato”ti.
analyzed: siyā ayam pana sabbaso va phari iti dassetum samanta ttho kappa saddo gahitaḥ iti āha anavasesam samantataḥ ti

original: Samaṇasaññāsamudācārenāti “ahaṃ samaṇo”ti evaṃ uppannasaññāsamuṭṭhitena samudācārena,
analyzed: samaṇa saññā samudācārena ati aham samaṇaḥ ti evam uppanna saññā samuṭṭhitena samudācārena

original: tannimittena vā tabbohārena. Pubbayogeti pubbayogakathāyaṃ. Papañco esāti eso tumhesu

original: samaṇadhammameva karomāti adhippāyo.

analyzed: valli antare vā ati vā saddaḥ paṃsu antare vā mattikā antare vā ati a vutta vikappa attho

original: Dvedhāpathasamā hoti appaṭipattihetubhāvato.

original: Tayo kulaputtā viyāti pācīnavaṃsadāye samaggavāsaṃ vutthā tayo kulaputtā viya. Pahāyāti pubbabhāge tadaṅgādivasena pacchā aggamaggeneva pajahitvā.
analyzed: tayo kula puttāḥ viya iti pācīna vaṃsa dāye samagga vāsam vutthā tayo kula puttāḥ viya pahāya iti pubba bhāge tad aṅga ādi vasena pacchā aggamaggena iva pajahitvā

analyzed: gāha gāhaka ādi vaṇṇanā

original: Cārikādivaṇṇanā
254. Abhiramanaṃ abhirataṃ, tadeva anunāsikalopaṃ akatvā vuttaṃ “abhiranta”nti. Bhāvanapuṃsakañcetaṃ.

original: Disvāti dassanahetu. Yasmā maggena catusaccadassanahetu āsavā na parikkhīṇā. Phalakkhaṇe

original: hi te khīṇāti vuccantīti.
analyzed: hi te khīṇā ati vuccanti iti

original: Loketi sattaloke saṅkhāraloke ca. Sattavisattabhāvenāti laggabhāvena ceva savisesaṃ

original: āsattabhāvena ca. Atha vātiādinā niddesanayavasena visattikāpadaṃ niddisati. Visatāti
analyzed: āsatta bhāvena ca atha vā ati ādinā niddesa naya vasena visattikā padam niddisati

analyzed: pādena tāliyamānaḥ api sahati osakkanam vipphandanam vā vadanti visaṃharati iti

original: yathā tathā kāmesu ānisaṃsaṃ dassentī vividhehi ākārehi nekkhammābhimukhappavattito
analyzed: yathā tathā kāmesu ānisaṃsam dassentī vividhehi ākārehi nekkhamma abhimukha ppavattito

analyzed: visam phalam etissa ati visa phalā taṇhāya rūpa ādikassa dukkhassa iva paribhogaḥ hoti

original: na amatassāti sā “visaparibhogā”ti vuttā. Sabbattha niruttivasena saddasiddhi veditabbā.

analyzed: maggena uddham uddham tiṇṇaḥ uttiṇṇaḥ yam pana ittha atthataḥ avibhattam tam su viññeyyam eva

original: Nivāpasuttavaṇṇanāya līnatthappakāsanā samattā.
analyzed: nivāpa sutta vaṇṇanāya līnattha ppakāsanā samattā

original: 6. Pāsarāsisuttavaṇṇanā
272. Sādhumayanti ettha sādhu-saddo āyācanattho, na “sādhāvuso”tiādīsu viya abhinandanādiatthoti
analyzed: sādhu mayanti ettha sādhu saddo āyācana atthaḥ na sādhu avuso tiādīsu viya abhinandana ādi atthaḥ ti

analyzed: āha āyācantā iti tena āha pāḷiyam labheyyāma ati ādi vuttam na sakkonti kasmā buddhā

original: hi garū honti, paramagarū uttamaṃ gāravaṭṭhānaṃ, na yathā tathā upasaṅkamanīyā. Tenāha
analyzed: hi garū honti parama garū uttamam gārava ṭṭhānam na yathā tathā upasaṅkamanīyā tena āha

original: “ekacāriko sīho”tiādi.
analyzed: sīha uti ādi

original: kimevamakāsīti? Na sabbakālamevamakāsi. Yadā pana akāsi, taṃ dassetuṃ “bhagavā paṭhamabodhiya”ntiādi

original: Mālākacavaranti milātamālākacavaraṃ. Rajojallaṃ na upalimpati acchatarachavibhāvato.

original: Vuttañhetaṃ “sukhumattā chaviyā kāye rajojallaṃ na limpatī”ti. Yadi evaṃ kasmā bhagavā

original: nahāyatīti āha “utuggahaṇattha”nti.
analyzed: nahāyati iti āha utu ggahaṇa attham ti

original: Vihāroti jetavanavihāro. Vīsatiusabhaṃ gāvutassa catuttho bhāgoti vadanti. Kadācīti

original: Yantanāḷikāhi paripuṇṇasuvaṇṇarasadhārāhi. Nhānavattanti “pabbajitena nāma evaṃ nhāyitabba”nti

original: nahānacārittaṃ dassetvā. Yasmā bhagavato sarīraṃ sudhantacāmīkarasamānavaṇṇaṃ suparisodhitapavāḷarucirakaracaraṇāvaraṃ
analyzed: nahāna cārittam dassetvā yasmai bhagavato sarīram su dhanta cāmīkara samāna vaṇṇam su parisodhita pavāḷa rucira kara caraṇa avaram

original: suvisuddhanīlaratanāvaḷisadisakesatanuruhaṃ, tasmā tahaṃ tahaṃ vinissatajātihiṅgulakarasūpasobhitaṃ

analyzed: atthaḥ dasa kathā vatthu nissitā ati kim sīlam nāma katham ca pūretabbam kāni ca assa

analyzed: saṃkilesa vodānāni itiādinā appiccha ādi nissitā sīla ādi nissitā ca kathā ariyaḥ ti niddosaḥ

original: Jhānanti dutiyajjhānaṃ.

original: tassā uparidesanāya sambandhaṃ dassetuṃ “dvemā, bhikkhave, pariyesanāti ko anusandhī”ti

original: “amosadhammaṃ nibbāna”ntiādīsu viya pakatipariyāyo. Jāyanasabhāvoti jāyanapakatikoti

analyzed: atthaḥ sesa padesu pi esa iva nayaḥ

original: Sabbatthāti yathā “puttabhariya”nti dvandasamāsavasena ekattaṃ, esa nayo sabbattha

original: “dāsidāsa”ntiādīsu sabbapadesu. Parato vikāraṃ anāpajjitvā sabbadā jātarūpameva hotīti

original: upadhayo. Cutīsaṅkhātaṃ maraṇanti ekabhavapariyāpannaṃ khandhanirodhasaṅkhātaṃ maraṇamāha.

original: Khaṇikanirodho pana khaṇe khaṇe. Tenāha “sattānaṃ viyā”ti. Saṃkilissatīti dūsavisena

analyzed: ca ittha sabbassa api anindriya baddhassa gahaṇam daṭṭhabbam putta bhariyā ādi gahaṇena

original: viya mittāmaccādiggahaṇaṃ.
analyzed: viya mitta amacca ādi ggahaṇam

original: 275. Ariyehi pariyesanā, ariyānaṃ pariyesanāti vā ariyapariyesanāti samāsadvayaṃ dasseti “ayaṃ, bhikkhave”tiādinā.
analyzed: ariyehi pariyesanā ariyānam pariyesanā ati vā ariya pariyesanā ati samāsa dvayam dasseti ayam bhikkhave ti ādinā

original: 276. Mūlato paṭṭhāyāti yaṃ mahābhinikkhamanassa mūlabhāvesuādīnavadassanaṃ, tato
analyzed: mūlataḥ paṭṭhāya ati yam mahā abhinikkhamanassa mūla bhāvesu ādīnava dassanam tatas

original: paṭṭhāya. Yasmā te bhikkhū tattha mahābhinikkhamanakathāya sannisinnā, sā ca nesaṃ
analyzed: paṭṭhāya yasmā te bhikkhū tattha mahā abhinikkhamana kathāya sannisinnā sā ca nesam

original: antarākathā vippakatā, tasmā bhagavā tesaṃ mūlato paṭṭhāya mahābhinikkhamanakathaṃ
analyzed: antarākathā vippakatā tasmā bhagavā tesam mūlataḥ paṭṭhāya mahā abhinikkhamana katham

original: kathetuṃ ārabhi. Ahampi pubbeti visesavacanaṃ aparipakkañāṇena sayaṃ carimabhave
analyzed: kathetum ārabhi aham pi pubba iti visesa vacanam aparipakka ñāṇena sayam carima bhave

original: tīsu pāsādesu tividhanāṭakaparivārassa dibbasampattisadisāya mahāsampattiyā anubhavanaṃ,
analyzed: tīsu pāsādesu tividha nāṭaka parivārassa dibba sampatti sadisāya mahā sampattiyā anubhavanaṃ

original: abhinikkhamitvā padhānapadahanavasena attakilamathānuyogañca sandhāyāha. Anariyapariyesanaṃ
analyzed: abhinikkhamitvā padhāna padahana vasena atta kilamatha anuyogam ca sandhāya āha anariya pariyesanam

original: pariyesinti etthāpi eseva nayo. Pañcavaggiyāpīti yathāsakaṃ gihibhogaṃ anuyuttā taṃ
analyzed: ettha api esā iva nayo pañcavaggiyā api iti yathāsakam gihi bhogam anuyuttā tam

original: pahāya pabbajitvā attakilamathānuyoge ṭhitā satthu dhammacakkapavattanadesanāya tampi
analyzed: pahāya pabbajitvā atta kilamatha anuyoge ṭhitā satthu dhammacakka pavattana desanāya tam pi

original: pahāya ariyapariyesanaṃ pariyesiṃsūti.
analyzed: pahāya ariya pariyesanam pariyesiṃsu iti

original: 277. Kāmaṃ dahara-saddo “daharaṃ kumāraṃ mandaṃ uttānaseyyaka”nti ettha bāladārake
analyzed: kāmam dahara saddaḥ daharam kumāram mandam ettha bāla dārake

original: āgato, “bhadrena yobbanena samannāgato”ti pana vakkhamānattā yuvāvatthā idha dahara-saddena
analyzed: āgataḥ bhadrena yobbanena samannāgataḥ ti pana idha dahara saddena

original: vuttāti āha “taruṇova samāno”ti. Paṭhamavayena ekūnatiṃsavayattā. Jātiyā hi yāva
analyzed: vuttā iti āha taruṇaḥ uva samānaḥ ti paṭhama vayena ekūnatiṃsa vayattā jātiyā hi

original: tettiṃsavayā paṭhamavayo. Anādaratthe sāmivacanaṃ yathā “devadattassa rudantassa
analyzed: tettiṃsavayā paṭhama vayaḥ an ādara tthe sāmi vacanam yathā devadattassa rudantassa

original: pabbajī”ti. Kāmaṃ assumuccanaṃ rodanaṃ, taṃ assumukhānanti iminā pakāsitaṃ, taṃ pana
analyzed: pabbajī ti kāmam assumuccanam rodanam tam assumukhānam ti iminā pakāsitam tam pana

original: vatvā “rudantāna”nti vacanaṃ balavasokasamuṭṭhānaṃ ārodanavatthuṃ pakāsetīti āha
analyzed: vatvā vacanam balava soka samuṭṭhānam ārodana vatthum pakāseti iti āha

original: “kanditvā rodamānāna”nti. Kiṃ kusalanti gavesamānoti kinti sabbaso avajjarahitaṃ
analyzed: kanditvā kim kusalanti gavesamānaḥ iti kim ti sabbaso avajja rahitam

original: ekanta niyyānikaṃ pariyesamāno. Varapadanti vaṭṭadukkhanissaraṇatthikehi ekantena
analyzed: ekanta niyyānikam pariyesamānaḥ vara padanti vaṭṭa dukkha nissaraṇa atthikehi ekantena

original: varaṇīyaṭṭhena varaṃ, pajjitabbaṭṭhena padaṃ. Tuṅgasarīratāya dīgho, piṅgalacakkhutāya
analyzed: varaṇīya ṭṭhena varam pajjitabba ṭṭhena padam tuṅga sarīra tāya dīghaḥ piṅgala cakkhu tāya

original: piṅgaloti dīghapiṅgalo. Dhammoti vinayo, samayoti attho. Sutvāva uggaṇhinti tena
analyzed: piṅgalo ti dīghapiṅgalo dhammo ti vinayo samayo ti attho sutvā va uggaṇhinti tena

original: vuccamānassa savanamatteneva uggaṇhiṃ vācuggataṃ akāsiṃ.
analyzed: vuccamānassa savana mattena iva uggaṇhim vācuggatam akāsim

original: Paṭilapanamattakenāti puna lapanamattakena. Jānātīti ñāṇo, ñāṇoti vādo ñāṇavādo,
analyzed: paṭilapana mattakena ati puna lapana mattakena jānāti iti ñāṇaḥ ñāṇaḥ iti vādaḥ ñāṇa vādaḥ

original: taṃ ñāṇavādaṃ. “Vadāmī”ti āgatattā aṭṭhakathāyaṃ “jānāmī”ti uttamapurisavasena attho
analyzed: tam ñāṇa vādam vadāmi iti āgata ttā aṭṭhakathā ayam jānāmi iti uttamapurisa vasena attho

original: vutto. Aññepi bahūti aññepi bahū mama tathābhāvaṃ jānantā “ayaṃ imaṃ dhammaṃ jānātī”ti,
analyzed: vuttaḥ aññe api bahū iti aññe api bahū mama tathābhāvam jānantā ayam imam dhammam jānāti iti

original: “akampanīyatāya thiro”ti vā evaṃ vadanti. Lābhīti aññāsīti dhammassa uddisanena mahāpaññatāya
analyzed: a kampanīya tāya thiraḥ ti vā evam vadanti lābhī iti aññāsi iti dhammassa uddisanena mahā pañña tāya

original: “ayaṃ attanā gatamaggaṃ pavedeti, na anussutiko”ti aññāsi. Assāti bodhisattassa.
analyzed: ayam attanā gata maggam pavedeti na anussutiko ti aññāsi assa ati bodhisattassa

original: Etadahosīti etaṃ “na kho āḷāro kālāmo”tiādi manasi ahosi, cintesīti attho.
analyzed: etat ahosi iti etam na kho āḷāro kālāmo tiādi manasi ahosi cintesi iti attho

original: Heṭṭhimasamāpattīhi vinā uparimasamāpattīnaṃ sampādanassa asambhavato “satta samāpattiyo
analyzed: heṭṭhima samāpattīhi vinā uparima samāpattīnam sampādanassa asambhavataḥ satta samāpattiyaḥ

original: maṃ jānāpesī”ti āha. Payogaṃ kareyyanti bhāvanaṃ anuyuñjeyyanti attho. Evamāhāti
analyzed: mam āha payogam kareyyanti bhāvanam anuyuñjeyyanti evam āha ati

original: evaṃ “ahaṃ, āvuso”tiādimāha, sattannaṃ samāpattīnaṃ adhigamaṃ paccaññāsīti attho.
analyzed: evam aham āvuso tiādim āha sattannam samāpattīnam adhigamam paccaññāsi iti attho

original: Anusūyakoti anissukī. Tena mahāpurise pasādaṃ pavedesi. Bodhisattassa tā samāpattiyo
analyzed: anusūyakā uti anissukī tena mahā purise pasādam pavedesi bodhisattassa tā samāpattiyaḥ

original: nibbattetvā ṭhitassa purimajātiparicayena ñāṇassa ca mahantatāya tāsaṃ gati ca abhisamparāyo
analyzed: nibbattetvā ṭhitassa purima jāti paricayena ñāṇassa ca mahanta tāya tāsam gati ca abhisamparāyaḥ

original: ca upaṭṭhāsi. Tena “vaṭṭapariyāpannā evetā”ti nicchayo udapādi. Tenāha “nāyaṃ dhammo
analyzed: ca upaṭṭhāsi tena vaṭṭa pariyāpannā nicchayaḥ udapādi tena āha na ayam dhammo

original: nibbidāyā”tiādi. Ekaccānaṃ virāgabhāvanāsamatikkamāvahopi neva tesampi accantāya
analyzed: nibbidāya ati ādi na iva tesam pi accantāya

original: samatikkamāvaho, sayañca vaṭṭapariyāpannoyeva, tasmā neva vaṭṭe nibbindanatthāya,
analyzed: sayam ca vaṭṭa pariyāpannaḥ yā iva tasmā na iva vaṭṭe nibbindana tthāya

original: yadaggena na nibbidāya, tadaggena na virajjanatthāya, rāgādīnaṃ pāpadhammānaṃ na
analyzed: yad aggena na nibbidāya tad aggena na virajjana tthāya rāga ādīnam pāpa dhammānam na

original: nirujjhanatthāya, na upasamatthāya, tasmā taṃ abhiññeyyadhammaṃ na abhijānanatthāya…pe…

original: saṃvattatīti yojanā.
analyzed: saṃvattati iti yojanā

original: Yāvadeva ākiñcaññāyatanupapattiyāti sattasu samāpattīsu ukkaṭṭhaṃ gahetvā vadati.
analyzed: yāvat eva ākiñcaññāyatana upapattiyā ti sattasu samāpattīsu ukkaṭṭham gahetvā vadati

original: Uṭṭhāya samuṭṭhāya acutidhammaṃ pariyesituṃ yuttattā tañca anatikkantajātidhammamevāti
analyzed: uṭṭhāya samuṭṭhāya acuti dhammam pariyesitum yutta ttā tat ca an atikkanta jāti dhammam eva ati

analyzed: gatiñca abhisamparāyañca abbhaññāsi tatas paṭṭhāya makkhikā vasena ati bhojanassa makkhikā missa tā vasena

original: hi antimabhavikabodhisattānaṃ samāpattinibbattane bhāriyaṃ nāma. Analaṅkaritvāti

original: anu anu alaṃkatvā punappunaṃ “iminā na kiñci payojana”nti katvā.
analyzed: anu anu alaṃkatvā punappunaṃ iminā na kiñci katvā

original: 278. Vācāya uggahitamattovāti ettha pubbe vuttanayānusārena attho veditabbo.
analyzed: vācāya uggahita mattaḥ uvā ti ettha pubbe vutta naya anusārena atthaḥ veditabbaḥ

original: 279. Mahāvelā viya mahāvelā, vipulavālikapuñjatāya mahanto velātaṭo viyāti attho.
analyzed: mahā velā viya mahā velā vipula vālika puñja tāya mahantaḥ velā taṭaḥ viya attho

original: Tenāha “mahāvālikarāsīti attho”ti. Uru maru sikatā vālukā vaṇṇu vālikāti ime saddā

original: samānatthā, byañjanameva nānaṃ.
analyzed: samānatthāḥ byañjanam eva nānam

original: Senā nigacchi nivisi etthāti senānigamo, senāya niviṭṭhaṭṭhānaṃ. Senānigāmoti pana

original: Idha pana bodhipallaṅko adhippeto ariyapariyesanāya vuccamānattā.
analyzed: idha pana bodhi pallaṅkaḥ adhippetaḥ ariya pariyesanāya vuccamāna ttā

original: 280. “Ñāṇadassana”nti ca ekajjhaṃ gahitapadadvayavisayavisesassa anāmaṭṭhattā “me”ti
analyzed: ñāṇa dassanam ti ca ekajjham gahita pada dvaya visaya visesassa a nāmaṭṭha ttā mā iti

original: na dassanamattanti āha “sabbadhammadassanasamatthañca me sabbaññutaññāṇaṃ udapādī”ti.

original: Akuppatāyāti vimokkhantatāya sabbaso paṭipakkhadhammehi asaṅkhobhanīyatāya. Tenāha
analyzed: akuppa tāya ati vimokkha anta tāya sabbaso paṭipakkha dhammehi a saṅkhobhanīya tāya tena āha

original: “rāgādīhi na kuppatī”ti. Ārammaṇasantatāyapi tadārammaṇānaṃ atthi viseso yathā taṃ

original: “āneñjavihāre”ti āha “akuppārammaṇatāya cā”ti. Paccavekkhaṇañāṇampīti na kevalaṃ

original: sabbaññutaññāṇameva, atha kho yathādhigate paṭivedhasaddhamme ekūnavīsatividhapaccavekkhaṇañāṇampi.

original: 281. Paṭividdhoti sayambhuñāṇena “idaṃ dukkha”ntiādinā paṭimukhaṃ nibbijjhanavasena

original: patto, yathābhūtaṃ avabuddhoti attho. Gambhīroti mahāsamuddo viya makasatuṇḍasūciyā
analyzed: pattaḥ yathābhūtam avabuddhaḥ ti atthaḥ gambhīraḥ iti mahā samuddaḥ viya makasa tuṇḍa sūciyā

original: aññatra samupacitaparipakkañāṇasambhārehi aññesaṃ ñāṇena alabbhaneyyapatiṭṭho. Tenāha
analyzed: aññatra samupacita paripakka ñāṇa sambhārehi aññesam ñāṇena a labbha neyya patiṭṭho tena āha

original: “uttānabhāvapaṭikkhepavacanameta”nti. Yo alabbhaneyyapatiṭṭho, so ogāhitumasakkuṇeyyatāya

original: kicchena kenacideva daṭṭhabbo. Yaṃ pana daṭṭhumeva na sakkā, tassa ogāhetvā anu anu
analyzed: kicchena kenacid eva daṭṭhabbaḥ yam pana daṭṭhum eva na sakkā tassa ogāhetvā anu anu

original: bujjhane kathā eva natthīti āha “duddasattāva duranubodho”ti. Dukkhena avabujjhitabbo
analyzed: bujjhane kathā eva natthi iti āha duddasa ttā va duranubodhaḥ ti dukkhena avabujjhitabbo

original: avabodhassa dukkarabhāvato. Imasmiṃ ṭhāne – “taṃ kiṃ maññatha, bhikkhave, katamaṃ
analyzed: avabodhassa dukkara bhāvato imasmin ṭhāne tam kim maññatha bhikkhave katamam

original: nu kho dukkarataraṃ vā durabhisambhavataraṃ vā”ti suttapadaṃ vattabbaṃ. Santārammaṇatāya
analyzed: nu kho dukkarataram vā durabhisambhavataram vā ati sutta padam vattabbam santa ārammaṇa tāya

original: vā santo. Nibbutasabbapariḷāhatāya nibbuto. Padhānabhāvaṃ nītoti vā paṇīto. Atittikaraṭṭhena
analyzed: vā santaḥ nibbuta sabba pariḷāha tāya nibbutaḥ padhāna bhāvam nītaḥ iti vā paṇītaḥ a tittika raṭṭhena

original: atappako sādurasabhojanaṃ viya. Ettha ca nirodhasaccaṃ santaṃ ārammaṇanti santārammaṇaṃ,
analyzed: atappakaḥ sādu rasa bhojanam viya ettha ca nirodha saccam santam ārammaṇanti santa ārammaṇam

original: maggasaccaṃ santaṃ santārammaṇañcāti santārammaṇaṃ. Anupasantasabhāvānaṃ kilesānaṃ

original: saṅkhārānañca abhāvato nibbutasabbapariḷāhatāya santapaṇītabhāveneva ca asecanakatāya
analyzed: abhāvataḥ nibbuta sabba pariḷāha tāya santa paṇīta bhāvena iva ca asecanaka tāya

original: atappakatā daṭṭhabbā. Tenāha “idaṃ dvayaṃ lokuttarameva sandhāya vutta”nti. Uttamañāṇavisayattā
analyzed: atappaka tā daṭṭhabbā tena āha idam dvayam lokuttaram eva sandhāya vuttam ti uttama ñāṇa visaya ttā

original: na takkena avacaritabbo, tato eva nipuṇañāṇagocaratāya ca saṇho. Sukhumasabhāvattā
analyzed: na takkena avacaritabbo tatas eva nipuṇa ñāṇa gocara tāya ca saṇhaḥ sukhuma sabhāvattā

original: ca nipuṇo, bālānaṃ avisayattā paṇḍitehi eva veditabboti paṇḍitavedanīyo. Ālīyanti

original: abhiramitabbaṭṭhena sevīyantīti ālayā, pañca kāmaguṇā. Ālayanti allīyantī abhiramaṇavasena

original: sevantīti ālayā, taṇhāvicaritāni. Ramantīti ratiṃ vindanti kīḷanti laḷanti. Ālayaratāti ālayaniratā.
analyzed: sevanti iti ālayā taṇhā vicaritāni ramanti iti ratim vindanti kīḍanti laḷanti ālaya ratā ati ālaya niratā

original: Ṭhānaṃ sandhāyāti ṭhāna-saddaṃ sandhāya. Atthato pana ṭhānanti ca paṭiccasamuppādo
analyzed: ṭhānam sandhāya ati ṭhāna saddam sandhāya atthato pana ṭhānam ti ca paṭiccasamuppādaḥ

original: eva adhippeto. Tiṭṭhati phalaṃ tadāyattavuttitāyāti ṭhānaṃ, saṅkhārādīnaṃ paccayabhūtā
analyzed: eva adhippetaḥ tiṭṭhati phalam tad āyatta vutti tāya ati ṭhānam saṅkhāra ādīnam paccaya bhūtā

original: avijjādayo. Imesaṃ saṅkhārādīnaṃ paccayāti idappaccayā, avijjādayova. Idappaccayā
analyzed: avijjā ādayaḥ imesam saṅkhāra ādīnam paccayā ati idappaccayā avijjā ādayaḥ idappaccayā

original: eva idappaccayatā yathā “devo eva devatā”ti, idappaccayānaṃ vā avijjādīnaṃ attano
analyzed: eva idappaccaya tā yathā devaḥ eva devatā ati idappaccayānam vā avijjā ādīnam attanaḥ

original: phalaṃ pati paccayabhāvo uppādanasamatthatā idappaccayatā. Tena samatthapaccayalakkhaṇo
analyzed: phalam pati paccaya bhāvaḥ uppādana samattha tā idappaccaya tā tena samattha paccaya lakkhaṇaḥ

original: paṭiccasamuppādo dassito hoti. Paṭicca samuppajjati phalaṃ etasmāti paṭiccasamuppādo.
analyzed: paṭiccasamuppādaḥ dassitaḥ hoti paṭicca samuppajjati phalam etasma ati paṭiccasamuppādaḥ

original: Padadvayenapi dhammānaṃ paccayaṭṭho eva vibhāvito. Tenāha “saṅkhārādipaccayānaṃ etaṃ

original: bahūyeva oḍḍeti, tasmā te cittena ekato gahetvā “pāsarāsī”ti vuttaṃ. Vāgurassa vā

original: pāsapadesānaṃ bahubhāvato “pāsarāsī”ti vuttaṃ.
analyzed: pāsa padesānam bahu bhāvato vuttam

original: Pāsarāsisuttavaṇṇanāya līnatthappakāsanā samattā.
7. Cūḷahatthipadopamasuttavaṇṇanā
288. Setaparivāroti setapaṭicchado, setavaṇṇālaṅkāroti attho. Pubbe pana “setālaṅkārā”ti
analyzed: seta parivāro ti seta paṭicchado seta vaṇṇa alaṅkāro ti attho pubbe pana seta alaṅkārā ti

original: assālaṅkāro gahito, idha cakkapañjarakubbarādirathāvayavesu kātabbālaṅkāro. Evaṃ
analyzed: assa alaṅkāraḥ gahitaḥ idha cakka pañjara kubbara ādi ratha avayavesu kātabba alaṅkāraḥ evam

original: vuttenāti evaṃ “setāya suda”ntiādinā pakārena saṃyuttamahāvagge vuttena. Nātimahā
analyzed: vuttena iti evam setāya su danti ādinā pakārena saṃyutta mahā vagge vuttena na ati mahā

original: yuddhamaṇḍale sañcārasukhatthaṃ. Yodho sārathīti dvinnaṃ, paharaṇadāyakena saddhiṃ tiṇṇaṃ vā.
analyzed: yuddha maṇḍale sañcāra sukha attham yodho sārathi iti dvinnam paharaṇa dāyakena saddhim tiṇṇam vā

original: Nagaraṃ padakkhiṇaṃ karoti nagarasobhanatthaṃ. Idaṃ kira tassa brāhmaṇassa jāṇussoṇiṭṭhānantaraṃ
analyzed: nagaram padakkhiṇam karoti nagara sobhana attham idam kira tassa brāhmaṇassa

original: jātisiddhaṃ paramparāgataṃ cārittaṃ. Tenāha “ito ettakehi divasehī”tiādi. Cārittavasena
analyzed: jāti siddham paramparā gatam cārittam tena āha itas ettakehi divasehi itiādi cāritta vasena

original: nagaravāsinopi tathā tathā paṭipajjanti. Puññavādimaṅgalakathane niyuttā māṅgalikā.
analyzed: nagara vāsinaḥ api tathā tathā paṭipajjanti puñña vādi maṅgala kathane niyuttā māṅgalikā

original: Suvatthipattanāya sovatthikā. Ādi-saddena vandīādīnaṃ saṅgaho. Yasasirisampattiyāti
analyzed: suvatthi pattanāya sovatthikā ādi saddena vandī ādīnam saṅgahaḥ yasa siri sampattiyā ati

original: yasasampattiyā sirisampattiyā ca, parivārasampattiyā ceva vibhavasobhāsampattiyā cāti attho.
analyzed: yasa sampattiyā siri sampattiyā ca parivāra sampattiyā ca iva vibhava sobhā sampattiyā ca ati attho

original: Nagarābhimukho pāyāsi attano bhikkhācāravelāya. Paṇḍito maññeti ettha maññeti idaṃ
analyzed: nagara abhimukhaḥ pāyāsi attanaḥ bhikkhā cāra velāya paṇḍitaḥ maññeti ettha maññeti idam

original: “maññatī”ti iminā samānatthaṃ nipātapadaṃ. Tassa iti-saddaṃ ānetvā atthaṃ dassento
analyzed: maññati iti iminā samāna ttham nipāta padam tassa iti saddam ānetvā attham dassento

original: “paṇḍitoti maññatī”ti āha. Anumatipucchāvasena cetaṃ vuttaṃ. Tenevāha “udāhu no”ti.
analyzed: paṇḍito ti maññati iti āha anumati pucchā vasena ca itam vuttam tena iva āha udāhu no ti

original: “Taṃ kiṃ maññati bhavaṃ vacchāyano samaṇassa gotamassa paññāveyyattiya”nti hi vuttamevatthaṃ
analyzed: tam kim maññati bhavam vacchāyanaḥ samaṇassa gotamassa hi vuttam evattham

original: puna gaṇhanto “paṇḍito maññe”ti āha. Tasmā vuttaṃ “bhavaṃ vacchāyano, samaṇaṃ gotamaṃ
analyzed: puna gaṇhantaḥ paṇḍitaḥ mañña iti āha tasmai vuttam bhavam vacchāyanaḥ samaṇam gotamam

original: paṇḍitoti maññati, udāhu no”ti, yathā te khameyya, tathā naṃ kathehīti adhippāyo.
analyzed: paṇḍito ti maññati udāhu no ti yathā te khameyya tathā nam kathehi iti adhippāyaḥ

original: Ahaṃ ko nāma, mama avisayo esoti dasseti. Ko cāti hetunissakke paccattavacananti
analyzed: aham kaḥ nāma mama avisayaḥ esa iti dasseti kaḥ ca ati hetu nissakke paccatta vacananti

original: āha “kuto cā”ti. Tathā cāha “kena kāraṇena jānissāmī”ti, yena kāraṇena samaṇassa

analyzed: gotamassa paññāveyyattiyam jāneyyam tam kāraṇam mayi na atthi iti adhippāyaḥ buddhaḥ yeva

original: bhaveyya, abuddhassa sabbathā buddhañāṇānubhāvaṃ jānituṃ na sakkāti. Vuttañhetaṃ

original: – “appamattakaṃ kho panetaṃ, bhikkhave, oramattakaṃ sīlamattakaṃ, yena puthujjano

original: tathāgatassa vaṇṇaṃ vadamāno vadeyya, atthi, bhikkhave, aññeva dhammā gambhīrā duddasā

original: duranubodhā …pe… yehi tathāgatassa yathābhuccaṃ vaṇṇaṃ sammā vadamāno vadeyyā”ti
analyzed: duranubodhā pe yehi tathāgatassa yathābhuccam vaṇṇam sammā vadamānaḥ vadeyya ati

original: ca. Etthāti “sopi nūnassa tādisovā”ti etasmiṃ pade. Pasattha pasatthoti pasatthehi
analyzed: ca ettha ati saḥ api nūnassa tādisaḥ uvā ati etasmin pade pasattha pasatthaḥ uti pasatthehi

original: attano guṇeheva so pasattho, na tassa kittinā, pasaṃsāsabhāveneva pāsaṃsoti attho.
analyzed: attanaḥ guṇehā iva saḥ pasatthaḥ na tassa kittinā pasaṃsā sabhāvena iva pāsaṃso ti atthaḥ

original: Tenāha “sabbaguṇāna”ntiādi. Maṇiratananti cakkavattino maṇiratanaṃ. Sadevake loke

original: pāsaṃsānampi pāsaṃsoti dassetuṃ “pasatthehi vā”ti dutiyavikappo gahito.
analyzed: pāsaṃsānam pi pāsaṃso ti dassetum pasatthehi vā ti dutiya vikappaḥ gahitaḥ

original: Araṇīyato attho, so eva vasatīti vasoti atthavaso, tassa tassa payogassa ānisaṃsabhūtaṃ

original: phalanti āha “atthavasanti atthānisaṃsa”nti. Attho vā vuttalakkhaṇo vaso etassāti

original: vasanako. Anuggahitasippoti asikkhitahatthisippo āyatavitthatassa padamattassa dassanena

original: Tāni hi tathāgatagandhahatthino desanāñāṇena akkantaṭṭhānāni. Cattārīti pana vineyyānaṃ

original: Vālanti anekadhā bhinnassa vālassa aṃsusaṅkhātaṃ vālaṃ. Bhindantā viyāti ghaṭādiṃ

original: Seyyoti uttamo, paramo lābhoti adhippāyo.
analyzed: seyyaḥ iti uttamaḥ paramaḥ lābho ti adhippāyo

original: ativiya dassanīyāti attho.

original: 290. Udāharīyati ubbegapītivasenāti, tathā vā udāharaṇaṃ udānaṃ. Tenāha “udāhāraṃ
analyzed: udāharīyati ubbega pīti vasena ati tathā vā udāharaṇam udānam tena āha udāhāram

original: udāharī”ti. Assa dhammassāti assa paṭipattisaddhammapubbakassa paṭivedhasaddhammassa.

original: Soti hatthipadopamo hatthipadopamabhāvena vuccamāno dhammo. Ettāvatāti ettakena paribbājakena

original: āha “na ettāvatā vitthārena paripūro hotī”ti. Yadi yathā vitthārena hatthipadopamo

original: 291. Āyāmatopīti pi-saddena ubbedhenapi rassāti dasseti. Nīcakāyā hi tā honti. Uccāti

analyzed: ayam vā ti ettha vā saddo yathā aññattha api ayam vā imesam samaṇa brāhmaṇānam

original: sabbabālo sabbamūḷho”tiādīsu.

original: Svāyanti idha-saddamattaṃ gaṇhāti, na yathāvisesitabbaṃ idha-saddaṃ. Tathā hi vakkhati
analyzed: idha sadda mattam gaṇhāti na yathā visesitabbam idha saddam tathā hi vakkhati

original: “katthaci padapūraṇamattamevā”ti. Lokaṃ upādāya vuccati loka-saddena samānādhikaraṇabhāvena

original: daṭṭhabbā. Okāsanti kañci padesaṃ indasālaguhāya adhippetattā. Padapūraṇamattameva

original: okāsāpadisanassapi asambhavato.
