original: tippakāresu koṭṭhāsesu. Na hi te tayo cattāro koṭṭhāsā.
analyzed: tippakāresu koṭṭhāsesu na hi te tayo cattāro koṭṭhāsā

original: Vuttappakārāti “kesā lomā”tiādinā vuttappakārā. Nānāsabhāvatoti satipi kakkhaḷabhāvasāmaññe
analyzed: vutta ppakārā ti kesāḥ loma āti ādinā vutta ppakārā nānā sabhāvato ti sati pi kakkhaḷa bhāva sāmaññe

original: sasambhāravibhattito pana kesādisaṅghātagatanānāsabhāvato. Ālayoti apekkhā. Nikantīti
analyzed: sa sambhāra vibhattito pana kesa ādi saṅghāta gata nānā sabhāvataḥ ālayo ti apekkhā nikanti iti

original: nikāmanā. Patthanāti taṇhāpatthanā. Pariyuṭṭhānanti taṇhāpariyuṭṭhānaṃ. Gahaṇanti
analyzed: nikāmanā patthanā ati taṇhā patthanā pariyuṭṭhānanti taṇhā pariyuṭṭhānam gahaṇanti

original: kāmupādānaṃ. Parāmāsoti parato āmasanā micchābhiniveso. Na balavā ālayādi. Yadi evaṃ
analyzed: kāma upādānam paratas āmasanā micchā abhinivesaḥ na balavā ālaya ādi yadi evam

original: kasmā vibhaṅge bāhirāpi pathavīdhātu vitthāreneva vibhattāti? Yathādhammadesanattā
analyzed: kasmai vibhaṅge bāhirā api pathavī dhātu vitthārena iva vibhattā ati yathā dhamma desanattā

original: tattha vitthāreneva desanā pavattā, yathānulomadesanattā panettha vuttanayena desanā saṃkhittā.
analyzed: tattha vitthārena iva desanā pavattā yathā anuloma desanattā pana ittha vutta nayena desanā saṃkhittā

original: Yojetvā dassetīti ekajjhaṃ katvā dasseti. Sāti ajjhattikā pathavīdhātu. Sukhapariggaho
analyzed: yojetvā dasseti iti ekajjham katvā dasseti sā ati ajjhattikā pathavī dhātu sukha pariggaho

original: hoti “na me so attā”ti. Siddhe hi anattalakkhaṇe dukkhalakkhaṇaṃ aniccalakkhaṇañca
analyzed: hoti na me so attā ati siddhe hi anatta lakkhaṇe dukkha lakkhaṇam anicca lakkhaṇañca

original: siddhameva hoti saṅkhatadhammesu tadavinābhāvatoti. Visūkāyatīti visūkaṃ virūpakiriyaṃ
analyzed: siddham eva hoti saṅkhata dhammesu tad avinābhāvato ti visūkāyati iti visūkam virūpa kiriyam

original: pavatteti. Sā pana atthato vipphandanamevāti āha “vipphandatī”ti. Assāti ajjhattikāya
analyzed: pavattā iti sā pana atthataḥ vipphandanam eva ati āha vipphandati iti assa āti ajjhattikāya

original: pathavīdhātuyā. Acetanābhāvo pākaṭo hoti dhātumattatāya dassanato. Taṃ ubhayampīti
analyzed: pathavī dhātuyāḥ acetanā bhāvo pākaṭaḥ hoti dhātumattatāya dassanato tam ubhayam pi iti

original: taṃ pathavīdhātudvayampi.
analyzed: tam pathavī dhātu dvayam pi

original: Tato visesatarenāti tato bāhiramahāpathavito visesavantatarena, lahutarenāti attho.
analyzed: tatas visesatarena ati tatas bāhira mahā pathavitaḥ visesavantatarena lahutarena ati attho

original: Kuppatīti luppati. Vilīyamānāti pakatiudake loṇaṃ viya vilayaṃ gacchantī. Udakānugatāti
analyzed: kuppati iti luppati vilīyamānā ati pakati udake loṇam viya vilayam gacchantī udaka anugatā iti

original: udakaṃ anugatā udakagatikā. Tenāha “udakameva hotī”ti. Abhāvo eva abhāvatā, na bhavatīti
analyzed: udakam anugatā udakagatikā tena āha udakam eva hoti iti abhāvaḥ eva abhāva tā na bhavati iti

original: vā abhāvo, tathāsabhāvo dhammo. Tassa bhāvo abhāvatā. Vayo vināso dhammo sabhāvo
analyzed: vā abhāvo tathā asabhāvaḥ dhammo tassa bhāvaḥ abhāva tā vayaḥ vināsaḥ dhammo sabhāvaḥ

original: etassāti vayadhammo, tassa bhāvo vayadhammatā, atthato khayo eva. Sesapadesupi eseva
analyzed: etassa ati vaya dhammo tassa bhāvaḥ vaya dhamma tā atthataḥ khayaḥ eva sesa padesu pi esā iva

original: nayo. Tenāha “sabbehipi imehi padehi aniccalakkhaṇameva vutta”nti. Viddhaṃsanabhāvassa
analyzed: nayo tena āha sabbehi pi imehi padehi anicca lakkhaṇam eva vuttan ti viddhaṃsana bhāvassa

original: pana paveditabbattā kāmaṃ aniccalakkhaṇameva vuttaṃ sarūpato, itarānipi atthato vuttānevāti
analyzed: pana paveditabba ttā kāmam anicca lakkhaṇam eva vuttam sarūpataḥ itarāni api atthataḥ vuttān eva ati

original: dassento āha “yaṃ panā”tiādi.
analyzed: āha yam pana atiādi

original: Mattaṃ khaṇamattaṃ tiṭṭhatīti mattaṭṭho, appamattaṭṭho mattaṭṭhako, atiittarakhaṇikoti
analyzed: mattam khaṇa mattam tiṭṭhati iti matta ṭṭhaḥ appamatta ṭṭhaḥ matta ṭṭhako atiittarakhaṇiko ti

original: attho. Tenāha “parittaṭṭhitikassā”ti. Ṭhitiparittatāyāti ekacittapavattimattatāṭhānalakkhaṇassa
analyzed: attho tena āha paritta ṭṭhitikassa ati ṭhiti paritta tāya ati eka citta pavatti matta tā ṭhāna lakkhaṇassa

original: itarabhāvena. Ekassa cittassa pavattikkhaṇamatteneva hi sattānaṃ paramatthato jīvanakkhaṇo
analyzed: itara bhāvena ekassa cittassa pavatti kkhaṇa mattena iva hi sattānam paramatthataḥ jīvana kkhaṇaḥ

original: paricchinno. Tenāha “ayaṃ hī”tiādi.
analyzed: tena āha ayam hi itiādi

original: Jīvitanti jīvitindriyaṃ. Sukhadukkhāti sukhadukkhā vedanā. Upekkhāpi hi sukhadukkhāsveva
analyzed: jīvitanti jīvitindriyam sukha dukkhā ati sukha dukkhāḥ vedanāḥ upekkhā api hi sukha dukkhāsu eva

original: antogadhā iṭṭhāniṭṭhabhāvato. Attabhāvoti jīvitavedanāviññāṇāni ṭhapetvā avasiṭṭhadhammā
analyzed: antogadhāḥ iṭṭha aniṭṭha bhāvataḥ atta bhāvaḥ ti jīvita vedanā viññāṇāni ṭhapetvā avasiṭṭha dhammā

original: vuttā. Kevalāti attaniccabhāvena avomissā. Ekacittasamāyuttāti ekena cittena sahitā
analyzed: vuttā kevalā ati atta nicca bhāvena avomissā eka citta samāyuttā ati ekena cittena sahitā

original: ekacittakkhaṇikā. Lahuso vattate khaṇoti tāya eva ekakkhaṇikatāya lahuko atiittaro
analyzed: eka citta khaṇikā lahusaḥ vattate khaṇoti tāya eva eka khaṇika tāya lahukaḥ ati ittaraḥ

original: jīvitādīnaṃ khaṇo vattati vītivattatīti attho. Idanti gāthāvacanaṃ.
analyzed: jīvita ādīnam khaṇaḥ vattati vītivattati iti atthaḥ idam ti gāthā vacanam

original: Yasmā sattānaṃ jīvitaṃ assāsapassāsānaṃ aparāparasañcaraṇaṃ labhamānameva pavattati,
analyzed: yasmai sattānam jīvitam assāsa passāsānam apara apara sañcaraṇam labhamānam eva pavattati

original: na alabhamānaṃ, tasmā assāsapassāsūpanibaddhaṃ. Tathā mahābhūtānaṃ samavuttitaṃ labhamānameva
analyzed: na a labhamānam tasmai assāsa passāsu upanibaddham tathā mahābhūtānam samavuttitaḥ labhamānam eva

original: pavattati. Pathavīdhātuyā hi āpodhātuādīnaṃ vā aññatarapakopena balasampannopi puriso
analyzed: pavattati pathavī dhātuyā hi āpodhātu ādīnam vā aññatara pakopena bala sampannaḥ api purisaḥ

original: patthaddhakāyo vā, atisārādivasena kilinnapūtikāyo vā, mahāḍāhapareto vā, sañchijjamānasandhibandhano
analyzed: patthaddha kāyaḥ vā atisāra ādi vasena kilinna pūti kāyaḥ vā mahā ḍāha paretaḥ vā sañchijjamāna sandhibandhanaḥ

original: vā hutvā jīvitakkhayaṃ pāpuṇāti. Kabaḷīkārāhārānaṃ yuttakāle labhantasseva jīvitaṃ
analyzed: vā hutvā jīvita khayam pāpuṇāti yutta kāle labhantassa iva jīvitaṃ

original: pavattati, alabhantassa parikkhayaṃ gacchati, viññāṇe pavattamāneyeva ca jīvitaṃ
analyzed: pavattati a labhantassa parikkhayam gacchati viññāṇe pavattamānā iya iva ca jīvitam

original: pavattati, na tasmiṃ appavattamāne. Jīvitanti ettha iti-saddena iriyāpathūpanibaddhatāsītuṇhūpanibaddhatādīnaṃ
analyzed: pavattati na tasmin appavattamāne jīvitan ti ettha iti saddena iriyāpathu upanibaddha tā sītuṇhu upanibaddha tā ādīnam

original: saṅgaho. Catunnañhi iriyāpathānaṃ samavuttitaṃ labhamānameva jīvitaṃ pavattati, aññatarassa
analyzed: saṅgahaḥ catunnam hi iriyāpathānam samavuttitam labhamānam eva jīvitam pavattati aññatarassa

original: pana adhimattatāya āyusaṅkhārā upacchijjanti, sītuṇhānampi samavuttitaṃ labhamānameva
analyzed: pana adhimatta tāya āyu saṅkhārāḥ upacchijjanti sītuṇhānam pi sama vutti tam labhamānam eva

original: pavattati, atisītena pana atiuṇhena vā abhibhūtassa vipajjatīti.
analyzed: pavattati ati sītena pana ati uṇhena vā abhibhūtassa vipajjati iti

original: Taṇhupādinnassāti iminā hi paccayuppannatākittanena sarasapabhaṅgutaṃyeva vibhāveti.
analyzed: taṇhupādinnassa ati iminā hi paccaya uppanna tā kittanena vibhāveti

original: Dukkhānupassanāya taṇhāggāhassa aniccānupassanāya mānaggāhassa anattānupassanāya
analyzed: dukkha anupassanāya taṇhā ggāhassa anicca anupassanāya māna ggāhassa anatta anupassanāya

original: diṭṭhiggāhassa ujuvipaccanīkabhāvato ekaṃseneva tīhi anupassanāhi gāhāpi vigacchantīti
analyzed: diṭṭhi ggāhassa uju vipaccanīka bhāvataḥ ekaṃsena iva tīhi anupassanāhi gāhā api vigacchanti iti

original: āha “noteva hotī”ti. Ekaṃyeva āgataṃ bāhirāya pathavīdhātuyā antaradhānadassanapavattajotanāya.
analyzed: āha notā iva hoti iti ekaṃyā iva āgatam bāhirāya pathavī dhātuyā antaradhāna dassana pavatta jotanāya

original: Pariggahanti dhātupariggahaṇaṃ. Paṭṭhapentoti ārabhanto desento. Sotadvāre balaṃ
analyzed: pariggahanti dhātu pariggahaṇam paṭṭhapento ti ārabhanto desento sotadvāre balam

original: dassetīti yojanā. Kammaṭṭhānikassa baladassanāpadesena kammaṭṭhānassa ānubhāvaṃ dasseti.
analyzed: dasseti iti yojanā kammaṭṭhānikassa bala dassana apadesena kammaṭṭhānassa ānubhāvam dasseti

original: Vācāya ghaṭṭanameva vuttaṃ sotadvāre baladassanabhāvato. Balanti ca bāhirāya viya
analyzed: vācāya ghaṭṭanam eva vuttam sota dvāre bala dassana bhāvataḥ ca bāhirāya viya

original: ajjhattikāyapi pathavīdhātuyā acetanābhāvadassanena rukkhassa viya akkosantepi paharantepi
analyzed: ajjhattikāya api pathavī dhātuyā acetanā bhāva dassanena rukkhassa viya akkosante pi paharante pi

original: nibbikāratā. Sampativattamānuppannabhāvenāti tadā paccuppannabhāvena. Samudācāruppannabhāvenāti
analyzed: nibbikāra tā sampativattamā anuppanna bhāvena ati tadā paccuppanna bhāvena samudācāra uppanna bhāvena ati

original: āpāthagate tasmiṃ aniṭṭhe saddārammaṇe ārammaṇakaraṇasaṅkhātauppattivasena sotadvāre
analyzed: āpātha gate tasmin aniṭṭhe sadda ārammaṇe ārammaṇa karaṇa saṅkhāta auppatti vasena sota dvāre

original: javanavedanā dukkhāti vacanato. Tathā hi “upanissayavasenā”ti vuttaṃ. Vedanādayopīti
analyzed: javana vedanā dukkhā ti vacanato tathā hi upanissaya vasena ati vuttam vedanā ādayaḥ api iti

original: “vedanā aniccā”ti ettha vuttavedanā ceva saññādayo ca. Te hi phassena samānabhūmikā
analyzed: vedanā aniccā ati ettha vutta vedanā ca iva saññā ādayo ca te hi phassena samāna bhūmikā

original: na pubbe vuttavedanā. Dhātusaṅkhātameva ārammaṇanti yathāpariggahitaṃ pathavīdhātusaṅkhātameva
analyzed: na pubbe vutta vedanā dhātu saṅkhātam eva ārammaṇanti yathā pariggahitam pathavī dhātu saṅkhātam eva

original: visayaṃ. Pakkhandatīti vipassanācittaṃ aniccantipi dukkhantipi anattātipi sammasanavasena
analyzed: visayam pakkhandati iti vipassanā cittam aniccan tipi dukkhan tipi anattā atipi sammasana vasena

original: anupavisati. Etena bahiddhāvikkhepābhāvamāha, pasīdatīti pana iminā kammaṭṭhānassa
analyzed: anupavisati etena bahiddhā vikkhepa abhāvam āha pasīdati iti pana iminā kammaṭṭhānassa

original: vīthipaṭipannataṃ. Santiṭṭhatīti iminā uparūpari visesāvahabhāvena avatthānaṃ paṭipakkhābhibhavena
analyzed: vīthi paṭipanna tam santiṭṭhati iti iminā upari upari visesa āvaha bhāvena avatthānam paṭipakkha abhibhavena

original: niccalabhāvato. Vimuccatīti iminā taṇhāmānadiṭṭhiggāhato visesena muccanaṃ. Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ
analyzed: niccala bhāvataḥ vimuccati iti iminā taṇhā māna diṭṭhi ggāhataḥ visesena muccanam aṭṭhakathāyam

original: pana samuṭṭhānavasena attho vutto “adhimokkhaṃ labhatī”ti. Sotadvāramhi ārammaṇe
analyzed: pana samuṭṭhāna vasena attho vutto adhimokkham labhati iti sota dvāramhi ārammaṇe

original: āpāthagateti idaṃ mūlapariññāya mūladassanaṃ. Sotadvārehi āvajjanavoṭṭhabbanānaṃ
analyzed: āpātha gatā iti idam mūla pariññāya mūla dassanam sota dvārehi āvajjana voṭṭhabba nānam

original: ayoniso āvajjayato voṭṭhabbanavasena iṭṭhe ārammaṇe lobho, aniṭṭhe ca paṭigho uppajjati,
analyzed: ayonisaḥ āvajjayataḥ voṭṭhabbana vasena iṭṭhe ārammaṇe lobhaḥ aniṭṭhe ca paṭighaḥ uppajjati

original: manodvāre pana “itthī, puriso”ti rajjanādi hoti, tassa pañcadvārajavanaṃ mūlaṃ, sabbaṃ
analyzed: manaḥ dvāre pana itthī puriso ti rajjana ādi hoti tassa pañca dvāra javanam mūlam sabbam

original: vā bhavaṅgādi. Evaṃ manodvārajavanassa mūlavasena pariññā. Āgantukatāvakālikapariññā
analyzed: vā bhavaṅga ādi evam manaḥ dvāra javanassa mūla vasena pariññā āgantuka tāvakālika pariññā

original: pana pañcadvārajavanasseva apubbabhāvavasena itarabhāvavasena ca veditabbā. Ayamettha
analyzed: pana pañca dvāra javanassa iva apubba bhāva vasena itara bhāva vasena ca veditabbā ayam ettha

original: saṅkhepo, vitthāro pana satipaṭṭhānasaṃvaṇṇanāyaṃ vutto eva.
analyzed: saṅkhepaḥ vitthāraḥ pana sati paṭṭhāna saṃvaṇṇanāyam vuttaḥ eva

original: Yāthāvato dhātūnaṃ pariggaṇhanavasena katapariggahassapi anādikālabhāvanāvasena ayoniso
analyzed: yāthāvataḥ dhātūnam pariggaṇhana vasena kata pariggahassa api anādi kāla bhāvanā vasena ayonisaḥ

original: āvajjanaṃ sacepi uppajjati. Voṭṭhabbanaṃ patvāti voṭṭhabbanakiccataṃ patvā. Ekaṃ
analyzed: āvajjanam sace pi uppajjati voṭṭhabbanam patvā ati voṭṭhabbana kiccataṃ patvā ekam

original: dve vāre āsevanaṃ labhitvā, na āsevanapaccayaṃ. Na hi upekkhāsahagatāhetukacittaṃ
analyzed: dve vāre āsevanam labhitvā na āsevana paccayam na hi upekkhā sahagata ahetuka cittam

original: āsevanapaccayabhūtaṃ atthi. Yadi siyā, paṭṭhāne kusalattike paṭiccavārādīsu “na maggapaccayā
analyzed: āsevana paccaya bhūtam atthi yadi siyā paṭṭhāne kusala ttike paṭiccavāra ādīsu na magga paccayā

original: āsevane dve, āsevanapaccayā na magge dve”ti ca vattabbaṃ siyā, “na maggapaccayā āsevane
analyzed: āsevane dve āsevana paccayā na magge dve ti ca vattabbam siyā na magga paccayā āsevane

original: ekaṃ, āsevanapaccayā na magge eka”nti ca pana vuttaṃ. Ekaṃ dve vāreti ettha ca ekaggahaṇaṃ
analyzed: ekam āsevana paccayāḥ na magge ekam ti ca pana vuttam ekam dve vāre iti ettha ca eka ggahaṇam

original: vacanasiliṭṭhatāya vasena vuttaṃ. Na hi dutiye moghavāre ekavārameva voṭṭhabbanaṃ
analyzed: vacana siliṭṭha tāya vasena vuttam na hi dutiye mogha vāre eka vāram eva voṭṭhabbanam

original: pavattati. Dvikkhattuṃ vā tassa pavattiṃ sandhāya ekavāraggahaṇaṃ, tikkhattuṃ pavattiṃ
analyzed: pavattati dvi khattum vā tassa pavattim sandhāya eka vāra ggahaṇam ti khattum pavattim

original: sandhāya dvevāraggahaṇaṃ. Tattha dutiyaṃ tatiyañca pavattamānaṃ laddhāsevanaṃ viya
analyzed: sandhāya tattha dutiyam tatiyam ca pavattamānam laddha āsevanam viya

original: hoti. Yasmā pana “voṭṭhabbanaṃ patvā ekaṃ dve vāreāsevanaṃ labhitvā cittaṃ bhavaṅgameva
analyzed: hoti yasmai pana voṭṭhabbanam patvā ekam dve vāre āsevanam labhitvā cittam bhavaṅgam eva

original: otaratī”ti idaṃ dutiyamoghavāravasena vuttaṃ bhaveyya. So ca ārammaṇadubbalatāya
analyzed: otarati iti idam dutiya moghavāra vasena vuttam bhaveyya so ca ārammaṇa dubbala tāya

original: eva hotīti abhidhammaṭṭhakathāyaṃ niyamito. Idha pana tikkhānupassanānubhāvena akusaluppattiyā
analyzed: eva hoti iti abhidhamma ṭṭhakathā ayam niyamitaḥ idha pana tikkha anupassanā anubhāvena akusala uppattiyā

original: asambhavavasena ayonisova āvajjato ayoniso vavatthānaṃ siyā, na yoniso, tasmiñca
analyzed: asambhava vasena āvajjataḥ ayonisaḥ vavatthānam siyā na tasmin ca

original: pavatte mahati atimahati vā ārammaṇe javanaṃ na uppajjeyyāti ayamattho vicāretvā gahetabbo.
analyzed: pavatte mahati atimahati vā ārammaṇe javanam na uppajjeyya ati ayam atthaḥ vicāretvā gahetabbaḥ

original: Etasseva vā satipi duvidhatāparikappane so ca yadi anulome vedanāttike paṭiccavārādīsu
analyzed: etassa iva vā duvidha tā parikappane saḥ ca yadi anulome vedanā attike paṭiccavāra ādīsu

original: “āsevanapaccayā na magge dve, na maggapaccayā āsevane dve”ti ca vuttaṃ siyā, (labbheyya),
analyzed: āsevana paccayāḥ na magge dve na magga paccayāḥ āsevane dve iti ca vuttam siyā labbheyya

original: na ca vuttaṃ. Yadi pana voṭṭhabbanampi āsevanapaccayo siyā, kusalākusalānampi siyā.
analyzed: na ca vuttam yadi pana voṭṭhabbanam pi āsevana paccayaḥ siyā kusala akusalānam pi siyā

original: Na hi āsevanapaccayaṃ laddhuṃ yuttassa āsevanapaccayatāpi dhammo āsevanapaccayo hotīti
analyzed: na hi āsevana paccayam laddhum yuttassa āsevana paccaya tā api dhammaḥ āsevana paccayaḥ hoti iti

original: avutto atthi, voṭṭhabbanassa pana kusalākusalānaṃ āsevanapaccayabhāvo avutto – “kusalaṃ
analyzed: avuttaḥ atthi voṭṭhabbanassa pana kusala akusalānam āsevana paccaya bhāvaḥ avuttaḥ kusalam

307. Nacirapakkanteti na ciraṃ pakkante, pakkantassa sato na cirasseva. Saliṅgenevāti
analyzed: nacira pakkanta iti na ciram pakkante pakkantassa sataḥ na cirassa iva saliṅgena iva ati

original: upaṭṭhānaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. Cakkavāḷapabbatamatthakasamīpe ābhāpharaṇavasena pavattiyā

original: “pācīnacakkavāḷapabbatamatthake”ti vuttaṃ, na cakkavāḷapabbatamatthake candamaṇḍalassa
analyzed: pācīna cakkavāḷa pabbata matthake iti vuttam na cakkavāḷa pabbata matthake canda maṇḍalassa

original: vicaraṇato. Tathā sati lokantarikanirayesupi candimasūriyānaṃ ābhā phareyya. Ubbedhavasena
analyzed: vicaraṇataḥ tathā sati candima sūriyānam ābhā phareyya ubbedha vasena

original: hi cakkavāḷapabbatassa vemajjhato candimasūriyā vicaranti. Sālakusumapabhānaṃ atirattatāya
analyzed: hi cakkavāḷa pabbatassa vemajjhataḥ candima sūriyāḥ vicaranti sāla kusuma pabhānaṃ a tiratta tāya

original: vuttaṃ “lākhārasena siñcamānaṃ viyā”ti. Upagāyamānā viyāti payirupāsanavasena upecca
analyzed: vuttam lākhā rasena siñcamānam viyāti upagāyamānā viyāti payiḥ upāsana vasena upecca

original: gāyamānā viya. Kāya nu kho ajja ratiyāti ajja jhānasamāpattiratiyā eva nu kho, udāhu
analyzed: gāyamānāḥ viya kāya nu kho ajja ratiyā ati ajja jhāna samāpatti ratiyā eva nu kho udāhu

original: dhammasākacchāratiyā dhammadesanāratiyāti cintesi.
analyzed: dhamma sākacchā ratiyā dhamma desanā ratiyā iti cintesi

original: Dve candamaṇḍalāni viya paramasobhaggappattāya kantiyā. Dve sūriyamaṇḍalāni viya
analyzed: dve canda maṇḍalāni viya parama sobhagga ppattāya kantiyā dve sūriya maṇḍalāni viya

original: ativiya suvisuddhasamujjalāya guṇavibhūtiyā. Dve chaddantanāgarājāno viya mahānubhāvatāya.
analyzed: guṇa vibhūtiyā dve chaddanta nāga rājānaḥ mahā anubhāva tāya

original: Dve sīhā viya tejussadatāya. Dve byagghā viya anolīnavuttitāya. Sabbapāliphullamevāti
analyzed: dve sīhā viya tejuḥ sada tāya dve byagghā viya anolīna vutti tāya sabba pāli phullam eva ati

original: sabbameva samantato vikasitaṃ.
analyzed: sabbam eva samantataḥ vikasitam

original: 333. Kathā upacarati pavattati etthāti kathāupacāro, savanūpacāro padeso, taṃ kathāupacāraṃ.
analyzed: kathā upacarati pavattati ettha ati kathā upacāro savana upacāraḥ padeso tam kathā upacāram

original: Ramaṇīyameva rāmaṇeyyakaṃ. Ujjaṅgaleti lūkhapadese kaṭhinapadese. Dosehi itā apagatāti
analyzed: ramaṇīyam eva rāmaṇeyyakam ujjaṅgalā iti lūkha padese kaṭhina padese dosehi itā apagatā iti

original: dosinā ta-kārassa na-kāraṃ katvā. Dibbā maññe gandhāti devaloke gandhā viya. Divi
analyzed: dosinā takārassa nakāram katvā dibbā maññe gandhāti deva loke gandhāḥ viya divi

original: bhavāti dibbā. Dve therāti sāriputtattheraānandattherā. Ānandatthero tāva mamāyatu
analyzed: dibbā dve therā ati sāriputta thera ānanda therā ānanda thero

original: akhīṇāsavabhāvato, sāriputtatthero kathanti? Na idaṃ mamāyanaṃ gehassitapemavasena,
analyzed: akhīṇāsava bhāvato sāriputta theraḥ kathanti naḥ idam mama ayanam geha ssita pema vasena

original: atha kho guṇabhattivasenāti nāyaṃ doso.
analyzed: atha kho guṇa bhatti vasena ati na ayam dosaḥ

original: Anumatiyā pucchā anumatipucchā, anumatiggahaṇatthaṃ pucchanaṃ. Tattha yasmā adhammikampi
analyzed: anumatiyā pucchā anumati pucchā anumati ggahaṇa attham pucchanam yasmai adhammikam pi

original: vuddhassa anumatiṃ itaro paṭikkhipituṃ na labhati, tena sā anujānitabbāva hoti, tasmā
analyzed: vuddhassa anumatim itaraḥ paṭikkhipitum na labhati tena sā anujānitabbā ava hoti tasmā

original: saṅghakhuddakato paṭṭhāya anumati pucchitabbā. Tenāha “anumatipucchā nāmesā”tiādi.
analyzed: saṅgha khuddakataḥ paṭṭhāya anumati pucchitabbā tena āha anumati pucchā nāma isā atiādi

original: Khuddakato paṭṭhāyāti kaṇiṭṭhato paṭṭhāya. Paṭibhāti upaṭṭhātīti paṭibhānaṃ, yathādhippeto
analyzed: khuddakataḥ paṭṭhāya ati kaṇiṭṭhataḥ paṭṭhāya paṭibhāti upaṭṭhāti iti paṭibhānam yathā adhippetaḥ

original: attho, taṃ paṭibhānaṃ. Sikhāppattā vepullappattā na bhavissati padesañāṇe ṭhitehi
analyzed: attho tam paṭibhānam sikhā appattā vepulla ppattā na bhavissati padesa ñāṇe ṭhitehi

original: bhāsitattā. Sikhāppattā vepullappattā bhavissati sabbaññutaññāṇena saṃsanditattā.
analyzed: bhāsita ttā sikhā appattā vepulla ppattā bhavissati sabbaññu ta ññāṇena saṃsandita ttā

original: Vuttamevatthaṃ upamāya vibhāvetuṃ “yathā hī”tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha paccatthikā aṭṭiyanti
analyzed: vuttam eva attham upamāya vibhāvetum yathā hi itiādi vuttam tattha paccatthikāḥ aṭṭiyanti

original: dukkhāyanti etenāti aṭṭo, vinicchitabbavohāro. Gāmabhojakanti yasmiṃ gāme so uppanno,
analyzed: dukkhāyanti etena ati aṭṭaḥ vinicchitabba vohāraḥ gāma bhojakanti yasmin gāme saḥ uppanno

original: taṃ gāmabhojakaṃ. Janapadabhojakanti yasmiṃ janapade so uppanno, taṃ janapadabhojakaṃ.
analyzed: tam gāma bhojakam janapada bhojakam ti yasmin janapade saḥ uppannaḥ tam janapada bhojakam

original: Mahāvinicchayaamaccanti yasmiṃ rajje so janapado, tassa rājadhāniyaṃ mahāvinicchayaamaccaṃ.
analyzed: yasmin rajje saḥ janapadaḥ tassa rājadhāniyam mahā vinicchaya amaccam

original: Senāpatinti yassa rañño so amacco, tassa senāpatiṃ. Tathā uparājanti. Idaṃ panettha
analyzed: senāpatinti yassa raññaḥ saḥ amacco tassa senāpatim tathā uparājanti idam pana ittha

original: pakaticārittavasena vuttaṃ upameyyatthānurūpatoti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Aparāparaṃ na sañcarati
analyzed: pakati cāritta vasena vuttam upameyya ttha anurūpa tā ti daṭṭhabbam apara aparam na sañcarati

original: vinicchayanārahena vinicchitabhāvato.
analyzed: vinicchayana ārahena

original: Pakaṭṭhānaṃ ukkaṭṭhānaṃ sīlādiatthānaṃ bodhanato, sabhāvaniruttivasena buddhādīhi
analyzed: paka ṭṭhānam ukka ṭṭhānam sīla ādi atthānam bodhanataḥ sabhāva nirutti vasena buddha ādīhi

original: bhāsitattā ca pakaṭṭhānaṃ vacanappabandhānaṃ āḷīti pāḷi, pariyattidhammo. Purimassa
analyzed: bhāsita ttā ca paka ṭṭhānam vacana pabandhānam pariyatti dhammo purimassa

original: atthassa pacchimena atthena anusandhānaṃ anusandhi. Atthamukhena pana pāḷipadesānampi
analyzed: atthassa pacchimena atthena anusandhānam anusandhi attha mukhena pana pāḷi padesānam pi

original: anusandhi hotiyeva, so ca pubbāparānusandhi-pucchānusandhi-ajjhāsayānusandhi-yathānusandhivasena
analyzed: anusandhi so ca pubba apara anusandhi puccha anusandhi ajjhāsaya anusandhi yathā anusandhi vasena

original: catubbidho. Taṃtaṃdesanānaṃ pana pubbāparasaṃsandanaṃ pubbāparaṃ. Pāḷivasena anusandhivasena
analyzed: catubbidhaḥ tad tad desanānam pana pubba apara saṃsandanam pubba aparam pāḷi vasena anusandhi vasena

original: pubbāparavasenāti paccekaṃ yojetabbaṃ. Uggahitanti byañjanaso atthaso ca uddhaṃ uddhaṃ
analyzed: pubba apara vasena ati paccekam yojetabbam uggahitam ti byañjanaso atthaso ca uddham uddham

original: gahitaṃ, pariyāpuṇanavasena ceva paripucchāvasena ca hadayena gahitanti attho. Vaṭṭadukkhanissaraṇatthikehi
analyzed: gahitam pariyāpuṇana vasena ca iva paripucchā vasena ca hadayena gahitan ti attho vaṭṭa dukkha nissaraṇa atthikehi

original: sotabbato sutaṃ, pariyattidhammo, taṃ dhāretīti sutadharo. Yo hi sutadharo, sutaṃ
analyzed: sotabbataḥ sutam pariyatti dhammo tam dhāreti iti sutadharaḥ yaḥ hi sutadharaḥ sutam

original: tasmiṃ patiṭṭhitaṃ hoti suppatiṭṭhitaṃ, tasmā vuttaṃ “sutassa ādhārabhūto”ti. Tenāha
analyzed: tasmin patiṭṭhitam hoti su patiṭṭhitam tasmā vuttam sutassa ādhāra bhūtaḥ ti tena āha

original: “yassa hī”tiādi. Ekapadaṃ ekakkharampi avinaṭṭhaṃ hutvā sannicīyatīti sannicayo,
analyzed: yassa hi itiādi eka padam eka kkharam pi a vinaṭṭham hutvā sannicīyati iti sannicayaḥ

original: sutaṃ sannicayo etasminti sutasannicayo. Ajjhosāyāti anupavisitvā. Tiṭṭhatīti na mussati.
analyzed: sutam sannicayaḥ etasmin ti suta sannicayaḥ ajjhosāya ati an upavisitvā tiṭṭhati iti na mussati

original: Ṭhitā paguṇāti paguṇā vācuggatā. Niccalitanti aparivattitaṃ. Saṃsanditvāti aññehi
analyzed: ṭhitā paguṇā ati paguṇā vācuggatā niccalitam ti a parivattitam saṃsanditvā iti aññehi

original: saṃsanditvā. Samanuggāhitvāti paripucchāvasena atthaṃ ogāhetvā. Pabandhassa vibandhābhāvato
analyzed: saṃsanditvā samanuggāhitvā ati paripucchā vasena attham ogāhetvā pabandhassa vibandha abhāvato

original: gaṅgāsotasadisaṃ, “bhavaṅgasotasadisa”nti vā pāṭho, akittimaṃ sukhappavattīti attho.
analyzed: gaṅgā sota sadisam bhavaṅga sota sadisanti vā pāṭhaḥ akittimam sukha ppavatti iti attho

original: Suttekadesassa suttassa ca vacasā paricayo idha nādhippeto, vaggādivasena pana adhippetoti
analyzed: sutta ekadesassa suttassa ca vacasā paricayaḥ idha na adhippetaḥ vagga ādi vasena pana adhippeto ti

original: āha “suttadasaka…pe… sajjhāyitā”ti, “dasa suttāni gatāni, dasa vaggāgatā”tiādinā
analyzed: āha sutta dasa kape sajjhāyitā ati dasa suttāni gatāni dasa vagga āgata ati ādinā

original: sallakkhetvā vācāya sajjhāyitāti attho. Manasā anu anu pekkhitā bhāgaso nijjhāyitā
analyzed: sallakkhetvā vācāya sajjhāyitā ati atthaḥ manasā anu anu pekkhitā bhāgasaḥ nijjhāyitā

original: cintitā manasānupekkhitā. Rūpagataṃ viya paññāyatīti rūpagataṃ viya cakkhussa vibhūtaṃ
analyzed: cintitā manasā an upekkhitā rūpa gatam viya paññāyati iti rūpa gatam viya cakkhussa vibhūtam

original: hutvā paññāyati. Suppaṭividdhāti nijjaṭaṃ niggumbaṃ katvā suṭṭhu yāthāvato paṭividdhā.
analyzed: hutvā paññāyati suppaṭividdhā ati nijjaṭam niggumbam katvā suṭṭhu yāthāvataḥ paṭividdhā

original: Pajjati attho ñāyati etenāti padaṃ, tadeva atthaṃ byañjetīti byañjananti āha “padameva
analyzed: pajjati atthaḥ ñāyati etena ati padam tat eva attham byañjeti iti byañjananti āha padam eva

original: atthassa byañjanato padabyañjana”nti. Akkharapāripūriyā padabyañjanassa parimaṇḍalatā,
analyzed: atthassa byañjanataḥ pada byañjanan ti akkhara pāripūriyā pada byañjanassa parimaṇḍala tā

original: sā pana pāripūrī evaṃ veditabbāti āha “dasavidhabyañjanabuddhiyo aparihāpetvā”ti.
analyzed: sā pana pāripūrī evam veditabbā ti āha dasavidha byañjana buddhiyaḥ a parihāpetvā iti

original: Aññaṃ upārambhakaranti yathānikkhittasuttato aññaṃ tassa ananulomakaṃ suttaṃ āharati.
analyzed: aññam upārambha karanti yathā nikkhitta suttataḥ aññam tassa ananulomakam suttam āharati

original: Tadatthaṃ otāretīti tassa āhaṭasuttasseva atthaṃ vicāreti. Tassa kathā aparimaṇḍalā
analyzed: tad attham otāreti iti tassa āhaṭa suttassa iva attham vicāreti tassa kathā aparimaṇḍalā

original: nāma hoti atthassa aparipuṇṇabhāvato. Yathānikkhittassa suttassa atthasaṃvaṇṇanāvaseneva
analyzed: nāma hoti atthassa a paripuṇṇa bhāvataḥ yathā nikkhittassa suttassa attha saṃvaṇṇanā vasena iva

original: suttantarampi ānento bahi ekapadampi na gacchati nāma. Amakkhentoti avināsento. Taṃ
analyzed: suttantaram pi ānentaḥ bahi eka padam pi na gacchati nāma a makkhentaḥ ti a vināsentaḥ tam

original: taṃ atthaṃ suṭṭhu vavatthitaṃ katvā dassento tulikāya paricchindanto viya. Gambhīrataramatthaṃ
analyzed: tam attham suṭṭhu vavatthitam katvā dassento tulikāya paricchindanto viya gambhīrataram attham

original: gamento gambhīramātikāya udakaṃ pesento viya. Uttānamātikāya hi mariyādaṃ ottharitvā
analyzed: gamentaḥ gambhīra mātikāya udakam pesentaḥ viyas uttāna mātikāya hi mariyādam ā uttharitvā

original: udakaṃ aññathā gaccheyya. Ekaṃyeva padaṃ anekehi pariyāyehi punappunaṃ saṃvaṇṇento
analyzed: udakam aññathā gaccheyya ekam yā iva padam anekehi pariyāyehi punappunam saṃvaṇṇentaḥ

original: padaṃ koṭṭento sindhavājānīyo viya. So hi vaggitāya gatiyā pade padaṃ koṭṭento gacchati.
analyzed: padam koṭṭentaḥ sindhavājānīyaḥ saḥ hi vaggitāya gatiyā pade padam koṭṭentaḥ gacchati

original: Kathāmaggena tassa kathā parimaṇḍalā nāma hoti dhammato atthato anusandhito pubbāparato
analyzed: kathā maggena tassa kathā parimaṇḍalā nāma hoti dhammataḥ atthataḥ anusandhitaḥ pubba aparato

original: ācariyuggahatoti sabbaso paripuṇṇabhāvato.
analyzed: ācari yuggahato ti sabbaso paripuṇṇa bhāvato

original: Anuppabandhehīti vissaṭṭhehi āsajjamānehi. Nātisīghaṃ nātisaṇikaṃ nirantaraṃ ekarasañca
analyzed: an uppabandhehi iti vissaṭṭhehi āsajjamānehi na ati sīgham na ati saṇikam nirantaram ekarasam ca

original: katvā parisāya ajjhāsayānurūpaṃ dhammaṃ kathento vissaṭṭhāya kathāya katheti nāma,

original: na aññathāti dassento “yo bhikkhū”tiādimāha. Araṇiṃ manthento viya, uṇhakhādanīyaṃ
analyzed: na aññathā iti dassento yaḥ bhikkhu iti ādim āha araṇim manthentaḥ viya uṇha khādanīyam

original: khādanto viyāti sīghaṃ sīghaṃ kathanassa udāharaṇaṃ, gahitaṃ gahitamevātiādi laṅghetvā
analyzed: khādantaḥ viyāti sīgham sīgham kathanassa udāharaṇam gahitam gahitam eva atiādi laṅghetvā

original: kathanassa. Purāṇapaṇṇantaresu hi paripātiyamānagodhā kadāci dissati, evamekaccassa
analyzed: kathanassa purāṇa paṇṇantaresu hi paripātiyamāna godhā kadāci dissati evam ekaccassa

original: atthavaṇṇanā katthaci na dissati. Ohāyāti ṭhapetvā. Yopītiādinā ekarūpena kathāya
analyzed: attha vaṇṇanā katthaci na dissati ohāya ati ṭhapetvā yopī iti ādinā ekarūpena kathāya

original: akathanaṃ dasseti. Petaggi nijjhāmataṇhikapetassa mukhato niccharaṇakaaggi. Vitthāyatīti
analyzed: a kathanam dasseti peta aggi nijjhāma taṇhika petassa mukhataḥ vitthāyati iti

original: appaṭitānatamāpajjati. Kenaci rogena dukkhaṃ patto viya nitthunanto. Kandanto viyāti
analyzed: appaṭitāna tam āpajjati kenacid rogena dukkham pattaḥ viya nitthunantaḥ kandantaḥ viya ati

original: ukkuṭṭhiṃ karonto viya. Appabandhā nāma hoti sukhena appavattabhāvato. Ācariyehi
analyzed: ukkuṭṭhim karontaḥ viya appabandhā nāma hoti sukhena appavatta bhāvataḥ ācariyehi

original: dinnanaye ṭhitoti ācariyuggahaṃ amuñcanto, yathā ca ācariyā taṃ taṃ suttaṃ saṃvaṇṇesuṃ,
analyzed: dinna naye ṭhitaḥ ti ācari yuggaham a muñcantaḥ yathā ca ācariyā tam tam suttam saṃvaṇṇesuṃ

original: teneva nayena saṃvaṇṇentoti attho. Acchinnadhāraṃ katvāti “nātisīghaṃ nātisaṇika”ntiādinā
analyzed: tena iva nayena saṃvaṇṇento ti attho acchinna dhāram katvā iti na ati sīgham na ati saṇikam ti ādinā

original: heṭṭhā vuttanayena avicchinnaṃ kathāpabandhaṃ katvā. Anusayasamugghātāyāti iminā
analyzed: heṭṭhā vutta nayena avicchinnam kathā apabandham katvā anusaya samugghātāya ati iminā

original: tassā kathāya arahattapariyosānataṃ dasseti. Evarūpenāti nayidaṃ ekavacanaṃ tattakavasena
analyzed: tassā kathāya arahatta pariyosāna tam dasseti evarūpena ati na yidam ekavacanam

original: gahetabbaṃ, atha kho lakkhaṇe pavattanti dassento “tathārūpeneva bhikkhusatena bhikkhusahassena
analyzed: gahetabbam atha kho lakkhaṇe pavattanti dassento tathārūpena iva bhikkhu satena bhikkhu sahassena

original: vā”ti vuttaṃ. Pallaṅkenāti pallaṅkapadesena, pallaṅkāsanantenāti attho. Iminā nayenāti
analyzed: vā ti vuttam pallaṅkena ati pallaṅka padesena pallaṅka āsana antena ati attho iminā nayena ati

original: vārantarasādhāraṇaṃ atthaṃ atidisati, asādhāraṇaṃ pana vakkhatevāti.
analyzed: vāra antara sādhāraṇam attham atidisati asādhāraṇam pana vakkhatā iva āti

original: 334. Āramati etenāti ārāmo.
analyzed: āramati etena ati

original: 335. Dhuvasevananti niyatasevitaṃ. Pāsādapariveṇeti pāsādaṅgaṇe. Nābhiyā patiṭṭhitānanti nābhiyā bhūmiyaṃ patiṭṭhitānaṃ. Arantarānīti aravivarāni taṃtaṃarānaṃ vemajjhaṭṭhānāni.
analyzed: dhuva sevanam ti niyata sevitam pāsāda pariveṇā iti pāsāda aṅgaṇe nābhiyā arantarāni iti ara vivarāni vemajjha ṭṭhānāni

original: 336. Samādinnaaraññadhutaṅgo āraññiko, na araññavāsamattena.
analyzed: samādinna arañña dhutaṅgaḥ āraññikaḥ na arañña vāsa mattena

original: 337. Na osādentīti na avasādenti, na avasādanāpekkhā aññamaññaṃ pañhaṃ pucchantīti attho. Pavattinīti paguṇā.
analyzed: na osādenti iti na avasādenti na avasādana apekkhāḥ aññam aññam pañham pucchanti iti attho pavattinī iti paguṇā

original: 338. Lokuttarā vihārasamāpatti nāma therassa arahattaphalasamāpattiyo, pariyāyato pana nirodhasamāpattipi veditabbā.
analyzed: lokuttarā vihāra samāpatti nāma therassa arahatta phala samāpattiyaḥ pariyāyato pana nirodha samāpatti pi veditabbā

original: 339. Sādhukāro ānandattherassa dinno. Tenāha bhagavā “yathā taṃ ānandova sammā byākaramāno
analyzed: sādhukāraḥ ānanda therassa dinnaḥ tena āha bhagavā yathā tam ānandaḥ uva sammā byākaramānaḥ

original: 378. Sīsaveṭhananti sīsaṃ rajjuyā bandhitvā daṇḍakena parivattakaveṭhanaṃ. Arahanto

390. Tatrāti tasmiṃ pubbārāmamigāramātupāsādānaṃ atthavibhāvane ayaṃ idāni vuccamānā

original: Vegāyatīti turitāyati. Sallakkhesīti cintesi, attanā yathā sutāya satthu desanāya

original: Chasu dvāresu niyuttāti chadvārikā, tehi.

original: ajjhosānāya. “Alameva nibbindituṃ alaṃ virajjitu”ntiādīsu viya alaṃ-saddo yuttatthopi

original: hotīti āha “na yuttā”ti. Sampajjantīti bhavanti. Yadipi “tatiyā, catutthī”ti idaṃ

original: visuddhidvayaṃ abhiññāpaññā, tassā pana sappaccayanāmarūpadassanabhāvato, sati ca

original: paccayapariggahe sappaccayattā (nāmarūpassa aniccatā, aniccaṃ dukkhaṃ, dukkhañca

original: anattāti atthato) lakkhaṇattayaṃ supākaṭameva hotīti āha “aniccaṃ dukkhaṃ anattāti
analyzed: anattā iti atthataḥ lakkhaṇattayam su pākaṭam eva hoti iti āha aniccam dukkham anattā iti

original: ñātapariññāya abhijānātī”ti. Tatheva tīraṇapariññāyāti iminā aniccādibhāvena nālaṃ
analyzed: ñāta pariññāya abhijānāti iti tathā iva tīraṇa pariññāya ati iminā anicca ādi bhāvena na alam

original: abhinivesāyāti nāmarūpassa upasaṃharati, na abhiññāpaññānaṃ sambhāradhammānaṃ. Purimāya

original: Uppādavayaṭṭhenāti udayabbayasabhāvena uppajjitvā nirujjhanena. Aniccāti addhu vā.

original: Khayavirāgoti khayasaṅkhāto virāgo saṅkhārānaṃ palujjanā. Yaṃ āgamma sabbaso saṅkhārehi

original: “Eseva nayo”ti abhidisitvā taṃ ekadesena vivaranto “nirodhopi hi…pe… duvidhoyevā”ti

analyzed: āha sabba āsava saṃvare vutta vossaggo va idha paṭinissaggo ti vutto ti dassento paṭinissaggo

original: Pucchantassa ajjhāsayavasena “na kiñci loke upādiyatī”ti ettha kāmupādānavasena upādiyanaṃ

original: kathesīti tassa ajjhāsayavasena papañcaṃ akatvā kathesi.
analyzed: kathesi iti tassa ajjhāsaya vasena papañcam a katvā kathesi

original: sammatāḷakaṃsatāḷasilāsalākatāḷādi. Tattha sammatāḷaṃ nāma daṇḍamayatāḷaṃ. Kaṃsatāḷaṃ
analyzed: sammatāḷa kaṃsatāḷa silāsa lāka tāḷa ādi tattha sammatāḷam nāma daṇḍa maya tāḷam kaṃsatāḷam

analyzed: suvaṇṇa ādi maye ghaṭake vāḷa rūpakāni ca pabāḷham mattaḥ iti pamattaḥ tena āha

original: 395. Paññātānanti pākaṭānaṃ cātumahārāja-suyāma-santusita-paranimmitavasavattimahābrahmānaṃ
analyzed: paññātānanti pākaṭānam

original: aññataro, na yesaṃ kesañcīti adhippāyo. Āraddhadhammavaseneva pariyosāpitattā yathānusandhināva niṭṭhapesi.
analyzed: aññataraḥ na yesam kesañci iti adhippāyaḥ āraddha dhamma vasena iva pariyosāpita ttā yathā anusandhinā eva niṭṭhapesi

original: Cūḷataṇhāsaṅkhayasuttavaṇṇanāya līnatthappakāsanā samattā.
analyzed: cūḷataṇhāsaṅkhaya sutta vaṇṇanāya līnattha ppakāsanā samattā

original: 8. Mahātaṇhāsaṅkhayasuttavaṇṇanā
396. Laddhimattanti micchāgāhamattaṃ, na diṭṭhābhiniveso. Sassatadiṭṭhīti niccābhiniveso.
analyzed: laddhi mattam ti micchāgāha mattam na diṭṭha abhiniveso sassata diṭṭhi iti nicca abhiniveso

original: Soti ariṭṭho bhikkhu. Kathetvā samodhānentanti yojanā. Samodhānentanti ca nigamentanti
analyzed: so ti ariṭṭhaḥ bhikkhu kathetvā yojanā samodhānentanti ca nigamentanti

original: attho. Tattha tatthevāti tesu tesu eva bhavesu nirujjhanti, na bhavantaraṃ saṅkamanti.
analyzed: tattha tattha iva ati tesu tesu eva bhavesu nirujjhanti na bhavantaram saṅkamanti

original: Viññāṇaṃ pana abhinnasabhāvaṃ anaññanti adhippāyo. Idhalokatoti imasmā attabhāvā.
analyzed: viññāṇam pana abhinna sabhāvam anaññanti adhippāyaḥ idhalokato ti imasmai atta bhāvā

original: Paralokanti parabhavasaññitaṃ attabhāvaṃ. Sandhāvatīti niccatāya kenaci asambaddhaṃ
analyzed: para lokam ti para bhava saññitam atta bhāvam sandhāvati iti niccatāya kenaci asambaddham

original: viya gacchati. Tena idhalokato paralokagamanamāha. Saṃsaratīti iminā paralokato idhāgamanaṃ.
analyzed: gacchati tena idha lokataḥ para loka gamanam āha saṃsarati iti iminā para lokataḥ idhāgamanam

original: Sandhāvatīti vā bhavantarasaṅkamanamāha. Saṃsaratīti tattha tattha aparāparasañcaraṇaṃ.
analyzed: sandhāvati iti vā bhavantara saṅkamanam āha saṃsarati iti tattha tattha apara apara sañcaraṇam

original: “Paccaye sati bhavatī”tiādinā viññāṇassa anvayato byatirekato ca paṭiccasamuppannabhāvaṃ
analyzed: paccaye sati bhavati iti ādinā viññāṇassa anvayataḥ byatirekataḥ ca paṭiccasamuppanna bhāvam

original: dassento sassatabhāvaṃ paṭikkhipati. Buddhena akathitaṃ kathesīti iminā “yaṃ abhāsitaṃ
analyzed: dassentaḥ sa sata bhāvam paṭikkhipati buddhena a kathitam kathesi iti iminā yam a bhāsitam

original: alapitaṃ tathāgatena, taṃ bhāsitaṃ lapitaṃ tathāgatenāti dīpetī”ti imasmiṃ bhedakaravatthusmiṃ
analyzed: a lapitam tathāgatena tam bhāsitam lapitam tathāgatena ati dīpeti iti imasmin bheda kara vatthusmin

original: sandissatīti dasseti. Jinacakke pahāraṃ detīti “tadevidaṃ viññāṇaṃ…pe… anañña”nti
analyzed: sandissati iti dasseti jina cakke pahāram deti iti tat eva idam viññāṇaṃ pe anaññanti

original: niccataṃ paṭijānanto – “sabbe saṅkhārā aniccā, rūpaṃ, bhikkhave, anicca”nti ca ādinayappavatte
analyzed: nicca tam paṭijānanto sabbe saṅkhārāḥ aniccāḥ rūpam bhikkhave aniccanti ca ādi naya ppavatte

original: satthu dhammacakke khīlaṃ uppādento pahāraṃ deti. Sabbaññutaññāṇena aniccanti diṭṭhaṃ
analyzed: satthu dhammacakke khīlam uppādento pahāram deti sabbaññuta ññāṇena aniccanti diṭṭham

original: paveditañca viññāṇaṃ niccanti paṭijānanto vesārajjañāṇaṃ paṭibāhati. Sotukāmaṃ jananti
analyzed: paveditam ca viññāṇam niccanti paṭijānantaḥ vesārajja ñāṇam paṭibāhati sotu kāmam jananti

original: ariyadhammādhigamassa ekantaupāyabhūtaṃ vipassanāmaggaṃ sotukāmaṃ janaṃ niccaggāhapaggaṇhanena
analyzed: ariya dhamma adhigamassa ekanta upāya bhūtam vipassanā maggam sotu kāmam janam nicca ggāha paggaṇhanena

original: visaṃvādeti. Tato eva ariyapathe ariyadhammavīthiyaṃ tassā paṭikkhipanena tiriyaṃ nipatitvā.
analyzed: visaṃvāde ti tatas eva ariya pathe ariya dhamma vīthiyam tassā paṭikkhipanena tiriyam nipatitvā

original: 398. Viññāṇasīsena attanā gahitaṃ attānaṃ vibhāvento “yvāyaṃ, bhante”tiādimāha. Tattha
analyzed: viññāṇa sīsena attanā gahitam attānam vibhāventaḥ yvā ayam bhante ti ādim āha tattha

original: vado vedeyyotiādayo sassatadiṭṭhiyā eva abhinivesākārā. Vadatīti vado, vacīkammassa
analyzed: vadaḥ vedeyya iti ādayo sassata diṭṭhiyā eva abhinivesa ākārā vadati iti vadaḥ vacī kammassa

original: kārakoti attho. Iminā hi kārakabhāvupāyikasattānaṃ hitasukhāvabodhanasamatthataṃ
analyzed: kārako ti atthaḥ iminā hi kāraka bhāva upāyika sattānam hita sukha avabodhana samattha tam

original: attano dasseti. Vediyova vedeyyo, jānāti anubhavati cāti attho. Īdisānañhi padānaṃ
analyzed: attanaḥ dasseti vediyaḥ iva vedeyyaḥ jānāti anubhavati ca ati atthaḥ īdisānam hi padānam

original: bahulā kattusādhanataṃ saddavidū maññanti. Vedayatīti taṃ taṃ anubhavitabbaṃ anubhavati.
analyzed: bahulā kattu sādhanatam sadda vidū maññanti vedayati iti tam tam anubhavitabbam anubhavati

original: Tahiṃ tahinti tesu tesu bhavayonigatiṭhitisattāvāsasattanikāyesu.
analyzed: tahim tahim ti tesu tesu bhava yoni gati ṭhiti sattā vāsa satta nikāyesu

original: 399. Taṃ vādaṃ paggayha ṭhitattā sātissa chinnapaccayatā aviruḷhadhammatā ca veditabbā.
analyzed: tam vādam paggayha ṭhita ttā sātissa chinna paccaya tā a viruḍha dhamma tā ca veditabbā

original: Heṭṭhāti alagaddasuttasaṃvaṇṇanaṃ sandhāyāha. Parato heṭṭhāti vuttaṭṭhānepi eseva
analyzed: heṭṭhā iti alagadda sutta saṃvaṇṇanam sandhāya āha paratas heṭṭhā iti vutta ṭṭhāne pi esā eva

original: nayo. Pāṭiyekko anusandhīti tīhipi anusandhīhi avomisso visuṃyeveko anusandhi. Nanu
analyzed: anusandhi iti tīhi pi anusandhīhi avomissaḥ nanu

original: cāyampi sātissa ajjhāsayavasena pavattitattā ajjhāsayānusandhiyevāti? Na, niyyānamukhena
analyzed: ca ayam pi ajjhāsaya vasena pavatti tattā ajjhāsaya anusandhiyā iva ati na niyyāna mukhena

original: appavattattā. Niyyānañhi purakkhatvā pucchādivasena pavattā itarā desanāpucchānusandhiādayo.
analyzed: appavatta ttā niyyānan hi purakkhatvā pucchā ādi vasena pavattāḥ itarāḥ desanā pucchā anusandhi ādayaḥ

original: Idha tadabhāvato vuttaṃ “pāṭiyekko anusandhī”ti. Parisāya laddhiṃ sodhentoti yādisī
analyzed: idha tad abhāvataḥ vuttam pāṭiyekkaḥ anusandhi iti parisāya laddhim sodhentā iti yādisī

original: sātissa laddhi, tadabhāvadassanavasena parisāya laddhiṃ sodhento, parisāya laddhisodhaneneva
analyzed: sātissa laddhi tad abhāva dassana vasena parisāya laddhim sodhentaḥ parisāya laddhi sodhanena iva

original: sāti gaṇato nissārito nāma jāto.
analyzed: sā ati gaṇataḥ nissāritaḥ nāma jātaḥ

original: 400. Yaṃ yadevāti idaṃ yadipi avisesato paccayadhammaggahaṇaṃ, “viññāṇantveva saṅkhyaṃ
analyzed: yam yat eva ati idam yat ipi avisesataḥ paccaya dhamma ggahaṇam viññāṇam tu eva saṅkhyam

original: gacchatī”ti pana vuttattā taṃtaṃviññāṇassa samaññānimittapaccayajātaṃ gahitanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
analyzed: gacchati iti pana vutta ttā tat tat viññāṇassa samaññā nimitta paccaya jātam gahitan ti daṭṭhabbam

original: Tena vuttaṃ pāḷiyaṃ – “cakkhuviññāṇantveva saṅkhyaṃ gacchatī”tiādi. Atha vā taṃtaṃdvāraniyataṃ
analyzed: tena vuttam pāḷiyam cakkhu viññāṇam tu eva saṅkhyam gacchati itiādi atha vā tat tat dvāra niyatam

original: itarampi sabbaṃ tassa tassa viññāṇassa paccayajātaṃ idha “yaṃ yadevā”ti gahitaṃ,
analyzed: itaram pi sabbam tassa tassa viññāṇassa paccaya jātam idha yam yat eva ati gahitam

original: tattha pana yaṃ asādhāraṇaṃ, tena samaññāti “cakkhuviññāṇantvevā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Dvārasaṅkantiyā
analyzed: tattha pana yam asādhāraṇam tena samaññā ti cakkhu viññāṇam tu eva ātiādi vuttam dvāra saṅkantiyā

original: abhāvanti viññāṇassa dvārantarasaṅkamanassa abhāvaṃ. Svāyaṃ oḷārikanayena mandabuddhīnaṃ
analyzed: viññāṇassa dvāra antara saṅkamanassa abhāvam svāyam oḷārika nayena manda buddhīnam

original: sukhāvabodhanatthaṃ nayadassanavasena vutto. Na hi kadāci paccuppannaṃ viññāṇaṃ vigacchantaṃ
analyzed: sukha avabodhana attham naya dassana vasena vuttaḥ na hi kadāci paccuppannam viññāṇam vigacchantam

original: anantaraviññāṇaṃ saṅkamati anantarādipaccayālābhe tassa anuppajjanato.
analyzed: anantara viññāṇam saṅkamati anantara ādi paccaya alābhe tassa an uppajjanato

original: Evamevāti yathā aggi upādānaṃ paṭicca jalanto anupādāno tattheva nibbāyati, na katthaci
analyzed: evam evā ti yathā aggi upādānam paṭicca jalantaḥ anupādāno tattha iva nibbāyati na katthaci

analyzed: saṅkamati evam eva paccaya vekallena tattha iva nirujjhati iti kasmā vuttam na ha ittha

original: anuppādanirodho icchito tādisassa nirodhassa idha anadhippetattā, atha kho khaṇanirodho,
analyzed: anuppāda nirodhaḥ icchitaḥ tādisassa nirodhassa idha an adhippeta ttā atha kho khaṇa nirodho

original: so ca sābhāvikattā na paccayavekallahetuko? Saccametaṃ, taṃtaṃdvārikassa pana viññāṇassa
analyzed: so ca sābhāvika ttā na paccaya vekalla hetukaḥ saccam etam taṃ taṃ dvārikassa pana viññāṇassa

original: dvārantaraṃ asaṅkamitvā tattha tattheva nirujjhanaṃ idhādhippetaṃ. Yesañca paccayānaṃ
analyzed: dvāra antaram a saṅkamitvā tattha tattha iva nirujjhanam idha adhippetam yesam ca paccayānam

original: vasena dvārantarikaviññāṇena bhavitabbaṃ, tesaṃ tadabhāvato paccayavekallaggahaṇaṃ,

original: tasmā paccayavekallena na sotādīni saṅkamitvā sotaviññāṇantiādi saṅkhyaṃ gacchatīti
analyzed: tasmā paccaya vekallena na sota ādīni saṅkamitvā sota viññāṇa ntiādi saṅkhyam gacchati iti

original: yojanā. Etena yaṃ viññāṇaṃ cakkhurūpādipaccayasāmaggiyā vasena cakkhuviññāṇasaṅkhyaṃ
analyzed: yojanā etena yam viññāṇam cakkhu rūpa ādi paccaya sāmaggiyā vasena cakkhu viññāṇa saṅkhyam

original: gacchati, tattha tattheva nirujjhati tāvakālikabhāvato, tassa pana sotasaddādipaccayābhāvato
analyzed: gacchati tattha tattha iva nirujjhati tāvakālika bhāvato tassa pana sota sadda ādi paccaya abhāvato

original: kuto sotaviññāṇādisamaññā, evamappavattito tassa kuto saṅkamoti dassitaṃ hoti. Viññāṇappavatteti
analyzed: kutas sota viññāṇa ādi samaññā evam appavattito tassa kutas saṅkamaḥ ti dassitam hoti viññāṇa ppavattā iti

original: viññāṇappavattiyaṃ. Dvārasaṅkantimattanti dvārantarasaṅkamanamattampi na vadāmi tattha
analyzed: viññāṇa ppavattiyam dvāra saṅkantimattanti dvāra antara saṅkamanamattam pi na vadāmi tattha

original: tattheva bhijjanato paccayassa uppādavantato sati ca uppāde avassaṃbhāvī nirodhoti
analyzed: tattha iva bhijjanataḥ paccayassa uppādavantataḥ sati ca uppāde avassaṃbhāvī nirodho ti

original: hutvā abhāvaṭṭhena aniccatā dīpitā hotīti.
analyzed: hutvā abhāva ṭṭhena anicca tā dīpitā hoti iti

original: 401. “Paṭiccasamuppannaṃ viññāṇaṃ vuttaṃ mayā, aññatra paccayā natthi viññāṇassa
analyzed: paṭicca samuppannam viññāṇam vuttam mayā aññatra paccayā natthi viññāṇassa

original: sambhavo”ti pāḷiyā anvayato ca byatirekato ca viññāṇassa saṅkhatatāva dassitāti āha
analyzed: sambhavaḥ ti pāḷiyā anvayato ca byatirekato ca viññāṇassa dassitā ati āha

original: “sappaccayabhāvaṃ dassetvā”ti. Hetupaccayehi jātaṃ nibbattaṃ “bhūta”nti idhādhippetaṃ,
analyzed: sappaccaya bhāvam dassetvā iti hetu paccayehi jātam nibbattam bhūtanti idha adhippetam

original: taṃ atthato pañcakkhandhā tabbinimuttassa sappaccayassa abhāvato, yañca khandhapañcakaṃ

original: attano tesañca bhikkhūnaṃ, taṃ “bhūtamida”nti bhagavā avocāti āha “idaṃ khandhapañcaka”nti.
analyzed: attano tesam ca bhikkhūnam tam bhūtam idam ti bhagavā avoca ati āha idam khandha pañcakam ti

original: Attano phalaṃ āharatīti āhāro, paccayo. Sambhavati etasmāti sambhavo, āhāro sambhavo
analyzed: attanaḥ phalam āharati iti āhāro paccayo sambhavati etasmā ati sambhavaḥ āhāro sambhavo

original: yena avijjādinā paccayena khandhapañcakaṃ sambhavati, tassa paccayassa anuppādanirodhā.
analyzed: yena avijjā ādinā paccayena khandha pañcakam sambhavati tassa paccayassa anuppāda nirodhā

original: Khaṇanirodho pana kāraṇanirapekkho.
analyzed: khaṇa nirodhaḥ pana kāraṇa nirapekkho

original: Nossūti saṃsayajotano nipātoti āha “bhūtaṃ nu kho idaṃ, na nu kho bhūta”nti. Bhūtamidaṃ
analyzed: āha bhūtam nu khalu idam na nu khalu bhūtanti bhūtam idam

original: nossūti ca iminā khandhapañcakameva nu kho idaṃ, udāhu attattaniyanti evaṃjātiko
analyzed: ca iminā khandha pañcakam eva nu kho idam evaṃjātikaḥ

original: saṃsayanākāro gahito. Tadāhārasambhavaṃ nossūti pana iminā sahetukaṃ nu kho idaṃ
analyzed: saṃsayana ākāraḥ tad āhāra sambhavam pana iminā sa hetukam nu kho idam

original: bhūtaṃ, udāhu ahetukanti yathā ahetukabhāvāpanno saṃsayanākāro gahito, evaṃ visamahetukabhāvāpannopi
analyzed: bhūtam udāhu ahetukanti yathā ahetuka bhāva āpannaḥ saṃsayana ākāraḥ gahitaḥ evam visama hetuka bhāva āpannaḥ api

original: saṃsayanākāro gahitoti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Visamahetunopi paramatthato bhūtassa ahetukabhāvato.
analyzed: saṃsayana ākāraḥ gahitaḥ ti daṭṭhabbam visama hetunā api paramatthataḥ bhūtassa ahetuka bhāvato

original: Visamahetuvādopi parehi parikappitamattatāya sabhāvaniyatiyadicchādivādehi samānayogakkhamoti.
analyzed: visama hetuvādaḥ api parehi parikappita matta tāya sa bhāva niyati yad icchā ādi vādehi samāna yogakkhamaḥ ti

original: Nirodhadhammaṃ nossūti iminā yathā aniccaṃ nu kho idaṃ bhūtaṃ, udāhu niccanti aniccataṃ
analyzed: nirodha dhammam iminā yathā aniccam nu kho idam bhūtam udāhu niccanti anicca tam

original: paṭicca saṃsayanākāro gahito, evaṃ dukkhaṃ nu kho, udāhu na dukkhaṃ, anattā nu kho,
analyzed: paṭicca saṃsayana ākāraḥ gahitaḥ evam dukkham nu kho udāhu na dukkham anattā nu kho

original: udāhu na anattātipi saṃsayanākāro gahitoyevāti daṭṭhabbaṃ aniccassa dukkhabhāvādiavassaṃbhāvato,
analyzed: udāhu na saṃsayana ākāraḥ daṭṭhabbam aniccassa

original: nicce ca tadubhayābhāvato. Yāthāvasarasalakkhaṇatoti aviparītasarasato salakkhaṇato
analyzed: nicce ca tad ubhaya abhāvataḥ yāthāvasa rasa lakkhaṇato ti aviparīta sarasataḥ salakkhaṇato

original: ca, kiccato ceva sabhāvato cāti attho. Vipassanāya adhiṭṭhānabhūtāpi paññā vipassanā
analyzed: ca kiccato ca iva sabhāvato ca ati attho vipassanāya adhiṭṭhāna bhūtā api paññā vipassanā

original: evāti vuttaṃ “vipassanāpaññāyā”ti. Sarasatoti ca sabhāvato. Salakkhaṇatoti sāmaññalakkhaṇato.
analyzed: eva iti vuttam vipassanā paññāya ati sarasataḥ ti ca sabhāvataḥ salakkhaṇataḥ ti sāmañña lakkhaṇato

original: Tenāha “vipassanāpaññāya sammā passantassā”ti. Vuttanayenevāti “yāthāvasarasalakkhaṇato”ti
analyzed: tena āha vipassanā paññāya sammā passantassa ati vutta nayena iva āti yāthāvasa rasa lakkhaṇato ti

original: vuttanayeneva. Ye yeti tassaṃ parisāyaṃ ye ye bhikkhū. Sallakkhesunti sammadeva upadhāresuṃ.
analyzed: vutta nayena iva ye ye iti tassam parisāyam ye ye bhikkhū sallakkhesunti sammadeva upadhāresuṃ

original: Tehīti tehi bhikkhūhi. Tatthāti tissaṃ vipassanāpaññāyaṃ. Nittaṇhabhāvanti taṇhābhāvaṃ
analyzed: tehi iti tehi bhikkhūhi tattha ati tissam vipassanā paññāyam nittaṇha bhāvanti taṇhā bhāvam

original: “etaṃ mama”nti taṇhāggāhassa pahīnataṃ. Etenapi bhagavā “ahaṃ, bhikkhave, dhammesupi
analyzed: etam taṇhā ggāhassa etena api bhagavā aham bhikkhave dhammesu pi

original: taṇhāpahānameva vaṇṇemi, sāti pana moghapuriso attabhāvepi taṇhāsaṃvaddhaniṃ viparītadiṭṭhiṃ
analyzed: taṇhā apahānam eva vaṇṇemi sā ati pana mogha purisaḥ atta bhāve pi viparīta diṭṭhim

original: paggayha tiṭṭhatī”ti sātiṃ niggaṇhāti. Sabhāvadassanenāti dhammānaṃ aviparītasabhāvadassanena.
analyzed: paggayha tiṭṭhati iti sātim niggaṇhāti sabhāva dassanena ati dhammānam aviparīta sabhāva dassanena

original: Paccayadassanenāti kāraṇadassanena anavasesato hetuno paccayassa ca dassanena. Allīyethāti
analyzed: paccaya dassanena ati kāraṇa dassanena anavasesataḥ hetuno paccayassa ca dassanena allīyetha ati

original: taṇhādiṭṭhivasena nissayetha. Tenāha “taṇhādiṭṭhīhī”ti. Kelāyethāti pariharaṇakeḷiyā
analyzed: taṇhā diṭṭhi vasena tena āha taṇhā diṭṭhīhi iti kelāyetha ati pariharaṇa keḷiyā

original: parihareyyātha. Tenāha “kīḷamānā vihareyyāthā”ti. Dhanaṃ viya icchantāti dhanaṃ viya

original: 402. Paṭicca etasmā phalaṃ etīti paccayo, sabbo kāraṇavisesoti āha “khandhānaṃ paccayaṃ

original: 404. Imasmiṃ sati idaṃ hotītiādīsu yaṃ vattabbaṃ, taṃ paramatthadīpaniyaṃ udānaṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttanayeneva veditabbaṃ.

original: Evarūpena sīlenātiādīsu sīlaggahaṇena vārittasīlamāha. Tena sammāvācākammantājīve

analyzed: vuttam te pana saddhamme pi sammāsambuddhe pi abhippasannāḥ eva tena āha buddha māmakā

original: na atthato. Samaṇena kattabbadhammāti samaṇadhamme ṭhitena sampādetabbadhammā. Yo

analyzed: hira uttappa ādi vasena desanā vitthāritā ati

original: jāgariyānuyogasatisampajañña-jhānavijjāvasena samaṇakaraṇadhammadesanā vitthārato

original: Tasseva atthoti tasseva avañcāpadasseva atthaniddeso. “Yassā hī”tiādinā byatirekavasena

original: atthaṃ vadati. Ettakena ṭhānenāti ettakena pāḷipadesena. Hirottappādīnaṃ upari pāḷiyaṃ

original: Jātiādimahattatāpaccavekkhaṇena uppajjamānā ca hirī tattha gāravavasena pavattatīti

original: 417. Kammapathavasenevāti akusalakammapathabhāveneva, tato tādisampi akusalakammaṃ

original: Uttānoti uddhamuddhaṃ tanotīti uttāno. Evaṃbhūto ca kenaci anuppādabhūmiyaṃ sañjātasālakalyāṇīkhandho

original: Tenāha “asañchanno”ti, nacchādetabboti attho. Ekasadiso visuddhabhāvena. Antarantare

original: anupakkilesato. Tenāha “kilesānaṃ dvāraṃ pidahanenā”ti.

original: 418. Ettha yathā lahukataraṃ kākuṭṭhāpanādikāyakammaṃ kāyasamācārassa aparisuddhabhāvāvahaṃ

original: sallekhavikopanato, micchāvitakkanamattañca manosamācārassa, evaṃ yaṃ kiñci aniyyānakathākathanamattaṃ

original: vacīsamācārassa aparisuddhabhāvāvahaṃ sallekhavikopanato, na hasādhippāyena musākathananti
analyzed: vacī samācārassa a parisuddha bhāva āvaham sallekha vikopanataḥ na hasa adhippāyena musā kathananti

original: daṭṭhabbaṃ. Hasādhippāyena hi musākathanaṃ sikkhāpadabaddheneva paṭikkhittanti.
analyzed: daṭṭhabbam hasa adhippāyena hi musā kathanam sikkhāpada baddhena iva paṭikkhittanti

original: 420. Ājīvopi ekacco kammapathavasena vārito labbhati. So pana atioḷāriko kāyavacīsamācāravāresu
analyzed: ājīvaḥ api ekaccaḥ kammapatha vasena vāritaḥ labbhati saḥ pana ati oḷārikaḥ kāya vacī samācāra vāresu

original: vuttanayo evāti na gahitoti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Ye pana “tādiso bhikkhūnaṃ ayogyato na gahito”ti
analyzed: vutta nayaḥ evā ti na gahitoti daṭṭhabbam ye pana tādisaḥ bhikkhūnam ayogyataḥ na gahitoti

original: vadanti, taṃ micchā tathā sati kāyavacīsamācāravārepi tassa aggahetabbabhāvāpattito.

original: “Khādatha pivathā”ti pucchā attano khāditukāmatādīpanena, pariyāyakathābhāvato panesā

original: sallekhavikopanā jātā.
analyzed: sat lekha vikopanā jātā

original: 422. Anesanaṃ pahāya dhammena samena paccaye pariyesanto pariyesanamattaññū nāma.
analyzed: an esanam pahāya dhammena samena paccaye pariyesantaḥ pariyesana mattaññū nāma

original: Dāyakassa deyyadhammassa attano ca pamāṇaññutāpaṭiggaṇhanto paṭiggahaṇamattaññū nāma.
analyzed: dāyakassa deyya dhammassa attano ca pamāṇa ññu tā paṭiggaṇhantaḥ paṭiggahaṇa mattaññū nāma

original: Yoniso paccavekkhitvā paribhuñjanto paribhogamattaññū nāma.
analyzed: yonisaḥ paccavekkhitvā paribhuñjantaḥ paribhoga mattaññū nāma

original: 423. Ekasmiṃ koṭṭhāseti majjhimayāmasaññite ekasmiṃ koṭṭhāse. “Vāmena passena sentī”ti
analyzed: ekasmin koṭṭhāse iti majjhima yāma saññite ekasmin koṭṭhāse vāmena passena senti iti

original: evaṃ vuttā. Dakkhiṇapassena sayāno nāma natthi dakkhiṇahatthassa sarīraggahaṇādipayogakkhamato.
analyzed: evam vuttā dakkhiṇa passena sayānaḥ nāma natthi dakkhiṇa hatthassa sarīra ggahaṇa ādi payoga kkhamato

original: Purisavasena cetaṃ vuttaṃ.
analyzed: purisa vasena ca itam vuttam

original: Tejussadattāti iminā sīhassa abhīrukabhāvaṃ dasseti. Bhīrukā hi sesamigā attano āsayaṃ
analyzed: tejussadattā iti iminā sīhassa abhīruka bhāvam dasseti bhīrukāḥ hi sesamigāḥ attanaḥ āsayam

analyzed: pavisitvā santāsa pubbakam yathā tathā sayanti sīhaḥ pana abhīruka bhāvato satokārī

original: bhikkhu viya satiṃ upaṭṭhapetvāva sayati. Tenāha “dve purimapāde”tiādi. Seti abyāvaṭabhāvena
analyzed: bhikkhu viya satim upaṭṭhapetvā ava sayati tena āha dve purima pāda itiādi sā iti

original: pavattati etthāti seyyā, catutthajjhānameva seyyā. Kiṃ pana taṃ catutthajjhānanti?
analyzed: pavattati ettha ati seyyā catuttha jhānam eva seyyā kim pana tam catuttha jhānam ti

original: Ānāpānacatutthajjhānaṃ. Tattha hi ṭhatvā vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā bhagavā anukkamena
analyzed: āna apāna catuttha jhānam tattha hi ṭhatvā vipassanam vaḍḍhetvā bhagavā anukkamena

original: aggamaggaṃ adhigato tathāgato jātoti keci, tayidaṃ padaṭṭhānaṃ nāma na seyyā. Apare
analyzed: agga maggam adhigataḥ tathāgataḥ jātaḥ iti keci tayidam padaṭṭhānam nāma na seyyāḥ apare

original: pana “catutthajjhānasamanantarā bhagavā parinibbāyī”ti vuttapadaṃ gahetvā “lokiyacatutthajjhānasamāpatti
analyzed: pana catuttha jhāna samanantarā bhagavā parinibbāyi iti vutta padam gahetvā lokiya catuttha jhāna samāpatti

original: tathāgataseyyā”ti vadanti, tathā sati parinibbānakālikā tathāgataseyyāti āpajjati,
analyzed: tathāgata seyyā iti vadanti tathā sati parinibbāna kālikā tathāgata seyyā iti āpajjati

original: na ca bhagavā catutthajjhānaṃ samāpajjanabahulo vihāsi, aggaphalajhānaṃ panettha
analyzed: na ca bhagavā catuttha jhānam samāpajjana bahulaḥ vihāsi agga phala jhānam pana ittha

original: “catutthajjhāna”nti adhippetaṃ. Tattha yathā sattānaṃ niddupagamanalakkhaṇā seyyā
analyzed: catuttha jhānan ti adhippetam tattha yathā sattānam niddupagamana lakkhaṇā seyyā

original: bhavaṅgacittavāravasena hoti, tañca tesaṃ paṭhamajātisamanvayaṃ yebhuyyavuttikaṃ,
analyzed: bhavaṅga citta vāra vasena tat ca tesam paṭhama jāti samanvayam yebhuyyavuttikam

original: evaṃ bhagavato ariyajātisamanvayaṃ yebhuyyavuttikaṃ aggaphalabhūtaṃ catutthajjhānaṃ
analyzed: evam bhagavataḥ ariya jāti samanvayam yebhuyyavuttikam agga phala bhūtam catuttha jjhānam

original: “tathāgataseyyā”ti veditabbaṃ. Sīhaseyyāti seṭṭhaseyyāti āha “uttamaseyyā”ti.
analyzed: tathāgata seyyā iti veditabbam sīha seyyā ati seṭṭha seyyā iti āha uttama seyyā iti

original: 426. Vigatantānīti iṇamūlāni. Tesanti iṇamūlānaṃ. Pariyantoti avaseso.
analyzed: vigata antāni iti iṇa mūlāni avasesaḥ

original: Pavattinivāraṇena catuiriyāpathaṃ chindanto. Ābādhatīti pīḷeti. Dukkhitoti sañjātadukkho.
analyzed: pavatti nivāraṇena catu iriyāpatham chindantaḥ ābādhati iti pīḷeti dukkhitaḥ ti sañjāta dukkho

original: Appaṃ balaṃ balamattā. Appattho hi ayaṃ mattā-saddo “mattāsukhapariccāgā”tiādīsu
analyzed: appam balam bala mattā appa atthaḥ hi ayam mattā saddaḥ mattā sukha pariccāga ati ādīsu

original: viya, balavattho pana mattā-saddo anatthantaro. Sesanti “tassa hi bandhanā muttomhīti
analyzed: viya balavatthaḥ pana mattā saddo anatthantaro tassa hi bandhanā mutto mhi iti

original: āvajjayato tadubhayaṃ hotī”tiādinā vattabbaṃ sandhāyāha. Sabbapadesūti vuttāvasiṭṭhesu
analyzed: āvajjayato tat ubhayam hoti itiādinā vattabbam sandhāya āha sabba padesu iti vutta avasiṭṭhesu

original: sabbapadesu. Yenakāmaṃ yathāruci gacchatīti yenakāmaṃgamoti anunāsikalopaṃ akatvā
analyzed: sabba padesu yenakāmam yathāruci gacchati iti yenakāmaṃgamaḥ iti anunāsika lopam a katvā

original: niddeso. Bhujo attano yathāsukhaviniyogo isso icchitabbo etthāti bhujisso, sāmiko.
analyzed: niddesaḥ bhujaḥ attanaḥ yathāsukha viniyogaḥ issaḥ icchitabbo ettha ati bhujissaḥ sāmiko

original: So pana aparasantakatāya “attano santako”ti vutto. Dullabhaāpatāya kaṃ tārenti etthāti
analyzed: so pana apara santaka tāya attano santako iti vutto kam tārenti ettha ati

original: kantāroti āha “nirudakaṃ dīghamagga”nti.
analyzed: āha nirudakam

original: Vināsetīti khādanadubbiniyojanādīhi yathā iṇamūlaṃ kiñci na hoti, tathā karoti. Yamhi
analyzed: vināsa iti iti khādana dubbiniyojana ādīhi yathā iṇa mūlam kiñci na hoti tathā karoti

original: rāgavatthumhi. So puggalo. Tena rāgavatthunā, puriso ce itthiyā, itthī ce purisena.
analyzed: rāga vatthumhi so puggalo tena rāga vatthunā puriso ce itthiyā itthī ce purisena

original: Iṇaṃ viya kāmacchando daṭṭhabbo pīḷāsamānato.
analyzed: iṇam viya kāmacchandaḥ daṭṭhabbo pīḷā samānato

original: Na vindatīti na jānāti. Upaddavethāti sukhavihārassa upaddavaṃ karotha, vibādhethāti attho. Rogo viya byāpādo daṭṭhabbo sukhabhañjanasamānato.
analyzed: na vindati iti na jānāti upaddavetha ati sukha vihārassa upaddavam karotha vibādhetha ati attho rogaḥ viya byāpādaḥ daṭṭhabbo sukha bhañjana samānato

original: Nānāvidhahetūpāyālaṅkatatāya khandhāyatanadhātupaṭiccasamuppādādidhammanītivicittatāya
analyzed: nānāvidha hetu upāya alaṅkata tāya khandha āyatana dhātu paṭiccasamuppāda ādi dhamma nīti vicitta tāya

original: ca vicittanaye. Dhammassavaneti dhammakathāyaṃ. Kathā hi sotabbaṭṭhena “savana”nti
analyzed: ca vicitta naye dhamma ssavane iti dhamma kathā ayam kathā hi sotabba ṭṭhena savananti

original: vuttā. Evamettha sīlaṃ vibhattaṃ, evaṃ jhānābhiññā, evaṃ vipassanāmaggaphalānīti
analyzed: vuttā evam ettha sīlam vibhattam evam jhāna abhiññā evam vipassanā magga phalāni iti

original: neva tassa dhammassavanassa ādimajjhapariyosānaṃ jānāti. Uṭṭhiteti niṭṭhite. Aho
analyzed: na iva tassa dhammassavanassa ādi majjha pariyosānam jānāti uṭṭhitā iti niṭṭhite aho

original: kāraṇanti tattha tattha paṭiññānurūpena nikkhittasādhanavasena gahitakāraṇaṃ. Aho
analyzed: kāraṇam ti tattha tattha paṭiññā anurūpena nikkhitta sādhana vasena gahita kāraṇam aho

original: upamāti tasseva kāraṇassa patiṭṭhāpanavasena anvayato byatirekato ca patiṭṭhaṃ udāharaṇādi.
analyzed: upamā ti tassa iva kāraṇassa patiṭṭhāpana vasena anvayataḥ byatirekataḥ ca patiṭṭham udāharaṇa ādi

original: Bandhanāgāraṃ viya thinamiddhaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ dukkhato niyyānassa vibandhanato.
analyzed: bandhanāgāram viya thinamiddham daṭṭhabbam dukkhataḥ niyyānassa vibandhanato

original: Yasmā kukkuccanīvaraṇaṃ uddhaccarahitaṃ natthi, yasmā vā uddhaccakukkuccaṃ samānakiccāhārapaṭipakkhaṃ,
analyzed: yasmā kukkucca nīvaraṇam uddhacca rahitam na atthi yasmā vā uddhacca kukkuccam samāna kicca āhāra paṭipakkham

original: tasmā kukkuccassa visayaṃ dassento “vinaye apakataññunā”tiādimāha. Yathā hi uddhaccaṃ
analyzed: tasmā kukkuccassa visayam dassentaḥ vinaye apakataññunā iti ādim āha yathā hi uddhaccam

original: sattassa avūpasamakaraṃ, tathā kukkuccampi. Yathāpi uddhaccassa ñātivitakkādi āhāro,
analyzed: tathā kukkuccam pi yathā api uddhaccassa ñāti vitakka ādi āhāro

original: tathā kukkuccassapi. Yathā ca uddhaccassa samatho paṭipakkho, tathā kukkuccassapīti.
analyzed: tathā kukkuccassa api yathā ca uddhaccassa samatho paṭipakkho tathā kukkuccassa api iti

original: Dāsabyaṃ viya uddhaccakukkuccaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ aseribhāvāpādanato.
analyzed: dāsabyam viya uddhacca kukkuccam daṭṭhabbam aseri bhāva āpādanato

original: Soḷasavatthukā vicikicchā aṭṭhavatthukaṃ vicikicchaṃ anupaviṭṭhāti āha “aṭṭhasu ṭhānesu
analyzed: soḷasa vatthukā vicikicchā aṭṭha vatthukam vicikiccham anupaviṭṭhā ti āha aṭṭhasu ṭhānesu

original: vicikicchā”ti. Vicikicchantoti saṃsayanto. Adhimuccitvāti pattiyāyetvā. Gaṇhitunti
analyzed: vicikiccha ati vicikicchantaḥ iti saṃsayantaḥ adhimuccitvā ati gaṇhitunti

original: saddheyyavatthuṃ pariggahetuṃ. Abhimukhaṃ sappanaṃ āsappanaṃ, parito sappanaṃ parisappanaṃ.
analyzed: saddheyya vatthum pariggahetum abhimukham sappanam āsappanam paritas sappanam parisappanam

original: Padadvayenapi cittassa anicchanākārameva vadati. Khemantagāmimaggaṃ na pariyogāhati
analyzed: pada dvayena api cittassa anicchana ākāram eva vadati khemanta gāmi maggam na pariyogāhati

original: etenāti apariyogāhanaṃ, ussaṅkitaparisaṅkitabhāvena chambhitaṃ hoti cittaṃ yassa
analyzed: etena ati a pariyogāhanam ussaṅkita parisaṅkita bhāvena chambhitam hoti cittam yassa

original: dhammassa vasena, so dhammo chambhitattanti vicikicchanākāramāha. Tenāha “cittassa
analyzed: dhammassa vasena so dhammo vicikicchana ākāram āha tena āha cittassa

original: uppādayamānā”ti. Kantāraddhānamaggo viyāti sāsaṅkakantāraddhānamaggo viya daṭṭhabbā
analyzed: uppādayamānā ati kantāraddhāna maggaḥ viya iti sa āsaṅka kantāraddhāna maggaḥ viya daṭṭhabbā

original: appaṭipattihetubhāvato.
analyzed: appaṭipatti hetu bhāvataḥ

original: Natthi ettha iṇanti aṇaṇo, tassa bhāvo āṇaṇyaṃ, kassaci iṇassa adhāraṇaṃ. Samiddhakammantoti
analyzed: natthi ettha tassa bhāvaḥ āṇaṇyam kassaci iṇassa a dhāraṇam samiddha kammanto ti

original: nipphannajīvikappayogo. Paribundhati uparodhetīti ra-kārassa la-kāraṃ katvā palibodho,
analyzed: nipphanna jīvika ppayogaḥ paribundhati uparodheti iti rakārassa lakāram katvā palibodhaḥ

analyzed: tassa mūlam kāraṇanti palibodha mūlam cha dhamme bhāvetvā ati asubha nimitta ggāha ādike

original: cha dhamme uppādetvā vaḍḍhetvā. Cha dhamme bhāvetvāti ca mettānimittaggāhādayo ca
analyzed: cha dhamme uppādetvā vaḍḍhetvā cha dhamme bhāvetvā ati ca mettā nimitta ggāha ādayo ca

original: tattha tattha cha dhammāti vuttāti veditabbo. Pajahatīti vikkhambhanavasena pajahati.
analyzed: tattha tattha cha dhammā ati vuttā ati veditabbo pajahati iti vikkhambhana vasena pajahati

original: Tenāha “ācārapaṇṇattiādīni sikkhāpiyamāno”tiādi. Paravatthumhīti visabhāgavatthusmiṃ,
analyzed: tena āha ācāra paṇṇatti ādīni para vatthumhi iti visa bhāga vatthusmiṃ

analyzed: para visaye vā para visayāḥ ha ete bhikkhuno yat idam pañca kāmaguṇāḥ āṇaṇyam iva kāmacchanda ppahānam

original: āha piyavatthuabhāvāvahato.
analyzed: āha

original: Ācāravipattipaṭibāhakāni sikkhāpadāni ācārapaṇṇattiādīni. Ārogyamiva byāpādappahānaṃ āha kāyacittānaṃ phāsubhāvāvahato.
analyzed: ācāra vipatti paṭibāhakāni sikkhāpadāni ācāra paṇṇatti ādīni ārogyam iva byāpāda pahānam āha kāya cittānam phāsu bhāva āvahato

original: Bandhanā mokkhamiva thinamiddhappahānaṃ āha cittassa niggahitabhāvāvahato.
analyzed: bandhanā mokkham iva thinam iddha ppahānam āha cittassa niggahita bhāva āvahato

original: Bhujissaṃ viya uddhaccakukkuccappahānaṃ āha cittassa seribhāvāvahato.
analyzed: bhujissam viya uddhacca kukkucca ppahānam āha cittassa

original: Tiṇaṃ viyāti tiṇamiva katvā. Agaṇetvāti acintetvā. Khemantabhūmiṃ viya vicikicchāpahānaṃ āha anussaṅkitāparisaṅkitabhāvena sammāpaṭipattihetubhāvato.
analyzed: tiṇam viya iti tiṇam iva katvā a gaṇetvā iti a cintetvā khemanta bhūmim viya vicikicchā apahānam āha anussaṅkita a parisaṅkita bhāvena sammā paṭipatti hetu bhāvato

original: 427. Kirīyati gabbhāsaye khipīyatīti karo, sambhavo, karato jātoti karajo, mātāpettikasambhavoti
analyzed: gabbha āsaye khipīyati iti karo sambhavo karataḥ jāto ti kara jaḥ mātā pettika sambhavo ti

original: attho. Mātuyā hi sarīrasaṇṭhāpanavasena karato jātoti karajoti apare. Ubhayathāpi
analyzed: attho mātuyā hi sarīra saṇṭhāpana vasena karataḥ jātaḥ iti apare ubhayathā api

original: karajakāyanti catusantatirūpamāha. Temetīti tintaṃ karoti. Ko panettha tintabhāvoti
analyzed: catur santati rūpam āha temeti iti tintam karoti kaḥ pana itthā tinta bhāvaḥ ti

original: āha “snehetī”ti, pītisnehena pīṇanaṃ karotīti attho. Tenāha “sabbattha pavattapītisukhaṃ
analyzed: āha sneha iti iti pīti snehena pīṇanam karoti iti attho tena āha sabbattha pavatta pīti sukham

original: karotī”ti. Pītisamuṭṭhānapaṇītarūpehi sakalassa karajakāyassa pariphuṭatāya cettha
analyzed: karoti iti pīti samuṭṭhāna paṇīta rūpehi sakalassa karaja kāyassa ca ittha

original: taṃsamuṭṭhāpakapītisukhānaṃ sabbattha pavatti jotitā. Parisandetītiādīsupi eseva
analyzed: tad samuṭṭhāpaka pīti sukhānam sabbattha pavatti joti tā parisandeti iti ādīsu pi esā eva

original: nayo. Tatthāpi hi “samantato sandeti temeti sneheti, sabbattha pavattapītisukhaṃ
analyzed: nayaḥ tattha api hi samantataḥ sandeti temeti sneheti sabbattha pavatta pīti sukham

original: karotī”tiādinā yathārahaṃ attho veditabbo. Paripūretīti vāyunā bhastaṃ viya imaṃ
analyzed: karoti iti ādinā yathāraham attho veditabbo paripūreti iti vāyunā bhastam imam

original: karajakāyaṃ pītisukhena pūreti. Samantato phusatīti imaṃ karajakāyaṃ pītisukhena
analyzed: karaja kāyam pīti sukhena pūreti samantataḥ phusati iti imam karaja kāyam pīti sukhena

original: phusati. Sabbāvatoti a-kārassa ā-kāro kato, sabbāvayavavatoti atthoti āha “sabbakoṭṭhāsavato”ti,
analyzed: phusati sabbāvato ti akārassa ākāraḥ kataḥ sabba avayavavato ti attho ti āha sabba koṭṭhāsavato ti

original: maṃsādisabbābhāgavatoti attho. Aphuṭaṃ nāma na hoti pītisukhasamuṭṭhānehi rūpehi
analyzed: maṃsa ādi sabba ābhāgavato ti attho aphuṭam nāma na hoti pīti sukha samuṭṭhānehi rūpehi

original: sabbatthakameva byāpitattā. Kātuñceva yojetuñca cheko sannetuṃ paṭibaloti yojanā.
analyzed: sabbatthakam eva kātum ca iva yojetum ca chekaḥ sannetum paṭibalaḥ ti yojanā

original: Nhānīyacuṇṇānaṃ parimaddanavasena piṇḍaṃ karontena hatthena bhājanaṃ nippīḷetabbaṃ
analyzed: nhānīya cuṇṇānam parimaddana vasena piṇḍam karontena hatthena bhājanam nippīḷetabbam

original: hotīti āha “sannentassa bhijjatī”ti. Anugatāti anupaviṭṭhā. Parigatāti parito samantato
analyzed: hoti iti āha sannentassa bhijjati iti anugatā ati anupaviṭṭhā parigatā ati paritas samantataḥ

original: tintā. Tintabhāveneva samaṃ antaraṃ bāhirañca etissāti santarabāhirā. Sabbatthakamevāti
analyzed: tintā tinta bhāvena iva samam antaram bāhiram ca etissa ati santarabāhirā sabbatthakam eva ati

original: sabbattheva. Na ca pagghariṇī pamāṇayuttasseva udakassa sittattā. Ettha ca nhānīyapiṇḍaṃ
analyzed: sabbattha iva na ca pagghariṇī pamāṇa yuttassa iva udakassa sitta ttā ettha ca nhānīya piṇḍam

original: viya karajakāyo, taṃ temetvā sampiṇḍitapamāṇayuttaudakaṃ viya paṭhamajjhānasukhaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ.
analyzed: viya karaja kāyo tam temetvā sampiṇḍita pamāṇa yutta odakam viya paṭhama jhāna sukham daṭṭhabbaṃ

original: 428. Heṭṭhā ubbhijjitvā uggacchanaudakoti rahadassa adhothūladhārāvasena ubbhijja
analyzed: heṭṭhā ubbhijjitvā rahadassa adhas thūla dhārā vasena ubbhijja

original: uṭṭhahanaudako. Antoyeva ubbhijjanaudakoti rahadassa abbhantareyeva thūladhārā ahutvā
analyzed: uṭṭhahana odakaḥ antoyā iva ubbhijjana odakaḥ ti rahadassa thūla dhārāḥ a hutvā

original: uṭṭhitaudakasirāmukhehi ubbhijjanako. Āgamanamaggoti nadītaḷākakandarasaraādito āgamanamaggo.
analyzed: uṭṭhita udaka sirā mukhehi ubbhijjanakaḥ āgamana maggo ti nadī taḷāka kandara sara āditaḥ āgamana maggo

original: 429. Uppalagacchāni ettha santīti uppalinī, vāri. Ayamettha vinicchayo, tathā hi
analyzed: uppala gacchāni ettha santi iti uppalinī vāri ayam ettha vinicchayaḥ tathā hi

original: loke rattakkhiko “puṇḍarīkakkho”ti vuccati. Keci pana “rattaṃ padumaṃ, setaṃ puṇḍarīka”nti
analyzed: loke rattakkhiko puṇḍarīkakkho ti vuccati keci pana rattam padumam setam puṇḍarīkanti

original: vadanti. Uppalādīni viya karajakāyo, udakaṃ viya tatiyajjhānasukhanti ayampi attho

analyzed: vimati chijjati vimati chedanā anumatiyā pucchā anumati pucchā tam kim

original: Kathetuṃ kamyatāya pucchā kathetukamyatāpucchā.

original: Therena sadisoti therena sadiso sāvako natthi.

original: Ito vā etto vā anukkamitvāti uggahitakathāmaggato yattha katthaci īsakampi anukkamitvā

original: uggahitaniyāmenevāti attho. Tenāha “yaṭṭhikoṭi”ntiādi. Ekapadikanti ekapadanikkhepamattaṃ.

original: Daṇḍakasetunti ekadaṇḍakamayaṃ setuṃ. Heṭṭhā ca upari ca suttapadānaṃ āharaṇena tepiṭakaṃ

original: Gatimantānanti atisayāya ñāṇagatiyā yuttānaṃ. Dhitimantānanti dhāraṇabalena yuttānaṃ.

original: Anantanayussadanti paccayuppannabhāsitatthanibbānavipākakiriyādivasena anantapabhede

original: Yasmā pucchāyaṃ byāpanicchānayena “duppañño duppañño”ti āmeḍitavasena vuttaṃ, tasmā
analyzed: yasmā pucchā ayam byāpan icchā nayena duppaññaḥ duppaññaḥ iti āmeḍita vasena vuttam tasmā

analyzed: āmeḍita vasena iva āha tattha iti saddo kāraṇa atthaḥ ti dassentaḥ yasmā na ppajānāti tasmā

original: duppaññoti vuccatī”ti āha. Idaṃ dukkhanti idaṃ upādānakkhandhapañcakaṃ dukkhaṃ ariyasaccaṃ.

original: Tañca kho ruppanaṃ vediyanaṃ sañjānanaṃ abhisaṅkharaṇaṃ vijānananti saṅkhepato ettakaṃ.

analyzed: yathābhūtam kilesa ppahāna karaṇa sarasataḥ ca iva niyyāna hetu dassana ādhipateyya lakkhaṇato

analyzed: ca na ppajānāti anantara vāre iti dutiya vāre iminā ava nayena ati idam dukkham ettakam

original: Savanatoti kammaṭṭhānassa savanato uggaṇhāti. Ganthasavanamukhena hi tadatthassa

analyzed: hoti a visaya ttā catu sacca kammaṭṭhānikaḥ

original: Pañcakkhandhāti pañcupādānakkhandhā. Khandhavasena vipassanābhinivesassa cakkhādivasena

analyzed: vedanā ādi vasena ca aneka vidhatte sukaram catu dhātu mukhena tam

original: dassetuṃ “dhātukammaṭṭhānavasena otaritvā”ti āha. Rūpanti vavatthapetīti ruppanaṭṭhena

analyzed: rūpanti asaṅkarataḥ paricchindati tad ārammaṇā ati tam rūpam ārammaṇam katvā pavattanakā

original: Nāmanti vedanādicatukkaṃ namanaṭṭhena nāmanti vavatthāpeti. Yamakatālakkhandhaṃ bhindanto

original: viya yamakaṃ bhinditvā “arūpaṃ, rūpañcā”ti dveva ime dhammā, na ettha koci attā vā

original: attaniyaṃ vāti nāmarūpaṃ vavatthapeti paricchindati pariggaṇhāti. Ettāvatā diṭṭhivisuddhi
analyzed: attaniyam vāti nāma rūpam vavatthapeti paricchindati pariggaṇhāti ettāvatā diṭṭhi visuddhi

original: dassitā. Taṃ panetaṃ nāmarūpaṃ na ahetukaṃ. Yasmā sabbaṃ sabbattha sabbadā ca natthi,
analyzed: dassitā tam pana itam nāma rūpam na ahetukam yasmā sabbam sabbattha sabbadā ca natthi

original: tasmā sahetukaṃ. Kīdisena hetunā? Na issarādivisamahetunā. Yaṃ panettha vattabbaṃ,
analyzed: tasmā sa hetukam kīdisena hetunā na issara ādi visama hetunā yam pana ittha vattabbam

original: taṃ visuddhimaggasaṃvaṇṇanāyaṃ vuttanayena gahetabbaṃ. Sahetukattā eva sapaccayaṃ.
analyzed: tat visuddhi magga saṃvaṇṇanāyam vutta nayena gahetabbam sa hetuka ttā eva sa paccayam

original: Avijjādayoti avijjātaṇhupādānakammāhārādayo. Evanti “taṃ paneta”ntiādinā vuttappakārena

original: avijjādike paccaye ceva rūpavedanādike paccayuppannadhamme ca vavatthapetvā paricchinditvā

original: pariggahetvā. Vuttañhetaṃ “avijjāsamudayā rūpasamudayo, taṇhāsamudayā rūpasamudayo”ti.
analyzed: pariggahetvā vuttaṃ ha etam avijjā samudayāḥ rūpa samudayo taṇhā samudayāḥ rūpa samudayo ti

original: Ettāvatā kaṅkhāvitaraṇavisuddhiṃ dasseti.
analyzed: ettāvatā kaṅkhā vitaraṇa visuddhim dasseti

original: Hutvāti hetupaccayasamavāye uppajjitvā. Abhāvaṭṭhenāti tadanantarameva vinassanaṭṭhena.
analyzed: hutvā ti hetu paccaya samavāye uppajjitvā abhāva ṭhena ati tad anantaram eva vinassana ṭṭhena

original: Aniccāti aniccā addhuvā. Aniccalakkhaṇaṃ āropetīti tesu pañcasu khandhesu aniccatāsaṅkhātaṃ
analyzed: aniccā ati aniccā addhuvā anicca lakkhaṇam āropeti iti tesu pañcasu khandhesu anicca tā saṅkhātam

original: sāmaññalakkhaṇaṃ niropeti. Tatoti aniccalakkhaṇāropanato paraṃ, tato vā aniccabhāvato.
analyzed: sāmañña lakkhaṇam niropeti tatas ti anicca lakkhaṇa āropanato param tatas vā anicca bhāvato

original: Udayabbayappaṭipīḷanākārenāti uppādanirodhehi pati pati abhikkhaṇaṃ pīḷanākārena
analyzed: udaya bbaya paṭipīḷana ākārena ati uppāda nirodhehi pati pati abhikkhaṇam pīḷana ākārena

original: hetunā dukkhā aniṭṭhā, dukkhamā vā. Avasavattanākārenāti kassaci vasena avasavattanākārena.
analyzed: hetunā dukkhāḥ aniṭṭhāḥ dukkhamāḥ vā a vasavattana ākārena ati kassaci vasena a vasavattana ākārena

original: Anattāti na sayaṃ attā, nāpi nesaṃ koci attā atthīti anattāti. Tilakkhaṇaṃ āropetvāti
analyzed: anattā ati na sayam attā na api na isam koci attā atthi iti anattā ati ti lakkhaṇam āropetvā ati

original: sāmaññalakkhaṇaṃ āropetvā. Sammasantoti udayabbayañāṇuppattiyā uppanne vipassanupakkilese
analyzed: sāmañña lakkhaṇam āropetvā sammasanto ti udaya bbaya ñāṇa uppattiyā uppanne vipassanu pakkilese

original: pahāya maggāmaggaṃ vavatthapetvā udayabbayañāṇādivipassanāpaṭipāṭiyā saṅkhāre sammasanto
analyzed: pahāya magga amaggam vavatthapetvā udaya bbaya ñāṇa ādi vipassanā paṭipāṭiyā saṅkhāre sammasantaḥ

original: gotrabhuñāṇānantaraṃ lokuttaramaggaṃ pāpuṇāti.
analyzed: gotra bhuñāṇa anantaram lokuttara maggam pāpuṇāti

original: Ekapaṭivedhenāti ekeneva ñāṇena paṭivijjhanena. Paṭivedho paṭighātābhāvena visaye
analyzed: eka paṭivedhena ati ekena iva ñāṇena paṭivijjhanena paṭivedhaḥ paṭighāta abhāvena visaye

original: nissaṅgacārasaṅkhātaṃ nibbijjhanaṃ. Abhisamayo avirajjhitvā adhigamanasaṅkhāto avabodho.
analyzed: nissaṅga cāra saṅkhātam nibbijjhanam abhisamayaḥ a virajjhitvā adhigamana saṅkhātaḥ avabodhaḥ

original: “Idaṃ dukkhaṃ, ettaṃ dukkhaṃ, na ito bhiyyo”ti paricchinditvā yāthāvato jānanameva

analyzed: sā yathā upaṭṭhita visaya padaṭṭhānā vuccati viññāṇam ārammaṇe ekacca visesa ggahaṇa samattha bhāvato

original: gāmikapurisakahāpaṇadassanasadisaṃ vuttaṃ. Paññā pana ārammaṇe anavasesāvabodhato
analyzed: gāmika purisa kahāpaṇa dassana sadisam vuttam paññā pana ārammaṇe anavasesa avabodhato

original: heraññikakahāpaṇadassanasadisā vuttā. Nesanti saññāviññāṇapaññānaṃ. Visesoti sabhāvaviseso.
analyzed: heraññika kahāpaṇa dassana sadisāḥ vuttāḥ na esanti saññā viññāṇa paññānam visesaḥ ti sabhāva visesaḥ

original: Duppaṭivijjho pakatipaññāya. Imināva nesaṃ accantasukhumataṃ dasseti.
analyzed: duppaṭivijjhaḥ pakati paññāya iminā ava na esam accanta sukhuma tam dasseti

original: Ekārammaṇe pavattamānānanti ekasmiṃyeva ārammaṇe pavattamānānaṃ. Tena abhinnavisayābhinnakālatādassanena
analyzed: eka ārammaṇe pavattamānānam ti ekasmin yeva ārammaṇe pavattamānānam tena abhinna visaya abhinna kāla tā dassanena

original: avinibbhogavuttitaṃ vibhāvento duppaṭivijjhataṃyeva ulliṅgeti. Vavatthānanti asaṅkarato
analyzed: a vinibbhoga vutti tam vibhāventaḥ ulliṅgeti asaṅkarato

original: ṭhapanaṃ. Ayaṃ phasso…pe… idaṃ cittanti nidassanamattametaṃ. Iti-saddo vā ādiattho.
analyzed: ayam phassa upe idam cittam ti nidassanam attam etam iti saddaḥ vā ādi atthaḥ

original: Tena sesadhammānampi saṅgaho daṭṭhabbo. Idanti arūpīnaṃ dhammānaṃ vavatthānakaraṇaṃ.
analyzed: tena sesa dhammānam pi saṅgahaḥ daṭṭhabbo idam ti arūpīnam dhammānam vavatthāna karaṇam

original: Tatoti yaṃ vuttaṃ tilatelādiuddharaṇaṃ, tato. Yadi dukkarataraṃ, kathaṃ tanti āha
analyzed: tatas iti yam vuttam tila tela ādi uddharaṇam tatas yadi dukkarataram katham tat āha

original: “bhagavā panā”tiādi.
analyzed: bhagavā

original: 451. Nissaṭenāti nikkhantena ataṃsambandhena. Pariccattenāti pariccattasadisena paccayabhāvānupagamanena
analyzed: nissaṭena ati nikkhantena ataṃsambandhena pariccattena ati pariccatta sadisena paccaya bhāva anupagamanena

original: paccayuppannasambandhābhāvato. Nissakkavacanaṃ apādānadīpanato. Karaṇavacanaṃ kattuatthadīpanato.
analyzed: paccaya uppanna sambandha abhāvataḥ nissakka vacanam apādāna dīpanataḥ karaṇa vacanam kattu attha dīpanataḥ

original: Kāmāvacaramanoviññāṇaṃ na niyamato “idaṃ nāma pañcadvārikāsambandhā”ti sakkā vattuṃ,
analyzed: kāmāvacara manaḥ viññāṇam na niyamataḥ idam nāma pañca dvārikā sambandhā ati sakkā vattum

original: rūpāvacaraviññāṇaṃ pana na tathāti, tasseva pañcahi indriyehi nissaṭatā vuttāti āha
analyzed: rūpāvacara viññāṇam pana na tathā iti tassa iva pañcahi indriyehi nissaṭa tā vuttā ti āha

original: “rūpāvacaracatutthajjhānacittenā”ti. Catutthajjhānaggahaṇaṃ tasseva arūpāvacarassa
analyzed: rūpāvacara catuttha jhāna cittena ati catuttha jhāna ggahaṇam tassa iva arūpāvacarassa

original: padaṭṭhānabhāvato. Parisuddhenāti visesato asaṃkilesikattāva. Tañhi vigatūpakkilesatāya
analyzed: padaṭṭhāna bhāvataḥ parisuddhena ati visesataḥ tat hi vigata upakkilesa tāya

original: visesato parisuddhaṃ. Tenāha “nirupakkilesenā”ti. Jānitabbaṃ neyyaṃ, saparasantānesu
analyzed: visesataḥ parisuddham tena āha nirupakkilesena ati jānitabbam neyyam sa para santānesu

original: idaṃ atisayaṃ jānitabbato bujjhitabbaṃ bodhetabbaṃ vāti attho. Neyyanti vā attano
analyzed: idam atisayam jānitabbataḥ bujjhitabbam bodhetabbam vā ati atthaḥ na iyyanti vā attanaḥ

original: santāne netabbaṃ pavattetabbanti attho. Tenāha “nibbattetuṃ sakkā hoti. Ettha ṭhitassa
analyzed: santāne netabbam pavattetabbanti atthaḥ tena āha nibbattetum sakkā hoti ettha ṭhitassa

original: hi sā ijjhatī”ti. Pāṭiyekkanti visuṃ visuṃ, anupadadhammavasenāti attho. Abhinivesābhāvatoti
analyzed: hi sā ijjhati iti visum visum anupada dhamma vasena ati attho abhinivesa abhāvato ti

original: vipassanābhinivesassa asambhavato. Kalāpato nayatoti kalāpasammasanasaṅkhātato nayavipassanato.
analyzed: vipassanā abhinivesassa asambhavataḥ kalāpataḥ nayataḥ ti kalāpa sammasana saṅkhātataḥ naya vipassanato

original: Bhikkhunoti sāvakassa. Sāvakasseva hi tatra anupadadhammavipassanā na sambhavati,
analyzed: bhikkhuno ti sāvakassa sāvakassa iva hi tatra anupada dhamma vipassanā na sambhavati

original: na satthu. Tenāha “tasmā”tiādi. Vissajjesīti tappaṭibaddhachandarāgappahānena pajahati.
analyzed: na satthu tena āha tasmā atiādi vissajjesi iti tad paṭibaddha chanda rāga ppahānena pajahati

original: Hatthagatattāti hatthagatasadisattā, āsannattāti attho. Yadā hi lokanātho bodhimūle
analyzed: hattha gata ttā ati hattha gata sadisa ttā āsanna ttā ati atthaḥ yadā hi lokanāthaḥ bodhi mūle

original: aparājitapallaṅke nisinno – “kicchaṃ vatāyaṃ loko āpanno”tiādinā paṭiccasamuppādamukhena
analyzed: aparājita pallaṅke nisinnaḥ kiccham vata ayam lokaḥ āpannaḥ ti ādinā paṭiccasamuppāda mukhena

original: vipassanābhinivesaṃ katvā adhigantabbasabbaññutaññāṇānurūpaṃ chattiṃsakoṭisahassamukhena
analyzed: vipassanā abhinivesam katvā adhigantabba sabbaññuta ññāṇa anurūpam chattiṃsa koṭi sahassa mukhena
