analyzed: mahā vajira ñāṇam nāma mahā bodhisatta sammasanam pavattentaḥ aneka ākāra samāpatti dhamma sammasane

original: anupadameva nevasaññānāsaññāyatanadhammepi aparāparaṃ sammasi. Tenāha “bhagavā panā”tiādi.
analyzed: anupadam eva apara aparam sammasi tena āha bhagavā pana atiādi

original: Paropaññāsāti dvepaññāsaṃ. Kāmañcettha keci dhammā vedanādayo phassapañcamakādīsu
analyzed: dvepaññāsam kāmañca ittha keci dhammā vedanā ādayaḥ phassa pañcamaka ādīsu

original: vuttāpi jhānakoṭṭhāsādīsupi saṅgahitā, taṃtaṃpaccayabhāvavisiṭṭhena pana atthavisesena
analyzed: vuttā api jhāna koṭṭhāsa ādīsu pi saṅgahitā taṃ taṃ paccaya bhāva visiṭṭhena pana attha visesena

original: dhammantarāni viya hontīti evaṃ vuttaṃ. Tathā hi lokuttaracittuppādesu navindriyatā
analyzed: dhamma antarāni viya honti iti evam vuttam tathā hi lokuttara cittuppādesu nava indriya tā

original: vuccati. Aṅguddhārenāti tattha labbhamānajhānaṅgabojjhaṅgamaggaṅgānaṃ uddharaṇena.
analyzed: vuccati aṅga uddhārena ati tattha uddharaṇena

original: Aṅga-saddo vā koṭṭhāsapariyāyo, tasmā aṅguddhārenāti phassapañcamakādikoṭṭhāsānaṃ
analyzed: aṅga saddo vā koṭṭhāsa pariyāyaḥ tasmai aṅga uddhārena ati phassa pañcamaka ādi koṭṭhāsānam

original: samuddharaṇena. Yāvatā saññāsamāpattiyoti yattakā saññāsahagatā jhānasamāpattiyo,
analyzed: samuddharaṇena yāvatā saññā samāpattiyo ti yattakā saññā sahagatāḥ jhāna samāpattiyo

original: tāhi vuṭṭhāya adhigandhabbattā tāvatikā veneyyānaṃ aññāpaṭivedho arahattasamadhigamo.
analyzed: tāhi vuṭṭhāya tāvatikā veneyyānam aññā paṭivedhaḥ arahatta samadhigamo

original: Dassanapariṇāyakaṭṭhenāti andhassa yaṭṭhikoṭiṃ gahetvā maggadesako viya dhammānaṃ
analyzed: dassana pariṇāyaka ṭṭhena ati andhassa yaṭṭhi koṭim gahetvā magga desakaḥ viya dhammānam

original: yathāsabhāvadassanasaṅkhātena pariṇāyakabhāvena. Yathā vā so tassa cakkhubhūto, evaṃ
analyzed: yathā sabhāva dassana saṅkhātena pariṇāyaka bhāvena yathā vā saḥ tassa cakkhu bhūtaḥ evam

original: sattānaṃ paññā. Tenāha “cakkhubhūtāya paññāyā”ti. Samādhisampayuttā paññā samādhipaññā.
analyzed: sattānam paññā tena āha cakkhu bhūtāya paññāya ati samādhi sampayuttā paññā samādhi paññā

original: Samādhi cettha āruppasamādhīti vadanti, sammasanapayogo pana koci jhānasamādhīti
analyzed: samādhi ca ittha āruppa samādhi iti vadanti sammasana payogaḥ pana koci jhāna samādhi iti

original: yuttaṃ. Vipassanābhūtā paññā vipassanāpaññā. Samādhipaññāya antosamāpattiyaṃ kiccato
analyzed: yuttam vipassanā bhūtā paññā vipassanā paññā samādhi paññāya antosamāpattiyam kiccato

original: pajānāti, “samāhito yathābhūtaṃ pajānātī”ti pana vacanato asammohato pajānāti. Tattha
analyzed: pajānāti samāhitaḥ yathābhūtam pajānāti iti pana vacanataḥ asammohato pajānāti tattha

original: kiccatoti gocarajjhatte ārammaṇakaraṇakiccato. Asammohatoti sampayuttadhammesu sammohavidhamanato
analyzed: kiccato ti gocara jjhatte ārammaṇa karaṇa kiccato asammohato ti sampayutta dhammesu sammoha vidhamanato

original: yathā pītipaṭisaṃvedanādīsu. Kimatthiyāti kiṃpayojanāti āha “ko etissā attho”ti.
analyzed: yathā pīti paṭisaṃvedana ādīsu kim atthiyā iti kiṃpayojanā ti āha kaḥ etissā attho ti

original: Abhiññeyye dhammeti yāthāvasarasalakkhaṇāvabodhavasena abhimukhaṃ ñeyye jānitabbe
analyzed: abhiññeyye dhamme iti yāthāvasa rasa lakkhaṇa avabodha vasena abhimukham ñeyye jānitabbe

original: khandhāyatanādidhamme. Abhijānātīti salakkhaṇato sāmaññalakkhaṇato ca abhimukhaṃ
analyzed: khandha āyatana ādi dhamme abhijānāti iti sa lakkhaṇato sāmañña lakkhaṇato ca abhimukham

original: avirajjhanavasena jānāti. Etena ñātapariññābyāpāramāha. Pariññeyyeti aniccātipi dukkhātipi
analyzed: a virajjhana vasena jānāti etena ñāta pariññā byāpāram āha pariññeyyā iti anicca atipi dukkha atipi

original: anattātipi paricchijja jānitabbe. Parijānātīti “yaṃ kiñci rūpaṃ…pe… aniccaṃ khayaṭṭhenā”tiādinā
analyzed: paricchijja jānitabbe parijānāti iti yam kiñci aniccam khaya ṭṭhena ati ādinā

original: paricchinditvā jānāti. Iminā tīraṇapariññābyāpāramāha. Pahātabbe dhammeti niccasaññādike
analyzed: paricchinditvā jānāti iminā tīraṇa pariññā byāpāram āha pahātabbe dhamma iti nicca saññā ādike

original: yāva arahattamaggavajjhā sabbe pāpadhamme. Pajahati pakaṭṭhato jahati, vikkhambheti
analyzed: yāva arahatta magga vajjhā sabbe pāpa dhamme pajahati pakaṭṭhataḥ jahati vikkhambheti

original: ceva samucchindati cāti attho. Iminā pahānapariññābyāpāramāha. Sā panesā paññā lokiyāpi
analyzed: ca iva samucchindati ca ati atthaḥ iminā pahāna pariññā byāpāram āha sā pana isā paññā lokiyā api

original: tippakārā lokuttarāpi, tāsaṃ visesaṃ sayamevāha. Kiccatoti abhijānanavasena ārammaṇakiccato.
analyzed: tippakārā lokuttarā api tāsam visesam sayam eva āha kiccataḥ ti abhijānana vasena ārammaṇa kiccato

original: Asammohatoti yathābalaṃ abhiññeyyādīsu sammohavidhamanato. Nibbānamārammaṇaṃ katvā
analyzed: asammohato ti yathābalam abhiññeyya ādīsu sammoha vidhamanataḥ nibbānam ārammaṇam katvā

original: pavattanato abhiññeyyādīsu vigatasammohato evāti āha “lokuttarā asammohato”ti.
analyzed: pavattanataḥ abhiññeyya ādīsu vigata sammohataḥ eva ati āha lokuttarāḥ asammohato ti

original: 452. Kammassakatā sammādiṭṭhi ca vaṭṭanissitattā idha nādhippetā, vivaṭṭakathā hesāti
analyzed: kammassaka tā sammādiṭṭhi ca vaṭṭa nissita ttā idha na adhippetā vivaṭṭa kathā ha isā ati

original: vuttaṃ “vipassanāsammādiṭṭhiyā ca maggasammādiṭṭhiyā cā”ti. Parato ghosoti parato
analyzed: vuttam vipassanā sammādiṭṭhiyā ca magga sammādiṭṭhiyā ca ati paratas ghoso ti paratas

original: satthuto, sāvakato vā labbhamāno dhammaghoso. Tenāha “sappāyadhammassavana”nti. Tañhi
analyzed: satthutaḥ sāvakataḥ vā labbhamānaḥ dhammaghoso tena āha sappāya dhamma ssavanam ti tat hi

original: sammādiṭṭhiyā paccayo bhavituṃ sakkoti, na yo koci paratoghoso. Upāyamanasikāroti
analyzed: sammādiṭṭhiyā paccayaḥ bhavitum sakkoti na yaḥ koci paratoghosaḥ upāya manasikāro ti

original: yena nāmarūpapariggahādi sijjhati, tādiso pathamanasikāro. Ayañca sammādiṭṭhiyā paccayoti
analyzed: yena nāma rūpa pariggaha ādi sijjhati tādisaḥ patha manasikāraḥ ayam ca sammādiṭṭhiyā paccayo ti

original: niyamapakkhiko, na sabbasaṃgāhakoti dassento “paccekabuddhānaṃ panā”tiādimāha. Yonisomanasikārasmiṃyevāti
analyzed: niyama pakkhikaḥ na sabba saṃgāhakaḥ ti dassento paccekabuddhānam pana iti ādim āha yoniso manasikārasmiṃ yeva iti

original: avadhāraṇena paratoghosameva nivatteti, na padaṭṭhānavisesaṃ paṭiyogīnivattanatthattā eva-saddassa.
analyzed: avadhāraṇena paratas ghosam eva nivatteti na padaṭṭhāna visesam paṭiyogī nivattana ttha ttā eva saddassa

original: Laddhupakārāti yathārahaṃ nissayādivasena laddhapaccayā. Vipassanāsammādiṭṭhiyā anuggahitabhāvena

original: vā. Aggaphalasamādhimhi tapparikkhāradhammesuyeva ca kevalo cetopariyāyo niruḷhoti
analyzed: vā agga phala samādhimhi ca kevalaḥ cetaḥ pariyāyaḥ niruḷhaḥ ti

original: sammādiṭṭhīti arahattamaggasammādiṭṭhi. Phalakkhaṇeti anantare kālantare cāti duvidhe
analyzed: sammādiṭṭhi iti arahatta magga sammādiṭṭhi phala khaṇe iti anantare kāla antare ca ati duvidhe

original: phalakkhaṇe. Paṭippassaddhivasena sabbasaṃkilesehi ceto vimuccati etāyāti cetovimutti,
analyzed: phala khaṇe paṭippassaddhi vasena sabba saṃkilesehi cetaḥ vimuccati etāya ati cetaḥ vimutti

original: aggaphalapaññaṃ ṭhapetvā avasesā phaladhammā. Tenāha “cetovimutti phalaṃ assāti.
analyzed: agga phala paññam ṭhapetvā avasesā phala dhammā tena āha cetaḥ vimutti phalam assa ati

original: Cetovimuttisaṅkhātaṃ phalaṃ ānisaṃso”ti, sabbasaṃkilesehi cetaso vimuccanasaṅkhātaṃ
analyzed: cetaḥ vimutti saṅkhātam phalam ānisaṃso ti sabba saṃkilesehi cetasaḥ vimuccana saṅkhātam

original: paṭippassambhanasaññitaṃ pahānaṃ phalaṃ ānisaṃso cāti yojanā. Idha ca cetovimutti-saddena
analyzed: paṭippassambhana saññitam pahānam phalam ānisaṃso ca ati yojanā idha ca cetaḥ vimutti saddena

original: pahānamattaṃ gahitaṃ, pubbe pahāyakadhammā, aññathā phaladhammā eva ānisaṃsoti gayhamāne
analyzed: pahāna mattam gahitam pubbe pahāyaka dhammāḥ aññathā phala dhammāḥ eva ānisaṃso ti gayhamāne

original: punavacanaṃ niratthakaṃ siyā.
analyzed: punavacanam niratthakam siyā

original: Paññāvimuttiphalānisaṃsāti etthāpi evameva attho veditabbo. Sammāvācākammantājīvā
analyzed: paññā vimutti phala anisaṃsā ti ettha api evam eva atthaḥ veditabbo sammā vācā kammanta ājīvā

original: sīlasabhāvattā visesato samādhissa upakārā, tathā sammāsaṅkappo jhānasabhāvattā.
analyzed: sīla sabhāva ttā visesataḥ samādhissa upakārā tathā sammāsaṅkappaḥ jhāna sabhāva ttā

original: Tathā hi so “appanā”ti niddiṭṭho. Sammāsatisammāvāyāmā pana samādhipakkhiyā evāti
analyzed: tathā hi so appanā ti niddiṭṭho sammā sati sammā vāyāmā pana samādhi pakkhiyā eva ati

original: āha “avasesā dhammā cetovimuttīti veditabbā”ti. Catupārisuddhisīlanti ariyamaggādhigamassa
analyzed: āha avasesā dhammā cetaḥ vimutti iti veditabbā ati catu pārisuddhi sīlam ti ariya magga adhigamassa

original: padaṭṭhānabhūtaṃ catupārisuddhisīlaṃ. Sutādīsupi eseva nayo. Attano cittappavattiārocanavasena
analyzed: padaṭṭhāna bhūtam catu pārisuddhi sīlam suta ādīsu pi esa iva nayaḥ attano citta ppavatti ārocana vasena

original: saha kathanaṃ saṃkathā, saṃkathāva sākacchā. Idha pana kammaṭṭhānapaṭibaddhāti āha
analyzed: saha kathanam saṃkathā saṃkathā ava sākacchā idha pana kammaṭṭhāna paṭibaddhā iti āha

original: “kammaṭṭhāne…pe… kathā”ti. Tattha kammaṭṭhānassa ekavāraṃ vīthiyā appaṭipajjanaṃ
analyzed: kathā ti tattha kammaṭṭhānassa eka vāram vīthiyāḥ appaṭipajjanam

original: khalanaṃ, anekavāraṃ pakkhalanaṃ, tadubhayassa vicchedanīkathā khalanapakkhalanachedanakathā.
analyzed: khalanam aneka vāram pakkhalanam tad ubhayassa vicchedanī kathā khalana pakkhalana chedana kathā

original: Pūrentassāti vivaṭṭanissitaṃ katvā pālentassa brūhentassa ca. Suṇantassāti “yathāuggahitakammaṭṭhānaṃ
analyzed: pūrentassa ati vivaṭṭa nissitam katvā pālentassa brūhentassa ca suṇantassa ati yathā uggahita kammaṭṭhānam

original: phātiṃ gamissatī”ti evaṃ suṇantassa. Teneva hi “sappāyadhammassavana”nti vuttaṃ.
analyzed: phātim gamissati iti evam suṇantassa tena iva hi sappāya dhamma ssavanam ti vuttam

original: Kammaṃ karontassāti bhāvanānuyogakammaṃ karontassa.
analyzed: kammam karontassa ati bhāvanā anuyoga kammam karontassa

original: Pañcasupi ṭhānesu anta-saddo hetuatthajotano daṭṭhabbo. Evañhi “yathā hī”tiādinā

original: māluvāphale poṭṭalikā. Santāsaṃ āpajjeyyāti sāle adhivatthadevatāya pavattiṃ gahetvā
analyzed: māluvā phale poṭṭalikā santāsam āpajjeyyāti sāle adhivattha devatāya pavattim gahetvā

original: vuttaṃ. Tadā hi tassā evaṃ hoti. Koviḷārapattasadisehīti mahākoviḷārapattasaṇṭhānehi.
analyzed: vuttam tadā hi tassā evam hoti koviḷāra patta sadisehi iti mahā koviḷāra patta saṇṭhānehi

original: Saṇṭhānavasena hetaṃ vuttaṃ, māluvāpattā pana koviḷārapattehi mahantatarāni ceva
analyzed: saṇṭhāna vasena ha etam vuttam māluvā pattā pana koviḷāra pattehi mahantatarāni ca iva

original: ghanatarāni ca honti. Vipulabahughanagarupattatāya mahantaṃ bhāraṃ janetvā. Sāti
analyzed: ghanatarāni ca honti vipula bahu ghana garu patta tāya mahantam bhāram janetvā sāti

original: māluvālatā. Oghananti heṭṭhato olambanahetubhūtaṃ ghanabhāvaṃ.
analyzed: māluvāla tāḥ oghananti heṭṭhatas olambana hetu bhūtam ghana bhāvam

original: Andhavanasubhagavanaggahaṇaṃ tesaṃ abhilakkhitabhāvato. Nāḷikerādīsu tiṇajātīsu.
analyzed: tesam abhilakkhita bhāvataḥ nāḷikera ādīsu tiṇa jātīsu

original: Khādanupalakkhaṇaṃ upacikānaṃ uṭṭhahanaggahaṇanti āha “uṭṭhaheyyu”nti. Keḷiṃ karontī

original: viyāti vilambananadī viya keḷiṃ karontī. Idāni ahaṃ taṃ ajjhottharinti pamodamānā
analyzed: viyāti vilambana nadī keḷim karontī idāni aham tam pamodamānā

original: viya ito cito ca vipphandamānā vilambantī. Samphassopi sukho mudutaluṇakomalabhāvato.
analyzed: viya itas citas ca vipphandamānā vilambantī samphassaḥ api sukhaḥ mudu taluṇa komala bhāvato

original: Dassanampi sukhaṃ ghanabahalapattasaṃhatatāya. Somanassajātāti pubbe anussavavasena
analyzed: dassanam pi sukham ghana bahala patta saṃhata tāya somanassa jātā ati pubbe anussava vasena

original: bhavanavināsabhayā santāsaṃ āpajji, idāni tassā sampattidassanena palobhitā somanassajātā ahosi.
analyzed: bhavana vināsa bhayā santāsam āpajji idāni tassā sampatti dassanena palobhitā somanassa jātā ahosi

original: Viṭabhiṃ kareyyāti ātānavitānavasena jaṭentī jālaṃ kareyya. Tathābhūtā ca ghanapattasañchannatāya
analyzed: viṭabhim kareyya ati ātāna vitāna vasena jaṭentī jālam kareyya tathābhūtā ca ghana patta sañchanna tāya

original: chattasadisī hotīti āha “chattākārena tiṭṭheyyā”ti. Sakalaṃ rukkhanti upari sabbasākhāpasākhaṃ
analyzed: chatta sadisī hoti iti āha chatta ākārena tiṭṭheyya ati sakalam rukkhanti upari sabba sākhā pasākham

original: sabbarukkhaṃ. Bhassamānāti paliveṭhanavaseneva otaramānā. Yāva mūlā otiṇṇasākhāhīti

analyzed: māluvā bhārena onamitvā rukkhassa yāva mūlā otiṇṇa sākhāhi puna abhiruhamānā sabba sākhā ati

original: 471. Bahalarāgasabhāvoti paccavekkhaṇāhi nīharituṃ asakkuṇeyyatāya balavā hutvā abhibhavanarāgadhātuko.

original: 472. Kammaniyāmenāti purimajātisiddhena lobhussadatādiniyamitena kammaniyāmena. Idāni
analyzed: kamma niyāmena ati purima jāti siddhena lobhussada tā ādi niyamitena kamma niyāmena idāni

original: kammakaraṇavelāya. Lobho balavāti tajjāya sāmaggiyā sāmatthiyato lobho adhiko hoti.

original: Cūḷadhammasamādānasuttavaṇṇanāya līnatthappakāsanā samattā.

original: 6. Mahādhammasamādānasuttavaṇṇanā
473. Evaṃ idāni vuccamānākāro kāmo kāmanaṃ icchā etesanti evaṃkāmā. Evaṃ chando chandanaṃ
analyzed: evam idāni vuccamāna ākāraḥ kāmaḥ kāmanam icchā etesanti evaṃkāmāḥ evam chandaḥ chandanam

original: adhippāyo, laddhi. Sā hi laddhabbavatthuṃ abhimukhaṃ “evameta”nti abhinivisantī tena

original: adhigacchanakasambandhīni, tāni ca sammāsambuddhamūlakāni anaññavisayattā. Tenāha
analyzed: adhigacchanaka sambandhīni tāni ca sammāsambuddha mūlakāni an añña visaya ttā tena āha

original: paññapetā. Tenāha “yathāsabhāvato”tiādi.

original: Paṭisaranti etthāti paṭisaraṇaṃ, bhagavā paṭisaraṇaṃ etesanti bhagavaṃpaṭisaraṇā.
analyzed: paṭisaranti ettha ati paṭisaraṇam bhagavā paṭisaraṇam etesanti bhagavaṃpaṭisaraṇā

original: Paṭisarati sabhāvasampaṭivedhavasena paccekamupagacchatīti vā paṭisaraṇaṃ, bhagavā
analyzed: paṭisarati sa bhāva sampaṭivedha vasena paccekam upagacchati iti vā paṭisaraṇam bhagavā

original: paṭisaraṇaṃ etesanti bhagavaṃpaṭisaraṇā. Paṭivedhavasenāti paṭivijjhitabbatāvasena.

analyzed: asati api mukhe atthataḥ evam vadantaḥ viya hoti iti āha phassaḥ āgacchati aham bhagavā

original: 474. Nissayitabbeti attano santāne uppādanavasena apassayitabbe. Tatiyacatutthadhammasamādānāni

original: Baddhacaroti paṭibaddhacariyo. Tenāha “antevāsiko”ti. Taṃ nissāyevāti raññā upaṭṭhiyamānopi rājānaṃ pahāya taṃ kappaṃ antevāsiṃ nissāyeva.

analyzed: āgamissati imam pana atīta vatthum āharitvā attanaḥ ñāṇa anubhāva dīpana mukhena māram

original: santajjento mahāthero “yo etamabhijānātī”ti gāthamāha. Tassattho – yo mahābhiñño
analyzed: mahā theraḥ yaḥ etam abhijānāti iti gātham āha tassa atthaḥ yaḥ mahā abhiñño

original: etaṃ kammaṃ kammaphalañca hatthatale ṭhapitaṃ āmalakaṃ viya abhimukhaṃ katvā paccakkhato
analyzed: etam kammam kamma phalam ca hattha tale ṭhapitam āmalakam viya abhimukham katvā paccakkhataḥ

original: jānāti. Sabbaso bhinnakilesatāya bhikkhu sammāsambuddhassa aggasāvako, tādisaṃ uḷāraguṇaṃ
analyzed: jānāti sabbasas bhinna kilesa tāya bhikkhu sammāsambuddhassa agga sāvako tādisam uḷāra guṇam

original: āsajja ghaṭṭayitvā ekantakāḷakehi pāpadhammehi samannāgatattā kaṇha māra āyatiṃ mahādukkhaṃ vindissasi.
analyzed: āsajja ghaṭṭayitvā ekanta kāḷakehi pāpa dhammehi samannāgata ttā kaṇha māra āyatim mahā dukkham vindissasi

original: Udakaṃ vatthuṃ katvāti tattha nibbattanakasattānaṃ sādhāraṇakammaphalena mahāsamuddaudakameva
analyzed: udakam vatthum katvā ti tattha nibbattanaka sattānam sādhāraṇa kamma phalena mahā samudda odakam eva

original: adhiṭṭhānaṃ katvā. Tathā hi tāni kappaṭṭhitikāni honti. Tenāha “kappaṭṭhāyino”ti.
analyzed: adhiṭṭhānam katvā tathā hi tāni kappa ṭṭhitikāni honti tena āha kappa ṭṭhāyinaḥ ti

original: Tesanti vimānānaṃ. Etaṃ yathāvuttavimānavatthuṃ tāsaṃ accharānaṃ sampattiṃ, tassa
analyzed: tesanti vimānānam etam yathā vutta vimāna vatthum tāsam accharānam sampattim tassa

original: ca kāraṇaṃ attapaccakkhaṃ katvā jānāti. Pādaṅguṭṭhena kampayīti pubbārāme visākhāya
analyzed: ca kāraṇam atta paccakkham katvā jānāti pādaṅguṭṭhena kampayīti pubbārāme visākhāya

original: mahāupāsikāya kāritaṃ sahassagabbhapaṭimaṇḍitamahāpāsādaṃ attano pādaṅguṭṭhena kampesi.
analyzed: mahā upāsikāya kāritam sahassa gabbha paṭimaṇḍita mahā pāsādam attanaḥ pādaṅguṭṭhena kampesi

original: Tenāha “idaṃ pāsādakampanasuttena dīpetabba”nti. Idanti “yo vejayanta”nti imissā
analyzed: tena āha idam pāsādakampana suttena dīpetabbanti idam ti yaḥ imissā

original: gāthāya atthajātaṃ cūḷataṇhāsaṅkhayavimuttisutteneva dīpetabbaṃ.
analyzed: gāthāya attha jātam cūḷa taṇhā saṅkhaya vimutti suttena iva dīpetabbam

original: Tassa brahmagaṇassa tathācintanasamanantarameva tasmiṃ brahmaloke sudhammaṃ brahmasabhaṃ
analyzed: tassa brahma gaṇassa tathā cintana samanantaram eva tasmin brahma loke sudhammam brahma sabham

original: gantvā. Tepīti mahāmoggallānādayo. Paccekaṃ disāsūti mahāmoggallānatthero puratthimadisāyaṃ,
analyzed: gantvā te pi iti mahāmoggallāna ādayo paccekam disāsu iti mahāmoggallāna thero

original: mahākassapatthero dakkhiṇadisāyaṃ, mahākappinatthero pacchimadisāyaṃ, anuruddhatthero
analyzed: mahākassapa theraḥ dakkhiṇa disā ayam mahākappina thero pacchima disā ayam anuruddha tthero

original: uttaradisāyanti evaṃ cattāro therā brahmaparisamatthake majjhe nisinnassa bhagavato
analyzed: uttara disā āyanti evam cattāro therāḥ brahmaparisamatthake majjhe nisinnassa bhagavato

original: samantato catuddisā nisīdiṃsu. Gāthā vuttāti “yo brahmaṃ paripucchatī”ti gāthā vuttā.
analyzed: samantataḥ catuddisā nisīdiṃsu gāthā vuttā ati yaḥ brahmam paripucchati iti gāthā vuttā

original: Aññatarabrahmasuttenāti – “tena kho pana samayena aññatarassa brahmuno evarūpaṃ pāpakaṃ
analyzed: aññatara brahma suttena ati tena kho pana samayena aññatarassa brahmunaḥ evarūpam pāpakam

original: diṭṭhigataṃ uppannaṃ hotī”tiādinā mahāvagge āgatena aññatarabrahmasuttena.
analyzed: diṭṭhigatam uppannam hoti itiādinā mahā vagge āgatena aññatara brahma suttena

original: Jhānavimokkhena phusīti jhānavimokkhasannissayena abhiññāñāṇena phassayi. Vananti
analyzed: jhāna vimokkhena phusi iti jhāna vimokkha sannissayena abhiññā ñāṇena phassayi vananti

original: jambudīpaṃ aphassayīti sambandho. Jambudīpo hi vanabahulatāya idha “vana”nti vutto.
analyzed: jambudīpam aphassayi iti sambandhaḥ jambudīpaḥ hi vana bahula tāya idha vananti vuttaḥ

original: Tenāha “jambusaṇḍassa issaro”ti. Pubbavidehānaṃ dīpanti pubbavidehavāsīnaṃ dīpaṃ,
analyzed: tena āha jambusaṇḍassa issaraḥ ti pubbavidehānam dīpanti pubbavideha vāsīnam dīpam

original: pubbavidehadīpanti attho. Bhūmisayā narā nāma aparagoyānakā uttarakurukā ca. Yasmā
analyzed: atthaḥ bhūmisayāḥ narāḥ nāma aparagoyānakāḥ uttarakurukā ca yasmā

original: te gehapariggahābhāvato bhūmiyaṃyeva sayanti, na pāsādādīsu. Paṭilabhīti uppādesi.
analyzed: te geha pariggaha abhāvataḥ bhūmiyaṃyeva sayanti na pāsāda ādīsu

original: Etaṃ āsaṃ mā akāsīti esā yathā pubbe dūsimārassa, evaṃ tuyhaṃ āsā dīgharattaṃ anatthāvahā,
analyzed: etam āsam mā akāsi iti esā yathā pubbe dūsimārassa evam tuyham āsā dīgharattam anattha āvahā

original: tasmā edisaṃ āsaṃ mā akāsīti mārassa ovādaṃ adāsi. Sesaṃ sabbattha suviññeyyameva.
analyzed: tasmai edisam āsam mā akāsi iti mārassa ovādam adāsi sesam sabbattha su viññeyyam eva

original: Papañcasūdaniyā majjhimanikāyaṭṭhakathāya
analyzed: papañcasūdaniyā majjhima nikāya ṭṭhakathāya

original: Māratajjanīyasuttavaṇṇanāya līnatthappakāsanā samattā.
Niṭṭhitā ca cūḷayamakavaggavaṇṇanā.
analyzed: niṭṭhitā ca cūḷayamaka vagga vaṇṇanā

original: Mūlapaṇṇāsaṭīkā samattā.
analyzed: mūla paṇṇā saṭīkā samattā

original: Dutiyo bhāgo niṭṭhito.
analyzed: dutiyaḥ bhāgaḥ niṭṭhitaḥ
